`CheatScripts/Ret Address Recorder.txt`:

```txt
// Ret Address Recorder
[ENABLE]
Alloc(HookProc, 128)
Label(LoopSearch)
Label(Return)
Label(AddToList)
Alloc(EspList, 2048)
Alloc(Count, 4)
RegisterSymbol(HookProc)
RegisterSymbol(EspList)
RegisterSymbol(Count)

HookProc:
Pushad
Mov Eax, [Esp+20]
Cmp Eax, 00401000 // [Esp] 下限
Jl Return
Cmp Eax, 7FFFFFFF // [Esp] 上限
Jg Return
Mov Ebx, EspList
Mov Ecx, [Count]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je AddToList
Dec Ecx
LoopSearch:
Cmp [Ebx+Ecx*4], Eax
Je Return
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je AddToList
Dec Ecx
Jmp LoopSearch
AddToList:
Mov Ecx, [Count]
Mov [Ebx+Ecx*4], Eax
Inc [Count]
Return:
Popad
// Orginal Code Here Please

// Jump Back Here Please

// {Address}:
// Jmp HookProc
[DISABLE]
// Restore Hook Here Please

Dealloc(HookProc)
Dealloc(EspList)
Dealloc(Count)
UnregisterSymbol(HookProc)
UnregisterSymbol(EspList)
UnregisterSymbol(Count)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_Pointer.txt`:

```txt
[Pointer&Offset] For TWMS
[VERSION] V126
[UPDATE] 屌王
[TIME] 2010.1.19

人物動作　　　00CDE80C　450
技能動作　　　00CDE80C　454
人物節拍　　　00CDE80C　458
停止呼吸　　　00CDE80C　44C
角色X座標　　 00CDEE20　B00
角色Y座標　　 00CDEE20　B04
角色X座標　　 00CDE80C　44B4
角色Y座標　　 00CDE80C　44B8
紅點數量　　　00CDE804　18
系統時間　　　00CDEC18　1C
主動技次數　　00CDE80C　3A18
輔助技次數　　00CDE80C　3A28
//--------------------------------------------------
左牆值　　　　00CDE800　offset   24
上牆值　　　　00CDE800　offset   28
右牆值　　　　00CDE800　offset   2C
下牆值　　　　00CDE800　offset   30
傳送點　　　　00CE0D84　offset   18
怪物數量　　　00CDE808　offset   24
怪物死亡　　　00CDE808　offset   38 
怪物消失　　　00CDE808　offset   4C
超撿　　　　　00CDA090　offset   2088
頻道資訊　　　00CDA090　offset   2050
地上物品數量　00CE0C80　offset   14
地上物品數量　00CE9D90　offset   14
滑鼠 X Y　　　00CDEC14　offset 978　offset　X 88　Y 8C
CharPID　　　00CDE80C　offset 17F4
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_crcbypass.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(Hook,256)
Hook:
Label(HSCRCBypass)
Label(BackToOP)
Label(MSCRCBypass)
Label(BackToMS)
Label(MSCRCCrack)
Label(BackToCrack)

HSCRCBypass:
Mov Eax,Fs:[20]
Cmp Eax,[Esp+0C]
Jne BackToOP
Mov Fs:[34], 57
Xor Eax, Eax
Ret 000C

BackToOP:
Push Ebp
Mov Ebp, Esp
Jmp OpenProcess+5

MSCRCBypass:
Push Esi
Xor Eax,[Esi+Ecx*4]
Cmp Esi,00401000
Jnge BackToMS
Cmp Esi,00BFC000
Jg BackToMS
Sub Esi,00401000
Push Ebx
Mov Ebx,[00400B80]
Xor Ebx,FAFA1234
Add Esi,Ebx
Pop Ebx

BackToMS:
Xor Eax,[Esi+Ecx*4]
And Eax,000000FF
Pop Esi
Push 00816D8D
Ret

MSCRCCrack:
Cmp Edx,00816D85
Jnge BackToCrack
Cmp Edx,00816D8D
Jg BackToCrack
Sub Edx,00401000
Push Ebx
Mov Ebx,[00400B80]
Xor Ebx,FAFA1234
Add Edx,Ebx
Pop Ebx
Push [Edx]

BackToCrack:
Push 00DBD2BB
Ret

OpenProcess:
        Jmp    HSCRCBypass
00816D88:
        Jmp    MSCRCBypass
00DC3DFA:
        Jmp    MSCRCCrack
004E62A9:
        Nop
        Nop
        Nop
        Nop
        Nop
[Disable]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_吸怪定怪_強化版1_(時間版)改.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------
//名稱：v126.吸怪定怪
//Origin：aaaddress1
//※使用方式:
//開啟後,設定LR_SET為需要模式.
//就會看到全圖怪物定住,並且吸到你指定的方向.
//更改:草尼馬(新增Y軸)
//------------------------------
[enable]
Alloc(Drop, 256)
Alloc(y_axis, 256)
Alloc(Vac, 512)
Alloc(Control, 4)
Alloc(OnoffLr, 4)
registersymbol(gwgs)
alloc(gwgs,512)
registersymbol(zgkzkg)
alloc(zgkzkg,4)
registersymbol(zgkzkg)
alloc(zgkzkg,4)
label(gwxy)
label(gwxz)
label(gwxzj)
label(ksxz)
label(ksxy)
Label(Vac02)
Label(Vac01)
Label(TrueInfo)
Label(Vac03)
Label(Vac04)
Label(Drop01)
Label(y_axis02)
//------------------------------
gwgs:
db dc 6d e4 83 c4 10
pushad
call gwxzj
popad
jmp 007F7BDF
//------------------------------
gwxz:
cmp eax,01
mov [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF
cmp [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF
jg  ksxz
ret
//------------------------------
ksxz:
mov [ebx+000001dc],2
ret
//------------------------------
gwxy:
cmp eax,01
mov [ebx+000001e8],1
cmp [ebx+000001e8],1
jg ksxy
ret
//------------------------------
ksxy:
mov [ebx+000001dc],4
ret
//------------------------------
gwxzj:
push eax
mov eax,[00CDEE20] 
mov eax,[eax+B00]
sub eax,64
cmp [ebx+0000071c],eax 
pop eax
jl gwxy
push eax
mov eax,[00CDEE20] 
mov eax,[eax+B00]
add eax,64
cmp [ebx+0000071c],eax 
pop eax
jg gwxz
mov [ebx+000001e8],0
ret
//------------------------------
Drop:
cmp [OnoffLr],0
je Drop01

Drop01:
mov eax,[ebx+000002e0]
jmp 007F7BF9
//-------------------------------------------------------------//Y軸部分

y_axis:
cmp [OnoffLr],0
je y_axis02

y_axis02:
cmp dword ptr [ebx+000001dc],00
je Drop
mov ecx,[ebx+000001a4]
jmp 007f0796

//-------------------------------------------------------------//Y軸部分
Vac:
cmp [esp],005B3BBA
je Vac01
cmp [esp],005B3C80
je Vac02
//------------------------------
TrueInfo:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
mov eax,[ebp+08]
jmp 00405900
//------------------------------
Vac02:
add esp,4
pop ecx
pop ecx
mov ecx,esi
mov edi,eax
call 00594265
mov edx,eax
sub edx,edi
mov ecx,esi
push eax
mov eax,[00CDEC18]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp eax,[Control]
jl Vac03
sub eax,bb8           //吸5秒
cmp eax,[Control]
jl Vac04
mov [Control],eax
add [Control],1770    //放5秒
Vac04:                
pop eax
mov [OnoffLr],1
jmp 005b3e3b
Vac03:
pop eax
mov [OnoffLr],0
jmp 005B3C9E
Vac01:
ret
//------------------------------
004058fa:
jmp Vac
nop
007F7BF3:
jmp Drop
nop
007F7BD9:
jmp gwgs
007F0753:
jmp y_axis
//------------------------------
[disable]
007F7BF3:
mov eax,[ebx+000002e0]
004058fa:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
mov eax,[ebp+08]
007F7BD9:
DB dc 6d e4 83 c4 10 dd 55 e4
007F0753:
DB 83 bb dc 01 00 00 00
```

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
//名稱：v126.地雷無延遲
//原創：aaaddress1
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
//code from here to '[DISABLE]' will be used to enable the cheat

0078D817:
db 83 e8 00 90 90 90

0078D810:
db 90 90


00CE929D:
DB 90 D5 71 80 31 F2 24 8C 91 27 09 98 8F 1A 76 8C 13 0D C1 3A A0 07 06 56 A7 E4 11

[DISABLE]
//code from here till the end of the code will be used to disable the cheat
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_技能無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(HookTime,4)
alloc(MyHookTime,128)
label(ReturnRealVal)
007CE02F:
jmp MyHookTime
MyHookTime:
mov eax,[00CDEC18]
sub [eax+1C],2710
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
mov [eax+44C],0
cmp [eax+454],ffffffff
je ReturnRealVal
mov [eax+454],ffffffff
add [HookTime],bb8
jmp ReturnRealVal
ReturnRealVal:
mov eax,[00CDEC18]
add [eax+1C],2710
mov eax,[00CDEC18]
mov eax,[eax+1C]
add eax,[HookTime]
ret
[DISABLE]
007CE02F:
mov eax,[00CDEC18]
mov eax,[eax+1C]
ret
dealloc(HookTime)
dealloc(MyHookTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_控怪(ReName+DeAlloc).txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
alloc(ControlMonster,512)
alloc(ControlMode,4)
registersymbol(ControlMode)
label(JumpMonster)
label(WalkMonster)
label(MonsterFallow)
label(GoRight)
label(GoLeft)
label(GoRight)
label(ksxz)
label(ksxy)

ControlMode:   //怪物方 向 1左 2右 3跟隨
dd 3


ControlMonster:
db dc 6d e4 83 c4 10
pushad
call MonsterFallow
popad
jmp 007F7BDF

MonsterFallow:
cmp [ebx+000002e0],1
je WalkMonster
cmp [ebx+000002e0],3
je JumpMonster
ret

WalkMonster:
cmp [ControlMode],1
je GoLeft
cmp [ControlMode],2
je GoRight
cmp [ControlMode],3
je GoRight
ret

JumpMonster:
cmp [ControlMode],1
je GoLeft
cmp [ControlMode],2
je GoRight
cmp [ControlMode],3
je GoRight
ret

GoLeft:
cmp eax,01
mov [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF       
cmp [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF
jg  ksxz
ret

ksxz:
mov [ebx+000001d0],2
ret

GoRight:
cmp eax,01
mov [ebx+000001e8],1
cmp [ebx+000001e8],1
jg ksxy
ret

ksxy:
mov [ebx+000001d0],4
ret

GoRight:
push eax
mov eax,[00cde80c]   //8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 ff 75 f8 e8
mov eax,[eax+000044b4] //89 8e ?? ?? 00 00 8b 40 04 89 86 ?? ?? 00
//sub eax,28
cmp [ebx+00000278],eax //c7 86 ?? 02 00 00 02 00 00 00
pop eax
jl GoRight
jg GoLeft
ret

007F7BD9:
JMP ControlMonster
[disable]
007F7BD9:
DB dc 6d e4 83 c4 10 dd 55 e4
dealloc(ControlMonster)
dealloc(ControlMode)
unregistersymbol(ControlMode)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_控怪(原版).txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
registersymbol(gwgs)
alloc(gwgs,512)
registersymbol(zgkzkg)
alloc(zgkzkg,4)
registersymbol(zgkzkg)
alloc(zgkzkg,4)
label(tiaoguai)
label(zouguai)
label(guaiwugensui)
label(gwxy)
label(gwxz)
label(gwxzj)
label(ksxz)
label(ksxy)

zgkzkg:   //怪物方 向 1左 2右 3跟隨
dd 3


gwgs:
db dc 6d e4 83 c4 10
pushad
call guaiwugensui
popad
jmp 007F7BDF

guaiwugensui:
cmp [ebx+000002e0],1
je zouguai
cmp [ebx+000002e0],3
je tiaoguai
ret

zouguai:
cmp [zgkzkg],1
je gwxz
cmp [zgkzkg],2
je gwxy
cmp [zgkzkg],3
je gwxzj
ret

tiaoguai:
cmp [zgkzkg],1
je gwxz
cmp [zgkzkg],2
je gwxy
cmp [zgkzkg],3
je gwxzj
ret

gwxz:
cmp eax,01
mov [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF       
cmp [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF
jg  ksxz
ret

ksxz:
mov [ebx+000001d0],2
ret

gwxy:
cmp eax,01
mov [ebx+000001e8],1
cmp [ebx+000001e8],1
jg ksxy
ret

ksxy:
mov [ebx+000001d0],4
ret

gwxzj:
push eax
mov eax,[00cde80c]   //8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 ff 75 f8 e8
mov eax,[eax+000044b4] //89 8e ?? ?? 00 00 8b 40 04 89 86 ?? ?? 00
//sub eax,28
cmp [ebx+00000278],eax //c7 86 ?? 02 00 00 02 00 00 00
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret

007F7BD9:
JMP gwgs
[disable]
007F7BD9:
DB dc 6d e4 83 c4 10 dd 55 e4
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_某牌全圖打.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(badegg)
alloc(badegg,256)
label(do1)
label(do2)

badegg:
do1:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[esp+c]
mov eax,FFFF26FD
mov [edi],eax
mov [edi+4],eax
do2:
mov eax,55555
mov [edi+8],eax
mov [edi+c],eax
mov eax,edi
pop edi
pop esi
ret
00406f70:
jmp badegg
[DISABLE]
00406f70:
db 56 8b 74 24 0c
unregistersymbol(badegg)
dealloc(badegg)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_滑鼠移動.txt`:

```txt
//滑鼠移動(右趴左趴板) TWMS0126
//代碼:007F3058
//EIP:CSX
[Enable]
alloc(MouserX,512) 
alloc(MouserY,512) 
alloc(CSX,128)
alloc(OnOff,128)
label(normal)
label(normalx) 
label(normaly) 
label(back) 
label(return)
label(On) 
label(Off)
registersymbol(CSX)
registersymbol(OnOff)

OnOff:
dd 0

CSX:
push eax
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
cmp [eax+0450],a
je On
cmp [eax+0450],b
je Off
pop eax
jmp MouserX

normal:
pop eax
mov [ebx], eax 
mov edi,[ebp+10] 
jmp back

back:
jmp 007F305D
return: 
jmp 007F30AB

On:
pop eax
mov [OnOff],1
jmp MouserX

Off:
pop eax
mov [OnOff],0
jmp MouserX

MouserX:
cmp [OnOff],0
je normalx
push eax
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
mov eax,[eax+17F4]
cmp esi,eax 
pop eax 
jne normalx 


mov eax,[00CDEC14]
mov eax, [eax+0978]
mov eax, [eax+88]
mov [ebx], eax 
mov edi,[ebp+10] 
test edi, edi
jne MouserY
jmp 007F305A

normalx: 
mov [ebx], eax 
mov edi,[ebp+10] 
jmp back 

MouserY: 
push eax 
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
mov eax,[eax+17F4]
cmp esi,eax 
pop eax 
jne normaly 

mov eax, [00CDEC14]
mov eax, [eax+0978]
mov eax, [eax+8C]
mov [edi], eax 
mov ebx,[ebp+14] 
jmp return 

normaly: 
mov [edi], eax 
mov ebx,[ebp+14] 
jmp return

007F3058:
JMP CSX
[Disable]

007F3058:
mov [ebx],eax
mov edi,[ebp+10]

dealloc(MouserX) 
dealloc(MouserY)
dealloc(CSX)
dealloc(OnOff)
unregistersymbol(CSX)
unregistersymbol(OnOff)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_無中生有.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MBornX,4)
Alloc(MBornY,4)
Alloc(ControlBorn,64)
Alloc(CopyIt,64)
Alloc(Switch,4)
RegisterSymbol(MBornX)
RegisterSymbol(MBornY)
CreateThread(CopyIt)

Switch
DD 0

CopyIt:
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
mov eax,[eax+44B4]
mov [MBornX],eax
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
mov eax,[eax+44B8]
mov [MBornY],eax
mov [Switch],1
ret

ControlBorn:
DB dc 6d e4 83 c4 10

cmp [Switch],1
jne 007F7BDF
push eax
mov eax,[MBornX]
mov [ebp+c],eax
mov eax,[MBornY]
mov [ebp+10],eax
pop eax
jmp 007F7BDF

007F7BD9:
JMP ControlBorn

007EF206:
jmp 007ef21b
[Disable]
007F7BD9:
DB dc 6d e4 83 c4 10 dd 55 e4

007ef206:
je 007ef21b
DeAlloc(MBornX)
DeAlloc(MBornY)
DeAlloc(ControlBorn)
DeAlloc(CopyIt)
DeAlloc(Switch)

UnRegisterSymbol(MBornY)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_無敵ICS.txt`:

```txt
//===========================
//For TWMS v129
//Author:The Evilest Mr.FortyFour
//Update:Inndy
//===========================
[enable]
registersymbol(MyTime)
alloc(MyTime,4)
registersymbol(MyNoBackICSCheck)
alloc(MyNoBackICSCheck,28)
registersymbol(MyNoBack)
alloc(MyNoBack,20)
alloc(OhMyGod,32)
CreateThread(OhMyGod)

OhMyGod:
mov eax,0
sub eax,[MyTime]
mov [MyTime],eax
ret

00A85B6C:
dd MyNoBackICSCheck

MyTime:
dd 00007530//無敵 30sec

MyNoBackICSCheck:
cmp [esp+1c],00763874
jne 0062E765
mov [esp+1c],MyNoBack
jmp 0062E765

MyNoBack:
lea ecx,[ebx+00002bac]
push [MyTime]
jmp 00764036
[Disable]
00A85B6C:
dd 0065DD71
registersymbol(MyTime)
dealloc(MyTime)
registersymbol(MyNoBackICSCheck)
dealloc(MyNoBackICSCheck)
registersymbol(MyNoBack)
dealloc(MyNoBack)
dealloc(OhMyGod)
```

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(ItemFilter,124)
alloc(IFTable,16024)
alloc(ItemCounter,4)
label(ifreject)
label(end)
label(skip)
registersymbol(ItemFilter)
registersymbol(ItemCounter)


ItemFilter:
        mov [ItemCounter],eax
        push ebx
        push esi
        xor ebx, ebx
        mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
        cmp eax,[esi]
        je skip
        cmp [esi],ebx
        je end
        add esi,4
        jmp ifreject
skip:
        mov eax,00
end:
        pop esi
        pop ebx
        mov ecx,edi
        mov [esi+34],eax
        jmp 004c67aa
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_物品過濾白名單.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(ItemFilter,256)
alloc(IFTable,400) //可容納255項物品，不包含結束代碼
alloc(EQUIP,4)
alloc(EUQIP,4)
alloc(COSUME,4)
alloc(COSUME,4)
alloc(,4)
alloc(,4)
alloc(,4)
alloc(,4)
label(ifreject)
label(GoBack)
label(SkipItem)


ItemFilter:
        push ebx
        push esi
        xor ebx, ebx
        mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
        cmp eax,[esi]
        je SkipItem
        cmp [esi],ebx
        je GoBack
        add esi,4
        jmp ifreject
SkipItem:
        mov eax,00
GoBack:
        pop esi
        pop ebx
        mov ecx,edi
        mov [esi+34],eax
        jmp 004c67aa

IFTable:
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_聖光.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_集氣無延遲.txt`:

```txt


[enable]
Registersymbol(Nodelay)
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Registersymbol(AttackTimes)
Alloc(AttackTimes, 4)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],2
jle 007A50F0
call 008688c0
cmp [AttackTimes],3
jg Refresh
jmp 007A50F0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0
jmp 007A50F0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007A50EB://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007A4D2C://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 87 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
Unregistersymbol(Nodelay)
dealloc(Nodelay)
Unregistersymbol(AttackTimes)
dealloc(AttackTimes)
007A50EB:
call 008688c0

007A4D2C:
call 007ce02f
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/TWMS126_飛行攻擊.txt`:

```txt
//v126.人物飛行全圖攻擊
//AUTHER:AAADDRESS1
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(Times)
alloc(VAC,64)
alloc(Times,4)
label(back)

VAC:
cmp [Times],0
je back
pushad
mov eax,[00CDE80C]
mov eax,[eax+17f4]
sub eax,c
mov ecx,[ebx+1A0]
mov [eax+1a0],ecx
popad
mov [Times],0
back:
mov eax,[ebx+000002E0]
jmp 007F7BF9

007F7BF3:
jmp VAC
nop
[DISABLE]
007F7C02:
db 8B 8B A0 01 00 00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS126/物品過濾白名單.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(ItemFilter,384)
alloc(EtcDrop,4)
alloc(EquipDrop,4)
alloc(IFTable,400) //可容納255項物品，不包含結束代碼
label(ifreject)
label(GoBack)
label(SkipItem)
label(StartFilter)
label(IFEquip)

EtcDrop:
DD 1    //掉落其他類物品請打1，不掉落請打0
EquipDrop:
DD 1    //掉落裝備類物品請打1，不掉落請打0

ItemFilter:
        push ebx
        push esi
        cmp eax,C350
        je GoBack
        cmp [EtcDrop],1
        jne IFEquip
        cmp eax,F4240
        jl IFEquip
        cmp eax,1E1723
        jg IFEquip
        jmp GoBack
IFEquip:
        cmp [EquipDrop],1
        jne StartFilter
        cmp eax,3D0900
        jl StartFilter
        cmp eax,41C3FC
        jg StartFilter
        jmp GoBack
StartFilter:
        xor ebx, ebx
        mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
        cmp eax,[esi]
        je GoBack
        cmp [esi],ebx
        je SkipItem
        add esi,4
        jmp ifreject
SkipItem:
        mov eax,00
GoBack:
        pop esi
        pop ebx
        mov ecx,edi
        mov [esi+34],eax
        jmp 004c67aa

IFTable:
DD 1F95F1 // 迴旋鏢
DD 1F95F2 // 黑色利刃
DD 1F95F3 // 雪花鏢
DD 1F95F4 // 梅鏢
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/TWMS128_CRC_Miss無敵.txt`:

```txt
//===============================================
//Miss無敵-5次 for TWMS128(CRC)
//更新：s519052002
[enable]
registersymbol(Miss)
alloc(Miss, 128)
alloc(MissRound, 4)
label(StopMiss)
label(StopMiss1)
Miss:
        inc     [MissRound]
        cmp     [MissRound], 5 //MISS次數 16進位
         ja      StopMiss
        xor     eax,eax
        jmp     006D83C0   //add je 下2
StopMiss:
        mov     [MissRound], 0
StopMiss1:
        jmp     006DB3BD    //add下1
006DB3B7:
jmp Miss
nop
[disable]
006DB3B7:
db 0f 84 d4 0f 00 00 
unregistersymbol(Miss)
dealloc(Miss)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/TWMS128_CRC_熱鍵(改).txt`:

```txt
//128-HotKey
//F5=3f0000,F6=400000
[enable]
registersymbol(HotKey)
alloc(HotKey,128)
label(H0)
label(H1)
label(H2)
label(H3)
label(H4)
label(HotRet)
label(ShowText)
label(text1)
label(text2)
label(text3)
label(text4)
label(text5)
label(text6)
label(text7)
label(T2)
label(T4)
//----------------
007B5ccb:
jmp HotKey
nop
//------(按鍵)---------
HotKey:
cmp eax,3f0000  //F5
je H1
cmp eax,400000  //F6
je H2
cmp eax,410000  //F7
je H0
cmp eax,3b0000  //F1
je H3
cmp eax,3c0000  //F2
je H4
jmp HotRet
//-------------------------
H1:
mov [400e84],8CA  //2250
mov eax, text5
call ShowText 
jmp HotRet

H2:
mov [400e84],6D6  //1750
mov eax, text6
call ShowText 
jmp HotRet

H0:
mov [400e84],4E2  //1250
mov eax, text7
call ShowText 
jmp HotRet

H3:
xor [400e70],1    //F1
cmp [400e70],1
je T2

mov eax, text2
call ShowText
jmp HotRet

T2:
mov eax, text1
call ShowText 
jmp HotRet


H4:
xor [400d00],1    //f2
cmp [400d00],1
je T4
mov eax, text4
call ShowText
jmp HotRet

T4:
mov eax, text3
call ShowText 
jmp HotRet

HotRet:
mov ecx,[00ce5250]
jmp 007B5cd1

//-------------
ShowText:
  PUSHAD
  push 00000000
  push 00000000
  push 00000000
  push ffffffff
  push 00000007	//顏色
  push eax
  mov ecx, [00ce9c90]
  call 0073218f	   // 1.28
  POPAD
  ret

  text1:
db '===打魚自動掛機啟動(Start)===' 00
  text2:
db '===打魚自動掛機關閉(Close)===' 00
  text3:
db '===人物至商店啟動(若打魚中=>時間結束後去)===' 00
  text4:
db '===人物至商店關閉(出圖後續按F1可繼續掛機)===' 00
  text5:
db '分數=2250(60%卷軸)' 00
  text6:
db '分數=1750(召喚包)' 00
  text7:
db '分數=1250(10%卷軸)' 00

[disable]
//
//
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/TWMS128_ICS_不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//V128 i-進戰不揮空
//-----------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(Empty)
alloc(Empty,1024)
label(Empty01)
//-----------------------------------------------
Empty:
cmp [esp],007AD669
jne OffsetRect  
mov [esp],Empty01
jmp OffsetRect 
//------Main------    
Empty01:
//DB ff 15 04 ed ce 00          //007AD663 - call dword ptr [00ceed04] : OffsetRect
DB ff b5 58 fe ff ff          //007AD669 - push [ebp-000001a8]
DB 6a 00                      //007AD66F - push 00
DB 6a 00                      //007AD671 - push 00
DB 6a 00                      //007AD673 - push 00
DB 6a 00                      //007AD675 - push 00
DB 6a 00                      //007AD677 - push 00
DB 6a 00                      //007AD679 - push 00
DB ff b5 78 fe ff ff          //007AD67B - push [ebp-00000188]
DB 8d 85 7c fe ff ff          //007AD681 - lea eax,[ebp-00000184]
DB 50                         //007AD687 - push eax
DB 8d 45 98                   //007AD688 - lea eax,[ebp-68]
DB 50                         //007AD68B - push eax
call 0042eecb
DB 8b c8                      //007AD691 - mov ecx,eax
call 005ab362
DB 89 45 84                   //007AD698 - mov [ebp-7c],eax


  cmp eax,0    //沒打到怪
  je 007ad945
  jmp 007AD69B


//----------------------------------------------
//007AD8ED - 81 bd 58 fe ff ff 3a 41 40 00 - cmp [ebp-000001a8],0040413a
//007AD8F7 - 74 4c                      - je 007ad945   //<==上面

//---------------------------------------------
00ceed04:
        dd Empty
[DISABLE]
00ceed04:
        dd OffsetRect      

dealloc(Empty)
unregistersymbol(Empty)
dealloc(Empty00)
unregistersymbol(Empty00)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/TWMS128_ICS_快速到位(OKOK).txt`:

```txt
//i-快速到位-v128
[enable]
registersymbol(HookFastLocation)
alloc(HookFastLocation, 1024)
label(GOTO)
label(chmap)
label(map1)
label(map2)
label(mapret)
//----------------------------------------
HookFastLocation:
     cmp [esp+24],00799EB3
     jnz interlockedincrement
     mov [esp+24],GOTO
     jmp interlockedincrement
//-----------------------------------

GOTO:
//==============================================================
//DB e8 05 b6 c8 ff             //00799EAE - call 004254b8
DB 8b 78 04                   //00799EB3 - mov edi,[eax+04]
DB 8d 4d c0                   //00799EB6 - lea ecx,[ebp-40]
call 00424c50
DB 6a ff                      //00799EBE - push ff
DB 8d 47 04                   //00799EC0 - lea eax,[edi+04]
DB 8d 8e 9c 17 00 00          //00799EC3 - lea ecx,[esi+0000179c]
DB 50                         //00799EC9 - push eax
call 00425c81
DB 8a 8f d7 00 00 00          //00799ECF - mov cl,[edi+000000d7]
DB 0f b6 c1                   //00799ED5 - movzx eax,cl
DB 80 e1 7f                   //00799ED8 - and cl,7f
DB 88 8f d7 00 00 00          //00799EDB - mov [edi+000000d7],cl
DB 88 4d f3                   //00799EE1 - mov [ebp-0d],cl
DB 8b 0d d4 be ce 00          //00799EE4 - mov ecx,[00cebed4] : 00000000
DB 8b 51 04                   //00799EEA - mov edx,[ecx+04]
DB c1 e8 07                   //00799EED - shr eax,07
DB 89 4d e0                   //00799EF0 - mov [ebp-20],ecx
DB 85 d2                      //00799EF3 - test edx,edx
DB 75 05                      //00799EF5 - jne 00799efc
DB 21 55 ec                   //00799EF7 - and [ebp-14],edx
DB eb 06                      //00799EFA - jmp 00799f02
DB 8b 52 fc                   //00799EFC - mov edx,[edx-04]
DB 89 55 ec                   //00799EFF - mov [ebp-14],edx
DB 85 c0                      //00799F02 - test eax,eax
jne 00799f18
DB 0f b6 45 f3                //00799F06 - movzx eax,byte ptr [ebp-0d]
DB 3b 45 ec                   //00799F0A - cmp eax,[ebp-14]
jnl 00799f18
DB 8b 49 04                   //00799F0F - mov ecx,[ecx+04]
DB 8b 44 c1 04                //00799F12 - mov eax,[ecx+eax*8+04]
//00799F16 - eb 7b                      - jmp 00799f93

//--------------------------
call chmap
jmp 00799F99


chmap:

push edx
mov edx,[00ce9fe0]
cmp edx,0
je mapret

mov edx,[edx+c48]
cmp edx,2c2ac340 //fishmap
je map1
cmp edx,2c2ac341 //shopmap
je map2

mov ecx,[ce3e10+44]   //打魚右牆
mov eax,1F4  //Y=500(安全值)

//正常
//mov ecx,[eax+0c]
//mov eax,[eax+10]
jmp mapret


map1:
mov ecx,360  //864
mov eax,a0   //160
jmp mapret

map2:
mov ecx,FFFFFF22
mov eax,dc
jmp mapret

mapret:
pop edx
ret


//------------------ Enter Point ---------------
00b2a0a0:
           dd HookFastLocation
//----------------------------------------------
[DISABLE]
00b2a0a0:
dd interlockedincrement

dealloc(HookFastLocation)
unregistersymbol(HookFastLocation)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/TWMS128_ICS_控怪.txt`:

```txt
//v128 控怪方向-ics
[enable]
registersymbol(Hook)
alloc(Hook, 128)
label(DullMob)
label(DullMob1)
registersymbol(gwgs)
alloc(gwgs,1024)
registersymbol(zgkg)
alloc(zgkg,4)
alloc(CharX,4)
label(zouguai)
label(guaiwugensui)
label(gwxret)
label(gwxy)
label(gwxz)
label(gwxzj)
label(gwxzk)
label(gwxzl)
//-----------
zgkg:  //控制方向
dd 3    //3為跟隨 , 1向左走 , 2向右走 ， 4 定點
//========
00cd0c5c:
dd Hook
//========
Hook:
  cmp [esp+44],007f6623
  jne 0065dd71
  mov [esp+44],DullMob
  jmp 0065dd71
DullMob:
  fstp st(0)
  call 0086e6ad
  cmp [esp],007f7175
  je DullMob1
  jmp 007f662a
DullMob1:
  add esp,8
  mov eax,[ebx]
  xor esi,esi
  push esi
  lea ecx,[ebp+7c]
  push ecx
  lea ecx,[ebp+34]
  push ecx
  mov ecx,ebx
  call gwgs
  jmp 007f7187
gwgs:
  push ebp
  mov ebp,esp
  sub esp,1c
  push ebx
  push esi
  mov ebx,ecx
  push edi
  mov edi,[00ce99c0]
  lea eax,[ebx+00000140]
  push [eax+10]
  push eax
  call 004d955f
  fstp qword ptr [ebp-1c]
  mov eax,[ebp+08]
  push [eax+10]
  push eax
  call 004d955f
db dc 6d e4 83 c4 10
pushad
call guaiwugensui
popad
  jmp 007fcdf4

guaiwugensui:
cmp [ebx+000002e0],1  //走怪
je zouguai
cmp [ebx+000002e0],3  //跳怪
je zouguai
ret

zouguai:
push eax
mov eax,[00ce99c4]
mov eax,[eax+18]
cmp eax,0
pop eax
jg gwxret
cmp [zgkg],1
je gwxz
cmp [zgkg],2
je gwxy
cmp [zgkg],3
je gwxzj
cmp [zgkg],4
je gwxzk
cmp [zgkg],5
je gwxzl
gwxret:
ret


gwxz:
mov [ebx+000001e8],FFFFFFFF
mov [ebx+000001d8],5
ret

gwxy:
mov [ebx+000001e8],1
mov [ebx+000001d8],4
ret

gwxzj:
push eax
mov eax,[00ce9fe0]
mov eax,[eax+b00]
//add eax,3c  //50   //離右 40
//sub eax,64  //28   //離左 40
cmp [ebx+0000071c],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret

gwxzk:
push eax
mov eax,[00ce9fe0]
mov eax,[eax+b00]
mov [CharX],eax
pop eax
mov [zgkg],5
ret

gwxzl:
push eax
mov eax,[CharX]
cmp [ebx+0000071c],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret

[disable]
00cd0c5c:
dd 0065dd71  //我的電腦是這個,你們的可能是 0065db71
unregistersymbol(zgkg)
dealloc(zgkg)
dealloc(CharX)
unregistersymbol(gwgs)
dealloc(gwgs)
unregistersymbol(Hook)
dealloc(Hook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/TWMS128_ICS_物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
//物品過濾-ics
[enable]
alloc(xuHook,512)
registersymbol(xuHook)
label(HookItem)
label(HookItem1)
label(HookItem2)
//===========
00cd0c5c:
dd xuHook
//===========
xuHook:
  mov [00ce3e1c],1
  cmp [esp+64],004c8e04
  jne 0065dd71
  mov [esp+64],HookItem
  jmp 0065dd71
//===========
HookItem:
//004c8dff - call 004c8523
  mov [00ce3e10],1
  mov eax,[ebp-1c]
  mov esi,[ebp-50]
  mov [esi+1c],al
  cmp eax,01
  je HookItem1  //004c8e1b
  cmp eax,02
  je HookItem1  //004c8e1b
  xor al,al
  jmp HookItem2  //004c8e1d
HookItem1:
  mov al,01
HookItem2:
  mov [esi+1d],al
  mov [esi+20],edi
  mov edi,[ebp+08]
  mov ecx,edi
  call 0040ba71
  movzx eax,al
  mov ecx,edi
  mov [esi+30],eax
  call 0040bacd
  //====(目前是怪只掉錢@@)
  mov ecx,edi      
  mov [esi+34],00  //原是 eax
  //====
  jmp  004c8e3f  
[disable]
00cd0c5c:
dd 0065dd71
//=============
dealloc(xuHook)
unregistersymbol(xuHook)
//=============
```

```txt
//v1.28.1 完美控怪 ,auther:aaaddress1
[ENABLE]

DD 3
LR:
cmp [LR_SET],2
je 007FE19C
cmp [LR_SET],1
je 007FE195
cmp [LR_SET],0
je 007FE0FC
push [edi+40]
push eax
pop ecx
pop ecx
fnstsw ax
jmp 7FE11F
007FE0D7: //, 39 9E 2C 07 00 00 0F 85 B2 00 00 00 39 9E 28 07
jmp LR
[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS128/v128 移動加速-ICS.txt`:

```txt
//v128 移動加速-ICS
[enable]
registersymbol(xHookMyMv)
alloc(xHookMyMv,256)
label(xMyMove)
//========
Label(xkreturn)
Label(xknormal)
Registersymbol(xkspeed)
Alloc(xkspeed, 4)
Registersymbol(xkspeedup)
Alloc(xkspeedup, 128)
//========
xkspeed:
dd 2 //數值越大速度越快 (0為正常)
//========
00ceeec4:
dd xHookMyMv
//========
xHookMyMv:
  cmp [esp+58],00836681
  jne timeGetTime
  mov [esp+58],xMyMove
  jmp timeGetTime
xMyMove:
db 8b 0d 78 99 ce 00          //- mov ecx,[00ce9978]
call 0043aee3
db 8b 8e 10 3c 00 00          //- mov ecx,[esi+00003c10]
db 85 c9                      //- test ecx,ecx
db 74 0b                      //- je 008366a1
db 8b 01                      //- mov eax,[ecx]
call xkspeedup
  jmp 0083669a
xkspeedup:
db 6a 74                      //- push 74
db b8 80 94 92 00             //- mov eax,00929480
call 0086e5d5
db 8b d9                      //- mov ebx,ecx
db 89 5d d0                   //- mov [ebp-30],ebx
db 8b 4b 08                   //- mov ecx,[ebx+08]
db 85 c9                      //- test ecx,ecx
db 74 04                      //- je 007c7fbe
db 8b 01                      //- mov eax,[ecx]
  push esi
  mov esi,[xkspeed]
xkreturn:
/*
  //====紅點偵測,不要的請自刪
push edx
mov edx, [00ce9fe0] 
mov edx,[edx+c48]
cmp edx,2c2ac340  
pop edx
  jg xknormal
  //====
*/
  cmp esi,0
  je xknormal
  dec esi
  push eax
  push ecx
  call dword ptr [eax]
  pop ecx
  pop eax
  jmp xkreturn
xknormal:
  pop esi
  call dword ptr [eax]
  mov eax,[ebx+30]
  jmp 007C7fc1
//========
[disable]
00ceeec4:
dd timeGetTime

unregistersymbol(xHookMyMv)
dealloc(xHookMyMv)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS130/TWMS130_CRC_DamageControl.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(DamageControl)
Alloc(DamageControl, 64)
Alloc(Damage, 4)
Label(normal)

0046C3F5:
jmp DamageControl
nop
nop

Damage://傷害
dd 1


DamageControl:
cmp [esp],007647B0
jne normal
push esi
mov esi,[esp+08]
mov esi,[esi+4]
push [Damage]
pop [esi+8]
pop esi
normal:
push 38
mov eax,0084BDD5
jmp 0046C3FC

[disable]
0046C3F5:
db 6a 38 b8 d5 bd 84 00

Unregistersymbol(DamageControl)
Dealloc(DamageControl)
Dealloc(Damage)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS130/TWMS130_CRC_平台接點切換吸怪.txt`:

```txt
//v1.30.1 平台接點切換吸怪
//亂改:守護者
[ENABLE]
alloc(Vac,512)
alloc(rec,20)
label(setvac)
label(setvac_1)
label(setvac_2)
label(relax)
label(GetVacPid)
alloc(UnFine,128)
rec:
dd 0

007ADBFC:
jmp Vac
nop
//007ADB99:
//call UnFine
//nop

Vac:
push eax
mov eax,[0A9C45C]
mov eax,[eax+2C]
test eax,eax
pop eax
jg relax
cmp [rec],0
jne setvac
call GetVacPid

relax:
mov [esi+1a0],ebx
jmp 007ADBFC+6

setvac:
inc [rec+8]
cmp [rec+8],2  //吸怪間隔時間
jl relax
cmp [rec+8],0  //持續吸怪時間(此值減去間隔)
jl setvac_1
mov [rec+8],0

setvac_1:
push eax
mov eax,[00a9c464]
mov eax,[eax+1794]
sub eax,c
mov ebx,[eax+1a0]
mov [esi+1a0],ebx
pop eax
mov [esi+2e0],6
jmp 007ADB9F

setvac_2:


GetVacPid:
push eax
mov eax,[00a9c464]
mov eax,[eax+1794]
sub eax,c
push [eax+1a0]
pop [rec]
pop eax
ret

[DISABLE]
007ADBFC:
mov [esi+1a0],ebx
//007ADB99:
//mov [esi+1a4],ebx
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS130/TWMS130_昭和村武器庫掛機.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
//日本武器庫
Registersymbol(RedV)
Alloc(RedV,4)
Alloc(SpawnControl,512)
Label(rtnSPC)
Label(rtnStart00)
Label(rtnStart01)
Label(rtnStart02)
Label(rtnStart03)
Label(rtnStart04)
Label(rtnNormal)

SpawnControl:
  mov [RedV],ebx
  pushad
  mov esi,[00A9CA88]
  mov esi,[esi+0C48]

  cmp esi,2FBEE680 //昭和村 基地前
  jz rtnStart00
  cmp esi,2FBEE681 //昭和村 停車場
  jz rtnStart01
  cmp esi,2FBEE682 //昭和村 金融中心
  jz rtnStart02
  cmp esi,2FBEE683 //昭和村 迎賓室
  jz rtnStart03
  cmp esi,2FBEE684 //昭和村 武器庫
  jz rtnStart04
rtnNormal:
  popad
  lea eax,[ebx+00004054]
  jmp rtnSPC

rtnStart00:
  mov [ebp-1C],000000C7
  mov [ebp-18],FFFFFFE7
  jmp rtnNormal
rtnStart01:
  mov [ebp-1C],0000056A
  mov [ebp-18],000000A1
  jmp rtnNormal
rtnStart02:
  mov [ebp-1C],00000567
  mov [ebp-18],000000A2
  jmp rtnNormal
rtnStart03:
  mov [ebp-1C],000004A5
  mov [ebp-18],000000A2
  jmp rtnNormal
rtnStart04:
  mov [ebp-1C],000001C1
  mov [ebp-18],000000A1
  jmp rtnNormal

00752ACB:
//8d 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 38 00 74 15
  jmp SpawnControl
  db 90
  rtnSPC:

[DISABLE]
00752ACB:
  db 8d 83 54 40 00 00

dealloc(SpawnControl)
dealloc(MapID)
dealloc(SpawnXY)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/131.1/人物左右.txt`:

```txt

[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AwesomeMan)
alloc(AwesomeMan,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLR)
alloc(MyAutoLR,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKey)
alloc(MyAutoLRKey,4)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKeyLR)
alloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR,4)
alloc(MyAutoLRXP,4)
label(MyAutoLR00)
label(MyAutoLR01)
label(MyAutoLR02)
label(MyAutoLRFix)

00AD4980:
DD AwesomeMan

//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLRKey:
DD 1
MyAutoLRKeyLR:
DD 0
MyAutoLRXP:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------

AwesomeMan:
cmp [esp],007D05A7
jne GetFocus
mov [esp],MyAutoLR
jmp GetFocus

MyAutoLR:
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],0
je MyAutoLR00
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],2
je MyAutoLRFix
push eax
mov eax,[00acf52c]
mov eax,[eax+44c4]
mov [MyAutoLRXP],eax
pop eax
mov [MyAutoLRKey],2
MyAutoLRFix:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],A
jle MyAutoLR01
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],14
jle MyAutoLR02

//修正偏離
push eax
mov eax,[00acf52c]
mov eax,[eax+44c4]
cmp [MyAutoLRXP],eax 
pop eax
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],fffffffe
jl MyAutoLR01
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],2
jmp MyAutoLR01

MyAutoLR01:
mov [ebp-8],ffffffff
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9

MyAutoLR02:
mov [ebp-8],1
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9

MyAutoLR00:
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9


[DISABLE]
00AD4980:
DD GetFocus

unregistersymbol(AwesomeMan)
dealloc(AwesomeMan)
unregistersymbol(MyAutoLR)
dealloc(MyAutoLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS V131集氣加速打.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS V131集氣加速打
//附註1:星光打幣專用數據
//附註2:請配合急速詠唱
[enable]
Registersymbol(Nodelay)
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Registersymbol(AttackTimes)
Alloc(AttackTimes, 4)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],2 //此值與下列值互減得到的等於正常次數
jle 0077867E
call 0083f1e0
cmp [AttackTimes],3 //此值至少要比上面的大1
jg Refresh
jmp 0077867E //*與Refresh相同
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0 //無延遲間格
jmp 0077867E //*與Nodelay jmp相同
//------------------------------------------------------------------
00778679://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007782BA://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 87 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
Unregistersymbol(Nodelay)
dealloc(Nodelay)
Unregistersymbol(AttackTimes)
dealloc(AttackTimes)
00778679://無延遲
call 0083f1e0

007782BA://瞬間集氣
call 0078c0bc
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_CRC_移動加速 .txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Label(return)
Label(normal)
Registersymbol(speed)
Alloc(speed, 4)
Registersymbol(speedup)
Alloc(speedup, 128)

speed:
dd 3 //數值越大速度越快 (0為正常)

speedup:
push esi
mov esi,[speed]

return:
cmp esi,0
je normal

dec esi
push eax
push ecx
call dword ptr [eax]
pop ecx
pop eax
jmp return

normal:
pop esi
call dword ptr [eax]
mov eax,[esi+30]
jmp 00797607

00797602: //85 c9 74 04 8b 01 ff 10 8b 46 30
jmp speedup

[disable]
Unregistersymbol(speed)
Dealloc(speed)
Unregistersymbol(speedup)
Dealloc(speedup)

00797602:
call dword ptr [eax]
mov eax,[esi+30]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_CSX攻擊不停.txt`:

```txt
//Twms v131.1 CSX攻擊不停
[Enable]

registersymbol(CSX)

alloc(CSX,128)

label(CSXReturn)

label(CSXXX)

CSX:

push eax

mov eax,[00acf52c]

mov eax,[eax+3A1C] //主動技能次數

cmp eax,15 //放技能N次回原位

pop eax

jg CSXReturn

push eax

mov eax,[00acf52c]

mov eax,[eax+3A1C]

cmp eax,14 //放技能N次偏移

pop eax

jg CSXXX

push eax

mov eax,[00acf52c]

mov eax,[eax+3a2c] //輔助技能次數

cmp eax,5

pop eax

jg CSXXX

CSXReturn:

mov [ebx], eax

mov edi,[ebp+10]

test edi,edi

je 007c75b6

jmp 007C756D

CSXXX:

push eax

mov eax,[00acf52c]

mov eax,[eax+17a8] //Char PID

cmp esi,eax

pop eax

jne CSXReturn

add eax,0a

jmp CSXReturn

007c7566:

jmp CSX

[Disable]

007c7566:

DB 89 03 8B 7D 10 85 FF 74

unregistersymbol(CSX)

dealloc(CSX)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_MobLR.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：v1.31.1 MobLR
// Address：007CC031
// EIP：MobLR
// Cortrol：LRKey
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
Registersymbol(MobLR)
Alloc(MobLR, 1024)
Registersymbol(MyState)
Alloc(MyState, 4)
Registersymbol(MyXYResh)
Alloc(MyXYResh, 4)
Registersymbol(LRKey)
Alloc(LRKey, 4)
Registersymbol(LRXY)
Alloc(LRXY, 4)
Registersymbol(LRV)
Alloc(LRV, 4)

Label(MobLRGo)
Label(CheckMob)
Label(Left)
Label(LeftSet)
Label(Right)
Label(RightSet)
Label(LRGoMe)
Label(LRGoXY)
Label(LRGoX)
Label(GetXY)
Label(GetState)
Label(XYAdd)
Label(XYSub)
//----------------------------
MobLR:
Fsubr Qword Ptr [Ebp-1C]
Add Esp, 10
Pushad
Call CheckMob
//Call MobLRGo
Popad
Jmp 007CC037
//----------------------------
CheckMob:
Cmp [Ebx+2E8], 1 //Wolk
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+2E8], 3 //Jump
Je MobLRGo
Ret
//----------------------------
MobLRGo:
Push Eax
Cmp [LRKey],1
Je Left
Cmp [LRKey],2
Je Right
Pop Eax

Cmp [LRKey], 3
Je LRGoMe
Cmp [LRKey], 4
Je LRGoXY
Cmp [LRKey], 5
Je GetXY
Cmp [LRKey], 6
Je LRGoX
Ret
//----------------------------
Left:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
//39 9E     7E  FF 76  8D 7E  57 E8     8B
Mov [Ebx+000001E8], FFFFFFFF
Cmp [Ebx+000001E8], FFFFFFFF
Jg LeftSet
Ret
//----------------------------
LeftSet:
//FF B6     8D 9E     57 50 FF 52 04
Mov [Ebx+000001D8], 2
Ret
//----------------------------
Right:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000001E8], 00000001
Cmp [Ebx+000001E8], 00000001
Jg RightSet
Ret
//----------------------------
RightSet:
Mov [Ebx+000001D8], 4
Ret
//----------------------------
LRGoMe:
Call GetState
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [00ACF52C]
Mov Eax, [Eax+44C4]
Sub Eax, 8
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+724], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+724], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000001E8], 0
Ret
//----------------------------
LRGoXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[LRXY]
Sub Eax, 8
Cmp [Ebx+724], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Cmp [Ebx+724], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000001E8], 0
Ret
//----------------------------
GetXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[00ACF52C]
Mov Eax,[Eax+44C4]
Mov [LRXY],0
Mov [LRXY],Eax
Mov [LRKey],4
Pop Eax
Ret
//----------------------------
LRGoX:
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [Ebx+00000724]
Mov [LRV], Eax
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000001D8], 2
Mov [Ebx+000001E8], 0
Ret
//----------------------------
GetState:
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [00ACF52C]
Mov Eax, [Eax+454]
Mov [MyState], Eax
Pop Eax
Cmp [MyState], 3
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 5
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 7
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 9
Je XYSub

Cmp [MyState], 2
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 4
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 6
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 8
Je XYAdd
Ret
//----------------------------
XYAdd:
Mov [MyXYResh], 00000020
Ret
//----------------------------
XYSub:
Mov [MyXYResh], FFFFFFE0
Ret
//----------------------------
LRKey:
Dd 0
LRXY:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
007CC031:
Jmp MobLR
Nop
//----------------------------
[Disable]
007CC031:
Db DC 6D E4 83 C4 10 DD 55 E4
Dealloc(LRXY)
Dealloc(LRKey)
Dealloc(MyState)
Dealloc(MyXYResh)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(LRV)
Unregistersymbol(LRV)
Unregistersymbol(LRXY)
Unregistersymbol(LRKey)
Unregistersymbol(MyState)
Unregistersymbol(MyXYResh)
Unregistersymbol(MobLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_PacketMonitor.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(PacketFix)
Alloc(PacketFix, 512)
Registersymbol(store)
alloc(store,256)
Registersymbol(data)
alloc(data,512)
Registersymbol(length)
alloc(length,4)

Label(normal)
Label(cycle)
Label(cycle2)
Label(cycle3)

0046CC51:
jmp PacketFix
nop
nop

PacketFix:
cmp [esp],00500000
jl normal
cmp [esp],00560000
jg normal
/*push eax
mov eax,[esp+8]
mov eax,[eax+8]
cmp eax,40
pop eax
jl normal

push eax
mov eax,[esp+8]
mov eax,[eax+8]
cmp eax,57
pop eax
jg normal*/

push eax
mov eax,[esp+8]
cmp byte ptr[eax+8],8
pop eax
jne normal

//mov eax,[esp]
//mov [data+90],eax

mov eax,[esp+4]
mov eax,[eax+8]
mov [length],eax

push eax
push ecx
push esi
mov esi,[esp+10]
mov ecx,80
//sub esi,50
cycle:
mov eax,[esi+ecx]
mov [store+ecx],eax
sub ecx,4
cmp ecx,0
jge cycle
mov esi,[esp+10]
mov esi,[esi+4]
mov ecx,[length]
dec ecx
//sub esi,ecx
cycle2:
mov al,byte ptr[esi+ecx]
mov byte ptr[data+ecx],al
dec ecx
cmp ecx,0
jge cycle2
mov ecx,[length]
cycle3:
inc ecx
mov byte ptr[data+ecx],0
cmp byte ptr[data+ecx+1],0
jne cycle3
pop esi
pop ecx
pop eax
normal:
db 6a 38
mov eax,0086BCB7
//以下兩行等於call 0083FB29
push 0046CC5D
jmp 0083FB29

[disable]
0046CC51:
db 6A 38 B8 B7 BC 86 00

Unregistersymbol(PacketFix)
Dealloc(PacketFix)
UnRegistersymbol(store)
dealloc(store)
unRegistersymbol(data)
dealloc(data)
unRegistersymbol(length)
dealloc(length)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_人物左右走007Mode.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(MyAutoLR,1024)
alloc(MyAutoLRKey,4)
alloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR,4)
alloc(tick,4)
alloc(delay,4)
alloc(nextGo,4)
registersymbol(step)
alloc(step,4)
label(MyAutoLR00)
label(MyAutoLR01)
label(MyAutoLR02)
label(test1)
label(test2)
label(SetLR)
label(back)
label(Set01)
label(Set02)
//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLRKey:
DD 1
MyAutoLRKeyLR:
DD 0
step:
DD 0
delay:
DD 500
//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLR:
cmp [step],0
je 007D05A7
cmp [step],2
jle back
push eax
call 007a2beb
sub eax,[delay]
cmp eax,[nextGo]
pop eax
jbe  MyAutoLR00
push eax
call 007a2beb
add eax,[delay]
mov [nextGo],eax
pop eax
jmp  SetLR

SetLR:

cmp [step],3
je Set02
cmp [step],4
je Set01
Set01:
mov [step],1
jmp back
Set02:
mov [step],2
jmp back
back:
cmp [step],1
je test1
cmp [step],2
je test2
jmp MyAutoLR00

test1:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],12//左右移動距離
jle MyAutoLR01
mov [step],3
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],0
jmp MyAutoLR02
test2:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],12//左右移動距離*2
jle MyAutoLR02
mov [step],4
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],0
jmp MyAutoLR01
MyAutoLR01:
mov [ebp-8],ffffffff
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9
MyAutoLR02:
mov [ebp-8],1
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9
MyAutoLR00:
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],0
jmp 007D07C9

007D05A1:
Jmp MyAutoLR
nop

step:
dd 1
[DISABLE]
007D05A1:
call dword ptr [00ad4980]

dealloc(MyAutoLR)
dealloc(MyAutoLRKey)
dealloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR)
dealloc(tick)
dealloc(delay)
dealloc(nextGo)
unregistersymbol(step)
dealloc(step,4)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_人物自動左右自動修正偏移.txt`:

```txt
//==============================
//Twms V131.1 人物自動左右自動修正偏移
//原作:屌王
//測試過可用
//夢X論壇的狗別轉載黑
//==============================
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AwesomeMan)
alloc(AwesomeMan,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLR)
alloc(MyAutoLR,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKey)
alloc(MyAutoLRKey,4)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKeyLR)
alloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR,4)
alloc(MyAutoLRXP,4)
label(MyAutoLR00)
label(MyAutoLR01)
label(MyAutoLR02)
label(MyAutoLRFix)

00AD4980:
DD AwesomeMan

//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLRKey:
DD 1
MyAutoLRKeyLR:
DD 0
MyAutoLRXP:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------

AwesomeMan:
cmp [esp],007D05A7
jne GetFocus
mov [esp],MyAutoLR
jmp GetFocus

MyAutoLR:
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],0
je MyAutoLR00
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],2
je MyAutoLRFix
push eax
mov eax,[00acf52c]
mov eax,[eax+44c4]
mov [MyAutoLRXP],eax
pop eax
mov [MyAutoLRKey],2
MyAutoLRFix:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],A
jle MyAutoLR01
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],14
jle MyAutoLR02

//修正偏離
push eax
mov eax,[00acf52c]
mov eax,[eax+44c4]
cmp [MyAutoLRXP],eax 
pop eax
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],fffffffe
jl MyAutoLR01
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],2
jmp MyAutoLR01

MyAutoLR01:
mov [ebp-8],ffffffff
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9

MyAutoLR02:
mov [ebp-8],1
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9

MyAutoLR00:
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9


[DISABLE]
00AD4980:
DD GetFocus

unregistersymbol(AwesomeMan)
dealloc(AwesomeMan)
unregistersymbol(MyAutoLR)
dealloc(MyAutoLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_吸走怪.txt`:

```txt
//V131.1 吸走怪
[Enable]
alloc(GhoulDx,256)
alloc(DxPlatform,4)
alloc(DxVacToken,4)
label(ResetDx)
label(DxVac)
label(DxEnd)
label(DxZero)
label(DxReturn)
registersymbol(DxPlatform)
registersymbol(DxVacToken)


DxPlatform:
dd 0

007CA252:
jmp GhoulDx
db 90

DxReturn:

GhoulDx:
push eax
mov eax, [00acf52c]
test eax, eax
je DxEnd
cmp [DxPlatform], 00
jne DxVac
mov eax, [eax+17a8]
sub eax,c
mov eax, [eax+1a4]
test eax, eax
je ResetDx
mov [DxPlatform], eax
jmp DxEnd


ResetDx:
mov [DxPlatform], 00
jmp DxEnd

DxVac:
push ebx
mov ebx, [esi+1a0]
test ebx, ebx
pop ebx
je DxZero
mov eax, [DxPlatform]
cmp [esi+1a0], eax
je DxZero
mov eax, [DxPlatform]
mov [esi+1a0], eax
mov [esi+1a4], eax
mov [esi+2e0],6
jmp DxEnd


DxZero:
mov [esi+1a0], 00


DxEnd:
pop eax
cmp [esi+1b0],ebx
jmp DxReturn+2

[Disable]


007CA252:
cmp [esi+1b0],ebx

unregistersymbol(DxPlatform)
unregistersymbol(DxVacToken)
dealloc(GhoulDx)
dealloc(DxPlatform)
dealloc(DxVacToken)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_吸跳怪.txt`:

```txt
//V131.1 吸跳怪
// From Safe Fast DupeX EMS  by Ghoul
[Enable]
alloc(GhoulDx,256)
alloc(DxPlatform,4)
alloc(DxVacToken,4)
label(ResetDx)
label(DxVac)
label(DxEnd)
label(DxZero)
label(DxReturn)

registersymbol(DxPlatform)
registersymbol(DxVacToken)

DxPlatform:
dd 0

007CA437:
jmp GhoulDx
db 90
DxReturn:

GhoulDx:
push eax
mov eax, [00acf52c]
test eax, eax
je DxEnd
cmp [DxPlatform], 00
jne DxVac
mov eax, [eax+17a8]
sub eax,c
mov eax, [eax+1a4]
test eax, eax
je ResetDx
mov [DxPlatform], eax
jmp DxEnd

ResetDx:
mov [DxPlatform], 00
jmp DxEnd

DxVac:
push ebx
mov ebx, [esi+1a0]
test ebx, ebx
pop ebx
je DxZero
mov eax, [DxPlatform]
cmp [esi+1a0], eax
je DxZero
mov eax, [DxPlatform]
mov [esi+1a0], eax
mov [esi+1a4], eax
jmp DxEnd

DxZero:
mov [esi+1a0], 00

DxEnd:
pop eax
cmp [esi+1b0],ebx
jmp DxReturn+2

[Disable]

007CA437:
cmp [esi+1b0],ebx

unregistersymbol(DxPlatform)
unregistersymbol(DxVacToken)

dealloc(GhoulDx)
dealloc(DxPlatform)
dealloc(DxVacToken)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_四四Fucking數據(VAC).txt`:

```txt
//Ver1.31 S-Vac (CSVac)
//Author: SmartFour44
[Enable]
alloc(MyX,4)
alloc(MyY,4)
alloc(MyXVac,128)
alloc(MyYVac,128)
label(XReturnBack)
label(YReturnBack)

007C3E08:
jmp MyXVac
nop

MyXVac:
mov ecx,[00ACF52C]
mov ecx,[ecx+17A8]
mov ecx,[ecx+194]
cmp eax,ecx
je XReturnBack
mov ecx,[MyX]
fstp qword ptr [ebp-0c]
jmp 007C3E0E

XReturnBack:
mov ecx,[eax+0c]
fstp qword ptr [ebp-0c]
jmp 007C3E0E

007C3B01:
jmp MyYVac

MyYVac:
mov eax,[00ACF52C]
mov eax,[eax+17A8]
mov eax,[eax+194]
cmp esi,eax
je YReturnBack
fstp st(0)
mov eax,[MyY]
jmp 007C3B06

YReturnBack:
fstp st(0)
mov eax,[esi+10]
jmp 007C3B06
[Disable]
007C3E08:
mov ecx,[eax+0c]
fstp qword ptr [ebp-0c]
007C3B01:
fstp st(0)
mov eax,[esi+10]
dealloc(MyX)
dealloc(MyY)
dealloc(MyXVac)
dealloc(MyYVac)
```

```txt
Pointer: 00ACADF0
Offsect :4118

值鎖定0 就有所有奇幻村功能 不需要一個一的代碼更新 而且還要Pass  這不用
值鎖定1 自己變成鎖定狀態 ...(搞笑用的 = =|||||
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
registersymbol(Spawn)
alloc(Spawn,256)
alloc(Sonoff,4)
alloc(rx,4)
alloc(ry,4)
label(S01)
label(Spawn_ret)
Spawn:
cmp [Sonoff],01
je S01
pushad
mov edx,[00acfb58]
mov eax,[edx+00000b0c]        //X
mov [rx],eax
mov eax,[edx+00000b10]        //Y
mov [ry],eax
popad
mov [Sonoff],00000001
jmp Spawn_ret
S01:
mov [ecx+000002e0],00000006
cmp [esp],0057A8CA
jne Spawn_ret
cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
jne Spawn_ret
push ecx
mov eax,[rx]
mov [esp+0c],eax
mov eax,[ry]
mov [esp+10],eax
push eax
mov ecx,[00acf520]
call 004b55fc
mov ecx,eax
mov [esp+20],ecx
pop ecx
Spawn_ret:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
push ebx
push esi
jmp 007C931B
007C9316:
jmp Spawn
[disable]
007C9316:
db 55 8b ec 53 56
unregistersymbol(Spawn)
dealloc(Spawn)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_快速鍵+攻擊失效.txt`:

```txt
//V131 攻擊失效
[enable]
registersymbol(HotKey)
alloc(HotKey, 256)
registersymbol(PRESSEDKEY)
alloc(PRESSEDKEY, 4)
label(key01)
label(key02)
label(key03)
label(AttackKey)
label(PickUpKey)

//快捷鍵設定參考:
//Shift:002A0003
//9: 010A0000
//n: 00310000
//x: 002d0000
//z: 002c0000

HotKey:
        mov [PRESSEDKEY],eax
        cmp eax,[AttackKey]        //攻擊鍵
        jne key03
        push eax
        mov eax,[00ACF528]
        mov eax,[eax+24]
        cmp eax,0                //怪物數
        pop eax
        jg key02
key01:
        mov eax,[PickUpKey]        //撿取鍵z
        jmp key03
key02:
        mov eax,[AttackKey]        //攻擊鍵
        jmp key03
key03:
        mov ecx,[00ACADF0]
        jmp 00784FC0
AttackKey:
DD 001D0000
PickUpKey:
DD 002C0000

00784FBA:
     jmp HotKey


[disable]
00784FBA:
        mov ecx,[00ACADF0]

unregistersymbol(HotKey)
dealloc(HotKey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_怪物數量低於N無法攻擊.txt`:

```txt
//Twms V131.1  怪物數量低於N無法攻擊
//更新者 迷樣政
//怪物數量 內設1(1在楓之谷中為無怪物)
//地圖實際怪物量= 怪物數量(pointer: 00acf528 offset: 24 )減1
[enable]
Registersymbol(StopAttack)
Alloc(StopAttack, 64)
Registersymbol(StopAttack01)
Alloc(StopAttack01, 64)
registersymbol(ReturnAttack)
alloc(ReturnAttack, 64)
registersymbol(StopCount)
alloc(StopCount, 4)

StopCount:
dd 1 //怪物數量
StopAttack:
mov esi,ecx
push eax
mov eax,[00acf528]
mov eax,[eax+24]
cmp eax,[StopCount]
pop eax
jle StopAttack01
jmp ReturnAttack

StopAttack01:
cmp dword ptr [esi+00002088],00
je 00463d1f
jmp 00463CEA

ReturnAttack:
cmp dword ptr [esi+00002088],00
jne 00463d1f
jmp 00463CEA

00463CDF:
jmp StopAttack
[disable]
Unregistersymbol(StopAttack)
dealloc(StopAttack)
Unregistersymbol(StopAttack01)
dealloc(StopAttack01)
Unregistersymbol(ReturnAttack)
dealloc(ReturnAttack)
00463CDF:
mov esi,ecx
cmp dword ptr [esi+00002088],00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_怪物瞬移2號-時間控制版.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
//TWMS v131.1怪物瞬移2號 - 時間控制版
//加入時間控制By Inndy
//有效減少斷線機率
//Delay時間請自行修改
Alloc(FastMonster,128)
Alloc(Delay,4)
RegisterSymbol(nextGo)
RegisterSymbol(Switch)
Label(nextGo)
Label(Switch)
Label(Mode0)
Label(Mode1)
Label(Faster)
Label(Normal)

Delay:
DD 1388 //5秒 

FastMonster:
push eax
Call 007A2BEB
cmp [Switch],1
jne Mode0
je Mode1

Mode0:
cmp [nextGo],eax
jg Faster
mov [Switch],1
add eax,[Delay]
mov [nextGo],eax
Jmp Normal

Mode1:
cmp [nextGo],eax
jg Normal
mov [Switch],0
add eax,[Delay]
mov [nextGo],eax
Jmp Faster

Normal:
pop eax
Call 0057644E
ret

Faster:
pop eax
ret

nextGo:
readmem([00ACF940]+1C,4)
Switch:
DD 0

0059575D:
Call FastMonster
[Disable]
0059575D:
call 0057644e

UnRegisterSymbol(nextGo)
UnRegisterSymbol(Switch)
DeAlloc(Delay)
DeAlloc(FastMonster)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_控怪左右怪物掉落.txt`:

```txt
//Twms V131.1 控怪左右怪物掉落
[enable]
Registersymbol(MobLRD)
Alloc(MobLRD, 256)
Registersymbol(MobLRtemp)
Alloc(MobLRtemp, 4)
Label(LRstart)
Label(MobwalkL)
Label(MobwalkR)
Label(MobR)
Label(MobL)
Label(normal)
MobLRtemp:
dd 0
MobLRD:
pushfd
push eax
mov eax,[00acf52c]
cmp [eax+454],A
je MobR
cmp [eax+454],B
je MobL
cmp [eax+454],15
je normal
cmp [eax+454],14
je normal
LRstart:
pop eax
cmp [MobLRtemp],1
je MobwalkR
jg MobwalkL
popfd
jne 007cc1a2
jmp 007CC05A
normal:
mov [MobLRtemp],0
jmp LRstart
MobR:
mov [MobLRtemp],1
jmp LRstart
MobL:
mov [MobLRtemp],2
jmp LRstart
MobwalkR:
popfd
fstp st(1)
jmp 007CC089
MobwalkL:
popfd
fnstsw ax
fstp st(0)
jmp 007CC089
007CC054:
jmp MobLRD
nop
[disable]
Unregistersymbol(MobLRtemp)
Dealloc(MobLRtemp)
Unregistersymbol(MobLRD)
Dealloc(MobLRD)
007CC054:
jne 007cc1a2
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_攻擊80下自動走一次.txt`:

```txt
//Twms V131.1 攻擊80下自動走一次 
[Enable]
registersymbol(AutoLR)
alloc(AutoLR, 2560)
alloc(LRKEY,4)
alloc(BeginX,4)
alloc(CurrentX,4)
alloc(moveLeftOverflow,4)
alloc(TargetDistance,4)
alloc(TargetAttachCounter,4)
alloc(isStopAttack,4)
registerSymbol(LRKEY)
registerSymbol(BeginX)
registerSymbol(CurrentX)
label(AutoLRstart)
label(doMoveLeft)
label(doMoveRight)
label(doMoveExit)
label(getBeginX)
label(getBeginXExit)
label(moveLeftCondition)
label(moveRightCondition)
label(startMoveLeftRight)

LRKEY:
dd 0
BeginX:
dd 0
TargetDistance:
dd 20
TargetAttachCounter:
dd 80
moveLeftOverflow:
dd 0
isStopAttack:
dd 0

00AD4980:
DD AutoLR

AutoLR:
cmp [esp],007D05A7
jne GetFocus
mov [esp],AutoLRstart
jmp GetFocus

AutoLRstart:
call getBeginX
push eax
mov eax, [00ACF52C]
mov eax, [eax+3A1C]
cmp eax, [TargetAttachCounter]
pop eax
jl doMoveExit
mov [isStopAttack],1
cmp [moveLeftOverflow],1
je moveRightCondition
mov [LRKEY],1

moveLeftCondition:
push eax
mov eax,[BeginX]
sub eax,[CurrentX]
cmp eax,[TargetDistance]
pop eax
jl startMoveLeftRight
mov [moveLeftOverflow],1
mov [LRKEY],2
jmp doMoveExit

moveRightCondition:
push eax
mov eax,[BeginX]
sub eax,[CurrentX]
cmp eax,0 
pop eax
jg startMoveLeftRight
mov [moveLeftOverflow],0
mov [LRKEY],0
push eax
mov eax, [00ACF52C]
mov [eax+3A1C],0
pop eax
mov [isStopAttack],0
jmp doMoveExit

startMoveLeftRight:
cmp [LRKEY],1
jl doMoveExit
je doMoveLeft
jg doMoveRight

doMoveLeft:
mov [ebp-8],ffffffff
jmp doMoveExit

doMoveRight:
mov [ebp-8],1
jmp doMoveExit

doMoveExit:
xor eax,eax
xor esi,esi
cmp [ebp-04],esi
lea ecx,[edi+00000234]
jmp 007D07C9

getBeginX:
push eax
mov eax, [00acf52c]
mov eax, [eax+44c4]
mov [CurrentX], eax
cmp [BeginX],0
jne getBeginXExit
mov eax, [00acf52c]
mov eax, [eax+44c4]
mov [BeginX], eax
getBeginXExit:
pop eax
ret

[Disable]
00AD4980:
DD GetFocus
unregistersymbol(AutoLR)
dealloc(AutoLR)
unregistersymbol(LRKEY)
dealloc(LRKEY)
unregistersymbol(BeginX)
dealloc(BeginX)
unregistersymbol(CurrentX)
dealloc(CurrentX)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_滑鼠趕路SS.txt`:

```txt
//滑鼠趕路SS F4熱鍵版 TWMS V131
[enable]
registersymbol(MouseRushStart)
alloc(MouseRushStart, 512)
registersymbol(HotKey)
alloc(HotKey, 128)
alloc(RushSW, 4)
alloc(x,4)
alloc(y,4)
label(dotele)
label(RetMSRush)
label(normal)

RushSW:
        dd      0              // 初始是關閉mouse 趕路

MouseRushStart:
push edx
mov edx,[00ACF52C]
cmp    [00ACF52C],0
je      RetMSRush
cmp    [00ACF52C],0
je      RetMSRush
cmp    [RushSW], 0
je      RetMSRush
mov    ebx, [00ACF52C]
mov    ebx, [ebx+17a8]
cmp    esi, ebx
jne    RetMSRush
mov    eax, [00acf93c]//8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 57 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8D 45 ??
mov    eax, [eax+978]
mov    ebx, [eax+8c]
mov    eax, [eax+88]
mov    [edi-4], ebx

mov [x],ebx
mov [y],eax
cmp [edx+00000454],a
je dotele
cmp [edx+00000454],b
je dotele
jmp RetMSRush
dotele:
push ecx
mov ecx,[x]
mov [edx+00002cf8],ecx // 89 83 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 45 ?? 89 83 ?? ?? ?? ?? 89
mov ecx,[y]
mov [edx+00002cfc],ecx
mov [edx+00000454],13
pop ecx
mov  [RushSW], 0
RetMSRush:
pop edx
        mov        [edi],eax
        mov        ebx,[ebp+14]
        jmp        007C75B9

007C75B4: // 89 07 8B 5D ?? 85 DB 74 ??
        jmp MouseRushStart

HotKey:
cmp eax,3e0000  //熱鍵 F4

jne normal
not [RushSW]

normal:
mov ecx,[00ACADF0]//8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B F8 C1 EF ??
jmp 00784FC0

00784FBA://8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B F8 C1 EF ??
jmp HotKey
nop

[disable]
007C75B4:// 89 07 8B 5D ?? 85 DB 74 ??
db 89 07 8b 5d 14

00784FBA:
mov ecx,[00ACADF0]

unregistersymbol(MouseRushStart)
dealloc(MouseRushStart)
dealloc(RushSW)
unregistersymbol(HotKey)
dealloc(HotKey)
dealloc(X)
dealloc(Y)

```

```txt
[ENABLE]
//炎魔忍耐任務
Alloc(SpawnControl,512)
Label(rtnSPC)

SpawnControl:
  pushad
  mov esi,[00ACFB58]
  mov esi,[esi+0C98]

  cmp esi,363D7F80 //自由市場入口
  jz rtnStart00
  cmp esi,0C939AC0 //冰原雪域
  jz rtnStart01
  cmp esi,0C93C1D0 //冰面I
  jz rtnStart02
  cmp esi,0C93E8E0 //冰面II
  jz rtnStart03
  cmp esi,0C940FF0 //結冰的平原I
  jz rtnStart04
  cmp esi,0C943700 //結冰的平原II
  jz rtnStart05
  cmp esi,0C943764 //冰雪峽谷I
  jz rtnStart06
  cmp esi,0C9437C8 //冰雪峽谷II
  jz rtnStart07
  cmp esi,0C94382C //尖銳的絕璧I
  jz rtnStart08
  cmp esi,0C943890 //尖銳的絕璧II
  jz rtnStart09
  cmp esi,0C9438F4 //尖銳的絕璧3
  jz rtnStart10
  cmp esi,0C943958 //尖銳的絕璧4
  jz rtnStart11
  cmp esi,0C9439BC //危險的絕璧
  jz rtnStart12
  cmp esi,0C943A20 //狼的領土1
  jz rtnStart13
  cmp esi,0C943A84 //狼的領土2
  jz rtnStart14
  cmp esi,0C943AE8 //狼的領土3
  jz rtnStart15
  cmp esi,0C943B4C //亡者之林I
  jz rtnStart16
  cmp esi,0C943BB0 //亡者之林II
  jz rtnStart17
  cmp esi,0C943C14 //亡者之林III
  jz rtnStart18
  cmp esi,0C943C78 //亡者之林IV
  jz rtnStart19
  cmp esi,0C943CDC //廢棄礦坑I
  jz rtnStart20
  cmp esi,0C943D40 //廢棄礦坑II
  jz rtnStart21
  cmp esi,0C943DA4 //廢棄礦坑III
  jz rtnStart22
  cmp esi,0C943E08 //廢棄礦坑IV
  jz rtnStart23
  cmp esi,0C943E6C //火山通道
  jz rtnStart24
  cmp esi,0C943ED0 //試煉洞窟I
  jz rtnStart25
  cmp esi,0C943F34 //試煉洞窟II
  jz rtnStart26
  cmp esi,0C943F98 //試煉洞窟III
  jz rtnStart27
  cmp esi,0C943FFC //通往殘暴炎魔之門
  jz rtnStart
  cmp esi,10B0C420 //火山的氣息<第1階段>
  jz rtnOne
  cmp esi,10B0C421 //火山的氣息<第2階段>
  jz rtnTwo
rtnNormal:
  popad
  lea eax,[ebx+00004054]
  jmp rtnSPC
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_無限XY之狂狼全圖反盾(完整).txt`:

```txt
//v1.31.1 狂狼反盾全圖攻擊
//auther:aaaddress1
//Fixed By 小翊game、草泥馬
//技術支援:頑皮鬼
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(SetBump,128)
alloc(Hit,128) 
alloc(BlockHit,128)
alloc(HitTime,4)
label(BlockHurt)
registersymbol(Get)
alloc(Get,4)
//--------------狂狼反盾停止呼吸---------
0077A30C: //c7 83 ?? ?? 00 00 88 13 00 00 81 ff ?? ?? ?? 00 74 1b 57
mov [ebx+00000450],00000000
0077A1D3: //bf dc 05 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 70 04 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ff
mov edi,00000000
//--------------不明功能---------
0078327F: //74 1b ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 59 85 c0 75 0b
db eb 1b
//--------------怪物穩如泰山--------------
00586DE6: //0f 8e ?? 00 00 00 83 7d ?? 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8b 4d ?? e8
jg 00586e7f
//--------------狂狼反盾清除連擊----------
00787C30: //85 c0 7e 1f 39 bb ?? ?? 00 00 7e 17
jmp Hit

Hit:
cmp [ebx+000045d0],258 
jl 00787c53
mov eax,[ebx+000045d4]
jmp 00787C47
//--------------狂狼反盾無敵-------------
0077901C: //e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85 ?? ?? 00 00 8b 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 e0 f2
jmp BlockHit
nop
BlockHit:
call 00420774
push ecx
mov ecx,[00ACF940]
mov ecx,[ecx+1c]
cmp ecx,[HitTime]
jl BlockHurt
mov eax,[ebx+00000454]
and eax,fe
mov [HitTime],ecx
add [HitTime],4E20
pop ecx
jmp 00779040

BlockHurt:
pop ecx
jmp 0077aa01
//--------------狂狼反盾連撞-------------
00783117: //81 c1 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 75 21 83 a5
call SetBump
nop
 
SetBump:
add ecx,3A14
call 0075C8E0
mov [ebp-20],00 
mov [ebp-000001A0],00 
mov [ebp-00000100],00 
mov [esp],007831AA
ret
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
//00AD97DE:
//DB 15 8E 8E 03 D0 79 1C 80 CE 5B B8 6F EA 79 20 95 0B A7 67 53 32 5D 90 86 1F C6
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
00588D1B: //e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 86 ?? ?? 00 00 3b c3 74 20
call SetXY
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00acf52c]
push [edi+44c4]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 004201be
push [edi+44c8]
mov ecx,esi
call 004201be
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 04
//-----------------------------------------
00AD8FE1:
db 90 29 6E 04 CC B1 4D 9E 71 92 E5 7E 53 4B 35 11 3B 55 F8 DE B8 C8 67 36 7F E0 49 4A 0D CE B8 27 C1 44 95 11 E1 57 CD 3F D2
[DISABLE]
00783178:
db 75 30
//00AD97DE:
//DB 15 8E 9D CC D8 9B 64 C6 DE EC 48 70 EA 6D 8D F0 AE B2 84 77 95 6D 88 8F D5 6D
00588D1B:
call 0044054A
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_無限XY之狂狼全圖反盾(舊).txt`:

```txt
//v1.31.1 狂狼反盾全圖攻擊
//auther:aaaddress1(無限XY原作)
//Fixed By 小翊game、草泥馬
//技術支援:頑皮鬼
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(SetBump,128)

//--------------狂狼反盾停止呼吸---------
0077A30C:
mov [ebx+00000450],00000000
0077A1D3:
mov edi,00000000
//--------------狂狼反盾連撞-------------
00783117:
call SetBump
nop

SetBump:
add ecx,00003a14
call 0075c8e0
mov [esp],00783147
ret

00783178:
db eb 30
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
//00AD97DE:
//DB 15 8E 8E 03 D0 79 1C 80 CE 5B B8 6F EA 79 20 95 0B A7 67 53 32 5D 90 86 1F C6
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
00588D1B:
call SetXY
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00acf52c]
mov [edi+00000450],0
mov [edi+000003e4],25
push [edi+44c4]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 004201be
push [edi+44c8]
mov ecx,esi
call 004201be
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 04
//-----------------------------------------
[DISABLE]
00783178:
db 75 30
//00AD97DE:
//DB 15 8E 9D CC D8 9B 64 C6 DE EC 48 70 EA 6D 8D F0 AE B2 84 77 95 6D 88 8F D5 6D
00588D1B:
call 0044054A
```

```txt
//v1.31.1 狂狼反盾全圖攻擊

0077A30C:
mov [ebx+00000450],00000000
0077A1D3:
mov edi,00000000
//--------------狂狼反盾連撞-------------
00783117:
call SetBump
nop

SetBump:
add ecx,00003a14
call 0075c8e0
mov [esp],00783147
ret

00783178:
db eb 30
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
00AD97DE:
DB 15 8E 8E 03 D0 79 1C 80 CE 5B B8 6F EA 79 20 95 0B A7 67 53 32 5D 90 86 1F C6
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
00588D1B:
call SetXY
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00acf52c]
mov [edi+00000450],0
mov [edi+000003e4],25
push [edi+44c4]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 004201be
push [edi+44c8]
mov ecx,esi
call 004201be
pop edi

pop esi
ret 04
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_疾風無敵ICS.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(Function,512)
Registersymbol(Function)
Alloc(CtrlTime,4)
Registersymbol(CtrlTime)
Label(Normal)
Label(Main)
Registersymbol(Main)

00AB62E4:
Dd Function

CtrlTime:
Dd FFFF8AD0 // 30 Sec

Function:
//E8     6A 64 33 D2 59 F7 F1 89 55
Cmp [Esp+1C], 007799EB
Jne 00637288
Mov [Esp+1C], Main
Jmp 00637288

Main:
Push 64
Xor Edx,Edx
Pop Ecx
Div Ecx
Mov [Ebp+30], Edx
Call 00428EFF
Test byte ptr [Eax+00000178], 02
Je Normal
Jmp 0076388A
//E8     39 7D  7F  8D 8B     68 24 FA FF FF E8
Normal:
Lea Ecx, [Ebx+00002BF4]
Push [CtrlTime]
Jmp 0077A1C0

[Disable]
00AB62E4:
Dd 00637288
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_禁止攻擊.txt`:

```txt
//Twms V131.1  怪物數量低於N無法攻擊
//更新者 迷樣政
//怪物數量 內設1(1在楓之谷中為無怪物)
//地圖實際怪物量 = 怪物數量(pointer: 00acf528 offset: 24 )減1
[enable]
Registersymbol(StopAttack)
Alloc(StopAttack, 64)
Registersymbol(StopAttack01)
Alloc(StopAttack01, 64)
registersymbol(ReturnAttack)
alloc(ReturnAttack, 64)
registersymbol(StopCount)
alloc(StopCount, 4)

StopCount:
dd 1 //怪物數量
StopAttack:
mov esi,ecx
push eax
mov eax,[00acf528]
mov eax,[eax+24]
cmp eax,[StopCount]
pop eax
jle StopAttack01
jmp ReturnAttack

StopAttack01:
cmp dword ptr [esi+00002088],00
je 00463d1f
jmp 00463CEA

ReturnAttack:
cmp dword ptr [esi+00002088],00
jne 00463d1f
jmp 00463CEA

00463CDF:
jmp StopAttack
[disable]
Unregistersymbol(StopAttack)
dealloc(StopAttack)
Unregistersymbol(StopAttack01)
dealloc(StopAttack01)
Unregistersymbol(ReturnAttack)
dealloc(ReturnAttack)
00463CDF:
mov esi,ecx
cmp dword ptr [esi+00002088],00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_笨A怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Registersymbol(MobCheck)
Alloc(MobCheck,256)
Label(MobStupid)

MobCheck:
And Dword Ptr [Ebp+00],00
Pop Edi
Pop Esi
Pop Ebp
Pop Ebx
//33 D2 B9 60 EA 00 00 F7 F1 8D 8E     81 C2
Cmp [Esp], 007C9612
Je MobStupid
Ret
//Call 0040BC16
MobStupid:
Add Esp,04
Xor Edx,Edx
Mov Ecx,0000EA60
//
Lea Ecx,[Esi+00000300]
//
Push Edx
Call 004201BE
Mov Ebx,[Ebp+0C]
Lea Edi,[Esi+000002F0]
Cmp [Edi],Ebx
Je 007C9645
Jmp 007C963A

0040811E:
Jmp MobCheck
Nop

[Disable]
//83 65 00 00 5F 5E 5D 5B C3
0040811E:
Db 83 65 00 00 5F 5E

Dealloc(MobCheck)
Unregistersymbol(MobCheck)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_等級一到就斷線.txt`:

```txt
// Twms V1.31.1 等級一到就斷線
// 作者： k0960132, coffeeKing1234
// TargetLevel 的值設目標等級
// NowLevel 是目前的等級，當目前的等級=目標等級就會斷線
//更新Homax 

[enable]
registersymbol(TargetLevel)
registersymbol(NowLevel)
alloc(CheckLevel,128)
label(TargetLevel)
label(NowLevel)
label(CheckLevelRet)
CheckLevel:
    mov [NowLevel], eax
    cmp [TargetLevel], 00
    jz CheckLevelRet
    cmp eax, [TargetLevel]
    je 00000000
    jmp CheckLevelRet
TargetLevel:
  dd  00
NowLevel:
  dd  00
0061FA1B:
jmp CheckLevel
CheckLevelRet:
[disable]
0061FA1B:
cmp eax,000000c8
unregistersymbol(TargetLevel)
unregistersymbol(NowLevel)
dealloc(CheckLevel)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_讀取HP、MP、MaxHP、MaxMP.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
registersymbol(GetHpMp)
alloc(GetHpMp,128)
registersymbol(HpValue)
alloc(HpValue,4)
registersymbol(MpValue)
alloc(MpValue,4)
registersymbol(MaxHpValue)
alloc(MaxHpValue,4)
registersymbol(MaxMpValue)
alloc(MaxMpValue,4)

006FAE9E:
jmp GetHpMp

GetHpMp:
call 0040496d
mov [MaxMpValue],ax
push [esi+6b]
mov ebx,eax
lea eax,[esi+63]
push eax
call 0040496d
mov [MpValue],ax
push [edi+00002108]
add edi,00002100
push edi
mov [ebp-1c],eax
call 0040496d
mov [MaxHpValue],ax
push [esi+53]
mov edi,eax
lea eax,[esi+4b]
push eax
call 0040496d
mov [HpValue],ax
add esp,20
jmp 006FAED7

[disable]
006FAE9E:
call 0040496d
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/TWMS131_跳怪掉落點式吸怪(鎖).txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
//TWMS131_跳怪掉落點式吸怪
//Auther:Aaaddress1
//更新：Inndy
alloc(JmpMobVac,128)
label(Vac)
alloc(rec,4)

007CC26E:
jmp JmpMobVac
nop

JmpMobVac:
push eax
mov eax,[00acf52c] //人物PID
mov eax,[eax+17A8]
sub eax,c
mov eax,[eax+1a0]
mov [rec],eax
pop eax

Vac:
push [rec]
pop [ebx+1a0]
mov [ebx+2e0],6
mov eax,[ebx+1a0]
jmp 007CC274


[DISABLE]
007CC26E:
db 8B 83 A0 01 00 00

dealloc(JmpMobVac)
dealloc(rec)
```

```txt
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:

cmp [R2KEY],2
jg R200
mov edi,ffffffff  		//技能動作 (16進位)
push [ebp+0c]
lea ecx,[esi+88]
mov eax,[ecx]
jmp 007486fa 		//add+3
//-----------------------------------------------

push [ebp+0c]
lea ecx,[esi+88]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/V131.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(LastEsp,4)
alloc(RealLastEsp,4)
registersymbol(RealLastEsp)
alloc(GetAddressCall,64)
alloc(GetAddressYeah,64)
alloc(GetTrueFalse,64)
007A2BEB:
jmp GetAddressCall 
GetAddressCall:
mov eax,[esp]
push eax
call GetTrueFalse//條件式
cmp eax,0//False
pop eax
je GetAddressYeah
mov [LastEsp],eax
mov eax,[ztltaskmemreallocimp+2e683e]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
ret
GetAddressYeah:
mov eax,[LastEsp]
mov [RealLastEsp],eax
mov eax,[ztltaskmemreallocimp+2e683e]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
ret
GetTrueFalse:
//Eax = 0 RealLastEsp會紀錄上一個的[esp]
ret
[DISABLE]
007A2BEB:
mov eax,[ztltaskmemreallocimp+2e683e]
dealloc(LastEsp)
dealloc(RealLastEsp)
dealloc(GetAddressCall)
dealloc(GetAddressYeah)
dealloc(GetTrueFalse)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/狂狼反盾加強.txt`:

```txt
//v1.31.1 狂狼反盾全圖攻擊
//auther:aaaddress1
//Fixed By 小翊game、草泥馬
//技術支援:頑皮鬼
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(SetBump,128)
alloc(Hit,128) 
alloc(BlockHit,128)
alloc(HitTime,4)
label(BlockHurt)
registersymbol(Get)
alloc(Get,4)
0078327F:
db eb 1b 
//--------------怪物穩如泰山--------------
00586DE6:
jg 00586e7f
//--------------狂狼反盾清除連擊----------
00787C30: 
jmp Hit

Hit:
cmp [ebx+000045d0],258 
jl 00787c53
mov eax,[ebx+000045d4]
jmp 00787C47
//--------------狂狼反盾無敵-------------
0077901C:
jmp BlockHit
nop
BlockHit:
call 00420774
push ecx
mov ecx,[00ACF940]
mov ecx,[ecx+1c]
cmp ecx,[HitTime]
jl BlockHurt
mov eax,[ebx+00000454]
and eax,fe
mov [HitTime],ecx
add [HitTime],4E20
pop ecx
jmp 00779040

BlockHurt:
pop ecx
jmp 0077aa01
//--------------狂狼反盾連撞-------------
00783117:
call SetBump
nop
 
SetBump:
add ecx,3a14
call 0075c8e0
mov [ebp-20],00 
mov [ebp-000001a0],00 
mov [ebp-00000100],00 
mov [esp],007831aa
ret
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
00AD97DE:
DB 15 8E 8E 03 D0 79 1C 80 CE 5B B8 6F EA 79 20 95 0B A7 67 53 32 5D 90 86 1F C6
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
00588D1B:
call SetXY
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00acf52c]
push [edi+44c4]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 004201be
push [edi+44c8]
mov ecx,esi
call 004201be
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 04
//-------------怪物強制弱化----------------
00783267:
mov eax,00000000
//-----------------------------------------
00AD8FE1:
db 90 29 6E 04 CC B1 4D 9E 71 92 E5 7E 53 4B 35 11 3B 55 F8 DE B8 C8 67 36 7F E0 49 4A 0D CE B8 27 C1 44 95 11 E1 57 CD 3F D2
[DISABLE]

00AD97DE:
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS131/狂狼反盾資料.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
//Auther:aaaddress1
//強化狂狼反盾 For Twms.v1.31.1
//加強反盾&加速反盾&無敵&連撞
[ENABLE]

alloc(BlockHit,128)
alloc(HitTime,4)
label(BlockHurt)
alloc(SetBump,1024)
registersymbol(Get)
alloc(Get,4)
label(SetHitRun) 
//---------------------------------------- 
0077901C:
jmp BlockHit
nop
00783117:
call SetBump
nop
//---------------------------------------- 
BlockHit:

call 00420774
push ecx
mov ecx,[00ACF940]
mov ecx,[ecx+1c]
cmp ecx,[HitTime]
jl BlockHurt
mov eax,[ebx+00000454]
and eax,fe
mov [HitTime],ecx
add [HitTime],4E20
pop ecx
jmp 00779040

BlockHurt:
pop ecx
jmp 0077aa01
//---------------------------------------- 

SetBump:
add ecx,3a14
call 0075c8e0
mov [ebp-020],00//更動造成反盾CS 
mov [ebp-1a0],00//更動造成怪物死亡殘影 
mov [ebp-100],00//不知道衝3小用的 
mov [ebp-108],00//非主要內定值(連擊次數) 
mov [ebp-128],01//主要內定值(連擊次數) 
lea eax,[ebp-0ab4] //狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov [ebp-135c],eax //狂狼反盾技能碼 
push 98//設定爆擊資料3 
push 00//設定爆擊資料2 
push [ebp-135c] //設定爆擊資料1 
//call 0083F1E0 //eax=設定爆擊狀態 
add esp,0c
mov ecx,[ebp-164]//ecx=0,ecx=ebp+ecx*4-164 
mov [eax],ecx  //似乎是撞擊時間值 
push 00 
mov eax,[ebp-135c]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
call 005804ca
mov ecx,[ebp-135c]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov [ecx+08],eax//不可固定的反盾變動值 
mov eax,[ebp-135c]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov ecx,[eax]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
call 0063d0a0
mov ecx,[ebp-135c]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov [ecx+0c],eax//不可固定的反盾變動值 
mov eax,[ebp-135c]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov ecx,[eax]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
call 00575cf7//報即計算? 
mov ecx,[ebp-135c]//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov eax,00 
mov [ecx+04],eax//怪物弱化控制:07=擊退,其餘則不擊退 
//mov [esp],0078329c //正常程序 
mov [ebp+14],00//狂狼反盾的呼吸時間? 
lea eax,[ebp+14]
mov [ebp-1ea0],eax//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov [ebp-1894],eax//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov edx,[ebp-135c]//不知道是啥小 
mov [edx+0090],ecx//反盾技能變動值 
mov [edx+0094],eax//狂狼反盾技能碼 
mov [ebp-1358],eax//狂狼反盾技能碼
mov [esp],SetHitRun
ret
SetHitRun:
and [ebp-34],00
and [ebp-00000120],00
and [ebp-1c],00
and [ebp-00000104],00
and [ebp-48],00
and [ebp-30],00
and [ebp-18],00
jmp 00783312 
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
00AD97DE:
DB 15 8E 8E 03 D0 79 1C 80 CE 5B B8 6F EA 79 20 95 0B A7 67 53 32 5D 90 86 1F C6
 
 
[DISABLE]

```

```txt
004C5844 - 74 09                      - je 004c584f

004C5849 - 74 04                      - je 004c584f
004C584B - 32 c0                      - xor al,al
004C584D - eb 02                      - jmp 004c5851
004C584F - b0 01                      - mov al,01
004C5851 - 88 46 1d                   - mov [esi+1d],al
004C5854 - 89 7e 20                   - mov [esi+20],edi
004C5857 - 8b 7d 08                   - mov edi,[ebp+08]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_AttackLowDelay.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC 攻擊低延遲
[enable]
registersymbol(LastTime)
alloc(LastTime, 4)
registersymbol(AttackTimes)
alloc(AttackTimes, 4)
registersymbol(Attnodelay)
alloc(Attnodelay, 128)
label(NoDelay)
registersymbol(GetDelay)
alloc(GetDelay, 128)
Attnodelay:
push eax
mov eax,[00BB7098]
sub [eax+1c],2710
cmp [AttackTimes],2
jge GetDelay

NoDelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
mov eax,[00BB7098]
add [eax+1C],2710
mov eax,[eax+1c]
mov [LastTime],eax
mov eax,ffff0000
JMP 0044E2EA

GetDelay:
mov [AttackTimes],0
add [eax+1C],2710
mov eax,[eax+1c]
sub eax,[LastTime]
cmp eax,3E8//1秒
pop eax
jge NoDelay
cmp eax,02
jg 0044e2e7
JMP 0044E2E4

0044E2DF:
jmp Attnodelay
[disable]
0044E2DF:
cmp eax,02
jg 0044e2e7
unregistersymbol(LastTime)
dealloc(LastTime)
unregistersymbol(AttackTimes)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_ByPassMSCRC.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC MSCRC Bypass
[Enable]
Alloc(Hook,256)

Hook:
Label(MSCRCBypass)
Label(BackToMS)
Label(MSCRCBypassTwo)
Label(BackToMSTwo)
Label(MSCRCCrack)
Label(BackToCrack)

MSCRCBypass:
    Push   Esi
    Xor    Eax, [Esi+Ecx*4]
    Cmp    Esi, 00400000
    Jnge   BackToMS
    Cmp    Esi, 00BFE000
    Jg     BackToMS
    Push   Eax
    Mov    Eax, FakeDump
    Sub    Eax, 00401000
    Add    Esi, Eax
    Pop    Eax
    Sub    Esi, 00401000
BackToMS:
    Xor    Eax, [Esi+Ecx*4]
    And    Eax, 000000FF
    Pop    Esi
    Push   008D5601
    Ret
MSCRCBypassTwo:
    Cmp    Ecx, 00400000
    Jnge   BackToMSTwo
    Cmp    Ecx, 00BFE000
    Jg     BackToMSTwo
    Push   Eax
    Sub    Ecx, 00400000
    Push   Eax
    Mov    Eax, FakeDump
    Sub    Eax, 00401000
    Add    Ecx, Eax
    Pop    Eax
    Sub    Ecx, 00400000
BackToMSTwo:
    Xor    Edx, Edx
    Mov    Ebx, [Ebp+08]
    Push   008D4FFF
    Ret
MSCRCCrack:
    Cmp    Edx, 008D4FF6
    Jnge   BackToCrack
    Cmp    Edx, 008D4FFF
    Jg     BackToCrack
    Push   Eax
    Mov    Eax, FakeDump
    Sub    Eax, 00401000
    Add    Edx, Eax
    Pop    Eax
    Sub    Edx, 00400000	
    Push   [Edx]
BackToCrack:
    Push   00c8f36d
    Ret
008D4FFA:
    Jmp    MSCRCBypassTwo
008D55FC:
    Jmp    MSCRCBypass
00C978a2:
    Jmp    MSCRCCrack
004E104A:
    DB 90 90 90 90 90
[Disable]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_定點生怪(Have-Error).txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC 定點生怪
[Enable]
registersymbol(Spawn)
alloc(Spawn,256)
label(Exit)
alloc(MyXY,8)
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(MapID,4)
SetXY:
mov [MapID],eax
mov ecx,[esp+10]
mov [MyXY],ecx
mov ecx,[esp+0c]
mov [MyXY+4],ecx
mov eax,[MyXY+4]
pop ecx
push ecx
push eax
mov ecx,[00bb6bd0]
call 0042AD65
mov ecx,eax
mov [esp+20],ecx
pop ecx
jmp Exit
Spawn:
cmp [ecx+460],0
je Exit
cmp [esp],0059BED7
jne Exit
cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
jne Exit
mov [ecx+2A0],6
push ecx
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+ca4]
cmp eax,[MapID]
jne SetXY
cmp [MyXY],0
je SetXY
mov eax,[MyXY]
mov [esp+10],eax
mov eax,[MyXY+4]
mov [esp+0c],eax
push eax
mov ecx,[00bb6bd0]
call 0042AD65
mov ecx,eax
mov [esp+20],ecx
pop ecx
Exit:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
push ebx
mov ebx,[ebp+10]
jmp 00839D40
00839D39:
jmp Spawn
nop
[Disable]
00839D39:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
push ebx
mov ebx,[ebp+10]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_移動加速 .txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC 移動加速
//更新:Inndy
[enable]
Label(return)
Label(normal)
Registersymbol(speed)
Alloc(speed, 4)
Registersymbol(speedup)
Alloc(speedup, 128)

speed:
dd 3 //數值越大速度越快 (0為正常)

speedup:
push esi
mov esi,[speed]

return:
cmp esi,0
je normal

dec esi
push eax
push ecx
call dword ptr [eax]
pop ecx
pop eax
jmp return

normal:
pop esi
call dword ptr [eax]
mov eax,[esi+30]
jmp 008026A5

008026A0:
jmp speedup

[disable]
Unregistersymbol(speed)
Dealloc(speed)
Unregistersymbol(speedup)
Dealloc(speedup)

008026A0:
call dword ptr [eax]
mov eax,[esi+30]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_笨怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC 笨怪
//更新:Inndy
[Enable]
Alloc(MobCheck,256)
Label(MobStupid)

MobCheck:
And Dword Ptr [Ebp+00],00
Pop Edi
Pop Esi
Pop Ebp
Pop Ebx
//               33 D2 B9 60 EA 00 00 F7 F1 8D 8E ?? ?? ?? ?? 81 C2
//e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 33 d2 b9 ?? ?? 00 00 f7 f1 8d 8e ?? ?? 00 00
Cmp [Esp], 00839FAC
Je MobStupid
Ret
//Call 0040BC16
MobStupid:
Add Esp,04
Xor Edx,Edx
Mov Ecx,0000EA60
//
Lea Ecx,[Esi+000002B0]
//
Push Edx
Call 00420f21
Mov Ebx,[Ebp+0C]
Lea Edi,[Esi+000002A0]
Cmp [Edi],Ebx
Je 00839fdf
Jmp 00839FD4

004087AE:
Jmp MobCheck
Nop

[Disable]
//83 65 00 00 5F 5E 5D 5B C3
004087AE:
Db 83 65 00 00 5F 5E

Dealloc(MobCheck)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_等級一到就斷線.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC 等級一到就斷線
//更新:Inndy
//作者：k0960132, coffeeKing1234
//TargetLevel 的值設目標等級
//NowLevel 是目前的等級，當目前的等級=目標等級就會斷線

[enable]
registersymbol(TargetLevel)
registersymbol(NowLevel)
alloc(CheckLevel,64)
label(TargetLevel)
label(NowLevel)
label(CheckLevelRet)
label(Return)

TargetLevel:
  dd  00
NowLevel:
  dd  00

CheckLevel:
    mov [NowLevel], eax
    cmp [TargetLevel], 00
    jz Return
    cmp eax, [TargetLevel]
    jne Return
    push 0
    call ExitProcess
    jmp Return
Return:
    cmp eax,000000C8
    jmp CheckLevelRet

00647357:
jmp CheckLevel
CheckLevelRet:
[disable]
00647357:
cmp eax,000000C8

unregistersymbol(TargetLevel)
unregistersymbol(NowLevel)
dealloc(CheckLevel)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_簡化版集氣無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Label(AttackTimes)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],1
jle 007E27F2
call 008B7F60
cmp [AttackTimes],2
jg Refresh
jmp 007E27F2
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0
jmp 007E27F2
//------------------------------------------------------------------
AttackTimes:
DD 0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007e27ed://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007e226f://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 87 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
007e27ed:
call 008B7F60

007e226f:
call 0080E4FD
dealloc(Nodelay)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_CRC_讀取血魔.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 CRC 讀取血魔
//更新:Inndy
//改寫 By Inndy
[ENABLE]
alloc(GetHPMP,128)
label(MM)
label(NM)
label(MH)
label(NH)
alloc(MAXMP,4)
alloc(NOWMP,4)
alloc(MAXHP,4)
alloc(NOWHP,4)
registersymbol(MAXMP)
registersymbol(NOWMP)
registersymbol(MAXHP)
registersymbol(NOWHP)

GetHPMP:
call 008B89B3
pop ebp

cmp [esp],0074FF43
je MM
cmp [esp],0074FF51
je NM
cmp [esp],0074FF66
je MH
cmp [esp],0074FF74
je NH
ret

MM:
mov [MAXMP],eax
ret

NM:
mov [NOWMP],eax
ret

MH:
mov [MAXHP],eax
ret

NH:
mov [NOWHP],eax
ret

00404DA1:
jmp GetHPMP
[DISABLE]
00404DA1:
call 008B89B3
dealloc(GetHPMP)
dealloc(MAXMP)
dealloc(NOWMP)
dealloc(MAXHP)
dealloc(NOWHP)
unregistersymbol(MAXMP)
unregistersymbol(NOWMP)
unregistersymbol(MAXHP)
unregistersymbol(NOWHP)
```
