```txt
//TWMS133 其他 Pointer
[Pointer&Offset] For TWMS 133
[VERSION] V133
[UPDATE] 愛哭鬼
[TIME] 2011.6.29

//人物基址：00BB6C30
//8b 0d ? ? ? ? 83 ? ? 8b ? 8d ? ? ? ff ? ? 0f b7 //第一個
人物動作：46C
//8b 88 ? ? ? ? 83 ? ? 83 ? ? 0f 84 ? ? ? ? 33
技能動作：474
人物節拍：478
呼吸值：468
角色X座標：4EEC
//89 8e ? ? ? ? 8b 40 ? 89 ? ? ? ? ? 8b ? 8b
角色Y座標：4EF0
主動技次數：
輔助技次數：
CharPID：17C8
//8b 86 ? ? ? ? 83 ? ? f7 ? 1b ? 83

//資訊基址：00BB72A8
//a1 ? ? ? ? 3b ? 74 ? 8b ? ? ? ? ? 8b ? 89
地圖ID：CA4
//8b 83 ? ? ? ? 3b ? 0f 84 ? ? ? ? 8b ? ? 3b ? ? 0f 83
角色X座標：B18
角色Y座標：B1C

//怪物基址：00BB6C2C
//8b 0d ? ? ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 81 //第一個
怪物數量：24

//滑鼠基址：00BB7094
//a1 ? ? ? ? ? a1 ? ? ? ? ? 33 ? 39 ? ? ? ? ? 0f 95 ? ? 8b//第2個
定位：B78
X：88
//8b 86 ? ? ? ? 8b 48 ? 8b 86 ? ? ? ? 85 c0
Y：8C

//系統基址：00BB7098
//a1 ? ? ? ? ? 33 ? 39 ? ? ? ? ? 0f 95 ? ? 8b ? 85
時間：1C

//伺服器基址：00BB2480
//a1 ? ? ? ? 39 ? ? ? ? ? 75 ? e8 ? ? ? ? 8b ? e8 ? ? ? ? 0f b7//第二個
頻道：2058
伺服器：2054

//狀態基址：00BB6F10
//a1 ? ? ? ? ? 33 ? 39 ? ? ? ? ? 0f 95 ? ? 8b //第一個
HP：17D0
//8b ? ? ? ? ? 8d ? ? ? ? 8d ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? ? c6 //第一個
MP：17D4

//警告基址：00BB6C24
//a1 ? ? ? ? 83 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 8b ? 75
HP：8C
//8b 96 ? ? ? ? 8b ? ? ? ? ? 4a 4a 33 ? 83
MP：90

//紅點基址：00BB6C28
//8b ? ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 8b ? 85 ? 75 ? ? e9
數量：18

//物品基址：00BB9460
//a1 ? ? ? ? ? 33 ? 39 ? ? ? ? ? 0f 95 ? ? c7//第二個
數量：14

//傳送點基址：00BB9564
//8b 1d ? ? ? ? 8d ? ? 51 8b ? ff ? ? 6a ? 8d//第一個
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_ICS_完全無敵.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 ICS 完全無敵
//改寫 By Inndy
[ENABLE]
alloc(GodMode,64)

00BBD234:
DD GodMode

GodMode:
cmp [esp],005ABB3A
jne IsRectEmpty
add esp,4
call IsRectEmpty
test eax,eax
jmp 005ABB3E

[DISABLE]
00BBD234:
DD IsRectEmpty

dealloc(GodMode)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_ICS_定點N合一.txt`:

```txt
//v133 新無敵系列-ICS
[enable]
registersymbol(xuHook)
alloc(xuHook, 1024)
//====無敵
label(Hook01)
label(Hook02)
label(Dull01)
label(Dull02)
label(Dull021)
alloc(God_k,4)
alloc(God_t0,4)
alloc(God_t1,4)
//====其他

//====控怪

alloc(ItemCounter,4)

registersymbol(ItemFilter)
registersymbol(ItemCounter)

//==========
God_k:  //1.完全無敵 0.N秒無敵
dd 0
God_t0:
dd 0
God_t1:  //無敵時間
dd 4e20
//===========
ItemKind:  //0.過濾物品  非0.怪只掉錢
dd 0
zgkg:  //控制方向
dd 4    //3為跟隨 , 1向左走 , 2向右走 ， 4 定點
//==========
xMobPIO:
dd 0
xMobPX:
dd 0
xMobPY:
dd 0
Red_Stop:
dd 0
//==========
xuHook:
  cmp dword ptr [esp+8c], 005a459c  //00582d8d  //定點生怪
  je Hook09
  cmp dword ptr [esp+40], 005aa741  //00588c39  //慢速控怪半套
  je Hook10
  cmp dword ptr [esp+64], 004c5838  //004b46ad  //物品過濾
  je Hook06
  cmp dword ptr [esp+48], 0077895a  //0071c88d  //顯示裝備潛藏能力(失效了!!)
  je Hook08
  cmp [Red_Stop],0  //遇紅點下列功能暫停
  jg 0066b41d
  //=====
  //cmp dword ptr [esp+34], 005b5a2c  //0059573b  //怪物瞬移
  //je Hook04
  //cmp dword ptr [esp+34], 005a8f25  //0058748e  //怪不擊退
  //je Hook05
  //cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 00839fac  //007c9612  //笨怪
  //je Hook07
  cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 007e3488  //00779128  //完全無敵
  je Hook02
  cmp [God_k],2  //等於2則執行損血人物不退後
  jne 0066b41d
  cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 007e3d75  //007799eb  //人物不退後
  je Hook01
  jmp 0066b41d

Hook01:
  mov [esp+1c],Dull01
  jmp 0066b41d

Hook02:
  mov [esp+1c],Dull02
  jmp 0066b41d
Hook04:
  mov [esp+34],Dull04
  jmp 0066b41d
Hook05:
  mov [esp+34],Dull05
  jmp 0066b41d
Hook06:
  mov [esp+64],HookItem
  jmp 0066b41d
Hook07:
  mov [esp+1c],Dull07
  jmp 0066b41d
Hook08:
  mov [esp+48],Dull08
  jmp 0066b41d
Hook09:
  mov [esp+8c], Dull09
  jmp 0066b41d

Hook10:
  mov [esp+40], Dull10
  jmp 0066b41d

//==================
Dull09:
db 8b f8                      //- mov edi,eax
db 8d 8e 04 01 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+00000104]
db 57                        //- push edi
call 0059bad1
db 8b ce                      //- mov ecx,esi
call 00597343
db ff 75 7c                  //- push [ebp+7c]
db 83 c0 40                  //- add eax,40
db ff 70 08                  //- push [eax+08]
db 50                        //- push eax
call 00404d6f
db 59                        //- pop ecx
db 59                        //- pop ecx
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8d 46 04                  //- lea eax,[esi+04]
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b cf                      //- mov ecx,edi
call 00838bad
db 8d 8e ac 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005ac]
call 0042152d
db 8d 8e b8 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005b8]
db 89 45 6c                  //- mov [ebp+6c],eax
call 0042152d
db ff 75 68                  //- push [ebp+68]
db 89 45 54                  //- mov [ebp+54],eax
db 83 c7 10                  //- add edi,10
db 8b 07                      //- mov eax,[edi]
db 8b ce                      //- mov ecx,esi
db 89 45 60                  //- mov [ebp+60],eax
call 00597bfc
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b 45 60                  //- mov eax,[ebp+60]
db 53                        //- push ebx
db 53                        //- push ebx
db ff 75 6c                  //- push [ebp+6c]
db 8b cf                      //- mov ecx,edi
db ff 75 54                  //- push [ebp+54]
db 53                        //- push ebx
cmp dword ptr [eax+74],00839d39
//55 8b ec 53 8b 5d
je Dull091
call dword ptr [eax+74]
jmp 005a460e

Dull091:  //0083ecef
  call Dull092
  jmp 005a460e  //00582dfc
Dull092:
  cmp [Red_Stop],0
  jg Dull093
  cmp [00bc1014],0
  je Dull093
  cmp  [xMobPIO],1
  je Dull0921
  pushad
  mov eax,[00bb72a8]
  mov ebx,[eax+b18]
  mov [xMobPX],ebx
  mov ebx,[eax+b1c]
  mov [xMobPY],ebx
  popad
  mov [xMobPIO],1
  jmp Dull093
Dull0921:
  cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
  jne Dull093
  push ecx
  mov ecx,[xMobPX]
  mov [esp+0c],ecx
  mov eax,[xMobPY]
  mov [esp+10],eax
  push eax
  mov ecx,[00bb6bd0]  //
  call Dull0922
  mov ecx,eax
  mov [esp+20],ecx
  pop ecx

Dull093:
  jmp 00839d39  //007c9316
Dull0922:
  push 14
  mov eax,008da56e
  call 008b88a9
  xor esi,esi
  mov [ebp-10],esi
  mov [ebp-14],esi
  mov [ebp-04],esi
  cmp [ebp+08],esi
  je 0042ad9d
  lea eax,[ebp-18]
  push eax
  lea eax,[ebp+08]
  push eax
  add ecx,00000088
  call 0042a470
  test eax,eax
  je Dull09221 
  lea eax,[ebp-18]
  jmp Dull09222
Dull09221:
  mov [ebp-1c],esi
  lea eax,[ebp-20]
  mov [ebp-10],00000001
Dull09222:
  test byte ptr [ebp-10],01
  mov esi,[eax+04]
  je Dull09223 
  lea ecx,[ebp-20]
  //call 004b0c0f
  call Dull09224
Dull09223:
  or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
  lea ecx,[ebp-18]
  //call 004b0c0f
  call Dull09224
  jmp 0042adc7
Dull09224:  //0042a3eb
  push esi
  mov esi,ecx
  cmp dword ptr [esi+04],00
  je Dull09225
  push 00
  call 00429b50  //004b0657
  and dword ptr [esi+04],00
Dull09225:
  pop esi
  ret
//==========
Dull10:
  pushad
  mov ebx,[esi+108]
  cmp ebx,0
  je Dull11XR
  sub ebx,c
  cmp ebx,0
  je Dull11XR
  cmp [ebx+298],1
  je Dull11X
  cmp [ebx+298],3
  je Dull11X
  jmp Dull11XR

Dull11X:
  mov ecx,[00bb6c28]
  mov ecx,[ecx+18]
  mov [Red_Stop],ecx
  cmp [Red_Stop],0  //紅點
  jg Dull11XR
  cmp [00bc1014],0  //控怪生怪開關
  je Dull11X1
  cmp [xMobPIO],1
  je Dull11X1
  mov [xMobPIO],1
  mov ecx,[00bb72a8]
  mov edx,[ecx+b18]
  mov [xMobPX],edx
  mov edx,[ecx+b1c]
  mov [xMobPY],edx
Dull11X1:
  call gwgs
  //mov [ebx+f4],ffffffff
  jmp Dull11XR

Dull11XR:
  popad
  jmp 005aa741
//================
gwgs:
cmp [00bc1014],0
je gwxret1
cmp [ebx+00000298],1  //走怪
je zouguai
cmp [ebx+00000298],3  //跳怪
je zouguai
ret

zouguai:
cmp [zgkg],1
je gwxz
cmp [zgkg],2
je gwxy
cmp [zgkg],3
je gwxzj
cmp [zgkg],4
je gwxzk
cmp [zgkg],5
je gwxzl
gwxret:
ret

gwxret1:
mov [zgkg],4
mov [xMobPIO],0
ret

gwxz:
mov [ebx+000000f4],FFFFFFFF
ret

gwxy:
mov [ebx+000000f4],1
ret

gwxzj:
push eax
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+b18]
//add eax,3c  //50  //離右 40
//sub eax,64  //28  //離左 40
cmp [ebx+00000694],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret

gwxzk:
push eax
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+b18]
mov [CharX],eax
pop eax
mov [zgkg],5
ret

gwxzl:
push eax
mov eax,[CharX]
cmp [ebx+00000694],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret
//==========
//========
Dull01:
  mov [God_k],0  //改變 God_k 值好回復完全無敵 N 秒
  jmp 007e460f  //0077a1b5
//========
Dull02:
  mov ecx,[ebp+44]
  inc [ebp+44]
  //cmp dword ptr [ebp+44],07  //這列移到 Dull021
  mov [ebp+ecx*4-64],eax
  //==============
  cmp [God_k],0  //小於0則正常
  jl Dull021
  cmp [God_k],1  //大於1則正常
  jg Dull021
  cmp [God_k],1  //1.完全無敵  0.N秒無敵
  je 007e4f4f
  push eax
  call clock
  cmp eax,[God_t0]
  pop eax
  jle 007e4f4f
  push eax
  push esi
  call clock
  mov esi,[God_t1]
  add eax,esi
  mov [God_t0],eax
  pop esi
  pop eax
  mov [God_k],2  //改變 God_k 值好執行損血人物不退後
Dull021:
  cmp dword ptr [ebp+44],07
  jmp 007e3496
//=========怪物瞬移
Dull04:
  mov ebx,[ebp+14]
  cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
  jne Dull041
  jmp 005b5b1e  //00595823
Dull041:
  mov edi,[esi+30]
  mov al,[edi]
  cmp al,0a
  je 005b5b09
  movzx ecx,al
  xor eax,eax
  inc eax
  xor edx,edx
  call 008bca70
  mov eax,[ebp+20]
  or [ecx],eax
  or [ecx+04],edx
  mov ecx,esi
  //call 00597b0b
  push [ecx+0000008c]
  add ecx,00000084
  mov eax,ecx
  push ecx
  cmp [00bc1018],0
  je Dull0411
  cmp [00bc101c],1
  je Dull0412
Dull0411:
  call 00404d6f  //0040496d  //標註起來是瞬1
Dull0412:
  pop ecx
  pop ecx
  movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
  cmp eax,ecx
  jl 005b5b1e
  mov ecx,esi
  push [ecx+0000008c]
  add ecx,00000084
  mov eax,ecx
  push ecx
  cmp [00bc1018],0
  je Dull0413
  cmp [00bc101c],0
  jne Dull0414
Dull0413:
  call 00404d6f  //0040496d  //標註起來是瞬1,4
Dull0414:
  pop ecx
  pop ecx
  jmp 005b5a70
//====怪不擊退
Dull05:
  cmp dword ptr [ebp+3c],01
  jne 005a8f3b
  mov ecx,edi
  call 00598718
  cmp [ebp+1c],eax
  jmp 005a8f37
//====笨怪
Dull07:
  xor edx,edx
  mov ecx,0000ea60
  //div ecx
  lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
  //add edx,0002bf20
  push edx
  jmp 00839fc2
//====顯示裝備隱藏潛力,v133 失效了
Dull08:
  mov esi,eax
  cmp esi,edi
  je 00778a50  //0071c987
  mov ecx,[ebp+38]
  mov eax,[ecx]
  call dword ptr [eax+000000b8]
  test eax,eax
  jmp 00778973  //0071c8a6
//=====物品過濾
HookItem:
  mov eax,[ebp-1c]
  mov esi,[ebp-50]
  mov [esi+1c],al
  cmp eax,01
  je HookItem1 
  cmp eax,02
  je HookItem1 
  xor al,al
  jmp HookItem2 
HookItem1:
  mov al,01
HookItem2:
  mov [esi+1d],al
  mov [esi+20],edi
  mov edi,[ebp+08]
  mov ecx,edi
  call 004085d3
  movzx eax,al
  mov ecx,edi
  mov [esi+30],eax
  call 0040862f
//=============
  cmp [ItemKind],0
  je ItemFilter
  mov ecx,edi     
  mov [esi+34],00
  jmp  004c5873
  //====
ItemFilter:
        push ebx
        push esi
        mov [ItemCounter],eax
        //mov [00bc100c],eax
        xor ebx, ebx
        mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
        cmp eax,[esi]
        je Itemskip
        cmp [esi],ebx
        je Itemend
        add esi,4
        jmp ifreject
Itemskip:
        mov eax,00
Itemend:
        pop esi
        pop ebx
        //====返回
        mov ecx,edi     
        mov [esi+34],eax 
        jmp  004c5873

IFTable:

dd 00
//==========
00b9a07c:
dd xuHook
//==========
[disable]
00b9a07c:
dd 0066b41d

//=========
dealloc(Red_Stop)
dealloc(ItemFilter)
dealloc(IFTable)
dealloc(ItemCounter)
unregistersymbol(ItemFilter)
unregistersymbol(ItemCounter)
dealloc(ItemKind)
//=========
unregistersymbol(gwgs)
dealloc(gwgs)
unregistersymbol(zgkg)
dealloc(zgkg)
dealloc(CharX)
//=========
dealloc(xMobPIO)
dealloc(xMobPX)
dealloc(xMobPY)
dealloc(Dull09)
dealloc(Dull11)
//=========
dealloc(God_k)
dealloc(God_t0)
dealloc(God_t1)
unregistersymbol(xuHook)
dealloc(xuHook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/TWMS133_ICS_疾風2合一.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS133 ICS 疾風2合一
//更新:Inndy
[enable]
alloc(TheMulti,128)
label(Next1)
label(Back)
alloc(Main,128)
label(StupidMob)
label(MyGod)
//--------------------
00B9A07C:
DD TheMulti
//--------------------
TheMulti:

cmp [esp+1c],007E3D75
jne Next1
mov [esp+1c],MyGod

Next1:
cmp [esp+1c],00839FAC
jne Back
mov [esp+1c],StupidMob

Back:
jmp 0066B43D
//--------------------
Main:
//----------
StupidMob:
Xor Edx,Edx
Mov Ecx,0000EA60
Lea Ecx,[Esi+000002B0]
Push Edx
Call 00420f21
Mov Ebx,[Ebp+0C]
Lea Edi,[Esi+000002A0]
Cmp [Edi],Ebx
Je 00839fdf
Jmp 00839FD4
//----------
MyGod:
lea ecx,[esi+0000327C]
push FFFF8AD0
jmp 007E461A

[disable]
00B9A07C:
DD 0066B43D

dealloc(TheMulti)
dealloc(Main)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS133/物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(DropsFucker,128)
Label(White)
Label(Black)
Label(Disappear)
Label(Appear)
Alloc(Mode,4)
Alloc(WhiteTable,1024)
Alloc(BlackTable,1024)
Alloc(LastDropedItem,4)
Registersymbol(LastDropedItem)
//------------------------------
Mode:
DD 0 //0關1不掉物2黑3白
//------------------------------
DropsFucker:
push esi
push ebx
cmp eax,C350
je Appear
xor ebx,ebx
mov [LastDropedItem],eax

cmp [Mode],1
je Disappear

mov esi,BlackTable
cmp [Mode],2
je Black

mov esi,WhiteTable
cmp [Mode],3
je White

jmp Appear
//---------------
White:
cmp [esi],eax
je Appear
cmp [esi],ebx
je Disappear
add esi,4
jmp White
//---------------
Black:
cmp [esi],eax
je Disppear
cmp [esi],ebx
je Appear
add esi,4
jmp Black
//---------------
Disappear:
xor eax,eax
Appear:
pop ebx
pop esi
mov ecx,edi
mov [esi+34],eax
jmp 004c5873
//------------------------------
004C586E:
jmp DropsFucker
[Disable]
004C586E:
db 8b cf 89 46 34
//------------------------------
Dealloc(DropsFucker)
Dealloc(WhiteTable)
Dealloc(BlackTable)
Dealloc(Mode)
Dealloc(LastDropedItem,4)
Unegistersymbol(LastDropedItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_CRC_ 技能無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(NoDelay,32)
alloc(FakeTime,32)
alloc(AddedTime,4)
//---------------------------
NoDelay:
mov edi,FFFFFFFF  //技能動作
mov [esi+00000470],edi
add [AddedTime],BB8
ret
//---------------------------
0081011A:
mov eax,[00bba238]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
add eax,[AddedTime]
ret
//---------------------------
AddedTime:
DD 0
//---------------------------
0081011A:
jmp FakeTime
//---------------------------
007A8DF0:
call NoDelay

[DISABLE]
007A8DE5:
db ff 75 0c 8d 8e 88 00 00 00
//---------------------------
0081011A:
db a1 38 a2 bb 00
//---------------------------
dealloc(NoDelay)
dealloc(FakeTime)
dealloc(AddedTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_CRC_SommonNoDelay.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS134召喚獸無延遲
//原作：zgenden
//更新：草泥馬
//修改：草泥馬
//00AB0BA5    FixTime  //0067C88E - E8 87381900  - call 0081011A
//0084E24E    Fix      //0067C9BA
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(FixTime)
alloc(FixTime,1024)
registersymbol(FixTimeOF)
alloc(FixTimeOF,4)
registersymbol(Fix)
alloc(Fix,1024)
registersymbol(FixSSTime)
alloc(FixSSTime,4)
registersymbol(FixSSTime10C)
alloc(FixSSTime10C,4)
label(Fix00)
label(Fix01)
//-----------------------------------------------
Fix:
    push eax
    mov eax,[esi+00000154]
    cmp [FixSSTime10C],eax
    pop eax
    je Fix01
    push eax
    mov eax,[FixTimeOF]
    cmp eax,[FixSSTime]
    pop eax
    je Fix00
    push eax
    mov eax,[esi+00000154]
    mov [FixSSTime10C],eax
    mov eax,[FixTimeOF]
    mov [FixSSTime],eax
    pop eax
Fix01:
    cmp dword ptr [esi+00000104],00
    je Fix00
    push [esi+000000D4]
    push [esi+000000DC]  //007FCE73
    call 00639157
    pop ecx
    pop ecx
    mov ecx,ebx
    sub ecx,[esi+00000154]
    push ebx
    mov ecx,esi
    call 006726B8
    jmp 0067CB4E
Fix00:
    mov eax,0217C05A
    cmp [esi+000000D4],eax
    jne 0067CB90
    jg 0067CBFC
    mov eax,[esi+000000e8]    //?
    je 0067CAEC
//-----------------------------------------------
FixTimeOF:
    dd 0
FixSSTime:
    dd 0
FixSSTime10C:
    dd 0
FixTime:
    add [FixTimeOF],2710  //05 10 27 00 00
    mov eax,[FixTimeOF]
    ret

0081011A:
jmp FixTime

0067C9BA:
jmp Fix
[DISABLE]
0081011A:
DB a1 38 a2 bb 00 8b 40 1c c3
//before DB a1 a0 09 ca 00 8b 40 18 c3
0067C9BA:
DB 0F 8F 3C 02 00 00 8b 86 e8 00 00 00
dealloc(Fix)
unregistersymbol(Fix)
dealloc(FixTime)
unregistersymbol(FixTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_CRC_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS 134.1定點生怪 定怪 笨怪 怪物不擊退
//使用方法:打開之後~把怪全清光吧= =
//建議不要換頻易斷~~換圖~測試過~應該不會斷
//55 8B EC 53 8B 5D 10 56 57
[enable]
registersymbol(Spawn)
alloc(Spawn,256)
alloc(Sonoff,4)
alloc(rx,4)
alloc(ry,4)
label(S01)
label(Spawn_ret)
//----------------------定點生怪
Spawn:
cmp [Sonoff],01
je S01
pushad
mov edx,[00bba448]  //ok a1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 3b c6 74 ?? 8b 93 ?? ?? ?? ??
mov eax,[edx+00000b18]        //X a1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 3b c6 74 ?? 8b 93 ?? ?? ?? ?? ---ok
mov [rx],eax
mov eax,[edx+00000b1C]        //Y ---ok
mov [ry],eax
popad
mov [Sonoff],00000001
jmp Spawn_ret

S01:
mov [ecx+000002e0],00000006 //FF B1 ?? ?? 00 00 81 C1 D8 02 00 00 51
cmp [esp],0059C1A8 //83 C0 40 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 59 --------ok
jne Spawn_ret
cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02 //83 7C 24 18 02 90
jne Spawn_ret
push ecx
mov eax,[rx]
mov [esp+0c],eax
mov eax,[ry]
mov [esp+10],eax
push eax
mov ecx,[00bb9d70] //ok 6A 01 68 FF FF FF 7F 8D 45 ??
call 0042ad65 //50 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 3B C3 74 ??  ----ok
mov ecx,eax
mov [esp+20],ecx
pop ecx
Spawn_ret:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
push ebx
mov ebx,[ebp+10]
push esi
jmp 0083B95E
0083B956:
jmp Spawn
//----------------------定點生怪
//----------------------定怪
005ABF1F://定怪(危險) 56 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E9 ?? ?? ?? ?? 56 E8
DB 90 90 90 90 90 90
//----------------------定怪
//----------------------超級笨怪
005A9F06://83 F8 04 0F ?? ?? 00 00 00
jmp 005a9fbf
nop
//----------------------超級笨怪
//----------------------不擊退
007C5945:
jmp 008bc8cb
//----------------------不擊退
[disable]
0083B956:
db 55 8b ec 53 8B EC
005A9F06:
jne 005a9fbf
005B59FC:
jne 005b5a05
005ABF1F:
DB 56 e8 9b 69 ff ff
007C5945:
call 008bc8cb
unregistersymbol(Spawn)
dealloc(Spawn)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_CRC_簡化版集氣無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Label(AttackTimes)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],1
jle 007E440C
call 008b9d40
cmp [AttackTimes],2
jg Refresh
jmp 007E440C
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0
jmp 007E440C
//------------------------------------------------------------------
AttackTimes:
DD 0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007E4407://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
007E3E89://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 87 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
007E4407:
call 008b9d40

007e226f:
call 0080E4FD
dealloc(Nodelay)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//--------------------
//Twms1.34.1人物左右
//更新:硍機掰
//-------------------------
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AwesomeMan)
alloc(AwesomeMan,1024)
registersymbol(MyAuto)
alloc(MyAuto,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLR)
alloc(MyAutoLR,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKey)
alloc(MyAutoLRKey,4)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKeyLR)
alloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR,4)
label(MyAutoLR00)
label(MyAutoLR01)
label(MyAutoLR02)

00bc0418:
DD AwesomeMan
//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLRKey:
DD 1
MyAutoLRKeyLR:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
AwesomeMan:
cmp [esp],00841E1B
jne GetFocus
mov [esp],MyAutoLR
jmp GetFocus
MyAuto:
cmp eax,edi
jne MyAutoLR
MyAutoLR:
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],0
je MyAutoLR00

add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],A//左右移動距離
jle MyAutoLR01
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],14//左右移動距離*2
jle MyAutoLR02
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
jmp MyAutoLR01

MyAutoLR01:
mov [ebp-8],ffffffff
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842037

MyAutoLR02:
mov [ebp-8],1
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842037

MyAutoLR00:
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842037


[DISABLE]
00bc0418:
DD GetFocus

unregistersymbol(AwesomeMan)
dealloc(AwesomeMan)
unregistersymbol(MyAutoLR)
dealloc(MyAutoLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_ICS_完全無敵.txt`:

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_ICS_物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(ItemICSHook,32)

alloc(ItemFilterHeader,128)
label(MyItemFilter)
label(ItemFilter)
label(ExitFilter)

alloc(BlockList,256)

alloc(LastItem,4)
registersymbol(LastItem)
////////////////////////////
BlockList:
dd 1E8482
dd 0 //物品過濾結束
////////////////////////////
00b9d07c:
dd ItemICSHook

ItemICSHook:
  cmp [esp+64],004C5847
  jne 0066B70E
  mov [esp+64],ItemFilterHeader
  jmp 0066B70E
  db 90 90 90 90 90

ItemFilterHeader:
  mov eax,[ebp-1c]
  mov esi,[ebp-50]
  mov [esi+1c],al
  cmp eax,01
  db 74 09
  cmp eax,02
  db 74 04
  xor al,al
  db eb 02
 MyItemFilter:
  mov al,01
  mov [esi+1d],al
  mov [esi+20],edi
  mov edi,[ebp+08]
  mov ecx,edi
  call 004085d3
  movzx eax,al
  mov ecx,edi
  mov [esi+30],eax
  call 0040862f
  mov [LastItem],eax
  call ItemFilter
  mov ecx,edi
  mov [esi+34],eax
  jmp 004C5882

 ItemFilter:
  mov ecx,BlockList
  cmp [ecx],0
  db 74 09 //je ExitFilter
  cmp eax,[ecx]
  add ecx,4
  jne ItemFilter+5
  xor eax,eax

 ExitFilter:
  ret

[DISABLE]
00b9d07c:
dd 0066B70E
dealloc(ItemICSHook)
dealloc(ItemFilterHeader)
dealloc(BlockList)
dealloc(LastItem)
unregistersymbol(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//近戰不揮空ICS V134
//-----------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(MYNA)
alloc(MYNA,1024)
registersymbol(MYNA00)
alloc(MYNA00,1024)
//-----------------------------------------------
00bc038c:
DD MYNA
//-----------------------------------------------
MYNA:
cmp [esp],007E83AE
jne OffsetRect
mov [esp],MYNA00
jmp OffsetRect  
//77D29011

MYNA00:
push [ebp-000001a0]
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push [ebp-00000188]
lea eax,[ebp-00000184]
push eax
lea eax,[ebp-68]
push eax
call 004301b0
mov ecx,eax
call 005ac223
mov [ebp-7c],eax

cmp dword ptr [ebp-7c],00
jne 007e871d

cmp [ebp-000001a0],0040413a
jmp 007e868a

//-----------------------------------------------

[DISABLE]
00bc038c:
DD OffsetRect

dealloc(MYNA)
unregistersymbol(MYNA)
dealloc(MYNA00)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS134/TWMS134_其他_召喚獸資料.txt`:

```txt
召喚獸攻擊時間
006391BB - b8 b80b0000    mov eax,00000BB8
006391C0 - c3    ret
不收詢
00639157 8b 44 24 04 mov eax,[esp+04]
召喚獸不收詢
00639182 - b8 2c010000 mov eax,0000012C
00639187 - c3 ret      
00639188 - ff 74 24 04 push [esp+04]



召喚獸攻擊之數
0084E661 - 2B D8  sub ebx,eax //eax=隻數??
0084E663 - 8b 86 08 01 00 00  mov eax,[esi+00000104]
0084E669 - 6a 01 push 01


至於攻擊隻數~這板的改隻數位置不見了
所以可能要改一下嘍><


召喚受PID
ADDRESS:不知道跑去哪了.....
PID請將
召喚獸攻擊次數 (EAX+018)<---人物移動就會歸0
召喚獸座標起點 (EAX+118)<---可實施召喚獸順移.不會斷線不會鎖
召喚獸座標終點 (EAX+11C)<---可實施召喚獸順移.不會斷線不會鎖
召喚獸動作 (EAX+148)<---可讓召喚獸固定動作
召喚獸座標X軸  (EAX+1C4)
召喚獸座標Y軸  (EAX+1C8)
召喚獸時間倒數 (EAX+25C)<---會從100到數到0一直重覆





FIX :0067C9BA
FIXTIME:不知道跑去哪了
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS136/TWMS136_CRC_超檢快掉.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS V136超檢+快掉
//超撿原創：草泥馬;快掉原創：eric09271
[Enable]
0046F56D:
db 90 90
004C181C:
jmp 004c1834
[Disable]
0046F56D:
db 75 35
004C181C:
db D9 E8 DD 5D F8 74 11









[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AwesomeMan)
alloc(AwesomeMan,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLR)
alloc(MyAutoLR,1024)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKey)
alloc(MyAutoLRKey,4)
registersymbol(MyAutoLRKeyLR)
alloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR,4)
alloc(MyAutoLRXP,4)
label(MyAutoLR00)
label(MyAutoLR01)
label(MyAutoLR02)
label(MyAutoLRFix)

00bc1418:
DD AwesomeMan

//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLRKey:
DD 1
MyAutoLRKeyLR:
DD 0
MyAutoLRXP:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------

AwesomeMan:
cmp [esp],0084201A
jne GetFocus
mov [esp],MyAutoLR
jmp GetFocus

MyAutoLR:
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],0
je MyAutoLR00
cmp [MyAutoLRKey],2
je MyAutoLRFix
push eax
mov eax,[00bbad70]
mov eax,[eax+1888]
mov [MyAutoLRXP],eax
pop eax
mov [MyAutoLRKey],2
MyAutoLRFix:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],A
jle MyAutoLR01
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],14
jle MyAutoLR02


push eax
mov eax,[00bbad70]
mov eax,[eax+1888]
cmp [MyAutoLRXP],eax
pop eax
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],fffffffe
jl MyAutoLR01
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],2
jmp MyAutoLR01


MyAutoLR01:
mov [ebp-8],ffffffff
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842236
MyAutoLR02:
mov [ebp-8],1
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842236

MyAutoLR00:
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842236

[DISABLE]
00bc1418:
DD GetFocus
unregistersymbol(AwesomeMan)
dealloc(AwesomeMan)
unregistersymbol(MyAutoLR)
dealloc(MyAutoLR)














[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AwesomeMan)
alloc(AwesomeMan,1024)
registersymbol(AttackVac)
alloc(AttackVac,1024)

00bc13e0:
DD AwesomeMan

AwesomeMan:
cmp [esp],005AC4F3
jne IntersectRect
mov [esp],AttackVac
jmp IntersectRect

AttackVac:
jmp 005AC4FF

[DISABLE]
00bc13e0:
DD IntersectRect

dealloc(AwesomeMan)
unregistersymbol(AwesomeMan)
dealloc(AttackVac)
unregistersymbol(AttackVac)













// TWMS 136 完全無敵 (ICS)

[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AwesomeMan)
alloc(AwesomeMan,1024)
registersymbol(Invincible)
alloc(Invincible,1024)

00BC13E4:
DD AwesomeMan
AwesomeMan:
cmp [esp],005ABF7B
jne IsRectEmpty
mov [esp],Invincible
jmp IsRectEmpty

Invincible:
test eax,eax
jmp 005ABF7F

[DISABLE]
00BC13E4:
DD IsRectEmpty

dealloc(AwesomeMan)
unregistersymbol(AwesomeMan)
dealloc(Invincible)
unregistersymbol(Invincible)











// TWMS1.36.1 近戰不揮空 ICS
// ICS 原創：冷羽楓痕
// P.S. 沒有怪的地圖會沒效果
[enable]
alloc(CallCheck,256)
alloc(NoEmptyAtk,256)
label(Normal)

00BC13E0:
DD CallCheck

CallCheck:
cmp [esp],005AC4F3
jne IntersectRect
mov [esp],NoEmptyAtk
jmp IntersectRect

NoEmptyAtk:
push eax
mov eax,[esp+58]
cmp eax,007E85E9
jne Normal
mov eax,[ebp]
mov [eax+10],1

Normal:
pop eax
jmp 005AC4F3

[disable]
00BC13E0:
DD IntersectRect

dealloc(CallCheck)
dealloc(NoEmptyAtk)


00647794 - 8b 44 24 04                - mov eax,[esp+04]
eax = Level


004A89DB:
jmp GetExp
GetExp:
call 00404d61
mov [NowEXP],eax
jmp 004A89E0 


004A8A05:
db b8 77 77 77 77
004A8A05: db e8 57 c3 f5 ff 
領導力控制
```

```txt
=> 向左走: 0x03
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS136/TWMS136_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS1.36.1 近戰不揮空 ICS
[enable]
alloc(CallCheck,256)
alloc(NoEmptyAtk,256)

00BC138C:
DD CallCheck

CallCheck:
cmp [esp],007E85BA
jne OffsetRect
mov [esp],NoEmptyAtk
jmp OffsetRect

NoEmptyAtk:
push [ebp-000001a0]
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push [ebp-00000188]
lea eax,[ebp-00000184]
push eax
lea eax,[ebp-68]
push eax
call 004301a2
mov ecx,eax
call 005ac393
mov [ebp-7c],eax
jmp 007E85F6

[disable]
00BC138C:
DD OffsetRect

dealloc(CallCheck)
dealloc(NoEmptyAtk)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS136/TWMS136_ICS_雪女練功 By 44.txt`:

```txt
//V136 雪女人物左右
//左右連擊必須要施放可以搭配近戰不揮空的Skill
//左右連擊內含NoDelaySkill
//Make By Future Doraemon Four
[Enable]
registersymbol(MyAttackInterval)
alloc(MyAttackInterval,4)

registersymbol(MyLastAttack)
alloc(MyLastAttack,4)

registersymbol(NoDelayTimes)
alloc(NoDelayTimes,4)

registersymbol(MyWalk)
alloc(MyWalk,4)

registersymbol(MyAttacking)
alloc(MyAttacking,4)

registersymbol(ICSWalk)
alloc(ICSWalk,64)

registersymbol(LRWalk)
alloc(LRWalk,128)

registersymbol(GetMyCharX)
alloc(GetMyCharX,32)

registersymbol(GetMyWalkX)
alloc(GetMyWalkX,256)
label(WalkRight)
label(WalkLeft)

registersymbol(LeftRightAttacking)
alloc(LeftRightAttacking,256)
label(ChangeLR)

registersymbol(NoDelaySkill)
alloc(NoDelaySkill,256)
label(ExitNoDelay)

registersymbol(CleanTimes)
alloc(CleanTimes,32)
MyAttackInterval:
dd 320//每800ms無延遲一次

MyLastAttack:
dd 0//如果此值遭到修改將造成錯亂

NoDelayTimes:
dd 0//如果此值錯亂會造成斷線

MyWalk:
dd 1//表示開啟後向右走

MyAttacking:
dd 0//表示開啟後自動向右攻擊 請勿Freeze此值

00bc1418: //ok
dd ICSWalk

ICSWalk:
cmp [esp],0084201A //ok
jne GetFocus
mov [esp],LRWalk
jmp GetFocus

LRWalk:
call GetMyWalkX
mov [ebp-08],eax
call LeftRightAttacking//左右連擊 不需要可以//掉
xor ecx,ecx
xor eax,eax
cmp [ebp-04],eax
jmp 00842236 //ok

GetMyCharX:
mov eax,[00bbad70] //ok
mov eax,[eax+1888] //ok
ret

GetMyWalkX:
call GetMyCharX//得到角色X值
mov ecx,[00bbad70] //ok
sub eax,[ecx+1c]//角色X值 - 左牆X值  //ok
cmp eax,50 //請注意 0x50不行請改大 
jle WalkRight
call GetMyCharX
mov ecx,[ecx+24]
sub ecx,eax
//右牆X值 - 角色X值
cmp ecx,50//請注意 0x50不行請改大 
jle WalkLeft
mov eax,[MyWalk]
ret//不進行改變

WalkRight:
mov [MyWalk],1
mov eax,1
ret

WalkLeft:
mov [MyWalk],ffffffff
mov eax,ffffffff
ret

LeftRightAttacking:
mov eax,[00bbadd0] //人物動作 ok
mov ecx,[MyAttacking]
lea ecx,[ecx+4]
mov [eax+46c],ecx //ok
cmp [MyAttacking],0
je ChangeLR
sub [MyAttacking],2

ChangeLR:
inc [MyAttacking]
call NoDelaySkill//無延遲技能 不需要請//掉
ret

NoDelaySkill:
call 0081031B//獲取楓之谷時間 //ok
sub eax,[MyAttackInterval]
cmp eax,[MyLastAttack]
jl ExitNoDelay
call 0081031B //ok
mov [MyLastAttack],eax
mov eax,[00bbadd0] //無延遲 ok 
cmp eax,0
je ExitNoDelay
cmp [eax+470],ffffffff
je ExitNoDelay
inc [NoDelayTimes]
cmp [NoDelayTimes],3
jge CleanTimes
mov [eax+470],ffffffff

ExitNoDelay:
ret

CleanTimes:
mov [NoDelayTimes],0
jmp ExitNoDelay

[Disable]

00bc1418:
dd GetFocus

unregistersymbol(NoDelayTimes)
dealloc(NoDelayTimes)

unregistersymbol(MyWalk)
dealloc(MyWalk)

unregistersymbol(MyAttacking)
dealloc(MyAttacking)

unregistersymbol(ICSWalk)
dealloc(ICSWalk)

unregistersymbol(LRWalk)
dealloc(LRWalk)

unregistersymbol(GetMyCharX)
dealloc(GetMyCharX)

unregistersymbol(GetMyWalkX)
dealloc(GetMyWalkX)

unregistersymbol(LeftRightAttacking)
dealloc(LeftRightAttacking)

unregistersymbol(NoDelaySkill)
dealloc(NoDelaySkill)

unregistersymbol(CleanTimes)
dealloc(CleanTimes)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS136/V136 抓封包用.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(PacketFix)
Alloc(PacketFix, 512)
Registersymbol(store)//封包資料
alloc(store,256)
Registersymbol(data)//封包Byte - 主要
alloc(data,512)
Registersymbol(length)
alloc(length,4)
Label(normal)
Label(cycle)
Label(cycle2)
Label(cycle3)

00478431: //6A 38 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 05 ?? ?? ?? 00
jmp PacketFix
nop
nop

PacketFix:
cmp [esp],00500000 //抓ADDRESS 起始點  //使用這個在得把Jl  jg前面//拿掉
jl normal
cmp [esp],00560000 //抓ADDRESS 終點
jg normal

//push eax    //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//mov eax,[esp+8]   //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//cmp byte ptr[eax+8],7//抓任意位置封包 但限制byte數  //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//pop eax    //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//jne normal //要用JL JG 請把這刪了

mov eax,[esp+4]
mov eax,[eax+8]
mov [length],eax

push eax
push ecx
push esi
mov esi,[esp+10]
mov ecx,80

cycle:
mov eax,[esi+ecx]
mov [store+ecx],eax
sub ecx,4
cmp ecx,0
jge cycle
mov esi,[esp+10]
mov esi,[esi+4]
mov ecx,[length]
dec ecx

cycle2:
mov al,byte ptr[esi+ecx]
mov byte ptr[data+ecx],al
dec ecx
cmp ecx,0
jge cycle2
mov ecx,[length]
cycle3:
inc ecx
mov byte ptr[data+ecx],0
cmp byte ptr[data+ecx+1],0
jne cycle3
pop esi
pop ecx
pop eax
normal:
db 6a 38
mov eax,008E782D //6A 0A 6A 04 8D 85 ?? ?? ?? ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? ??
jmp 00478438

[disable]
00478431:
db 6a 38 b8 E5 85 8E 00

Unregistersymbol(PacketFix)
Dealloc(PacketFix)
UnRegistersymbol(store)
dealloc(store)
unRegistersymbol(data)
dealloc(data)
unRegistersymbol(length)
dealloc(length)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/CGVac.txt`:

```txt
long CGVacAdr			= 0x005AF275//50 0F ?? ?? ??8B ? ? 50 0F BF ? ? 50 0F BF ? ? 50 0F BF
[ENABLE]
Alloc(CGVac, 1024)
Label(InitMob)
Label(InitMob)
Label(StartVac)
Label(TEST2)
Label(Waits)
Label(Return)

CGVac:
Push   Eax
Cmp    [MyCGKey], 0
Je     Return
Mov    Ecx, Dword ptr DS:[Ebp-10]
Cmp    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+08], 0
Je     InitMob
Cmp    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+08], 1
Jnz    StartVac //Jnz TEMP
Jmp    Return

/*
TEMP:
Call   00821538
Cmp    Eax, [WaitTime]
Jl     Return
Cmp    Eax,Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+08]
Jge    StartVac
Jmp    Return
*/

InitMob:
Call   00821538
Add    Eax,300
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+08], Eax
Jmp    Return

StartVac:
//Mov    [VacIng],1
//Mov    [XiGuaiCounts],0
//Push   Ebx
//Mov    Ebx,[XiGuaiCount]
//Cmp    [XiGuaiCounts],Ebx
//Pop    Ebx
//Jge    Waits
Pop    Eax
Inc    [XiGuaiCounts]
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+08], 01
Push   00
Push   04
Movsx  Eax, Word ptr [Ebp-50]
Push   Eax
Push   0
Sub    [MobSpY], 5
Push   [MobSpY]
Add    [MobSpY], 5
Push   [MobSpX]
Mov    Eax, [MobSpX]
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+022E], Eax
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+0694], Eax
Mov    Eax, [MobSpY]
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+0230], Eax
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+0698], Eax
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+0298], 06
Mov    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+04], 01
Push   1
Jmp    005AF290

TEST2:
Mov    [VacIng],0
Jmp    Return

Waits:
Mov    [XiGuaiCounts], 0
Add    Eax, 600
Mov    [WaitTime], Eax

Return:
Mov    [VacIng], 1
Pop    Eax
Push   Eax
Movzx  Eax, Byte ptr [Ebp-4E]
Jmp    005AF27A

005AF275:
Jmp	   GCVac

[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/ForceVac.txt`:

```txt
long ForceVacAdr		= 0x005AF0A5//0F 8C ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B CB E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C0 75 ?? E8
long ForceVacJmp		= 0x005AF0E7//8B 55 ?? 8B CB E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B CB E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B D0
long ForceVacJe			= 0x005AF51F//jl
long ForceVacAdr2		= 0x005AF08E//7C ?? FF 75 ?? 8B CB E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 89 45 ?? EB ?? 89 75

Push   Ecx
Mov    Ecx, Dword ptr DS:[Ebp-10]
Cmp    [MyCGKey], 0
Je     Normal
Cmp    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+00000298], 6
Jg     Normal
Cmp    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+00000298], 0
Je     Normal
Cmp    Dword ptr DS:[Ecx+08], 1
Je     Normal
Pop    Ecx
Jmp    Start
/*
Cmp    [MyCGKey],0
Je     Normal
Push   Ecx

Cmp    [Ecx+00000298], 6
Pop    Ecx
Jg     Normal
Push   Ecx
Mov    Ecx, Dword ptr DS:[Ebp-10]
Cmp    [Ecx+00000298], 0
Pop    Ecx
Je     Normal
Cmp    [Ecx+4], 4
Push   Eax
Mov    Eax, [00BBADD0]
Mov    Eax, [Eax+0468]
Mov    Eax, [MyAutoKey]
Cmp    Eax, 0
Pop    Eax
Je     Normal
//Cmp    [Ecx+04], 01
//Je     test1
Jmp    Start  
*/
Normal:
Pop    Ecx
Cmp    Dword ptr DS:[Ebp+08], Edi
Jmp    L_je_forceVac

Start:
Push   ForceVacJmp
Retn

L_je_forceVac:
Push   ForceVacJe
Retn

/*	test1:
Mov    [VacIng],0  */
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_人物定點出生.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MoveMent,128)
    Label(Searching)
    Label(MoveChar)
    Label(KamiTeleportMove)
    Label(Normal)
Alloc(MapList,8004) //500張地圖

MapList:
//地圖一
DD 06422C40 //MapId
DD 000005AB //X
DD 000000FF //Y
DD 00000001 //UseKamiTeleport
//結束
DD 0

MoveMent:
Push  Esi
Mov   Esi, MapList
Mov   Ebx, [00BD8D60]
Mov   Ebx, [Ebx+0CA4]

Searching:
Cmp   [Esi], 00
Je    Normal
Cmp   [Esi], Ebx
Je    MoveChar
Add   Esi, 10
Jmp   Searching

MoveChar:
Mov   Ecx, [Esi+04] //X 
Mov   Ebx, [Esi+08] //Y
Cmp   [Esi+0C], 1
Je    KamiTeleportMove
Pop   Esi
Ret

KamiTeleportMove:
Push  Eax
Mov   Eax, [00BD86D8]
Mov   [Eax+4210], Ecx
Mov   [Eax+4214], Ebx
Mov   [Eax+420C], 1
Mov   [Eax+4208], 1
Pop   Eax
Pop   Esi
Add Ecx,100
Ret

Normal:
Mov   Ecx, [Eax+0C] //X
Mov   Ebx, [Eax+10] //Y
Pop   Esi
Ret

007E26C1:
Call MoveMent
Nop
[DISABLE]
007E26C1:
Mov Ebx, [Eax+10]
Mov Ecx, [Eax+0C]

DeAlloc(MoveMent)
DeAlloc(MapList)
```

```txt
[ENABLE]
//TWMS137 炎魔忍耐任務

/*

*/
Alloc(SpawnControl,512)
Label(rtnSPC)

SpawnControl:

  mov esi,[00BD8D60]
  mov esi,[esi+0CA4]

  cmp esi,363D7F80 //自由市場入口
  jz rtnStart00
  cmp esi,0C939AC0 //冰原雪域
  jz rtnStart01
  cmp esi,0C93C1D0 //冰面I
  jz rtnStart02
  cmp esi,0C93E8E0 //冰面II
  jz rtnStart03
  cmp esi,0C940FF0 //結冰的平原I
  jz rtnStart04
  cmp esi,0C943700 //結冰的平原II
  jz rtnStart05
  cmp esi,0C943764 //冰雪峽谷I
  jz rtnStart06
  cmp esi,0C9437C8 //冰雪峽谷II
  jz rtnStart07
  cmp esi,0C94382C //尖銳的絕璧I
  jz rtnStart08
  cmp esi,0C943890 //尖銳的絕璧II
  jz rtnStart09
  cmp esi,0C9438F4 //尖銳的絕璧3
  jz rtnStart10
  cmp esi,0C943958 //尖銳的絕璧4
  jz rtnStart11
  cmp esi,0C9439BC //危險的絕璧
  jz rtnStart12
  cmp esi,0C943A20 //狼的領土1
  jz rtnStart13
  cmp esi,0C943A84 //狼的領土2
  jz rtnStart14
  cmp esi,0C943AE8 //狼的領土3
  jz rtnStart15
  cmp esi,0C943B4C //亡者之林I
  jz rtnStart16
  cmp esi,0C943BB0 //亡者之林II
  jz rtnStart17
  cmp esi,0C943C14 //亡者之林III
  jz rtnStart18
  cmp esi,0C943C78 //亡者之林IV
  jz rtnStart19
  cmp esi,0C943CDC //廢棄礦坑I
  jz rtnStart20
  cmp esi,0C943D40 //廢棄礦坑II
  jz rtnStart21
  cmp esi,0C943DA4 //廢棄礦坑III
  jz rtnStart22
  cmp esi,0C943E08 //廢棄礦坑IV
  jz rtnStart23
  cmp esi,0C943E6C //火山通道
  jz rtnStart24
  cmp esi,0C943ED0 //試煉洞窟I
  jz rtnStart25
  cmp esi,0C943F34 //試煉洞窟II
  jz rtnStart26
  cmp esi,0C943F98 //試煉洞窟III
  jz rtnStart27
  cmp esi,0C943FFC //通往殘暴炎魔之門
  jz rtnStart
  cmp esi,10B0C420 //火山的氣息<第1階段>
  jz rtnOne
  cmp esi,10B0C421 //火山的氣息<第2階段>
  jz rtnTwo
rtnNormal:
  pop esi
  lea eax,[ecx+00004658]
  jmp rtnSPC

  mov [ebp-18], FFFFFFC5
  mov ebx, FFFFFD96
  jmp rtnNormal
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_怪物走向.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：v1.37.1 MobLR
// Address：0084F7F2
// EIP：MobLR
// Aob：DD 07 DC 20 DD 5D ?? D9 EE DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B
// Aob：DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 83
// Cortrol：LRKey
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
Registersymbol(MobLR)
Alloc(MobLR, 1024)
Registersymbol(MyState)
Alloc(MyState, 4)
Registersymbol(MyXYResh)
Alloc(MyXYResh, 4)
Registersymbol(LRKey)
Alloc(LRKey, 4)
Registersymbol(LRXY)
Alloc(LRXY, 4)

Label(MobLRGo)
Label(Left)
Label(Right)
Label(LRGoMe)
Label(LRGoXY)
Label(GetXY)
Label(GetState)
Label(XYAdd)
Label(XYSub)
Label(MobNormal)
//----------------------------
MobLR:
Cmp [Ebx+298], 1 //Wolk
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+298], 3 //Jump
Je MobLRGo

MobNormal:
Fcom ss:[Ebp-18]
Wait:Fstsw ax
Jmp 0084F7F7
//----------------------------
MobLRGo:
Push Eax
Cmp [LRKey],1
Je Left
Cmp [LRKey],2
Je Right
Pop Eax

Cmp [LRKey], 3
Je LRGoMe
Cmp [LRKey], 4
Je LRGoXY
Cmp [LRKey], 5
Je GetXY
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Left:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000000F4], FFFFFFFF
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Right:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000000F4], 00000001
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoMe:
Call GetState
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [00BD8678]
Mov Eax, [Eax+1888]
Sub Eax, 8
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000000F4], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[LRXY]
Sub Eax, 8
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000000F4], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[00BD8678]
Mov Eax,[Eax+1888]
Mov [LRXY],0
Mov [LRXY],Eax
Mov [LRKey],4
Pop Eax
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetState:
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [00BD86D8]
Mov Eax, [Eax+46C]
Mov [MyState], Eax
Pop Eax
Cmp [MyState], 3
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 5
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 7
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 9
Je XYSub

Cmp [MyState], 2
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 4
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 6
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 8
Je XYAdd
Ret
//----------------------------
XYAdd:
Mov [MyXYResh], 00000020
Ret
//----------------------------
XYSub:
Mov [MyXYResh], FFFFFFE0
Ret
//----------------------------
LRKey:
Dd 0
LRXY:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
0084F7F2:
Jmp MobLR
//----------------------------
[Disable]
0084F7F2:
db dc 55 e8 df e0

Dealloc(LRXY)
Dealloc(LRKey)
Dealloc(MyState)
Dealloc(MyXYResh)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Unregistersymbol(LRXY)
Unregistersymbol(LRKey)
Unregistersymbol(MyState)
Unregistersymbol(MyXYResh)
Unregistersymbol(MobLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(GodTime, 4)
Alloc(HitTime, 4)
Alloc(OhMyGod, 128)
Label(Invisible)

GodTime:
DD 7530 //30 Sec.

OhMyGod:
Call    004215DA
Push    Ecx
Mov     Ecx, Dword Ptr [00BD8B50]
Mov     Ecx, Dword Ptr [Ecx+001C]
Cmp     Ecx, [HitTime]
Jl      Invisible
Mov     Eax, Dword Ptr [Esi+046C]
And     Eax, FFFFFFFE
Add     Ecx, [GodTime]
Mov     [HitTime], Ecx
Pop     Eax
Jmp     007F57EB
Invisible:
Pop     Ecx
Jmp     007F7401

007F57D5:
Jmp		OhMyGod
[DISABLE]
007F57D5:
Call 004215DA

DeAlloc(OhMyGod)
DeAlloc(GodTime)
DeAlloc(HitTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_熱鍵N合1.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
//------------------------------
Alloc(MouseRush,512)
    Label(Dotele)
    Label(RetMSRush)
RegisterSymbol(RushSW)
Alloc(RushSW,4)
Alloc(MouseX,4)
Alloc(MouseY,4)
//----------------------
Alloc(SpeedUp, 128)
    Label(SpeedUp_Loop)
    Label(RetSpeedUp)
RegisterSymbol(SpeedSW)
Alloc(SpeedSW, 4)
//----------------------
Alloc(Hotkey,256)
    Label(Hotkey_F1)
    Label(Hotkey_F2)
    Label(Hotkey_F3)
    Label(Hotkey_F4)
    Label(RetHotkey)
//------------------------------
RushSW:
DD 0
MouseRush:
Push   Edx
Push   Ebx
Mov    Edx, [00BD86D8]
Cmp    [00BD86D8], 0
Je     RetMSRush
Cmp    [RushSW], 0
Je     RetMSRush
//--------------
Mov    Ebx, [00BD86D8]
Mov    Ebx, [Ebx+1954]
Cmp    Esi, Ebx
Jne    RetMSRush
Mov    Eax, [00BD8B4C]//8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 57 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8D 45 ??
Mov    Eax, [Eax+978]
Mov    Ebx, [Eax+8C]
Mov    Eax, [Eax+88]
Mov    [Edi-4], Ebx
Mov    [MouseX], Ebx
Mov    [MouseY], Eax
Cmp    [Edx+046C], 0A //右趴 
Je     Dotele
Cmp    [Edx+046C], 0B //左趴
Je     Dotele
Cmp    [Edx+046C], 0E //樓梯 
Je     Dotele
Cmp    [Edx+046C], 0F //樓梯 
Je     Dotele
Cmp    [Edx+046C], 10 //繩索
Je     Dotele 
Cmp    [Edx+046C], 11 //繩索 
Je     Dotele
//Mov    [Edx+0468], 1388 //不斷呼吸 
Jmp    RetMSRush
//--------------
Dotele:
Push   Ecx
//SS-XY
//AOB: 8b f1 8b 86 ?? ?? 00 00 8b 9e ?? ?? 00 00
Mov    Ecx, [MouseX]
Mov    [Edx+33D8], Ecx
Mov    Ecx, [MouseY]
Mov    [Edx+33DC], Ecx
Mov    [Edx+046C], 13
Pop    Ecx
Mov    [RushSW], 0
//--------------
RetMSRush:
Pop    Ebx
Pop    Edx
Mov    [Edi], Eax
Mov    Edi, [Ebp+14]
Jmp    008471BB
//----------------------
SpeedSW:
DD 0
SpeedUp:
Push Esi
Cmp [SpeedSW], 0
Je RetSpeedUp
Mov Esi,7
//--------------
SpeedUp_Loop:
Cmp Esi,0
Je RetSpeedUp
Dec Esi
Push Eax
Push Ecx
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Pop Ecx
Pop Eax
Jmp SpeedUp_Loop
//--------------
RetSpeedUp:
Pop Esi
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Mov Eax,[Esi+30]
Jmp 00815137
//----------------------
Hotkey:

Hotkey_F1:
Cmp    Eax, 3B0000  //熱鍵 F1
Jne    Hotkey_F2
Not    [RushSW]
Jmp RetHotkey
//--------------
Hotkey_F2:
Cmp    Eax, 3C0000  //熱鍵 F2
Jne    Hotkey_F3
Not    [SpeedSW]
Jmp RetHotkey
//--------------
Hotkey_F3:
Cmp    Eax, 3D0000  //熱鍵 F3
Jne    Hotkey_F4
Pushad
Mov    Eax, [00BD86D8]
Mov    Ebx, [00BD8D60]
Mov    Ecx, [Ebx+0B18]
Mov    [Eax+4210], Ecx
Mov    Ecx, [Ebx+0B1C]
Mov    [Eax+4214], Ecx
Popad
Jmp RetHotkey
//--------------
Hotkey_F4:
Cmp    Eax, 3E0000  //熱鍵 F4
Jne    RetHotkey
Mov    Ecx, [00BD86D8]
Mov    [Ecx+4208], 1
Jmp RetHotkey
//--------------
RetHotkey:
Mov Ecx, [00BD3F20]
Ret 
//------------------------------
008471B6:
Jmp MouseRush
//----------------------
00815132:
Jmp SpeedUp
//----------------------
00800C1C:
Call Hotkey
Nop
[DISABLE]
008471B6:
DB 89 07 8B 7D 14

00815132:
DB FF 10 8B 46 30

00800C1C:
DB 8b 0d 20 3f bd 00
//------------------------------
DeAlloc(MouseRush)
UnRegisterSymbol(RushSW)
DeAlloc(RushSW)
DeAlloc(MouseX)
DeAlloc(MouseY)

UnRegisterSymbol(SpeedSW)
DeAlloc(SpeedSW)
DeAlloc(SpeedUp)

DeAlloc(Hotkey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_狂狼反盾.txt`:

```txt
//v1.37.1 狂狼反盾全圖攻擊
//auther:aaaddress1
//Fixed By 小翊game、草泥馬
//技術支援:頑皮鬼
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(SetBump,128)
alloc(Hit,128) 
alloc(BlockHit,128)
alloc(HitTime,4)
label(BlockHurt)
registersymbol(Get)
alloc(Get,4)
//--------------狂狼反盾弱化取消---------
005B3F24:
db 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90
//--------------狂狼反盾停止呼吸---------
007FD9E7: //c7 83 ?? ?? 00 00 88 13
mov [ebx+00000468],00000000
//--------------不明功能---------
007FEF71: //74 ?? ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 59 85 c0 75
db eb 21
//--------------怪物穩如泰山--------------
005B0856: //0f 8e ?? 00 00 00 83 7d ?? 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8b 4d ?? e8
jg 005b0906
//--------------狂狼反盾清除連擊----------
00804803:
//ff 75 ?? 8b ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 7e ?? 39
jmp Hit

Hit:
call 0062ef19
cmp [ebx+00005034],258
jl 00804808
mov [ebx+00005034],0
mov [ebx+00005038],0
jmp 00804808
//--------------狂狼反盾無敵-------------
0080350B:
DB 85
//--------------狂狼反盾連撞-------------
007FEDF7: //81 c1 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 75 21 83 a5 ?? ?? ff ff 00 83 4d fc ff 8d 8d ?? ?? ff ff e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 85 ?? ?? ff ff e9 ?? ?? 00 00 83 65
jmp SetBump
nop
 
SetBump:
add ecx,4438
call 007d42c0
mov dword ptr [ebp-1c],00
mov dword ptr [ebp-00000194],00
mov dword ptr [ebp-00000100],00
jmp 007FEE9C
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
00BE49C5:
db 8F 16 92 0C 49 1D AB 48 EA 58 4D 10 70 E6 55 37 9A 79 57 1F C3 B1 E2 70 66 20 BA
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
005B29AC: //e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 86 ?? ?? 00 00 3b c3 74 20 2b 45
call SetXY
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00BD8678]
push [edi+1888]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 00420fcc
push [edi+188C]
mov ecx,esi
call 00420fcc
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 04
[DISABLE]
//--------------狂狼反盾弱化取消---------
005B3F24:
db 56 E8 A8 BA FF FF E9 9C 00 00 00
//--------------狂狼反盾停止呼吸---------
007FD9E7:
mov [ebx+00000468],00001388
//--------------不明功能---------
007FEF71:
db 74 21
//--------------怪物穩如泰山--------------
005B0856:
jng 005b0906
//--------------狂狼反盾清除連擊----------
00804803:
call 0062ef19
//--------------狂狼反盾無敵-------------
0080350B:
DB 84
//--------------狂狼反盾連撞-------------
007FEDF7:
add ecx,00004438
//-------------動態狂狼反盾---------------
00BE49C5:
db 8F 16 92 2A 9B 01 1D D9 0C E8 50 32 70 25 8E CE 76 34 7C B6 A3 E1 73 EC 6F 16 92 0A
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
005B29AC:
call 0042ae24
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_移動加速 .txt`:

```txt
[enable]


SpeedUp:
Push Esi
Cmp [SpeedSW], 0
Je RetSpeedUp
Mov Esi,6

SpeedUp_Loop:
Cmp Esi,0
Je RetSpeedUp

Dec Esi
Push Eax
Push Ecx
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Pop Ecx
Pop Eax
Jmp SpeedUp_Loop

RetSpeedUp:
Pop Esi
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Mov Eax,[Esi+30]
Jmp 00815137

00815132: //85 c9 74 04 8b 01 ff 10 8b 46 30
Jmp SpeedUp

[disable]
00815132:
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Mov Eax,[Esi+30]

Dealloc(SpeedSW)
Dealloc(SpeedUp)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_角色顯式.txt`:

```txt
//=================================================
// 角色顯式 for Twms137
// 原作：未知
// Address : 00847195
// JmpAddr : CSEax
// 
// 功能: 
// 0.關閉, 1.滑鼠趕路, 2.物品落腳下, 3.攻擊不停.
// 
// 使用方法:
// 修改 CSEaxMode 的值即可.
// 
// 註: 滑鼠趕路, 物落腳下 請勿攻擊
//=================================================
[Enable]
Registersymbol(CSEax)
Alloc(CSEax, 256)
Registersymbol(CSEaxMode)
Alloc(CSEaxMode, 4)

Label(NormalX)
Label(NormalY)

Label(MouserX)
Label(MouserY)

Label(UberX)
Label(UberY)
Label(CharX)
Label(CharY)

Label(CSXStart)
Label(CSXReturn)
//=================================================
CSEaxMode:
        Db      0
//=================================================
CSEax:
       Cmp     [CSEaxMode], 1
       Je      MouserX
       Cmp     [CSEaxMode], 2
       Je      UberX
       Cmp     [CSEaxMode], 3
       Je      CSXStart
NormalX:
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Mov     Edi, [Ebp+10]
       Cmp     Edi, Ebx
       Jmp     0084719C
NormalY:
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Mov     Edi, [Ebp+14]
       Cmp     Edi, Ebx
       Jmp     008471BD
//=================================================
// 滑鼠趕路 137
//=================================================
MouserX:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]  //Char PID
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1954]
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Jne     NormalX
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD8B4C]  //滑鼠點擊
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+978]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+8C]  //X
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Mov     Edi, [Ebp+10]
       //Cmp     Edi, Ebx
       Je      MouserY
       Jmp     NormalX+5
MouserY:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]  //Char PID
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1954]
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Jne     NormalY
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD8B4C]  //滑鼠點擊
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+978]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+88]  //Y
       //Jmp     NormalY
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Mov     Edi,[Ebp+14]
       Jmp     NormalY+5
//=================================================
// 物品落腳下 137
//=================================================
UberX:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]  //Char PID
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1954]
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Je      NormalX
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD8678]  //X
       Lea     Eax, [Eax+1888]
       //Cmp     Edi, Eax
       //Je      CharX
       Mov     Eax, [Eax]
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Mov     Edi, [Ebp+10]  
       Jne     UberY
       Jmp     NormalX+5
CharX:
       Pop     Eax
       Jmp     NormalX
UberY:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]  //Char PID
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1954]
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Je      NormalY
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD8678] //Y
       Lea     Eax, [Eax+188C]
       //Cmp     Edi, Eax
       //Je      CharY
       Mov     Eax, [Eax]
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Mov     Edi,[Ebp+14]
       Jmp     NormalY+5
CharY:
       Pop     Eax
       Jmp     NormalY
//=================================================
// 攻擊不停 137
//=================================================
CSXStart:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4440] //主動技能次數
       Cmp     Eax, 15 //放技能N次回原位
       Pop     Eax
       Jg      NormalX
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4440]
       Cmp     Eax, 14 //放技能N次偏移
       Pop     Eax
       Jg      CSXReturn
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4450] //輔助技能次數
       Cmp     Eax, 5
       Pop     Eax
       Jg      CSXReturn
       Jmp     NormalX
CSXReturn:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00BD86D8]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1954] //Char PID
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Jne     NormalX
       Add     Eax, 0A
       Jmp     NormalX
//=================================================
00847195:
       //Enter CRC Pointer
       Jmp     CSEax
[Disable]
00847195:
       //Return CRC Pointer
       Db      89 07 8B 7D 10 3B FB
Dealloc(CSEaxMode)
Dealloc(CSEax)
Unregistersymbol(CSEaxMode)
Unregistersymbol(CSEax)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_讀取血魔.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 CRC 讀取血魔
//出處:s18leoare (至少我拿到的來源)
//更新:Inndy
//改寫 By Inndy
[ENABLE]
alloc(GetHPMP,128)
label(MM)
label(NM)
label(MH)
label(NH)
alloc(MAXMP,4)
alloc(NOWMP,4)
alloc(MAXHP,4)
alloc(NOWHP,4)
registersymbol(MAXMP)
registersymbol(NOWMP)
registersymbol(MAXHP)
registersymbol(NOWHP)

GetHPMP:
call 008cd643
pop ebp

cmp [esp],0075F352
je MM
cmp [esp],0075F360
je NM
cmp [esp],0075F375
je MH
cmp [esp],0075F383
je NH
ret

MM:
mov [MAXMP],eax
ret

NM:
mov [NOWMP],eax
ret

MH:
mov [MAXHP],eax
ret

NH:
mov [NOWHP],eax
ret

00404DAF:
jmp GetHPMP
[DISABLE]
00404DAF:
call 008cd643
dealloc(GetHPMP)
dealloc(MAXMP)
dealloc(NOWMP)
dealloc(MAXHP)
dealloc(NOWHP)
unregistersymbol(MAXMP)
unregistersymbol(NOWMP)
unregistersymbol(MAXHP)
unregistersymbol(NOWHP)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_超級笨怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 超級笨怪
[enable]
005B1CAC://83 F8 04 0F ?? ?? 00 00 00 8b ce
jmp 005b1d65
nop

/*
For BCB

AsmJump(0x005B1CA9, SuperStupidMob, 4);

__asm
{
cmp [SuperStupidMobSW],0
je NormalReturn

CheatReturn:
push 0x005b1d65
ret

NormalReturn:
cmp eax,04
jne CheatReturn
mov ecx,esi
push 0x005B1CB9
push 0x0059f849
ret
}

*/

/*
005B1CA9 - 83 f8 04                   - cmp eax,04
005B1CAC - 0f 85 b3 00 00 00          - jne 005b1d65
005B1CB2 - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
005B1CB4 - e8 90 db fe ff             - call 0059f849
*/
 
[disable]
005B1CAC:
jne 005b1d65
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_重機槍可走動.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 重機槍可走動
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MCMove, 128)
Label(MCMove2)
Label(MCMove_Return)

MCMove:
cmp [esp],0080033B	//137	//85 C0 0F 84 ? ? ? ? 8B 86 ? ? ? ? 2D ? ? ? ? 74
je MCMove2
xor eax,eax
ret

MCMove2:
push esi
mov esi,ecx
add esi,1
mov eax,[esi]
sub esi,1
jmp MCMove_Return

007D5F45: //56 8B ? 8B ? ? ? ? ? 85 ? 74 ? 50 E8 ? ? ? ? 59 85 ? 74 ? 8B ? E8 ? ? ? ? 85
jmp MCMove
db 90 90 90 90
MCMove_Return:
[DISABLE]
007D5F45:
db 56 8b f1 8b 86 ac 41 00 00

DeAlloc(MCMove)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_CRC_雙倍鏢箭彈+無限鏢箭彈.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
registersymbol(DoubleFire)
alloc(DoubleFire, 32)
registersymbol(DFireKey)
alloc(DFireKey, 4)
alloc(NoDecKey, 4)
label(NoDec)

NoDecKey:
dd 1

DoubleFire:
cmp [NoDecKey],1
je NoDec
call 00652e63
NoDec:
neg eax
sbb eax,eax
neg eax
mov [ebp-00000200],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-00000220]

cmp [DFireKey], 00
je Normal
xor eax,eax
inc eax
Normal:
call 006295d7
jmp 007ed095

007ED079: // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF F7 D8 1B C0 F7 D8 89 85 ?? ?? FF FF 8B 8D ?? ?? FF FF E8 ?? ?? ?? FF F7 D8 1B C0 F7 D8 89 85 ?? ?? FF FF 81
jmp DoubleFire
[disable]
007ED079:
call 00652e63

unregistersymbol(DoubleFire)
dealloc(DoubleFire)
unregistersymbol(DFireKey)
dealloc(DFireKey)
dealloc(NoDecKey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_Call_換頻.txt`:

```txt
AOB:6a 0c b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 33 ff

void ChangeChannel(long Channel)
{
    DWORD ChangeChannel_Call = 0x004DCC47;
    __asm
    {
        Pushad
        Push 0
        Push [Channel]
        Call dword ptr [ChangeChannel_Call]
        Popad
    }
}
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_Call_撿物.txt`:

```txt
pushad
mov ecx,[00BD86D8]
add ecx,4
lea esi,[ecx+19a0]
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 004215da
mov [rx],eax
mov ecx, esi
mov edi, eax
call 004215da
mov edi,eax
mov [ry],eax
//以上貌似為取得XY
//以下貌似為撿物
mov edi,[00bdaf18]
lea eax,[rx] // Eax指向X軸座標
push eax
mov ecx,edi
call 004c6c3f
popad
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_Else_PVP_HACK.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(MyEnabled)
Registersymbol(SkillID)
RegisterSymbol(SkillLevel)
alloc(MyEnabled,4)
alloc(SkillID,4)
alloc(SkillLevel,4)
alloc(SendPacket,256)
alloc(Packet,16)
alloc(Data,24)
CreateThread(SendPacket)
MyEnabled:
dd 0
SkillLevel:
dd #20
SkillID:
dd 0
Data: db 36 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 09 00 00 00 05 13 00 00 00 00 00 00
SendPacket:
push 64
call Sleep
cmp [MyEnabled],0
je SendPacket
mov eax,[SkillLevel]
mov [Data+6],eax
mov eax,[SkillID]
mov [Data+2],eax
mov [Packet],0 // Null1
mov [Packet+04],Data // 封包資料
mov [Packet+08],18 // 封包長度
mov [Packet+0c],0 // Null2
mov ecx,[00bd4204]
lea eax,[Packet]
push SendPacket
push eax
push 00401005 // 任何ret的位置 =>因為送封包的函式會檢查返回值是否在MSCRC保護記憶體範圍, 所以要給假的的返回位址
jmp 0047C24C
[disable]
UnRegistersymbol(MyEnabled)
UnRegistersymbol(SkillID)
UnRegistersymbol(SkillLevel)
DeAlloc(MyEnabled)
DeAlloc(SkillID)
DeAlloc(SkillLevel)
DeAlloc(SendPacket)
DeAlloc(Packet)
DeAlloc(Data)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_Else_人物變身.txt`:

```txt
bd86d8 + 3f4

變身代碼表

=========有無敵效果============
0009  蘇菲莉雅丟棄的娃娃
0015  屈原變身祕藥
0022  佩圖變身藥水
0036  杰配託變身藥水


=============未知-------------
0001  菇菇寶貝的雕像
```

```txt
006519A3 - 3d c8 00 00 00             - cmp eax,000000c8
006519A8 - 7f 0d                      - jg 006519b7
006519AA - 83 f8 01                   - cmp eax,01
006519AD - 7d 03                      - jnl 006519b2
006519AF - 33 c0                      - xor eax,eax
006519B1 - 40                         - inc eax
006519B2 - 8b 04 81                   - mov eax,[ecx+eax*4]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_全圖撞擊.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS 1.37.1 被無形怪撞擊1(全圖撞擊另外版本) {ICS}
//原創:zgenden
//修改:冰Smith
//FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? FF 75 ?? 8D 45 ?? 50
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(Hit)
alloc(Hit,1024)
registersymbol(Invisible)
alloc(Invisible,1024)


00bdec8c:
DD Hit


Hit:
cmp [esp],005B3E89
jne SetRect
mov [esp],Invisible
jmp SetRect


Invisible:
jmp 005B3E9A //or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff


[DISABLE]
00bdec8c:
DD SetRect
dealloc(Hit)
unregistersymbol(Hit)
dealloc(Invisible)
unregistersymbol(Invisible)


//TWMS 1.37.1 被無形怪撞擊2(全圖撞擊另外版本) {ICS}
//原創:冰Smith
//FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? 83 4D ?? ?? 8D 4D ?? 85 C0
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(Hit2)
alloc(Hit2,1024)
registersymbol(Invisible2)
alloc(Invisible2,1024)


00bded28:
DD Hit2


Hit2:
cmp [esp],005B3E9A
jne IntersectRect
mov [esp],Invisible2
jmp IntersectRect


Invisible2:
or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
lea ecx,[ebp-10]
test eax,eax
jmp 005b3ecf


[DISABLE]
00bded28:
DD IntersectRect
dealloc(Hit2)
unregistersymbol(Hit2)
dealloc(Invisible2)
unregistersymbol(Invisible2)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_完全無敵.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS 1.37.1 完全無敵 ICS
//更新:硍機掰
//----------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
alloc(OhMyGod,32)

00bded2c:
DD OhMyGod

OhMyGod:
cmp [esp],005B3E1B
jne IsRectEmpty
add esp,4
call IsRectEmpty
test eax,eax
jmp 005B3E1F

[DISABLE]
00bded2c:
DD IsRectEmpty

dealloc(OhMyGod)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_怪物不擊退.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
registersymbol(CheckESP)
alloc(CheckESP,256)
Label(HookESP)
Label(HookFun)
00BBB594:
DD CheckESP

CheckESP:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+34],005B0F9C
JE HookESP
JMP 00675C15
HookESP:
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+34],HookFun
JMP 00675C15

HookFun:
CMP DWORD PTR SS:[EBP+3C],1
JNZ 005B0FB2
MOV ECX,EDI
CALL 005A02F7
JMP 005B0FAE

[Disable]
00BBB594:
DB 15 5C 67 00
unregistersymbol(CheckESP)
dealloc(CheckESP)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_怪物瞬移4.txt`:

```txt
//V137怪瞬移4
[Enable]
registersymbol(CheckESP)
alloc(CheckESP,256)
Label(shunyi)

00BBB594:
DD CheckESP

CheckESP:
CMP DWORD PTR [ESP+34],005BDE9E
JE shunyi
JMP 00675C15

shunyi:
        push edx
        mov eax,[esp+34]
        add eax,84
        mov edx,eax
        mov eax,[esp+30]
        movsx eax,word ptr [eax+10]
        sub edx,eax
        mov [esp+10],edx
        mov [esp+24],edx
        pop edx
        jmp 00675C15

[Disable]
00BBB594:
DB 15 5C 67 00
unregistersymbol(CheckESP)
dealloc(CheckESP)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
RegisterSymbol(CheckESP)
Alloc(CheckESP,512)
RegisterSymbol(ItemList)
Alloc(ItemList,204800)
RegisterSymbol(LastItem)
Alloc(LastItem,4)
RegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
Alloc(FilterMode,4)
Label(HookESP)
Label(HookFun)
Label(HookOr1)
Label(HookOr2)
Label(BlackFilter)
Label(WhiteFilter)
Label(Skip)
Label(End)

FilterMode:
//0-關閉  1-黑名單模式  2-白名單模式
DD 1

ItemList:
//請在以下加入物品清單

//請在以上加入物品清單
DD 00

CheckESP:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+64],004C953D
JE HookESP
JMP 00675C15
HookESP:
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+64],HookFun
JMP 00675C15

HookFun:
MOV EAX,DWORD PTR SS:[EBP-1C]
MOV ESI,DWORD PTR SS:[EBP-50]
MOV BYTE PTR DS:[ESI+1C],AL
CMP EAX,1
JE HookOr1
CMP EAX,2
JE HookOr1
XOR AL,AL
JMP HookOr2
HookOr1:
MOV AL,1
HookOr2:
MOV BYTE PTR DS:[ESI+1D],AL
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESI+20],EDI
MOV EDI,DWORD PTR SS:[EBP+8]
MOV ECX,EDI
CALL 00408585
MOVZX EAX,AL
MOV ECX,EDI
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESI+30],EAX
CALL 004085E1
PUSH ESI
MOV ESI,ItemList
CMP EAX,C350
JE End
MOV [LastItem], EAX
CMP [FilterMode], 0
JE End
CMP [FilterMode], 1
JE BlackFilter
CMP [FilterMode], 2
JE WhiteFilter


BlackFilter:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je End
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je Skip
ADD ESI,4
JMP BlackFilter

WhiteFilter:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je Skip
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je End
ADD ESI,4
JMP WhiteFilter

Skip:
XOR EAX,EAX
End:
POP ESI
MOV ECX,EDI
MOV [ESI+34],EAX
JMP 004C9578

00BBB594:
DD CheckESP

[Disable]
00BBB594:
DD 00675C15

UnRegisterSymbol(CheckESP)
DeAlloc(CheckESP)
UnRegisterSymbol(ItemList)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
UnRegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
DeAlloc(FilterMode)
UnRegisterSymbol(LastItem)
DeAlloc(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_疾風2合一.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 ICS 疾風2合一
//更新:Inndy
[enable]
alloc(ICSEntry,128)
label(Next1)
label(Back)
alloc(CheatMain,128)
label(StupidMob)
label(MyGod)
//--------------------
00bbb594:
DD ICSEntry
//--------------------
ICSEntry:

cmp [esp+1c],007F6227
jne Next1
mov [esp+1c],MyGod

Next1:
cmp [esp+1c],0084D379
jne Back
mov [esp+1c],StupidMob

Back:
jmp 00675C15
//--------------------
CheatMain:
//----------
StupidMob:
xor edx,edx
mov ecx,0000ea60
lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
jmp 0084D38E
//----------
MyGod:
lea ecx,[esi+00003280]
push FFFF8AD0
jmp 007F6ACC

[disable]
00bbb594:
DD 00675C15

dealloc(ICSEntry)
dealloc(CheatMain)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(Main)
alloc(Main,1024)
registersymbol(Time)
alloc(Time,4)
registersymbol(RLCtrlW)
alloc(RLCtrlW,4)
registersymbol(RLCtrlJ)
alloc(RLCtrlJ,4)
registersymbol(StupidMons)
alloc(StupidMons,4)
registersymbol(MissTime)
alloc(MissTime,4)
registersymbol(MissTimeCmp)
alloc(MissTimeCmp,4)
label(Nohurt)
label(NohurtMain)
label(NohurtMainI)
label(NohurtMainII)
label(StupidMonster)
label(StupidMonsterMain)
label(StupidMonsterMainI)
label(JumpControl)
label(JumpControlMain)
label(WalkControl)
label(WalkControlMain)
label(StupidReturn)
label(JumpRet)
label(WalkRet)
//==============
Time:
dd FFFF8AD0
MissTime: //迴避次數
DD 5
RLCtrlW: // 走 2左3右 4關
DD 4
RLCtrlJ: // 跳 2左3右 4關
db 4   
StupidMons: // 笨怪 0關 1開
dd 0 
//==============
00bbb594:
dd Main
//==============

Main:
cmp [esp+1c],007F6227 // 6A 64 33 D2 59 F7 F1 89 55
je Nohurt //無敵
cmp [esp+1c],0084D379 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
je StupidMonster //笨怪
cmp [esp+1c],0084E389 // 6a 03 59 89 47 20 33 d2 f7 f1 c7 47
je JumpControl //控怪 跳
cmp [esp+1c],0084DF64 // 6a 03 59 89 47 20 33 d2 f7 f1 89 5f
je WalkControl //控怪
jmp 00675C15
//==============
Nohurt:
mov [esp+1c],NohurtMain
jmp 00675C15

StupidMonster:
mov [esp+1c],StupidMonsterMain
jmp 00675C15

JumpControl:
mov [esp+1c],JumpControlMain
jmp 00675C15

WalkControl:
mov [esp+1c],WalkControlMain
jmp 00675C15

//-------------------------
WalkControlMain:
push 03
pop ecx
cmp [RLCtrlW],4
je WalkRet
mov eax,[RLCtrlW]
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0084DF67

WalkRet:
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0084DF67

//-------------------------
JumpControlMain:
push 03
pop ecx
cmp [RLCtrlJ],4
je JumpRet
mov eax,[RLCtrlJ]
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0084E38C

JumpRet:
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0084E38C

//-------------------------
StupidMonsterMain:
cmp [StupidMons],1
jne StupidReturn
xor edx,edx
mov ecx,0000ea60
lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
push edx
call 00420fcc
mov ebx,[ebp+0c]
lea edi,[esi+000002a0]
cmp [edi],ebx
je StupidMonsterMainI
jmp 0084D3A1

StupidMonsterMainI:
jmp 0084d3ac

StupidReturn:
jmp 0084D379
//-------------------------
NohurtMain:
push 64
xor edx,edx
pop ecx
div ecx
call 004297F5
test byte ptr [eax+0000019C],02
je NohurtMainI
jmp 007F623F
//==============
NohurtMainI:
lea ecx,[esi+00003280]
push [Time]
pushad
mov eax,[MissTime]
cmp [MissTimeCmp],eax
popad
jg NohurtMainII
mov [ebp+5C],0
inc [MissTimeCmp]
jmp 007F6ACC
//==============
NohurtMainII:
mov [MissTimeCmp],0
jmp 007F6ACC
//-------------------------

[DISABLE]
00bbb594:
dd 00675C15

dealloc(Main)
unregistersymbol(Main)
dealloc(Time)
unregistersymbol(Time)
dealloc(RLCtrlW)
unregistersymbol(RLCtrlW)
dealloc(RLCtrlJ)
unregistersymbol(RLCtrlJ)
dealloc(StupidMons)
unregistersymbol(StupidMons)
dealloc(MissTime)
unregistersymbol(MissTime)
dealloc(MissTimeCmp)
unregistersymbol(MissTimeCmp)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_秒數無敵.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(Function,512)
Registersymbol(Function)
Alloc(CtrlTime,4)
Registersymbol(CtrlTime)
Label(Normal)
Label(Main)

00BBB594:
Dd Function

CtrlTime:
Dd FFFF8AD0 // 30 Sec

Function:
//E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 6A 64 33 D2 59 F7 F1 89 55
Cmp [Esp+1C], 007F6227
Jne 00675C15
Mov [Esp+1C], Main
Jmp 00675C15

Main:
Push 64
Xor Edx,Edx
Pop Ecx
Div Ecx
Mov [Ebp+3C], Edx
Call 004297F5
Test byte ptr [Eax+0000019C], 02
Je Normal
Jmp 007F623D
//E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 39 7D ?? 7F ?? 8D 8B ?? ?? ?? ?? 68 24 FA FF FF E8
Normal:
Lea Ecx, [Esi+00003280]
Push [CtrlTime]
Jmp 007F6ACC

[Disable]
00BBB594:
Dd 00675C15

DeAlloc(Function)
UnRegistersymbol(Function)
DeAlloc(CtrlTime)
UnRegistersymbol(CtrlTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/TWMS137_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
alloc(CallCheck,256)
alloc(NoEmptyAtk,256)

00bdecd4:
DD CallCheck

CallCheck:
cmp [esp],007E85BA
jne OffsetRect
mov [esp],NoEmptyAtk
jmp OffsetRect

NoEmptyAtk:
push [ebp-000001a0]
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push [ebp-00000188]
lea eax,[ebp-00000184]
push eax
lea eax,[ebp-68]
push eax
call 004301f5
mov ecx,eax
call 005b4233
mov [ebp-7c],eax
jmp 007F8C82

[disable]
00bdecd4:
DD OffsetRect

dealloc(CallCheck)
dealloc(NoEmptyAtk)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS137/物品.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 賣物品用
int GetPositionByID(int ID)
{
	VMProtectBegin("GetPositionByID");
	int i = 0;
	long OutPosition = 0;
	long ItemBase = *(long*)( *(long*)( *(long*)0x00BD89B4 + 0x98 ) + 0xDC );//0xBF194C//0x78//0xbc
	if(ItemBase!=0)
	{
		int n = *(long*)(ItemBase-4);
		for(;i<n;i++)
		{          
			long ItemAddr = ItemBase+i*0x50;
			//Get ItemID
			long GetItemID = 0x4215DA;//0x42a49e
			long ItemID2 = 0;
			__asm{
				pushad
				mov ecx,ItemAddr
				call GetItemID
				mov ItemID2,eax
				popad
			}
			//WriteLog("%d=%X!=%X\n",i,ItemID2,ID);
			if(ItemID2==ID)
			{   
				OutPosition = i;
				break;
			}
		}
		
		if(i==n&&OutPosition==0)
		{
			return -1;
		}
	}

	VMProtectEnd();
	
	return OutPosition;

}
//137
int GetSellItemID(int SellPosition)
{
	VMProtectBegin("GetSellItemID");
	int ItemID2 = 0;
	long ItemBase = *(long*)(*(long*)(*(long*)0x00BD89B4+0x98)+0xEC);
	if(ItemBase!=0)
	{
		long ItemAddr = ItemBase+SellPosition*0x50;//0x40
		long GetItemID = 0x4215DA;//0x42a49e
		__asm{
			pushad
			mov ecx,ItemAddr
			call GetItemID
			mov ItemID2,eax
			popad
		}
	}
	VMProtectEnd();
	return ItemID2;
}

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/SP點擊2010_10_29.txt`:

```txt
===========SP點擊封包==============================
008E8370 - 68 F4010000                - push 000001F4
008E8375 - E8 4000B9FF                - call 004783BA
008E837A - 85 C0                      - test eax,eax
008E837C - 74 4E                      - je 008E83CC
008E837E - 68 88000000                - push 00000088//
008E8383 - 8D 4D E4                   - lea ecx,[ebp-1C]//
008E8386 - E8 E0CFD0FF                - call 005F536B//
008E838B - 83 65 FC 00                - and dword ptr [ebp-04],00//
008E838F - E8 7E76F8FF                - call 0086FA12
008E8394 - 50                         - push eax
008E8395 - 8D 4D E4                   - lea ecx,[ebp-1C]
008E8398 - E8 D8A2B2FF                - call 00412675
008E839D - FF 75 08                   - push [ebp+08]
008E83A0 - 8D 4D E4                   - lea ecx,[ebp-1C]
008E83A3 - E8 CDA2B2FF                - call 00412675
008E83A8 - 8B 0D 7CA2C800             - mov ecx,[00C8A27C] : [0031348C]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_全圖吸物.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(GetXY,128)
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(XY,20)

004530A2:
/*
00453085 - e8 a6 87 fd ff             - call 0042b830
*/
call SetXY
004CF2E9:
/*
004CF2DC - ff 50 18                   - call dword ptr [eax+18]
004CF2DF - 89 45 d0                   - mov [ebp-30],eax
*/
call GetXY

GetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[esp+0c]
push [edi]
pop [XY]
push [edi+04]
pop [XY+08]
jmp 0042D0AC

SetXY:
push esi
push edi
push [XY]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 00422cc3
push [XY+08]
mov ecx,esi
call 00422cc3
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 04
[DISABLE]
004530A2:
call 0042d0a6
004CF2E9:
call 0042d0a6
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_攻擊無延遲.txt`:

```txt
/*
0080AC89 - ff 50 14                   - call dword ptr [eax+14]
0080AC8C - 83 be 98 39 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [esi+00003998],00
*/
[ENABLE]
alloc(R2,256)
alloc(R2KEY,4)
label(R200)
label(return)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
inc [R2KEY]
cmp [R2KEY],2
jl return
cmp [R2KEY],3
jg R200
mov edi,2a //無延遲
jmp return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
mov [R2KEY],0
return:
mov [esi+00000478],edi
jmp 0080AC89
//-----------------------------------------------
0080AC83:
jmp R2
db 90
[DISABLE]
0080AC83:
db 89 be 78 04 00 00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(GodTime, 4)
Alloc(HitTime, 4)
Alloc(OhMyGod, 128)
Label(Invisible)

GodTime:
DD 7530 //30 Sec.

OhMyGod:
Call    00423250
Push    Ecx
Mov     Ecx, Dword Ptr [00C8ED10]
Mov     Ecx, Dword Ptr [Ecx+001C]
Cmp     Ecx, [HitTime]
Jl      Invisible
Mov     Eax, Dword Ptr [Ebi+0474]
And     Eax, FFFFFFFE
Add     Ecx, [GodTime]
Mov     [HitTime], Ecx
Pop     Eax
Jmp     00841439
Invisible:
Pop     Ecx
Jmp     0084326B

00841423:
Jmp		OhMyGod
[DISABLE]
00841423:
call 00423250

DeAlloc(OhMyGod)
DeAlloc(GodTime)
DeAlloc(HitTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_移動加速 .txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(SpeedSW,4)
Alloc(SpeedUp,128)
SpeedUp:
Push Esi
Cmp [SpeedSW], 0
Je RetSpeedUp
Mov Esi,6

SpeedUp_Loop:
Cmp Esi,0
Je RetSpeedUp

Dec Esi
Push Eax
Push Ecx
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Pop Ecx
Pop Eax
Jmp SpeedUp_Loop

RetSpeedUp:
Pop Esi
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Mov Eax,[Esi+30]
Jmp 00862BFF

00862BFA: //ff 10 8b 46 30
Jmp SpeedUp

[disable]
00862BFA:
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Mov Eax,[Esi+30]

Dealloc(SpeedSW)
Dealloc(SpeedUp)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_讀取血魔.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 CRC 讀取血魔
//出處:s18leoare (至少我拿到的來源)
//更新:Inndy
//改寫 By Inndy

//00B2643C -> 0x0079EEFE
[ENABLE]
alloc(GetHPMP,128)
label(MM)
label(NM)
label(MH)
label(NH)
alloc(MAXMP,4)
alloc(NOWMP,4)
alloc(MAXHP,4)
alloc(NOWHP,4)
registersymbol(MAXMP)
registersymbol(NOWMP)
registersymbol(MAXHP)
registersymbol(NOWHP)

GetHPMP:
call 00923b93
pop ebp

cmp [esp],0079F056 //ff 76 ?? 8b d8 8d 46 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff ff b7
je MM
cmp [esp],0079F064 //ff b7 ?? ?? 00 00 81 c7 ?? ?? 00 00 57 89 45 ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 76 ?? 8b f8
je NM
cmp [esp],0079F079 //ff 76 ?? 8b f8 8d 46 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 83 c4 20 ff 75
je MH
cmp [esp],0079F087 //83 c4 20 ff 75 ?? 8b ce
je NH
ret

MM:
mov [MAXMP],eax
ret

NM:
mov [NOWMP],eax
ret

MH:
mov [MAXHP],eax
ret

NH:
mov [NOWHP],eax
ret

00404E79:
jmp GetHPMP
[DISABLE]
00404E79:
call 00923b93

dealloc(GetHPMP)
dealloc(MAXMP)
dealloc(NOWMP)
dealloc(MAXHP)
dealloc(NOWHP)
unregistersymbol(MAXMP)
unregistersymbol(NOWMP)
unregistersymbol(MAXHP)
unregistersymbol(NOWHP)


/*
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_退怪模式.txt`:

```txt
00a1c224:
DD Hook
Cmp [Esp+54], 005C6359

00923BD5 - ff 15 24 c2 a1 00          - call dword ptr [00a1c224] : 0547096B


//退怪模式 TWMS138
//原創 max大大
//更新:冰Smith
//Address:005C6354
//AAttackDir:0怪不動 1怪退正常 2怪退遠 3怪反退到底 A怪退到底
//EIP:AABack
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AABack)
registersymbol(AABackOnOff)
registersymbol(AAttackDir)
alloc(AABack, 128)
alloc(AABackOnOff, 4)
alloc(AAttackDir, 4)
label(doAABackNormal)

AABack:
call 005b49a0 //add
cmp [AABackOnOff],0
jz doAABackNormal
push eax
mov eAx,[AAttackDir]
mov [ebp+64],eAx //005c63f7
pop eax

doAABackNormal:
test eAx,eAx
jmp 005C635B //add下一

AABackOnOff:
dd 1  // {0: 關閉 | 1: 開啟 }

AAttackDir:
dd 0 //遠攻者可改2
    // 0: 怪不動
    // 1: 怪退後一點點 (正常值)
    // 2: 怪退後很多點
    // 3: 怪反方向退到底
    // A: 怪退到底

005C6354:
JMP AABack

[DISABLE]
005C6354:
call 005b49a0
test eAx,eAx

dealloc(AABack)
dealloc(AABackOnOff)
dealloc(AAttackDir)
unregistersymbol(AABack)
unregistersymbol(AABackOnOff)
unregistersymbol(AAttackDir)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_重機槍可走動.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS137 重機槍可走動
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MCMove, 128)
Label(MCMove2)
Label(MCMove_Return)

MCMove:
cmp [esp], 0084CBAC	//137	//85 C0 0F 84 ? ? ? ? 8B 86 ? ? ? ? 2D ? ? ? ? 74
je MCMove2
xor eax,eax
ret

MCMove2:
push esi
mov esi,ecx
add esi,1
mov eax,[esi]
sub esi,1
jmp MCMove_Return

0081FD2E: //56 8B ? 8B ? ? ? ? ? 85 ? 74 ? 50 E8 ? ? ? ? 59 85 ? 74 ? 8B ? E8 ? ? ? ? 85
jmp MCMove
db 90 90 90 90
MCMove_Return:
[DISABLE]
0081FD2E:
db 56 8b f1 8b 86 5c 48 00 00

DeAlloc(MCMove)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_CRC_雙倍鏢箭彈+無限鏢箭彈.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
registersymbol(DoubleFire)
alloc(DoubleFire, 32)
registersymbol(DbFireKey)
alloc(DbFireKey, 4)
alloc(NoDecKey, 4)
label(NoDec)
label(Normal)

NoDecKey:
dd 1

DbFireKey:
dd 1

DoubleFire:
cmp [NoDecKey],1
je NoDec
call 00675cd9
NoDec:
neg eax
sbb eax,eax
neg eax
mov [ebp-00000204],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-00000224]

cmp [DbFireKey], 00
je Normal
xor eax,eax
inc eax
Normal:
call 00643f0d
jmp 008380BD

008380A1:
jmp DoubleFire
[disable]
008380A1:
call 00675cd9

unregistersymbol(DoubleFire)
dealloc(DoubleFire)
unregistersymbol(DbFireKey)
dealloc(DbFireKey)
dealloc(NoDecKey)
```

```txt
0089D905 - 8b 86 98 02 00 00          - mov eax,[esi+00000298]
0089D90B - 83 f8 01                   - cmp eax,01
0089D90E - 0f 84 4f 07 00 00          - je 0089e063
0089D914 - 83 f8 03                   - cmp eax,03
0089D917 - 0f 84 46 07 00 00          - je 0089e063
0089D91D - 83 f8 06                   - cmp eax,06
0089D920 - 0f 84 3d 07 00 00          - je 0089e063
0089D926 - 83 f8 04                   - cmp eax,04
0089D929 - 0f 85 8c 07 00 00          - jne 0089e0bb


//V138跳怪+走怪掉落
//原作:zgenden
//更新:冰Smith
//更新日期 2011/11/11
//Address: 0089E802
//EIP: ALLDOWN
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(ALLDOWN)
alloc(ALLDOWN,128)

ALLDOWN:
add [ebx+00000298],1
mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
cmp eax,01
jmp 0089E80B

[DISABLE]
dealloc(ALLDOWN)
unregistersymbol(ALLDOWN)
```

```txt
  jmp 00842749		//007e460f

Dull02:				//TWSM138
  mov ecx,[ebp+8]
  inc [ebp+8]
  //cmp dword ptr [ebp+8],07  //這列移到 Dull021

  //==============

  jl Dull021

  je 0084326B		//8b 4d ?? 64 89 0d 00 00 00 00 59 5f 5e 5b 83 c5 ?? c9 c2 ?? 00 33 c0

  add eax,esi

Dull04:
  mov ebx,[ebp+14]
  cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
  jne Dull041
  jmp 005b5b1e  //00595823
Dull041:
  mov edi,[esi+30]
  mov al,[edi]
  cmp al,0a
  je 005b5b09
  movzx ecx,al
  xor eax,eax
  inc eax
  xor edx,edx
  call 008bca70
  mov eax,[ebp+20]
  or [ecx],eax
  or [ecx+04],edx
  mov ecx,esi
  //call 00597b0b
  push [ecx+0000008c]
  add ecx,00000084
  mov eax,ecx
  push ecx
  cmp [00bc1018],0
  je Dull0411
  cmp [00bc101c],1
  je Dull0412
Dull0411:
  call 00404d6f  //0040496d  //標註起來是瞬1
Dull0412:
  pop ecx
  pop ecx
  movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
  cmp eax,ecx
  jl 005b5b1e
  mov ecx,esi
  push [ecx+0000008c]
  add ecx,00000084
  mov eax,ecx
  push ecx
  cmp [00bc1018],0
  je Dull0413
  cmp [00bc101c],0
  jne Dull0414
Dull0413:
  call 00404d6f  //0040496d  //標註起來是瞬1,4
Dull0414:
  pop ecx
  pop ecx
  jmp 005b5a70
//====怪不擊退
Dull05:
  cmp dword ptr [ebp+3c],01
  jne 005a8f3b
  mov ecx,edi
  call 00598718
  cmp [ebp+1c],eax
  jmp 005a8f37
//====笨怪
Dull07:
  xor edx,edx
  mov ecx,0000ea60
  //div ecx
  lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
  //add edx,0002bf20
  push edx
  jmp 00839fc2
//====顯示裝備隱藏潛力,v133 失效了
Dull08:
  mov esi,eax
  cmp esi,edi
  je 00778a50  //0071c987
  mov ecx,[ebp+38]
  mov eax,[ecx]
  call dword ptr [eax+000000b8]
  test eax,eax
  jmp 00778973  //0071c8a6
//=====物品過濾
HookItem:
  mov eax,[ebp-1c]
  mov esi,[ebp-50]
  mov [esi+1c],al
  cmp eax,01
  je HookItem1 
  cmp eax,02
  je HookItem1 
  xor al,al
  jmp HookItem2 
HookItem1:
  mov al,01
HookItem2:
  mov [esi+1d],al
  mov [esi+20],edi
  mov edi,[ebp+08]
  mov ecx,edi
  call 004085d3
  movzx eax,al
  mov ecx,edi
  mov [esi+30],eax
  call 0040862f
//=============
  cmp [ItemKind],0
  je ItemFilter
  mov ecx,edi     
  mov [esi+34],00
  jmp  004c5873
  //====
ItemFilter:
        push ebx
        push esi
        mov [ItemCounter],eax
        //mov [00bc100c],eax
        xor ebx, ebx
        mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
        cmp eax,[esi]
        je Itemskip
        cmp [esi],ebx
        je Itemend
        add esi,4
        jmp ifreject
Itemskip:
        mov eax,00
Itemend:
        pop esi
        pop ebx
        //====返回
        mov ecx,edi     
        mov [esi+34],eax 
        jmp  004c5873

IFTable:

dd 00
//==========
00c71084:
dd xuHook
//==========
[disable]
00c71084:
dd 0069C0A8

//=========
dealloc(Red_Stop)
dealloc(ItemFilter)
dealloc(IFTable)
dealloc(ItemCounter)
unregistersymbol(ItemFilter)
unregistersymbol(ItemCounter)
dealloc(ItemKind)
//=========
unregistersymbol(gwgs)
dealloc(gwgs)
unregistersymbol(zgkg)
dealloc(zgkg)
dealloc(CharX)
//=========
dealloc(xMobPIO)
dealloc(xMobPX)
dealloc(xMobPY)
dealloc(Dull09)
dealloc(Dull11)
//=========
dealloc(God_k)
dealloc(God_t0)
dealloc(God_t1)
unregistersymbol(xuHook)
dealloc(xuHook)
```
