`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_Hotkey.txt`:

```txt
//v138 熱鍵控制-ics
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(xHookHotKey)
alloc(xHookHotKey,1024)
label(xHotKey)
label(xHotKey2)
label(xHotKey3)
label(xHotKey4)
label(xHotKey5)
label(xHotKey6)
label(xHotKey7)
label(xHotKey8)

label(xHotKey9)
label(xNormal)

//-----------------------------------------------
00c96924:
DD xHookHotKey
//-----------------------------------------------
xHookHotKey:
cmp [esp],004DF88A
jne ImmGetContext
mov [esp],xHotKey
jmp ImmGetContext

xHotKey:
pushad
cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],003d0000 //按下 f3  完全無敵
je xHotKey2
cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],003e0000 //按下 f4  58秒無敵
je xHotKey3

cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],00440000 //按下 f10  動態數據
je xHotKey4

cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],003c0000 //按下 f2  來回撿道具
je xHotKey5


cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],003b0000 //按下 f1  暫關 大亂鬥定點
je xHotKey6

cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],00400000 //按下 f6  笨怪
je xHotKey7

cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],00410000 //按下 f7  笨怪關閉
je xHotKey8

cmp dword ptr [ebp+0c],003f0000 //按下 f5  移動加速
je xHotKey9
jmp xNormal


xHotKey5:
//add  [00BC6000],4      // 
not [00C9C010]
jmp xNormal

xHotKey9:
add [00C9C014],1  //走路加速
and [00C9C014],1
jmp xNormal

xHotKey2:
mov  [00C9C000],1      // 完全無敵
jmp xNormal

xHotKey3:
mov  [00C9C000],0      // 58秒無敵
jmp xNormal

xHotKey6:
mov [00C9C030],1  //大亂鬥定點 關閉
jmp xNormal

xHotKey7:
mov  [00C9C034],1      // 笨怪
jmp xNormal

xHotKey8:
mov  [00C9C034],0      // 笨怪關閉
jmp xNormal

xHotKey4:
jmp xNormal
//神聖之光30%  
mov [00BE3FEC],1246D1D5
mov [00BE3FF0],5892368E
mov [00BE3FF4],1DD98F9C
mov [00BE3FF8],4F8C4EBB
mov [00BE3FFC],827D7A97
mov [00BE4000],3A26888C
mov [00BE4004],2514BA4A
mov [00BE4008],5120FFAE
mov [00BE400C],8E1ECA00

//無形箭 137
mov [00BE4010],77E898FC
mov [00BE4014],EBBF44C7
mov [00BE4018],7A29700E
mov [00BE401C],D1BD6F9B
mov [00BE4020],868223DA
mov [00BE4024],39DAA8D6
mov [00BE4028],79B7CD85
mov [00BE402C],E3CAE22E
mov [00BE4030],29E3B41A

jmp xNormal  


xNormal:
popad
push edi
mov edi,[00c89f40]
jmp 004DF89E

//-----------------------------------------------
[DISABLE]
00c96924:
DD ImmGetContext

dealloc(xHookHotKey)
unregistersymbol(xHookHotKey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：		AutoLR
// Version:		TWMS138
// Update:		Inndy
// Address：	008A2DB2
// EIP：		AutoLRMain
// Aob：		ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 3b c7 0f 85
// Cortrol：	AutoLRRange
// 0: Off, Else: Range
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008A2DB8
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008A2DB8
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-08], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008A3001

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-08], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008A3001
//-----------------------------------------------
00C96810:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
/*
008A2DB2:
Nop
Nop
Call   AutoLRICSEntry
*/
[DISABLE]
00C96810:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_地雷狂掉.txt`:

```txt
//008223AE - 74 7b                      - je 0082242b //Nop掉，地雷狂掉
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FastBomb_ICS, 32)
Alloc(FastBomb_Main, 64)

FastBomb_ICS:
Cmp [Esp], 00822365
Jne 008934DA
Mov [Esp], FastBomb_Main
Jmp 008934DA

FastBomb_Main:
DB   85 c0                              //00822365 - test eax,eax
DB   74 02                              //00822367 - je 0082236b
DB   33 db                              //00822369 - xor ebx,ebx
DB   33 ff                              //0082236B - xor edi,edi
DB   39 be a0 57 00 00                  //0082236D - cmp [esi+000057a0],edi
DB   75 1a                              //00822373 - jne 0082238f
DB   3b df                              //00822375 - cmp ebx,edi
DB   74 16                              //00822377 - je 0082238f
call 0086fa12                           //00822379 - call 0086fa12
DB   2d e8 03 00 00                     //0082237E - sub eax,000003e8
DB   89 86 9c 57 00 00                  //00822383 - mov [esi+0000579c],eax
DB   89 9e a0 57 00 00                  //00822389 - mov [esi+000057a0],ebx
DB   3b 9e a0 57 00 00                  //0082238F - cmp ebx,[esi+000057a0]
DB   74 11                              //00822395 - je 008223a8
call 0086fa12                           //00822397 - call 0086fa12
DB   89 86 9c 57 00 00                  //0082239C - mov [esi+0000579c],eax
DB   89 9e a0 57 00 00                  //008223A2 - mov [esi+000057a0],ebx
DB   39 be a0 57 00 00                  //008223A8 - cmp [esi+000057a0],edi
Jmp 008223B0

00B30FE4:
DD FastBomb_ICS 
[DISABLE]
00B30FE4:
DD 008934DA

DeAlloc(FastBomb_ICS)
DeAlloc(FastBomb_Main)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_完全無敵.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
alloc(NoHurtIcs,64)

00c967dc:
dd NoHurtIcs

NoHurtIcs:
cmp [esp],005C9F6D
jne IsRectEmpty
add esp,4
call IsRectEmpty
test eax,eax
jmp 005C9F71

[Disable]
00c967dc:
dd IsRectEmpty

dealloc(NoHurtIcs)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_定點N合一.txt`:

```txt
//v138 新無敵系列-ICS
[enable]
registersymbol(xuHook)
alloc(xuHook, 1024)
//====無敵
label(Hook01)
label(Hook02)
label(Dull01)
label(Dull02)
label(Dull021)
alloc(God_k,4)
alloc(God_t0,4)
alloc(God_t1,4)
//====其他

//=====

//====控怪

alloc(zgkg,4)
alloc(CharX,4)
label(zouguai)
label(gwxret)
label(gwxret1)
label(gwxy)
label(gwxz)

label(gwxzk)

//=====物品過濾

label(HookItem1)
label(HookItem2)
//===========

alloc(IFTable,16024)
alloc(ItemCounter,4)
label(ifreject)
label(Itemend)
label(Itemskip)
registersymbol(ItemFilter)
registersymbol(ItemCounter)
alloc(ItemKind,4)
//==========
God_k:  //1.完全無敵 0.N秒無敵
dd 0
God_t0:
dd 0
God_t1:  //無敵時間
dd 4e20
//===========
ItemKind:  //0.過濾物品  非0.怪只掉錢
dd 0
zgkg:  //控制方向
dd 4    //3為跟隨 , 1向左走 , 2向右走 ， 4 定點
//==========
xMobPIO:
dd 0
xMobPX:
dd 0
xMobPY:
dd 0
Red_Stop:
dd 0
//==========
xuHook:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+8c], 005C1F51 // 005a459c  //定點生怪 8B F8 8D 8E ?? ?? ?? ?? 57 E8 ?? ?? ?? ??
    je Hook09
    //cmp dword ptr [esp+40], 005C88AC // 005aa741  //慢速控怪半套 23 7D ?? 83 FF FF 75 ?? 8B CE
    //je Hook10
    //cmp dword ptr [esp+64], 4CF1FF // 004c5838  //物品過濾 8B 45 ?? 8B 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 F8 01
    //je Hook06
    //cmp dword ptr [esp+48], 007CC139 // 0077895a  //顯示裝備潛藏能力(失效了!!) 3B C6 0F 84 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 07 8B CF
    //je Hook08
    cmp [Red_Stop],0  //遇紅點下列功能暫停
    jg 0069C0A8
    //=====
    cmp dword ptr [esp+34], 005D467E // 005b5a2c  //怪物瞬移 8B 5D ?? E9 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 7E ?? 8A 07
    je Hook04
    cmp dword ptr [esp+34], 005C6CE7 // 005a8f25  //怪不擊退 83 7D ?? ?? 75 ?? 8B CF E8 ?? ?? ?? ??
    je Hook05
    cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 0089C371 // 00839fac  //笨怪 33 D2 B9 60 EA 00 00 F7 F1
    je Hook07
    cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 00841577 // 007e3488  //完全無敵 8B 4D ?? FF 45 ?? 83 7D ?? ??
    je Hook02
    cmp [God_k],2  //等於2則執行損血人物不退後
    jne 0069C0A8
    cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 0084204E // 007e3d75  //人物不退後 6A 64 33 D2 59 F7 F1 89 55 ?? E8
    je Hook01
    jmp 0069C0A8

Hook01:
    mov [esp+1c],Dull01
    jmp 0069C0A8

Hook02:
    mov [esp+1c],Dull02
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook04:
    mov [esp+34],Dull04
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook05:
    mov [esp+34],Dull05
    jmp 0069C0A8

    mov [esp+64],HookItem
    jmp 0069C0A8

    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook08:
    mov [esp+48],Dull08
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook09:
    mov [esp+8c], Dull09
    jmp 0069C0A8

Hook10:
    mov [esp+40], Dull10
    jmp 0069C0A8

//==================
Dull09:
db 8b f8                      //- mov edi,eax
db 8d 8e 0C 01 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+0000010c]
db 57                         //- push edi
call 005b8dca
db ff 75 7c                  //- push [ebp+7c]
db 8b ce                     //- mov ecx,esi
call 005b403b
db 8b c8                       //- mov ecx,eax
call 005b46e4
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8d 46 04                  //- lea eax,[esi+04]
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b cf                      //- mov ecx,edi
call 0089af7b
db 8d 8e d0 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005d0]
call 00423250
db 8d 8e dc 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005dc]
db 89 45 6c                  //- mov [ebp+6c],eax
call 00423250
db ff 75 68                  //- push [ebp+68]
db 89 45 54                  //- mov [ebp+54],eax
db 83 c7 10                  //- add edi,10
db 8b 07                      //- mov eax,[edi]
db 8b ce                      //- mov ecx,esi
db 89 45 60                  //- mov [ebp+60],eax
call 005b49f4
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b 45 60                  //- mov eax,[ebp+60]
db 53                        //- push ebx
db 53                        //- push ebx
db ff 75 6c                  //- push [ebp+6c]
db 8b cf                     //- mov ecx,edi
db ff 75 54                  //- push [ebp+54]
db 53                        //- push ebx
cmp dword ptr [eax+7C],0089C0FE // 55 8B EC 53 8B 5D ?? 56 57
//55 8b ec 53 8b 5d
je Dull091
call dword ptr [eax+7C]
jmp 005C1FBC

Dull091:  //008A12F2 55 8B EC 53 8B 5D ?? 56 57
    call Dull092
    jmp 005C1FBC  //00582dfc
Dull092:
    cmp [Red_Stop],0
    jg Dull093
    //cmp [00bc1014],0
    //je Dull093
    cmp  [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull0921
    pushad
    mov eax,[00c8efe0]
    mov ebx,[eax+b18]
    mov [xMobPX],ebx
    mov ebx,[eax+b1c]
    mov [xMobPY],ebx
    popad
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    jmp Dull093
Dull0921:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
    jne Dull093
    push ecx
    mov ecx,[xMobPX]
    mov [esp+0c],ecx
    mov eax,[xMobPY]
    mov [esp+10],eax
    push eax
    mov ecx,[00c8e730]  //
    call Dull0922
    mov ecx,eax
    mov [esp+20],ecx
    pop ecx

Dull093:
    jmp 0089C0FE  
Dull0922: //0042D006 6A 14 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 33 F6
    push 14
    mov eax,009471b9
    call 00923a89
    xor esi,esi
    mov [ebp-10],esi
    mov [ebp-14],esi
    mov [ebp-04],esi
    cmp [ebp+08],esi
    je 0042d03e
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    push eax
    lea eax,[ebp+08]
    push eax
    add ecx,00000088
    call 0042c665
    test eax,eax
    je Dull09221 
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    jmp Dull09222
Dull09221:
    mov [ebp-1c],esi
    lea eax,[ebp-20]
    mov [ebp-10],00000001
Dull09222:
    test byte ptr [ebp-10],01
    mov esi,[eax+04]
    je Dull09223 
    lea ecx,[ebp-20]
    //call 004b0c0f
    call Dull09224
Dull09223:
    or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
    lea ecx,[ebp-18]
    //call 004b0c0f
    call Dull09224
    jmp 0042D068
Dull09224:  //0042C5BA
    push esi
    mov esi,ecx
    cmp dword ptr [esi+04],00
    je Dull09225
    push 00
    call 0042bc79  //004b0657
    and dword ptr [esi+04],00
Dull09225:
    pop esi
    ret
//==========控怪有變
Dull10:
    pushad
    mov ebx,[esi+110]
    cmp ebx,0
    je Dull11XR
    sub ebx,c
    cmp ebx,0
    je Dull11XR
    cmp [ebx+298],1
    je Dull11X
    cmp [ebx+298],3
    je Dull11X
    jmp Dull11XR

Dull11X:
    mov ecx,[00bb6c28]
    mov ecx,[ecx+18]
    //mov [Red_Stop],ecx
    cmp [Red_Stop],0  //紅點
    jg Dull11XR
    //cmp [00bc1014],0  //控怪生怪開關
    //je Dull11X1
    cmp [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull11X1
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    mov ecx,[00bb72a8]
    mov edx,[ecx+b18]
    mov [xMobPX],edx
    mov edx,[ecx+b1c]
    mov [xMobPY],edx
Dull11X1:
    call gwgs
    //mov [ebx+f8],ffffffff
    jmp Dull11XR

Dull11XR:
    popad
    jmp 005C88AF
//================
gwgs:
//cmp [00bc1014],0
//je gwxret1
cmp [ebx+00000298],1  //走怪
je zouguai
cmp [ebx+00000298],3  //跳怪
je zouguai
ret

zouguai:
cmp [zgkg],1
je gwxz
cmp [zgkg],2
je gwxy
cmp [zgkg],3
je gwxzj
cmp [zgkg],4
je gwxzk
cmp [zgkg],5
je gwxzl
gwxret:
ret

gwxret1:
mov [zgkg],4
mov [xMobPIO],0
ret

gwxz:
mov [ebx+000000f8],FFFFFFFF
ret

gwxy:
mov [ebx+000000f8],1
ret

gwxzj:
push eax
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+b18]
//add eax,3c  //50  //離右 40
//sub eax,64  //28  //離左 40
cmp [ebx+00000694],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret

gwxzk:
push eax
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+b18]
mov [CharX],eax
pop eax
mov [zgkg],5
ret

gwxzl:
push eax
mov eax,[CharX]
cmp [ebx+00000694],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret
//==========
//========
Dull01:
    mov [God_k],0  //改變 God_k 值好回復完全無敵 N 秒
    mov ecx,fffffa24
    jmp 0084276A  //0077a1b5
//========
Dull02:
    mov ecx,[ebp+14]
    inc [ebp+14]
    //cmp dword ptr [ebp+14],07  //這列移到 Dull021
    mov [ebp+ecx*4-60],eax
    //==============
    cmp [God_k],0  //小於0則正常
    jl Dull021
    cmp [God_k],1  //大於1則正常
    jg Dull021
    cmp [God_k],1  //1.完全無敵  0.N秒無敵
    je 007e4f4f 
    push eax
    call clock
    cmp eax,[God_t0]
    pop eax
    jle 0084326B
    push eax
    push esi
    call clock
    mov esi,[God_t1]
    add eax,esi
    mov [God_t0],eax
    pop esi
    pop eax
    mov [God_k],2  //改變 God_k 值好執行損血人物不退後
Dull021:
    cmp dword ptr [ebp+14],07
    jmp 00841585
//=========怪物瞬移
Dull04:
    mov ebx,[ebp+14]
    cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
    jne Dull041
    jmp 005D4770  //00595823
Dull041:
    mov edi,[esi+30]
    mov al,[edi]
    cmp al,0b
    je 005d475b
    movzx ecx,al
    xor edx,edx
    inc eax
    xor edx,edx
    call 00927ec0
    mov eax,[ebp+20]
    or [ecx],eax
    or [ecx+04],edx
    mov ecx,esi
    //call 005B48B4
    push [ecx+0000008c]
    add ecx,00000084
    mov eax,ecx
    push ecx
    //cmp [00bc1018],0
    //je Dull0411
    //cmp [00bc101c],1
    //je Dull0412
Dull0411:
    call 00404e47  //0040496d  //標註起來是瞬1
Dull0412:
    pop ecx
    pop ecx
    movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
    cmp eax,ecx
    jl 005d4770
    mov ecx,esi
    push [ecx+0000008c]
    add ecx,00000084
    mov eax,ecx
    push ecx
    //cmp [00bc1018],0
    //je Dull0413
    //cmp [00bc101c],0
    //jne Dull0414
Dull0413:
    call 00404e47  //0040496d  //標註起來是瞬1,4
Dull0414:
    pop ecx
    pop ecx
    jmp 005D46C2
//====怪不擊退
Dull05:
    cmp dword ptr [ebp+3c],01
    jne 005c6cfd
    mov ecx,edi
    call 005b550a
    cmp [ebp+1c],eax
    jmp 005C6CF9
//====笨怪
Dull07:
    xor edx,edx
    mov ecx,0000ea60
    //div ecx
    lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
    //add edx,0002bf20
    push edx
    jmp 0089C387
//====顯示裝備隱藏潛力,v133 失效了
Dull08:
    //mov esi,eax
    cmp eax,esi
    je 007cc231  //007CC13B
    mov eax,[edi]
    mov ecx,edi
    call dword ptr [eax+000000D8]
    test eax,eax
    jmp 007CC14F  //0071c8a6
//=====物品過濾
HookItem:
    mov eax,[ebp-1c]
    mov esi,[ebp-50]
    mov [esi+1c],al
    cmp eax,01
    je HookItem1 
    cmp eax,02
    je HookItem1 
    xor al,al
    jmp HookItem2 
HookItem1:
    mov al,01
HookItem2:
    mov [esi+1d],al
    mov [esi+20],edi
    mov edi,[ebp+08]
    mov ecx,edi
    call 004085d3
    movzx eax,al
    mov ecx,edi
    mov [esi+30],eax
    call 004085c6
//=============
    cmp [ItemKind],0
    je ItemFilter
    mov ecx,edi     
    mov [esi+34],00
    jmp  004CF23A
    //====
ItemFilter:
    push ebx
    push esi
    mov [ItemCounter],eax
    //mov [00bc100c],eax
    xor ebx, ebx
    mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
    cmp eax,[esi]
    je Itemskip
    cmp [esi],ebx
    je Itemend
    add esi,4
    jmp ifreject
Itemskip:
    mov eax,00
Itemend:
    pop esi
    pop ebx
    //====返回
    mov ecx,edi     
    mov [esi+34],eax 
    jmp  004CF23A

IFTable:

dd 00
//==========
00C71084:
dd xuHook
//==========
[disable]
00C71084:
dd 0069C0A8
//=========
dealloc(Red_Stop)
dealloc(ItemFilter)
dealloc(IFTable)
dealloc(ItemCounter)
unregistersymbol(ItemFilter)
unregistersymbol(ItemCounter)
dealloc(ItemKind)
//=========
unregistersymbol(gwgs)
dealloc(gwgs)
unregistersymbol(zgkg)
dealloc(zgkg)
dealloc(CharX)
//=========
dealloc(xMobPIO)
dealloc(xMobPX)
dealloc(xMobPY)
dealloc(Dull09)
dealloc(Dull11)
//=========
dealloc(God_k)
dealloc(God_t0)
dealloc(God_t1)
unregistersymbol(xuHook)
dealloc(xuHook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS138定點生怪 ICS
[ENABLE]
Alloc(SpawnControl, 64)
Label(Main)
Label(SpawnRet)
Alloc(MobSpX, 4)
Alloc(MobSpY, 4)
Alloc(SpawnKey, 4)

SpawnKey:
// 0: Off
// 1: On
// 2: Set Position
DD 2

SpawnControl:
Cmp [Esp], 005B91DC
Jne SpawnRet
Cmp Dword ptr [Esp+18], 02
Jne SpawnRet
Cmp [SpawnKey], 0
Je SpawnRet
Cmp [SpawnKey], 1
Je Main

Push   Eax
Mov    Eax, [00C8EFE0]
Mov    Eax, [Eax+B18]
Mov    [MobSpX], Eax
Mov    Eax, [00C8EFE0]
Mov    Eax, [Eax+B1C]
Mov    [MobSpY], Eax
Mov    [SpawnKey], 1
Pop    Eax

Main:
Mov    [Ecx+0298], 06
Push   Ecx
Mov    Eax, [MobSpX]
Mov    [Esp+0C], Eax
Mov    Eax, [MobSpY]
Mov    [Esp+10], Eax
Push   Eax
Mov    Ecx, [00C8E730]
Call   0042D006 //6a ?? b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 33 f6 89 75 f0 89 75 ec 89 75 fc
Mov    Ecx, Eax
Mov    [Esp+20], Ecx
Pop    Ecx

SpawnRet:
Jmp    0089C0FE

00B30880:
DD SpawnControl
[DISABLE]
00B30880:
DD 0089C0FE

DeAlloc(SpawnKey)
DeAlloc(MobSpX)
DeAlloc(MobSpY)
DeAlloc(SpawnControl)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_怪物走向.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：v1.38.1 MobLR
// Address：0089E7F4
// EIP：MobLR
// Aob：DD 07 DC 20 DD 5D ?? D9 EE DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B
// Aob：DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 83
// Cortrol：LRKey
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
[Enable]
Registersymbol(MobLR)
Alloc(MobLR, 1024)
Registersymbol(MyState)
Alloc(MyState, 4)
Registersymbol(MyXYResh)
Alloc(MyXYResh, 4)
Registersymbol(LRKey)
Alloc(LRKey, 4)
Registersymbol(LRXY)
Alloc(LRXY, 4)
Alloc(FakeCall,64)

Label(MobLRGo)
Label(Left)
Label(Right)
Label(LRGoMe)
Label(LRGoXY)
Label(GetXY)
Label(GetState)
Label(XYAdd)
Label(XYSub)
Label(MobNormal)
//----------------------------
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
LRKey:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
FakeCall:
db 55                 // push ebp
db 8b ec              // mov ebp,esp
db 83 ec 20           // sub esp,20
db 8b 45 08           // mov eax,[ebp+08]
db 53                 // push ebx
db 56                 // push esi
db 8b 35 30 e7 c8 00  // mov esi,[00c8e730]
db 8b d9              // mov ebx,ecx
db 57                 // push edi
db 8d bb 88 00 00 00  // lea edi,[ebx+00000088]
db dd 07              // fld qword ptr [edi]
db dc 20              // fsub qword ptr [eax]
db dd 5d e8           // fstp qword ptr [ebp-18]
db d9 ee              // fldz
//----------------------------
MobLR:
Cmp [Ebx+298], 1 //Wolk
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+298], 2 //掉落的怪物
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+298], 3 //Jump
Je MobLRGo

MobNormal:
Fcom ss:[Ebp-18]
Fstsw ax
Jmp 0089E7F9
//----------------------------
MobLRGo:

//Mov [Ebx+298], 2
//上面這行註解拿掉就是怪物掉落

Push Eax
Cmp [LRKey],1
Je Left
Cmp [LRKey],2
Je Right
Pop Eax

Cmp [LRKey], 3
Je LRGoMe
Cmp [LRKey], 4
Je LRGoXY
Cmp [LRKey], 5
Je GetXY
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Left:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000000F8], FFFFFFFF
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Right:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000000F8], 00000001
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoMe:
Call GetState
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[00C8EFE0]
Mov Eax,[Eax+0B18]
Sub Eax, 8
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000000F8], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[LRXY]
Sub Eax, 8
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Cmp [Ebx+694], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000000F8], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[00C8EFE0]
Mov Eax,[Eax+0B18]
Mov [LRXY],0
Mov [LRXY],Eax
Mov [LRKey],4
Pop Eax
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetState:
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [00C8A248]
Mov Eax, [Eax+474]
Mov [MyState], Eax
Pop Eax
Cmp [MyState], 3
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 5
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 7
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 9
Je XYSub

Cmp [MyState], 2
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 4
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 6
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 8
Je XYAdd
Ret
//----------------------------
XYAdd:
Mov [MyXYResh], 00000020
Ret
//----------------------------
XYSub:
Mov [MyXYResh], FFFFFFE0
Ret
//----------------------------
LRXY:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
00B30978:
DD FakeCall
//----------------------------
[Disable]
00B30978: //Call From 0089510A
DD 0089E7D1

Dealloc(LRXY)
Dealloc(LRKey)
Dealloc(MyState)
Dealloc(MyXYResh)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(FakeCall)
Unregistersymbol(LRXY)
Unregistersymbol(LRKey)
Unregistersymbol(MyState)
Unregistersymbol(MyXYResh)
Unregistersymbol(MobLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
RegisterSymbol(CheckESP)
Alloc(CheckESP,512)
RegisterSymbol(ItemList)
Alloc(ItemList,204800)
RegisterSymbol(LastItem)
Alloc(LastItem,4)
RegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
Alloc(FilterMode,4)
Label(HookESP)
Label(HookFun)
Label(HookOr1)
Label(HookOr2)
Label(BlackFilter)
Label(WhiteFilter)
Label(Skip)
Label(End)

FilterMode:
//0-關閉  1-黑名單模式  2-白名單模式
DD 1

ItemList:
//請在以下加入物品清單

//請在以上加入物品清單
DD 00

CheckESP:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+64],004CF1FF //8b 45 ?? 8b 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 f8 01
JE HookESP
JMP 0069C0A8
HookESP:
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+64],HookFun
JMP 0069C0A8

HookFun:
MOV EAX,DWORD PTR SS:[EBP-1C]
MOV ESI,DWORD PTR SS:[EBP-50]
MOV BYTE PTR DS:[ESI+1C],AL
CMP EAX,1
JE HookOr1
CMP EAX,2
JE HookOr1
XOR AL,AL
JMP HookOr2
HookOr1:
MOV AL,1
HookOr2:
MOV BYTE PTR DS:[ESI+1D],AL
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESI+20],EDI
MOV EDI,DWORD PTR SS:[EBP+8]
MOV ECX,EDI
call 0040856a
MOVZX EAX,AL
MOV ECX,EDI
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESI+30],EAX
call 004085c6
PUSH ESI
MOV ESI,ItemList
CMP EAX,C350
JLE End
MOV [LastItem], EAX
CMP [FilterMode], 0
JE End
CMP [FilterMode], 1
JE BlackFilter
CMP [FilterMode], 2
JE WhiteFilter


BlackFilter:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je End
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je Skip
ADD ESI,4
JMP BlackFilter

WhiteFilter:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je Skip
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je End
ADD ESI,4
JMP WhiteFilter

Skip:
XOR EAX,EAX
End:
POP ESI
MOV ECX,EDI
MOV [ESI+34],EAX
JMP 004CF23A

00c71084: //ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c0 74 16 eb 08
DD CheckESP

[Disable]
00c71084:
DD 0069C0A8

UnRegisterSymbol(CheckESP)
DeAlloc(CheckESP)
UnRegisterSymbol(ItemList)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
UnRegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
DeAlloc(FilterMode)
UnRegisterSymbol(LastItem)
DeAlloc(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(Main)
alloc(Main,1024)
registersymbol(Time)
alloc(Time,4)
registersymbol(RLCtrlW)
alloc(RLCtrlW,4)
registersymbol(RLCtrlJ)
alloc(RLCtrlJ,4)
registersymbol(StupidMons)
alloc(StupidMons,4)
registersymbol(MissTime)
alloc(MissTime,4)
registersymbol(MissTimeCmp)
alloc(MissTimeCmp,4)
label(Nohurt)
label(NohurtMain)
label(NohurtMainI)
label(NohurtMainII)
label(StupidMonster)
label(StupidMonsterMain)
label(StupidMonsterMainI)
label(JumpControl)
label(JumpControlMain)
label(WalkControl)
label(WalkControlMain)
label(StupidReturn)
label(JumpRet)
label(WalkRet)
//==============
Time:		//無敵時間
DD FFFF8AD0
MissTime:	//迴避次數
DD 5
RLCtrlW:	// 走 2左3右 4關
DD 4
RLCtrlJ:	// 跳 2左3右 4關
DD 4   
StupidMons:	// 笨怪 0關 1開
DD 1
//==============
00C71084:
dd Main
//==============

Main:
cmp [esp+1c],0084204E	// 6A 64 33 D2 59 F7 F1 89 55
je Nohurt		//無敵
cmp [esp+1c],0089C371	// 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
je StupidMonster	//笨怪
cmp [esp+1c],0089D388	// 6a 03 59 89 47 20 33 d2 f7 f1 c7 47
je JumpControl		//控怪 跳
cmp [esp+1c],0089CF63	// 6a 03 59 89 47 20 33 d2 f7 f1 89 5f
je WalkControl		//控怪
jmp 0069C0A8
//==============
Nohurt:
mov [esp+1c],NohurtMain
jmp 0069C0A8

StupidMonster:
mov [esp+1c],StupidMonsterMain
jmp 0069C0A8

JumpControl:
mov [esp+1c],JumpControlMain
jmp 0069C0A8

WalkControl:
mov [esp+1c],WalkControlMain
jmp 0069C0A8

DontJump:
mov [esp+1c],DontJumpMain
jmp 0069C0A8
//-------------------------
WalkControlMain:
push 03
pop ecx
cmp [RLCtrlW],4
je WalkRet
mov eax,[RLCtrlW]
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0089CF69

WalkRet:
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0089CF69

//-------------------------
JumpControlMain:
push 03
pop ecx
cmp [RLCtrlJ],4
je JumpRet
mov eax,[RLCtrlJ]
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0089D38E

JumpRet:
mov [edi+20],eax
jmp 0089D38E

//-------------------------
StupidMonsterMain:
cmp [StupidMons],1
jne StupidReturn
xor edx,edx
mov ecx,0000ea60
lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
push edx
call 00422cc3
mov ebx,[ebp+0c]
lea edi,[esi+000002a0]
cmp [edi],ebx
je StupidMonsterMainI
jmp 0089C397

StupidMonsterMainI:
jmp 0089C3A4

StupidReturn:
jmp 0089C371
//-------------------------
NohurtMain:
push 64
xor edx,edx
pop ecx
div ecx
call 0042baaf
test byte ptr [eax+000001b0],02
je NohurtMainI
jmp 00842066
//==============
NohurtMainI:
lea ecx,[ebx+000038AC]
push [Time]
push eax
mov eax,[MissTime]
cmp [MissTimeCmp],eax
pop eax
jg NohurtMainII
mov [ebp+58],0
inc [MissTimeCmp]
jmp 00842771
//==============
NohurtMainII:
mov [MissTimeCmp],0
jmp 00842771
//-------------------------
MobFast:
mov ebx,[ebp+14]
cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
jne MobFast1
jmp 005DC22D
MobFast1:
mov edi,[esi+30]
mov al,[edi]
cmp al,0b
je 005dc218
movzx ecx,al
xor eax,eax
inc eax
xor edx,edx
call 009464d0
mov eax,[ebp+20]
or [ecx],eax
or [ecx+04],edx
mov ecx,esi
//call 005bc1ac  //標註起來是瞬4
push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
mov eax,ecx
push ecx
call 00404e51  //標註起來是瞬1
pop ecx
pop ecx
movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
cmp eax,ecx
jl 005dc22d
mov ecx,esi
push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
mov eax,ecx
push ecx
call 00404e51  //標註起來是瞬1,4
pop ecx
pop ecx
jmp 005DC17F
//-------------------------
[DISABLE]
00C71084:
dd 0069C0A8

dealloc(Main)
unregistersymbol(Main)
dealloc(Time)
unregistersymbol(Time)
dealloc(RLCtrlW)
unregistersymbol(RLCtrlW)
dealloc(RLCtrlJ)
unregistersymbol(RLCtrlJ)
dealloc(StupidMons)
unregistersymbol(StupidMons)
dealloc(MissTime)
unregistersymbol(MissTime)
dealloc(MissTimeCmp)
unregistersymbol(MissTimeCmp)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_移動加速 .txt`:

```txt
//PTR:00B2DCD8
//008DF2FA -> 00862BE0 (00862BFA)
[enable]
Alloc(FakeCall,128)
Alloc(SpeedUp,128)
Alloc(SpeedSw,4)

SpeedSw:
DD 1

FakeCall:
push 78
mov eax,009e620c
call 00923a89
mov esi,ecx
mov [ebp-14],esi
mov ecx,[esi+08]
test ecx,ecx
je 00862bfc
mov eax,[ecx]
Jmp SpeedUp


SpeedUp:
Push Esi
Cmp [SpeedSW], 0
Je RetSpeedUp
Mov Esi,6

SpeedUp_Loop:
Cmp Esi,0
Je RetSpeedUp

Dec Esi
Push Eax
Push Ecx
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Pop Ecx
Pop Eax
Jmp SpeedUp_Loop

RetSpeedUp:
Pop Esi
Call Dword Ptr [Eax]
Mov Eax,[Esi+30]
Jmp 00862BFF


00B2DCD8:
DD FakeCall
[disable]
00B2DCD8:
DD 00862BE0

DeAlloc(FakeCall)
DeAlloc(SpeedUp)
DeAlloc(SpeedSw)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(JumpDown1, 128)
Alloc(JumpDown2, 64)

JumpDown1:
db 55                    // push ebp
db 8b ec                 // mov ebp,esp
db 83 ec 20              // sub esp,20
db 8b 45 08              // mov eax,[ebp+08]
db 53                    // push ebx
db 56                    // push esi
db 8b 35 30 e7 c8 00     // mov esi,[00c8e730]
db 8b d9                 // mov ebx,ecx
db 57                    // push edi
db 8d bb 88 00 00 00     // lea edi,[ebx+00000088]
db dd 07                 // fld qword ptr [edi]
db dc 20                 // fsub qword ptr [eax]
db dd 5d e8              // fstp qword ptr [ebp-18]
db d9 ee                 // fldz
db dc 55 e8              // fcom qword ptr [ebp-18]
db df e0                 // fnstsw ax
db f6 c4 44              // test ah,44
jnp 0089ef15             // jnp 0089ef15
db 8b 83 98 02 00 00     // mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
db 83 f8 01              // cmp eax,01
je 0089E811
db dd d8                 // fstp st(0)
jmp 0089ebb3

JumpDown2:
db 55                    // push ebp
db 8b ec                 // mov ebp,esp
db 83 ec 0c              // sub esp,0c
db 53                    // push ebx
db 56                    // push esi
db 8b f1                 // mov esi,ecx
db 83 be 98 02 00 00 03  // cmp dword ptr [esi+00000298],03
db 57                    // push edi
db 8b 3d 30 e7 c8 00     // mov edi,[00c8e730]
jmp 0089d6f6

00B30978:
DD JumpDown1

00B3097C:
DD JumpDown2
[DISABLE]
00B30978:
DD 0089E7D1
00B3097C:
DD 0089D61D

Dealloc(JumpDown1)
Dealloc(JumpDown2)
```

```txt
jmp OffsetRect

push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00

lea eax,[ebp-68]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp [Esp], 0080AC8C
Jne 007FA5FD
Call R2
Jmp 007FA5FD
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Inc [R2KEY]
Cmp [R2KEY],2
Jl R2_Return
Cmp [R2KEY],3
Jg R200
Mov Edi,2a //無延遲
//2a 或是 ffffffff
Jmp R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov [Esi+00000478],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS138/TWMS138_ICS_雙倍鏢箭彈+無限鏢箭彈.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(DoubleFire_ICS, 64)
Alloc(DoubleFire_1, 512)
Alloc(DoubleFire_2, 128)
Alloc(DoubleFire_3, 128)
Label(Dark00837eca)
Label(Dark00837f44)

DoubleFire_ICS:
Cmp [Esp], 00837EA5
Jne 0089365D
Mov [Esp], DoubleFire_1
Jmp 0089365D

DoubleFire_1:
DB   85 c0                              //00837EA5 - test eax,eax
je Dark00837eca                         //00837EA7 - je 00837eca
DB   83 a5 60 f3 ff ff 00               //00837EA9 - and dword ptr [ebp-00000ca0],00
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //00837EB0 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 8d 0c fe ff ff                  //00837EB4 - lea ecx,[ebp-000001f4]
call 00820b1f                           //00837EBA - call 00820b1f
DB   8b 85 60 f3 ff ff                  //00837EBF - mov eax,[ebp-00000ca0]
jmp 0083b8f2                            //00837EC5 - jmp 0083b8f2
Dark00837eca:
DB   81 bd 08 fe ff ff a9 12 16 02      //00837ECA - cmp [ebp-000001f8],021612a9
je Dark00837f44                         //00837ED4 - je 00837f44
DB   81 bd 08 fe ff ff 51 99 17 02      //00837ED6 - cmp [ebp-000001f8],02179951
je Dark00837f44                         //00837EE0 - je 00837f44
DB   ff b5 08 fe ff ff                  //00837EE2 - push [ebp-000001f8]
call 006433a9                           //00837EE8 - call 006433a9
DB   59                                 //00837EED - pop ecx
DB   85 c0                              //00837EEE - test eax,eax
je Dark00837f44                         //00837EF0 - je 00837f44
DB   8d 85 d4 f4 ff ff                  //00837EF2 - lea eax,[ebp-00000b2c]
DB   50                                 //00837EF8 - push eax
DB   8d 85 08 fe ff ff                  //00837EF9 - lea eax,[ebp-000001f8]
DB   50                                 //00837EFF - push eax
DB   8b 8d 9c ea ff ff                  //00837F00 - mov ecx,[ebp-00001564]
DB   81 c1 ec 55 00 00                  //00837F06 - add ecx,000055ec
call 0045fc39                           //00837F0C - call 0045fc39
DB   85 c0                              //00837F11 - test eax,eax
je Dark00837f44                         //00837F13 - je 00837f44
DB   8b 85 b8 fe ff ff                  //00837F15 - mov eax,[ebp-00000148]
DB   3b 85 d4 f4 ff ff                  //00837F1B - cmp eax,[ebp-00000b2c]
jnl Dark00837f44                        //00837F21 - jnl 00837f44
DB   83 a5 5c f3 ff ff 00               //00837F23 - and dword ptr [ebp-00000ca4],00
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //00837F2A - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 8d 0c fe ff ff                  //00837F2E - lea ecx,[ebp-000001f4]
call 00820b1f                           //00837F34 - call 00820b1f
DB   8b 85 5c f3 ff ff                  //00837F39 - mov eax,[ebp-00000ca4]
jmp 0083b8f2                            //00837F3F - jmp 0083b8f2
Dark00837f44:
DB   83 7d 08 00                        //00837F44 - cmp dword ptr [ebp+08],00
Jne DoubleFire_2
DB   8b 8d 9c ea ff ff                  //00837F4E - mov ecx,[ebp-00001564]
DB   81 c1 90 00 00 00                  //00837F54 - add ecx,00000090
call 0042023e                           //00837F5A - call 0042023e
DB   85 c0                              //00837F5F - test eax,eax
Je DoubleFire_2
DB   ff b5 dc fd ff ff                  //00837F67 - push [ebp-00000224]
DB   ff b5 e0 fd ff ff                  //00837F6D - push [ebp-00000220]
call 00644ce2                           //00837F73 - call 00644ce2
DB   59                                 //00837F78 - pop ecx
DB   59                                 //00837F79 - pop ecx
DB   85 c0                              //00837F7A - test eax,eax
Jne DoubleFire_2
Jmp 00837F7E

DoubleFire_2:
DB   ff 75 c4                           //00837FEB - push [ebp-3c]
DB   ff 75 0c                           //00837FEE - push [ebp+0c]
DB   ff 75 08                           //00837FF1 - push [ebp+08]
DB   ff b5 e0 fd ff ff                  //00837FF4 - push [ebp-00000220]
DB   8b 85 9c ea ff ff                  //00837FFA - mov eax,[ebp-00001564]
DB   ff b0 d8 03 00 00                  //838000 - push [eax+000003d8]
call 00665eba                           //838006 - call 00665eba
DB   83 c4 14                           //0083800B - add esp,14
DB   89 45 c8                           //0083800E - mov [ebp-38],eax
DB   83 7d c8 00                        //838011 - cmp dword ptr [ebp-38],00
Jnl DoubleFire_3
Jmp 00838017


DoubleFire_3:
DB   8b 8d dc fd ff ff                  //838084 - mov ecx,[ebp-00000224]
call 006755e0                           //0083808A - call 006755e0
DB   f7 d8                              //0083808F - neg eax
DB   1b c0                              //838091 - sbb eax,eax
DB   f7 d8                              //838093 - neg eax
DB   89 85 bc fe ff ff                  //838095 - mov [ebp-00000144],eax
DB   8b 8d dc fd ff ff                  //0083809B - mov ecx,[ebp-00000224]
//call 00675cd9                           //008380A1 - call 00675cd9
DB   f7 d8                              //008380A6 - neg eax
DB   1b c0                              //008380A8 - sbb eax,eax
DB   f7 d8                              //008380AA - neg eax
DB   89 85 fc fd ff ff                  //008380AC - mov [ebp-00000204],eax
DB   8b 8d dc fd ff ff                  //008380B2 - mov ecx,[ebp-00000224]
Xor eax,eax
Inc eax
Jmp 008380B8

00B30FD8:
DD DoubleFire_ICS
[disable]
00B30FD8:
DD 0089365D

DeAlloc(DoubleFire_ICS)
DeAlloc(DoubleFire_1)
DeAlloc(DoubleFire_2)
DeAlloc(DoubleFire_3)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_Kami滑鼠飛行.txt`:

```txt


/*
[Release] v.99.01 SS Mouse Fly CE script
[ENABLE]
alloc(SSFlyVac,128)
label(SSFlyRet)

009FD306:
jmp SSFlyVac
db 90
SSFlyRet:

SSFlyVac:
pushad
mov eax,[00DC7CB8] // Mouse Pointer
mov eax,[eax+978] // Mouse Location
mov eax,[eax+8C] // Mouse X
mov ecx,[00DC7CB8] // Mouse Pointer
mov ecx,[ecx+978] // Mouse Location
mov ecx,[ecx+88] // Mouse Y
mov ebx,[00DC775C] // Character Base
mov [ebx+43D8],eax // Tele X
mov [ebx+43DC],ecx // Tele Y
mov [ebx+43D0],01 // Teleport Toggle
popad
jmp SSFlyRet

[DISABLE]
009FD306:
db 0F 84 5C 01 00 00

dealloc(SSFlyVac) 
*/

//TwMS v140.1 滑鼠飛行SS
[ENABLE]
alloc(SSFlyVac,128)
label(SSFlyRet)

0086B26D:
jmp SSFlyVac
db 90
SSFlyRet:

SSFlyVac:
pushad
mov eax,[00cc2794] // Mouse Pointer
mov eax,[eax+978] // Mouse Location
mov eax,[eax+8C] // Mouse X
mov ecx,[00cc2794] // Mouse Pointer
mov ecx,[ecx+978] // Mouse Location
mov ecx,[ecx+88] // Mouse Y
mov ebx,[00cbdcd0] // Character Base
mov [ebx+4D48],eax // Tele X
mov [ebx+4D4C],ecx // Tele Y
mov [ebx+4D40],01 // Teleport Toggle
popad
jmp SSFlyRet

[DISABLE]
0086B26D:
db 0f 84 87 01 00 00
dealloc(SSFlyVac)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_MSCRCBYPASS.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(Hook, 256)
Alloc(FakeDump, 10047488)
Alloc(MyCopyMemory, 128)
CreateThread(MyCopyMemory)

MyCopyMemory:
    mov     edi, FakeDump	//目標
    mov     esi, 00401000	//來源
    mov     ecx, 00265400	//長度 / 4
    repe    movsd
    ret

Hook:
//    Label(HSCRCBypass)
//    Label(BackToOP)
    Label(MSCRCBypass)
    Label(BackToMS)
    Label(MSCRCCrack)
    Label(BackToCrack)

/*
HSCRCBypass:
    Mov  Eax, Fs:[20]
    Cmp  Eax, [Esp+0C]
    Jne  BackToOP
    Mov  Fs:[34], 57
    Xor  Eax, Eax
    Ret  000C

BackToOP:
    Push Ebp
    Mov  Ebp, Esp
    Jmp  OpenProcess+5
*/
MSCRCBypass:
    Push Esi
    Cmp  Esi, 00401000
    Jnge BackToMS
    Cmp  Esi, 00CD8000
    Jg   BackToMS
    Sub  Esi, 00401000
    Add  Esi, FakeDump	//Dump
    Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+18]
    Mov  Ecx, [Ecx]
    Xor  Ecx, Edx

BackToMS:
    And  Ecx, 000000FF
    Pop  Esi
    Jmp  0095EA19

MSCRCCrack:
    Cmp  Edx, 0095EA11
    Jnge BackToCrack
    Cmp  Edx, 0095EA19
    Jg   BackToCrack
    Sub  Edx, 00401000
    Push Ebx
    Add  Edx, FakeDump	//Dump
    Pop  Ebx
    Add  Esp, 4
    Push [Edx]

BackToCrack:
    Jmp 00D9F825

OpenProcess:
    Jmp    HSCRCBypass
0095EA13:    //33 ca 81 e1 ff 00 00 00
    Jmp    MSCRCBypass
    Nop
00DA9AF5:    //e9 ?? ?? ff ff 01 de 81 c6
    Jmp    MSCRCCrack
004F1EF5:    //e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 51 51 8b cc
    Nop
    Nop
    Nop
    Nop
    Nop
[Disable]
```

```txt
004302BA - 56                         - push esi
004302BB - 57                         - push edi
004302BC - 8b 7c 24 0c                - mov edi,[esp+0c]
004302C0 - ff 37                      - push [edi]
004302C2 - 8b f1                      - mov esi,ecx
004302C4 - 8d 4e 0c                   - lea ecx,[esi+0c]
004302C7 - e8 48 5b ff ff             - call 00425e14
004302CC - ff 77 04                   - push [edi+04]
004302CF - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
004302D1 - e8 3e 5b ff ff             - call 00425e14
004302D6 - 5f                         - pop edi
004302D7 - 8b c6                      - mov eax,esi
004302D9 - 5e                         - pop esi
004302DD - 6a 04                      - push 04




[ENABLE]
alloc(SetXY,128)
//-------------SS全圖---------------------
005D06CE:
call SetXY
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00cbdcd0]
push [edi+3e74]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 00425E14
push [edi+3e78]
mov ecx,esi
call  00425E14 //00425E14 - 55  - push ebp
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 0004

//-----------------------------------------
[DISABLE]

call 004302ba
```

```txt
//人物吸物  Twms140
//更新:裕兒
[Enable]

Label(UseRet)

004D3A7C:
   Db 90 90
004D47C1:
   Db EB 18
008B378D:
   Db EB 0A
004D47AB:
   Jmp GetPlz
   GetRet:
008EEFCA:
  Jmp UsePlz
  UseRet:

GetPlz:
Call   00430680
Mov    Ecx, [Eax]
Mov    [iXY], Ecx
Mov    Ecx, [Eax+04]
Mov    [iXY+04], Ecx
Jmp    GetRet

UsePlz:

Mov    Edi, iXY
Jmp    UseRet+3
```

```txt
//140.重炮手 三轉技能加農砲控制點 by.aaaddress1
alloc(SetSkill,128)
00855ED0:
jmp SetSkill
SetSkill:
mov ecx,[ebp-000015B8]
add ecx,00000090
mov eax,[ecx+0000033C]
mov [ebp-000015DC],0A
push [ebp+0C]
mov ecx,[ebp+08]
call 0066FD45
mov ecx,eax
call 0052DB1F
mov eax,6 //打怪數量
mov [ebp-000015DC],eax
mov [ebp-000001C0],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-0000022C]
push [ecx+00000F90]
add ecx,0f88
push ecx
call 00404E51
pop ecx
jmp 00855F8B
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_怪物數量低於N無法攻擊.txt`:

```txt
// Twms V140.1
// 怪物數量低於N無法攻擊
// 更新：Inndy
[enable]
Alloc(StopAttack, 256)
Label(ReturnAttack)
RegisterSymbol(StopCount)
Alloc(StopCount, 4)

StopCount:
dd 1 //怪物數量

StopAttack:
push eax
mov eax,[00cc225c]
mov eax,[eax+24]
cmp eax,[StopCount]
pop eax
jle 0047d338
jmp ReturnAttack

ReturnAttack:
cmp dword ptr [esi+000020a4],00
jmp 0047D301

0047D2FA: // 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 00 75 ? 83 7C 24 ?? 00 75
jmp StopAttack
nop
nop
[disable]
0047D2FA:
db 83 be a4 20 00 00 00

DeAlloc(StopAttack)
DeAlloc(StopCount)
UnRegisterSymbol(StopCount)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_抓取封包.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(PacketFix)
Alloc(PacketFix, 512)
Registersymbol(store)//封包資料
alloc(store,256)
Registersymbol(data)//封包Byte - 主要
alloc(data,512)
Registersymbol(length)
alloc(length,4)
Label(normal)
Label(cycle)
Label(cycle2)
Label(cycle3)

004861A1: //6A 38 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 05 ?? ?? ?? 00
jmp PacketFix
nop
nop

PacketFix:
cmp [esp],00500000 //抓ADDRESS 起始點  //使用這個在得把Jl  jg前面//拿掉
jl normal
cmp [esp],00560000 //抓ADDRESS 終點
jg normal

//push eax    //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//mov eax,[esp+8]   //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//cmp byte ptr[eax+8],7//抓任意位置封包 但限制byte數  //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//pop eax    //要用JL JG 請把這刪了
//jne normal //要用JL JG 請把這刪了

mov eax,[esp+4]
mov eax,[eax+8]
mov [length],eax

push eax
push ecx
push esi
mov esi,[esp+10]
mov ecx,80

cycle:
mov eax,[esi+ecx]
mov [store+ecx],eax
sub ecx,4
cmp ecx,0
jge cycle
mov esi,[esp+10]
mov esi,[esi+4]
mov ecx,[length]
dec ecx

cycle2:
mov al,byte ptr[esi+ecx]
mov byte ptr[data+ecx],al
dec ecx
cmp ecx,0
jge cycle2
mov ecx,[length]
cycle3:
inc ecx
mov byte ptr[data+ecx],0
cmp byte ptr[data+ecx+1],0
jne cycle3
pop esi
pop ecx
pop eax
normal:
db 6a 38
mov eax,009724F3 //6A ? 6A ? 8D ? ? ? ? ? 50 E8 ? ? ? ? C3 8D ? ? E9 ? ? ? ? 8D ? ? E9 ? ? ? ? 8D ? ? E9 ? ? ? ? 8D ? ? E9 ? ? ? ? 8D
jmp 004861A8

[disable]
004861A1:
db 6a 38 B8 A0 32 97 00

Unregistersymbol(PacketFix)
Dealloc(PacketFix)
UnRegistersymbol(store)
dealloc(store)
unRegistersymbol(data)
dealloc(data)
unRegistersymbol(length)
dealloc(length)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_控制走怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(WalkingHook, 64)
Alloc(WalkingSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(WalkingSwitch)

WalkingHook:
Cmp  [WalkingSwitch], 1	// Right
Je   008B9579			//6A 01 EB ?? DB 86 ?? 00 00 00 DC 5E
Cmp  [WalkingSwitch], 2	// Left
Je   008B958D			//6A FF EB ?? 8B 8E ?? ?? 00 00
Cmp  [WalkingSwitch], 3	// Stop
Je   008B90B3

Test Eax, Eax
Jg   008B925A
Jmp  008B90B3

008B90AD: //0F 8F ? ? 00 00 83 BE ? ? 00 00 00 0F 84
Jmp  WalkingHook
Nop
[Disable]
008B90AD:
db 0F 8F A7 01 00 00

Dealloc(WalkingHook, 64)
Dealloc(WalkingSwitch, 4)
UnregisterSymbol(WalkingSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_攻擊不停.txt`:

```txt
/*
// Unlimited Attack
// Updated by Ozko
// gMS v99.1
[Enable]
009C81A0:
db EB

[Disable]
009C81A0: // 7E ? 83 ? ? 7D ? 8B
db 7E
*/
//TwMS v140.1 無限攻擊(攻擊不停)
[Enable]
0083BF68:
db EB

[Disable]
0083BF68: // 7E ? 83 ? ? 7D ? 8B
db 7E
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
//00cca624	5C or 58 or 54
[ENABLE]
Alloc(GodTime, 4)
Alloc(HitTime, 4)
Alloc(OhMyGod, 128)
Label(Invisible)

GodTime:
DD 7530 //30 Sec.

OhMyGod:
Call    004263A1
Push    Ecx
Mov     Ecx, Dword Ptr [00CC2798]
Mov     Ecx, Dword Ptr [Ecx+0000001C]
Cmp     Ecx, [HitTime]
Jl      Invisible
Mov     Eax, Dword Ptr [Ebi+0000047C]
And     Eax, FFFFFFFE
Add     Ecx, [GodTime]
Mov     [HitTime], Ecx
Pop     Eax
Jmp     0085F34E
Invisible:
Pop     Ecx
Jmp     008611A2

0085F338:
Jmp     OhMyGod
[DISABLE]
0085F338:
Call    004263A1

DeAlloc(OhMyGod)
DeAlloc(GodTime)
DeAlloc(HitTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_無限重機槍.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 無限重機槍(支援導彈罐模式)、解除角色移動等限制

[enable]
alloc(Limit,64)
label(NoLimit)
label(Normal)

Limit:
cmp [esp+08],0086AAD9 // 攻擊判斷 - 85 c0 0f 84 ? ? ? ? 8b 86 ? ? ? ? 2d 5c c0 17 02
je Normal

cmp eax,0217c05c // 重機槍
je NoLimit
cmp eax,0217E775 // 重機槍 (導彈罐模式)
je NoLimit

Normal:
call 0064f96c
jmp 0083E38E

NoLimit:
xor eax,eax
jmp 0083E38E

0083E389: // 解除角色移動等限制
jmp Limit

008751B3: // 無限重機槍
jmp 00875212 

00875036: // 無限重機槍 (導彈罐模式)
jmp 00875212
nop


[disable]
0083E389: // e8 ? ? ? ? 59 85 c0 75 ? 8b ce e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 74 ?
call 0064f96c

008751B3: // 8b 45 ? 2b 86 ? ? 00 00 3d 88 13 00 00 7c ?
jnge 00875212

00875036: // 8b 45 ? 2b 86 ? ? 00 00 3d 88 13 00 00 0f 8c ? ? ? ?
jl 00875212

dealloc(Limit)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_笨怪控制.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 StupidMob & SetAggro
// 出處: ccplz
// 修改: 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(AutoAggro,128)
alloc(Switch,4)
label(StupidMob)
label(SetAggro)

Switch: // 0: 超級笨怪 1: 強制怪物跟隨、魔攻 (遇人失效)
DD 0

AutoAggro:
call 008b5040

cmp [Switch],0
je StupidMob
cmp [Switch],1
je SetAggro
jmp 008BC229

//-------- StupidMob ---------
StupidMob:
mov [esi+000002a8],0
jmp 008BC229

//--------- SetAggro ---------
SetAggro:
push edx
mov edx,[00cbdcd0]
add edx,4
mov [esi+000002a8],edx // 83 a6 ? ? 00 00 00 5e 5d c2 1c 00
pop edx
jmp 008BC229

008BC224:
jmp AutoAggro

[disable]
008BC224: // e8 ? ? ? ? 3b c7 75 ? 33 c0 eb ? 83 be ? ? ? ? 06
call 008b5040

dealloc(AutoAggro)
dealloc(Switch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_簡化版集氣無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Label(AttackTimes)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],1
jle 0085E671
call 009416f0
cmp [AttackTimes],2
jg Refresh
jmp 0085E671
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0
jmp 0085E671
//------------------------------------------------------------------
AttackTimes:
DD 0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085E66C://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 04 00
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085E13C://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
0085E66C:
call 009416f0
dealloc(Nodelay)

0085E13C:
call 0088f5fd
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_角色欄位擴充.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 免費角色欄位擴充
// 原創: 冷羽楓痕
// 使用說明: 把數據寫入後，使用任意補品即可擴充目前伺服器角色欄位1個
// 注意: 麻煩數據別流出去，否則引起橘子注意可能會鎖

[enable]
008F8C2F:
push 7c

008F8C40:
mov [ebp+0c],0023DBB1
db 90 90 90 90 90 90 90

[disable]
008F8C2F:

008F8C40:

lea ecx,[ebp-28]
call 004126c1
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_讀取血魔.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS140 CRC 讀取血魔
//出處:s18leoare (至少我拿到的來源)
//更新:Inndy
//改寫:Inndy
//00B53F10->007BC15D

[ENABLE]
Alloc(GetHPMP, 128)
Label(GetMaxMP)
Label(GetNowMP)
Label(GetMaxHP)
Label(GetNowHP)
Alloc(MaxMP, 4)
Alloc(NowMP, 4)
Alloc(MaxHP, 4)
Alloc(NowHP, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MaxMP)
RegisterSymbol(NowMP)
RegisterSymbol(MaxHP)
RegisterSymbol(NowHP)

GetHPMP:
Call 00942143
Pop Ebp
Cmp [Esp], 007BD88A //ff 76 ?? 8b d8 8d 46 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff ff b7
je GetMaxMP
Cmp [Esp], 007BD898 //ff b7 ?? ?? 00 00 81 c7 ?? ?? 00 00 57 89 45 ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 76 ?? 8b f8
je GetNowMP
Cmp [Esp], 007BD8AD //ff 76 ?? 8b f8 8d 46 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 83 c4 20 ff 75
je GetMaxHP
Cmp [Esp], 007BD8BB //83 c4 20 ff 75 ?? 8b ce
je GetNowHP
Ret

GetMaxMP:
Mov [MaxMP], Eax
Ret

GetNowMP:
Mov [NowMP], Eax
Ret

GetMaxHP:
Mov [MaxHP], Eax
Ret

GetNowHP:
Mov [NowHP], Eax
Ret

00404E83:	//e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 5d c3 8b 44 24 04 85 c0
Jmp GetHPMP
[DISABLE]
00404E83:
Call 00942143

DeAlloc(GetHPMP)
DeAlloc(MaxMP)
DeAlloc(NowMP)
DeAlloc(MaxHP)
DeAlloc(NowHP)
UnRegisterSymbol(MaxMP)
UnRegisterSymbol(NowMP)
UnRegisterSymbol(MaxHP)
UnRegisterSymbol(NowHP)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_退怪模式.txt`:

```txt
//退怪模式 TWMS138
//原創 max大大
//更新:冰Smith
//Address:005C6354
//AAttackDir:0怪不動 1怪退正常 2怪退遠 3怪反退到底 A怪退到底
//EIP:AABack
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AABack)
registersymbol(AABackOnOff)
registersymbol(AAttackDir)
alloc(AABack, 128)
alloc(AABackOnOff, 4)
alloc(AAttackDir, 4)
label(doAABackNormal)

AABack:
call 005bc298
cmp [AABackOnOff],0
jz doAABackNormal
push eax
mov eAx,[AAttackDir]
mov [ebp+28],Eax
//005CEA33 - 57                         - push edi	//Ebp+28?
pop eax

doAABackNormal:
test Eax, Eax
jmp 005C635B //add下一

AABackOnOff:
dd 1  // {0: 關閉 | 1: 開啟 }

AAttackDir:
dd 0 //遠攻者可改2
    // 0: 怪不動
    // 1: 怪退後一點點 (正常值)
    // 2: 怪退後很多點
    // 3: 怪反方向退到底
    // A: 怪退到底

005CE97C:
JMP AABack

[DISABLE]
005CE97C:
call 005bc298

dealloc(AABack)
dealloc(AABackOnOff)
dealloc(AAttackDir)
unregistersymbol(AABack)
unregistersymbol(AABackOnOff)
unregistersymbol(AAttackDir)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_CRC_集氣加速打.txt`:

```txt
//集氣加速打  TWMS V140
[enable]
Registersymbol(Nodelay)
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Registersymbol(AttackTimes)
Alloc(AttackTimes, 4)
Registersymbol(cszp)
Alloc(cszp,128)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],2 //此值與下列值互減得到的等於正常次數
jle 0085E66C+5
call 009416f0
cmp [AttackTimes],4 //此值至少要比上面的大1
jg Refresh
jmp 0085E66C+5
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0 //無延遲間格
jmp 0085E66C+5
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085E66C://無延遲
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085E13C:
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
0085E66C://無延遲
call 009416f0

0085E13C://瞬間集氣
call 0088f5fd

Unregistersymbol(Nodelay)
dealloc(Nodelay)
Unregistersymbol(AttackTimes)
dealloc(AttackTimes)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_Call_換頻.txt`:

```txt
void ChangeChannel(long Channel)
{
    DWORD ChangeChannel_Call = 0x004EBDD7;
    __asm
    {
        Pushad
        Push 0
        Push [Channel]
        Call dword ptr [ChangeChannel_Call]
        Popad
    }
}
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_人物全圖吸物.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 ICS 人物全圖吸物
// 原創: Cam1596
// 出處: w8baby (GMS V0.98.1 Item Vac Script)
// ICS : 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(ItemVac,64)
label(SetItemXY)

00CCA77C:
dd ItemVac

ItemVac:
cmp [esp],004D47BF    // 85 c0 75 ? 83 4d fc ? 8d 4d ? e8 ? ? ? ? 83 7d ? 00 0f 85 ? ? ? ?
je SetItemXY
cmp [esp],004D3A7A    // 85 c0 74 ? 39 5d ? 75 ? eb ?
jne PtInRect
mov [esp],004D3A7E    // "004D3A7A+04" - 不斷線
jmp PtInRect

SetItemXY:
push eax
mov eax,[esp+0c]      // [esp+0c]: 地上物品X
mov [edi],eax         // [edi+00]: 封包物品X (人物X)
mov eax,[esp+10]      // [esp+10]: 地上物品Y
mov [edi+04],eax      // [edi+04]: 封包物品Y (人物Y)
pop eax
mov [esp],004D47DB    // 004D47BF+02 jne "004d47db" - 可撿物
jmp PtInRect

[disable]
00CCA77C:
dd PtInRect

dealloc(ItemVac)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_人物左右走(掛機模式).txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
alloc(MyAutoLR,1024)
alloc(MyAutoLRKey,4)
alloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR,4)
alloc(tick,4)
alloc(delay,4)
alloc(nextGo,4)
registersymbol(step)
alloc(step,4)
label(MyAutoLR00)
label(MyAutoLR01)
label(MyAutoLR02)
label(test1)
label(test2)
label(SetLR)
label(back)
label(Set01)
label(Set02)
//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLRKey:
DD 1
MyAutoLRKeyLR:
DD 0
step:
DD 0
delay:
DD 1388
//-----------------------------------------------
MyAutoLR:
Cmp   [Esp], 008C127E
Jne   GetFocus
Add   Esp, 4
cmp [step],0
je 008C127E
cmp [step],2
jle back
push eax
call 00890D49
sub eax,[delay]
cmp eax,[nextGo]
pop eax
jbe  MyAutoLR00
push eax
call 00890D49
add eax,[delay]
mov [nextGo],eax
pop eax
jmp  SetLR

SetLR:

cmp [step],3
je Set02
cmp [step],4
je Set01
Set01:
mov [step],1
jmp back
Set02:
mov [step],2
jmp back
back:
cmp [step],1
je test1
cmp [step],2
je test2
jmp MyAutoLR00

test1:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],12//左右移動距離
jle MyAutoLR01
mov [step],3
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],0
jmp MyAutoLR02
test2:
add [MyAutoLRKeyLR],1
cmp [MyAutoLRKeyLR],12//左右移動距離
jle MyAutoLR02
mov [step],4
mov [MyAutoLRKeyLR],0
jmp MyAutoLR01
MyAutoLR01:
Mov   [Ebp-08], FFFFFFFF
Jmp   008bfdb5
MyAutoLR02:
Mov   [Ebp-08], 00000001
Jmp   008bfdb5
MyAutoLR00:
Jmp   008bfdb5

00CCA7D8:
DD MyAutoLR

step:
dd 1
[DISABLE]
00CCA7D8:
DD GetFocus

dealloc(MyAutoLR)
dealloc(MyAutoLRKey)
dealloc(MyAutoLRKeyLR)
dealloc(tick)
dealloc(delay)
dealloc(nextGo)
unregistersymbol(step)
dealloc(step,4)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	AutoLR
// Version:	TWMS140
// Update:	Inndy
// Address：	008BFB2C
// EIP：	AutoLRMain
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 3b c7 0f 85
// Cortrol：	AutoLRRange
// 0: Off, Else:Range
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008BFB32
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008BFB32
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-08], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008bfdb5

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-08], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008bfdb5
//-----------------------------------------------
00CCA7D8:
DD AutoLRICSEntry

//以下註解取消為CRC數據
/*
008BFB2C:
Nop
Nop
Call   AutoLRICSEntry
*/
[DISABLE]
00CCA7D8:
DD GetFocus

008BFB2C:
db ff 15 d8 a7 cc 00

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_地雷狂掉.txt`:

```txt
//00840966 - 74 7b                      - je 008409e3 //Nop掉，地雷狂掉
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FastBomb_ICS, 32)
Alloc(FastBomb_Main, 64)

FastBomb_ICS:
Cmp [Esp], 0084091D	//85 c0 74 02 33 db 33 ff
Jne 008B33F9		//d9 ee dc 51 ?? df e0
Mov [Esp], FastBomb_Main
Jmp 008B33F9

FastBomb_Main:
DB   85 c0                              //0084091D - test eax,eax
DB   74 02                              //0084091F - je 00840923
DB   33 db                              //00840921 - xor ebx,ebx
DB   33 ff                              //00840923 - xor edi,edi
DB   39 be 3c 5c 00 00                  //00840925 - cmp [esi+00005c3c],edi
DB   75 1a                              //0084092B - jne 00840947
DB   3b df                              //0084092D - cmp ebx,edi
DB   74 16                              //0084092F - je 00840947
call 0088f5fd                           //00840931 - call 0088f5fd
DB   2d e8 03 00 00                     //00840936 - sub eax,000003e8
DB   89 86 38 5c 00 00                  //0084093B - mov [esi+00005c38],eax
DB   89 9e 3c 5c 00 00                  //00840941 - mov [esi+00005c3c],ebx
DB   3b 9e 3c 5c 00 00                  //00840947 - cmp ebx,[esi+00005c3c]
DB   74 11                              //0084094D - je 00840960
call 0088f5fd                           //0084094F - call 0088f5fd
DB   89 86 38 5c 00 00                  //00840954 - mov [esi+00005c38],eax
DB   89 9e 3c 5c 00 00                  //0084095A - mov [esi+00005c3c],ebx
DB   39 be 3c 5c 00 00                  //00840960 - cmp [esi+00005c3c],edi

Jmp 00840968

????????:
DD FastBomb_ICS 
[DISABLE]
????????:
DD 008B33F9

DeAlloc(FastBomb_ICS)
DeAlloc(FastBomb_Main)

/*
以下其中一個是ICS點，因為全部指向同一位址，我懶得找
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_完全無敵.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	Full God
// Version:	TWMS140
// Update:	Inndy
// Address：	005D18E3
// EIP：	FullGodICS
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c0 74 0e
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
alloc(FullGodICS,64)

FullGodICS:
Cmp  [Esp],005D18E9
Jne  IsRectEmpty
Add  Esp,4
Call IsRectEmpty
Test eax,eax
Jmp  005D18ED

00CCA7A4:
dd FullGodICS

//以下註解取消為CRC數據
/*
005D18E3:
Nop
Nop
Call FullGodICS
*/
[Disable]
00CCA7A4:
dd IsRectEmpty

005D18E3:
db ff 15 a4 a7 cc 00

dealloc(FullGodICS)
```

```txt
dd 0

dd 0

dd 4e20

dd 0

dd 4    //3為跟隨 , 1向左走 , 2向右走 ， 4 定點
//==========

dd 0
xMobPX:
dd 0
xMobPY:

Red_Stop:

//==========
xuHook:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+8c], 005C1F51 // 005a459c  //定點生怪 8B F8 8D 8E ?? ?? ?? ?? 57 E8 ?? ?? ?? ??
    je Hook09
    //cmp dword ptr [esp+40], 005C88AC // 005aa741  //慢速控怪半套 23 7D ?? 83 FF FF 75 ?? 8B CE
    //je Hook10
    //cmp dword ptr [esp+64], 4CF1FF // 004c5838  //物品過濾 8B 45 ?? 8B 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 F8 01
    //je Hook06
    //cmp dword ptr [esp+48], 007CC139 // 0077895a  //顯示裝備潛藏能力(失效了!!) 3B C6 0F 84 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 07 8B CF
    //je Hook08
    cmp [Red_Stop],0  //遇紅點下列功能暫停
    jg 0069C0A8
    //=====
    cmp dword ptr [esp+34], 005DC13B // 005D467E // 005b5a2c  //怪物瞬移 8B 5D ?? E9 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 7E ?? 8A 07
    je Hook04
    cmp dword ptr [esp+34], 005C6CE7 // 005a8f25  //怪不擊退 83 7D ?? ?? 75 ?? 8B CF E8 ?? ?? ?? ??
    je Hook05
    cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 0089C371 // 00839fac  //笨怪 33 D2 B9 60 EA 00 00 F7 F1
    je Hook07
    cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 0086F1F3 // 00841577 // 007e3488  //完全無敵 8B 4D ?? FF 45 ?? 83 7D ?? ??
    je Hook02
    cmp [God_k],2  //等於2則執行損血人物不退後
    jne 0069C0A8
    cmp dword ptr [esp+1c], 0086001E // 0084204E // 007e3d75  //人物不退後 6A 64 33 D2 59 F7 F1 89 55 ?? E8
    je Hook01
    jmp 0069C0A8

Hook01:
    mov [esp+1c],Dull01
    jmp 0069C0A8

Hook02:
    mov [esp+1c],Dull02
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook04:
    mov [esp+34],Dull04
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook05:
    mov [esp+34],Dull05
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook06:
    mov [esp+64],HookItem
    jmp 0069C0A8

    mov [esp+1c],Dull07
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook08:
    mov [esp+48],Dull08
    jmp 0069C0A8
Hook09:
    mov [esp+8c], Dull09
    jmp 0069C0A8

Hook10:
    mov [esp+40], Dull10
    jmp 0069C0A8

//==================
Dull09:
db 8b f8                      //- mov edi,eax
db 8d 8e 0C 01 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+0000010c]
db 57                         //- push edi
call 005b8dca
db ff 75 7c                  //- push [ebp+7c]
db 8b ce                     //- mov ecx,esi
call 005b403b
db 8b c8                       //- mov ecx,eax
call 005b46e4
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8d 46 04                  //- lea eax,[esi+04]
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b cf                      //- mov ecx,edi
call 0089af7b
db 8d 8e d0 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005d0]
call 00423250
db 8d 8e dc 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005dc]
db 89 45 6c                  //- mov [ebp+6c],eax
call 00423250
db ff 75 68                  //- push [ebp+68]
db 89 45 54                  //- mov [ebp+54],eax
db 83 c7 10                  //- add edi,10
db 8b 07                      //- mov eax,[edi]
db 8b ce                      //- mov ecx,esi
db 89 45 60                  //- mov [ebp+60],eax
call 005b49f4
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b 45 60                  //- mov eax,[ebp+60]
db 53                        //- push ebx
db 53                        //- push ebx
db ff 75 6c                  //- push [ebp+6c]
db 8b cf                     //- mov ecx,edi
db ff 75 54                  //- push [ebp+54]
db 53                        //- push ebx
cmp dword ptr [eax+7C],0089C0FE // 55 8B EC 53 8B 5D ?? 56 57
//55 8b ec 53 8b 5d
je Dull091
call dword ptr [eax+7C]
//005C1FB9 - ff 50 7c                   - call dword ptr [eax+7c]
jmp 005C1FBC

Dull091:  //008A12F2 55 8B EC 53 8B 5D ?? 56 57
    call Dull092
    jmp 005C1FBC  //00582dfc
Dull092:
    cmp [Red_Stop],0
    jg Dull093
    //cmp [00bc1014],0
    //je Dull093
    cmp  [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull0921
    pushad
    mov eax,[00c8efe0]
    mov ebx,[eax+b18]
    mov [xMobPX],ebx
    mov ebx,[eax+b1c]
    mov [xMobPY],ebx
    popad
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    jmp Dull093
Dull0921:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
    jne Dull093
    push ecx
    mov ecx,[xMobPX]
    mov [esp+0c],ecx
    mov eax,[xMobPY]
    mov [esp+10],eax
    push eax
    mov ecx,[00c8e730]  //
    call Dull0922
    mov ecx,eax
    mov [esp+20],ecx
    pop ecx

Dull093:
    jmp 0089C0FE
Dull0922: //0042D006 6A 14 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 33 F6
    push 14
    mov eax,009471b9
    call 00923a89
    xor esi,esi
    mov [ebp-10],esi
    mov [ebp-14],esi
    mov [ebp-04],esi
    cmp [ebp+08],esi
    je 0042d03e
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    push eax
    lea eax,[ebp+08]
    push eax
    add ecx,00000088
    call 0042c665
    test eax,eax
    je Dull09221 
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    jmp Dull09222
Dull09221:
    mov [ebp-1c],esi
    lea eax,[ebp-20]
    mov [ebp-10],00000001
Dull09222:
    test byte ptr [ebp-10],01
    mov esi,[eax+04]
    je Dull09223 
    lea ecx,[ebp-20]
    //call 004b0c0f
    call Dull09224
Dull09223:
    or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
    lea ecx,[ebp-18]
    //call 004b0c0f
    call Dull09224
    jmp 0042D068
Dull09224:  //0042C5BA
    push esi
    mov esi,ecx
    cmp dword ptr [esi+04],00
    je Dull09225
    push 00
    call 0042bc79  //004b0657
    and dword ptr [esi+04],00
Dull09225:
    pop esi
    ret
//==========控怪有變
Dull10:
    pushad
    mov ebx,[esi+110]
    cmp ebx,0
    je Dull11XR
    sub ebx,c
    cmp ebx,0
    je Dull11XR
    cmp [ebx+298],1
    je Dull11X
    cmp [ebx+298],3
    je Dull11X
    jmp Dull11XR

Dull11X:
    mov ecx,[00bb6c28]
    mov ecx,[ecx+18]
    //mov [Red_Stop],ecx
    cmp [Red_Stop],0  //紅點
    jg Dull11XR
    //cmp [00bc1014],0  //控怪生怪開關
    //je Dull11X1
    cmp [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull11X1
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    mov ecx,[00bb72a8]
    mov edx,[ecx+b18]
    mov [xMobPX],edx
    mov edx,[ecx+b1c]
    mov [xMobPY],edx
Dull11X1:
    call gwgs
    //mov [ebx+f8],ffffffff
    jmp Dull11XR

Dull11XR:
    popad
    jmp 005C88AF
//================
gwgs:
//cmp [00bc1014],0
//je gwxret1
cmp [ebx+00000298],1  //走怪
je zouguai
cmp [ebx+00000298],3  //跳怪
je zouguai
ret

zouguai:
cmp [zgkg],1
je gwxz
cmp [zgkg],2
je gwxy
cmp [zgkg],3
je gwxzj
cmp [zgkg],4
je gwxzk
cmp [zgkg],5
je gwxzl
gwxret:
ret

gwxret1:
mov [zgkg],4
mov [xMobPIO],0
ret

gwxz:
mov [ebx+000000f8],FFFFFFFF
ret

gwxy:
mov [ebx+000000f8],1
ret

gwxzj:
push eax
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+b18]
//add eax,3c  //50  //離右 40
//sub eax,64  //28  //離左 40
cmp [ebx+00000694],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret

gwxzk:
push eax
mov eax,[00bb72a8]
mov eax,[eax+b18]
mov [CharX],eax
pop eax
mov [zgkg],5
ret

gwxzl:
push eax
mov eax,[CharX]
cmp [ebx+00000694],eax
pop eax
jl gwxy
jg gwxz
ret
//==========
//========
// 0086001E // 0084204E
Dull01:
    mov [God_k],0  //改變 God_k 值好回復完全無敵 N 秒
    mov ecx,fffffa24
    jmp 008605A0 // 0084276A // 0077a1b5
//========
Dull02:
    mov ecx,[ebp+4c]
    inc [ebp+4c]
    //cmp dword ptr [ebp+4c],07  //這列移到 Dull021
    mov [ebp+ecx*4-38],eax
    //==============
    cmp [God_k],0  //小於0則正常
    jl Dull021
    cmp [God_k],1  //大於1則正常
    jg Dull021
    cmp [God_k],1  //1.完全無敵  0.N秒無敵
    je 007FEE7B
    push eax
    call clock
    cmp eax,[God_t0]
    pop eax
    jle 008611A5
    push eax
    push esi
    call clock
    mov esi,[God_t1]
    add eax,esi
    mov [God_t0],eax
    pop esi
    pop eax
    mov [God_k],2  //改變 God_k 值好執行損血人物不退後
Dull021:
    cmp dword ptr [ebp+4c],07
    jmp 0086F201
//=========怪物瞬移
Dull04:
    mov ebx,[ebp+14]
    cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
    jne Dull041
    jmp 005DC22D
Dull041:
    mov edi,[esi+30]
    mov al,[edi]
    cmp al,0b
    je 005dc218
    movzx ecx,al
    xor eax,eax
    inc eax
    xor edx,edx
    call 009464d0
    mov eax,[ebp+20]
    or [ecx],eax
    or [ecx+04],edx
    mov ecx,esi
    //call 005bc1ac
    push [ecx+0000008c]
    add ecx,00000084
    mov eax,ecx
    push ecx
Dull0411:
    call 00404e51  //標註起來是瞬1
Dull0412:
    pop ecx
    pop ecx
    movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
    cmp eax,ecx
    jl 005dc22d
    mov ecx,esi
    push [ecx+0000008c]
    add ecx,00000084
    mov eax,ecx
    push ecx
Dull0413:
    call 00404e51  //標註起來是瞬1,4
Dull0414:
    pop ecx
    pop ecx
    jmp 005DC17F
//====怪不擊退
Dull05:
    cmp dword ptr [ebp+3c],01
    jne 005c6cfd
    mov ecx,edi
    call 005b550a
    cmp [ebp+1c],eax
    jmp 005C6CF9
//====笨怪
Dull07:
    xor edx,edx
    mov ecx,0000ea60
    //div ecx
    lea ecx,[esi+000002b0]
    //add edx,0002bf20
    push edx
    jmp 0089C387
//====顯示裝備隱藏潛力,v133 失效了
Dull08:
    //mov esi,eax
    cmp eax,esi
    je 007cc231  //007CC13B
    mov eax,[edi]
    mov ecx,edi
    call dword ptr [eax+000000D8]
    test eax,eax
    jmp 007CC14F  //0071c8a6
//=====物品過濾
HookItem:
    mov eax,[ebp-1c]
    mov esi,[ebp-50]
    mov [esi+1c],al
    cmp eax,01
    je HookItem1 
    cmp eax,02
    je HookItem1 
    xor al,al
    jmp HookItem2 
HookItem1:
    mov al,01
HookItem2:
    mov [esi+1d],al
    mov [esi+20],edi
    mov edi,[ebp+08]
    mov ecx,edi
    call 004085d3
    movzx eax,al
    mov ecx,edi
    mov [esi+30],eax
    call 004085c6
//=============
    cmp [ItemKind],0
    je ItemFilter
    mov ecx,edi     
    mov [esi+34],00
    jmp  004CF23A
    //====
ItemFilter:
    push ebx
    push esi
    mov [ItemCounter],eax
    //mov [00bc100c],eax
    xor ebx, ebx
    mov esi,IFTable
ifreject:
    cmp eax,[esi]
    je Itemskip
    cmp [esi],ebx
    je Itemend
    add esi,4
    jmp ifreject
Itemskip:
    mov eax,00
Itemend:
    pop esi
    pop ebx
    //====返回
    mov ecx,edi     
    mov [esi+34],eax 
    jmp  004CF23A

IFTable:

dd 00
//==========
00C71084:
dd xuHook
//==========
[disable]
00C71084:
dd 0069C0A8
//=========
dealloc(Red_Stop)
dealloc(ItemFilter)
dealloc(IFTable)
dealloc(ItemCounter)
unregistersymbol(ItemFilter)
unregistersymbol(ItemCounter)
dealloc(ItemKind)
//=========
unregistersymbol(gwgs)
dealloc(gwgs)
unregistersymbol(zgkg)
dealloc(zgkg)
dealloc(CharX)
//=========
dealloc(xMobPIO)
dealloc(xMobPX)
dealloc(xMobPY)
dealloc(Dull09)
dealloc(Dull11)
//=========
dealloc(God_k)
dealloc(God_t0)
dealloc(God_t1)
unregistersymbol(xuHook)
dealloc(xuHook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS140 ICS 定點生怪
//原創：不知道，據說是浪漫高層找的
//更新：Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(myHook, 1024)
Alloc(xMobPX, 4)
Alloc(xMobPY, 4)
Alloc(xMobPIO, 4)
Label(Dull0121)
Label(Dull013)
Label(Dull0122)
Label(Dull01221)
Label(Dull01222)
Label(Dull01223)
Label(Dull01224)
Label(Dull01225)

myHook:
    cmp [esp], 005CA106	//8B 07 8B CF FF 90 ?? 00 00 00 50 8B CE
    jne 008B9B07	//55 8B EC 53 8B 5D 10 56 57
    cmp [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull0121
    pushad
    mov eax,[00cc58c8]
    mov ebx,[eax+b0c]
    mov [xMobPX],ebx
    mov ebx,[eax+b10]
    mov [xMobPY],ebx
    popad
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    jmp Dull013
Dull0121:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
    jne Dull013
    push ecx
    mov ecx,[xMobPX]
    mov [esp+0c],ecx
    mov eax,[xMobPY]
    mov [esp+10],eax
    push eax
    mov ecx,[00cc21b8]  //a1 ?? ?? ?? 00 c3 8b c1 83 20 00 c3 8b c1
    call Dull0122
    mov ecx,eax
    mov [esp+20],ecx
    pop ecx

Dull013:
    jmp 008B9B07
Dull0122: //0043021A // 0042D006 6A 14 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 33 F6 89 75 ?? 89 75 ?? 89 75
    push 14
    mov eax,00965add
    call 00942039
    xor esi,esi
    mov [ebp-10],esi
    mov [ebp-14],esi
    mov [ebp-04],esi
    cmp [ebp+08],esi
    je 00430252
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    push eax
    lea eax,[ebp+08]
    push eax
    add ecx,00000088
    call 0042f857
    test eax,eax
    je Dull01221 
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    jmp Dull01222
Dull01221:
    mov [ebp-1c],esi
    lea eax,[ebp-20]
    mov [ebp-10],00000001
Dull01222:
    test byte ptr [ebp-10],01
    mov esi,[eax+04]
    je 00430270
    lea ecx,[ebp-20]
    //call 0042f7ac
    call Dull01224
Dull01223:
    or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
    lea ecx,[ebp-18]
    //call 0042f7ac
    call Dull01224
    mov eax,esi
    call 00942111
    ret 4
Dull01224:  //0042C5BA
    push esi
    mov esi,ecx
    cmp dword ptr [esi+04],00
    je Dull01225
    push 00
    call 0042ed98 // 0042bc79  //004b0657
    and dword ptr [esi+04],00
Dull01225:
    pop esi
    ret

00B5E378:
DD myHook
[DISABLE]
00B5E378:
DD 008B9B07 

DeAlloc(myHook)
DeAlloc(xMobPX)
DeAlloc(xMobPY)
DeAlloc(xMobPIO)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_怪物走向.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	MobLR
// Version:	TWMS140
// Update:	Inndy
// Address：	0089E7F4
// EIP：	MobLR
// Aob：	DD 07 DC 20 DD 5D ?? D9 EE DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B
// Aob：	DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 83
// Cortrol：	LRKey
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	83 bb ?? 00 00 00 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8d
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
// V140 008B6960 - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
// V145 008E326C - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	83 be ?? ?? 00 00 03 57 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00
// V138 0089D627 - 83 be 98 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+00000298],03
// V140 008B98E4 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// V145 008E6272 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// 
// AOB：	8b 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 f8 01 0f 85 ?? ?? 00 00
// V138 0089E802 - 8b 83 98 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
// V140 008BAE82 - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
// V145 008E781E - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	39 8e ?? ?? 00 00 7c
// V138 0089B435 - 39 8e 94 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+00000694],ecx
// V140 008B7AE0 - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
// V145 008E445E - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
Registersymbol(MobLR)
Alloc(MobLR, 1024)
Registersymbol(MyState)
Alloc(MyState, 4)
Registersymbol(MyXYResh)
Alloc(MyXYResh, 4)
Registersymbol(LRKey)
Alloc(LRKey, 4)
Registersymbol(LRXY)
Alloc(LRXY, 4)
Alloc(FakeCall,64)

Label(MobLRGo)
Label(Left)
Label(Right)
Label(LRGoMe)
Label(LRGoXY)
Label(GetXY)
Label(GetState)
Label(XYAdd)
Label(XYSub)
Label(MobNormal)
//----------------------------
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
LRKey:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
FakeCall:
db 55                 // push ebp
db 8b ec              // mov ebp,esp
db 83 ec 20           // sub esp,20
db 8b 45 08           // mov eax,[ebp+08]
db 53                 // push ebx
db 56                 // push esi
db 8b 35 b8 21 cc 00  // mov esi,[00cc21b8]
db 8b d9              // mov ebx,ecx
db 57                 // push edi
db 8d bb 88 00 00 00  // lea edi,[ebx+00000088]
db dd 07              // fld qword ptr [edi]
db dc 20              // fsub qword ptr [eax]
db dd 5d e8           // fstp qword ptr [ebp-18]
db d9 ee              // fldz
//----------------------------
MobLR:
Cmp [Ebx+2A0], 1 //Wolk
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+2A0], 2 //掉落的怪物
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+2A0], 3 //Jump
Je MobLRGo

MobNormal:
Jmp 008BAE74
//----------------------------
MobLRGo:

//Mov [Ebx+2A0], 2
//上面這行註解拿掉就是怪物掉落

Push Eax
Cmp [LRKey],1
Je Left
Cmp [LRKey],2
Je Right
Pop Eax

Cmp [LRKey], 3
Je LRGoMe
Cmp [LRKey], 4
Je LRGoXY
Cmp [LRKey], 5
Je GetXY
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Left:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Right:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoMe:
Call GetState
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[00cc58c8]	//人物X軸
Mov Eax,[Eax+0b0c]
Sub Eax, 8
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+69C], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+69C], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000000FC], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[LRXY]
Sub Eax, 8
Cmp [Ebx+69C], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Cmp [Ebx+69C], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+000000FC], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[00cc58c8]	//人物X軸
Mov Eax,[Eax+0b0c]
Mov [LRXY],0
Mov [LRXY],Eax
Mov [LRKey],4
Pop Eax
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetState:
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [00cbdcd0]	//人物動作
Mov Eax, [Eax+47C]
Mov [MyState], Eax
Pop Eax
Cmp [MyState], 3
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 5
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 7
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 9
Je XYSub

Cmp [MyState], 2
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 4
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 6
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 8
Je XYAdd
Ret
//----------------------------
XYAdd:
Mov [MyXYResh], 00000020
Ret
//----------------------------
XYSub:
Mov [MyXYResh], FFFFFFE0
Ret
//----------------------------
LRXY:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
00B5E470:
DD FakeCall
//----------------------------
[Disable]
00B5E470: //Call From 008B50EF //ff 50 04 85 c0 0f 84 ?? 01 00 00
DD 008BAE51

Dealloc(LRXY)
Dealloc(LRKey)
Dealloc(MyState)
Dealloc(MyXYResh)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(FakeCall)
Unregistersymbol(LRXY)
Unregistersymbol(LRKey)
Unregistersymbol(MyState)
Unregistersymbol(MyXYResh)
Unregistersymbol(MobLR)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_打怪吸怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 ICS 打怪吸怪
// 原創: ms890110
// ICS: 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(Vac, 512)
alloc(VacXY, 8)
label(ForceVac)
label(ForceVac2)
label(Label1)
label(Label2)
label(InitMob)
label(Normal)
label(FullMapVac)
label(StartVac)
label(Normal01)
label(Normal02)
label(Normal03)

VacXY:
ReadMem([00cc58c8]+b0c, 8)

Vac:
ForceVac:
cmp [esp], 005D05BF
jne 008B34F0
mov [esp], ForceVac2
jmp 008B34F0

ForceVac2:
push eax
mov ecx, esi
call 005cae9b
and edi, [ebp-20]
cmp edi, ff
jne 005d0635

mov ecx, esi
call 005bc301
cmp eax, edi
jle Label1

cmp [ebp-10], ebx
je 005d0635

Label1:
cmp [esi+00000498], ebx
jne 005d0635

mov ecx, esi
call 005bc37f
test eax, eax
jne 005d0635

mov ecx, esi
call 005bc298
cmp eax, 03
je Label2

mov ecx, esi
call 005bc298
cmp eax, 04
jne 005d0635

Label2:
cmp [esi+000003f0], ebx
jne 005d0635

push 64
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx

push eax
mov eax, [esi+00000110]
test eax, eax
je Normal

add eax, f4
cmp dword ptr [eax+000002a0], 00
je Normal
cmp dword ptr [eax+000002a0], 06
jg Normal
cmp dword ptr [eax+08], 00
je InitMob
cmp dword ptr [eax+08], 01
jne Normal

pop eax
push 00 // 怪物動作
jmp 005D062E

InitMob:
inc [eax+08]

Normal:
pop eax
push FF
jmp 005D062E

//--------------------------
FullMapVac:
cmp [esp], 005CD177
jne 008B83BB
mov eax, [ebp-10]
cmp dword ptr [eax+08], 01
je StartVac
jmp 008B83BB

StartVac:
cmp [eax+2a0], 06
je 008B83BB
mov [esp+1c], 00

mov eax, [esp+18]
cmp eax, 04
je Normal01
cmp eax, 02
je Normal01
cmp eax, 05
je Normal01


Normal01:
mov eax, [esp+14]
test eax, eax
je Normal02


Normal02:
mov eax, [esp+10]
test eax, eax
je Normal03


Normal03:
push ecx
mov ecx, [ebp-10]
mov esi, [VacXY]
mov [esp+0c], esi
mov [ecx+238], esi
mov [ecx+69c], esi
mov eax, [VacXY+04]
mov [esp+10], eax
mov [ecx+23a], eax
mov [ecx+6a0], eax
mov [ecx+2a0], 06 // 定怪
pop ecx
jmp 008B83BB

00B5E384:
dd ForceVac

00B5E378:
dd FullMapVac

[disable]
00B5E384: // 005D05B9 ff 90 ? 00 00 00 eb ? 8b ce e8 ? ? ? ? 83 e0 01
dd 008B34F0

00B5E378: // 005CD175 ff 17 8b 7d ? 83 c7 f9
dd 008B83BB

dealloc(Vac)

// 005D05B9 call dword ptr [eax+00000090] => eax+90: 00B5E384, [eax+90]: 008B34F0
// 005CD175 call dword ptr [edi] => edi: 00B5E378, [edi]: 008B83BB
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_無敵.txt`:

```txt
//v.140. 人物不退+5次MISS [ICS] by.aaaddress1
[ENABLE]
alloc(Set,128)
label(set1)
label(normal)
label(keepzerohurt)
alloc(times,4)
Set:
cmp [esp],00860566	//ff 75 ?? 8b 10 ff 75 ?? 8b c8 57 57
jne 0083D309		//8b 81 00 3d 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 8b 81 ?? ?? 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 56
mov [esp],set1
jmp 0083D309
set1:
inc [times]
cmp [times],4 //MISS 次數-1
jl keepzerohurt
mov [times],0
jmp normal
keepzerohurt:
mov [ebp+58],0
normal:
push 00       //人物不退
mov edx,[eax]
push 00       //人物不退
mov ecx,eax
push edi
push edi
push 20
call dword ptr [edx+58]
mov ecx,[ebp+48]
push 05
lea eax,[ebp+38]
push eax
mov [ebp+60],2710  //無敵時間(目前10秒)
jmp 008605BE
00B5B76C:
dd Set
[DISABLE]
00B5B76C:
dd 0083D309

dealloc(Set)
dealloc(times)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_物品落腳下.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(ItemMove)
Alloc(ItemMove, 128)

ItemMove:
DB   55                                 //005C9C03 - push ebp
DB   8b ec                              //005C9C04 - mov ebp,esp
DB   51                                 //005C9C06 - push ecx
DB   51                                 //005C9C07 - push ecx
DB   8d 45 f8                           //005C9C08 - lea eax,[ebp-08]
DB   50                                 //005C9C0B - push eax
DB   81 c1 d4 05 00 00                  //005C9C0C - add ecx,000005d4
call 004313da                           //005C9C12 - call 004313da
cmp [ebp+04], 005BE28A	//8b 55 ?? 8b c8 8b 45 ?? 03 c2 99 2b c2 8b f0 8b 07 d1 fe 2b 31 8d 4d
je 005C9C17
cmp [ebp+04], 005BE2AB
je 005C9C17
mov eax,[ebp+08]
push edx
mov ecx,[00cc58c8]
mov edx,[ecx+B0C] //x
mov ecx,[ecx+B10] //y
mov [eax],edx
mov [eax+4],ecx
pop edx
leave
ret 4

00AFC7DC:
DD ItemMove

[disable]
00AFC7DC:
DD 005C9C03

Unregistersymbol(ItemMove)
Dealloc(ItemMove)
```
