`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
RegisterSymbol(CheckESP)
Alloc(CheckESP,512)
RegisterSymbol(ItemList)
Alloc(ItemList,204800)
RegisterSymbol(LastItem)
Alloc(LastItem,4)
RegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
Alloc(FilterMode,4)
Label(HookESP)
Label(HookFun)
Label(HookOr1)
Label(HookOr2)
Label(BlackFilter)
Label(WhiteFilter)
Label(Skip)
Label(End)

FilterMode:
//0-關閉  1-黑名單模式  2-白名單模式
DD 1

ItemList:
//請在以下加入物品清單

//請在以上加入物品清單
DD 00

CheckESP:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+64],004D715E //8b 45 ?? 8b 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 f8 01
JE HookESP
JMP 006B28D9
HookESP:
MOV DWORD PTR DS:[ESP+64],HookFun
JMP 006B28D9

HookFun:
mov eax,[ebp-1c]
mov esi,[ebp-50]
mov [esi+1c],al
cmp eax,01
Je HookOr1
cmp eax,02
Je HookOr1
xor al,al
Jmp HookOr2

HookOr1:
mov al, 01
HookOr2:
mov [esi+1d],al
mov [esi+20],edi
mov edi,[ebp+08]
mov ecx,edi
call 00408574
movzx eax,al
mov ecx,edi
mov [esi+30],eax
call 004085d0

PUSH ESI
MOV ESI,ItemList
CMP EAX,C350
JLE End
MOV [LastItem], EAX
CMP [FilterMode], 0
JE End
CMP [FilterMode], 1
JE BlackFilter
CMP [FilterMode], 2
JE WhiteFilter


BlackFilter:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je End
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je Skip
ADD ESI,4
JMP BlackFilter

WhiteFilter:
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je Skip
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je End
ADD ESI,4
JMP WhiteFilter

Skip:
XOR EAX,EAX
End:
POP ESI
MOV ECX,EDI
MOV [ESI+34],EAX
JMP 004D7199

00CA36F4: //ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c0 74 16 eb 08
DD CheckESP

[Disable]
00CA36F4:
DD 006B28D9

UnRegisterSymbol(CheckESP)
DeAlloc(CheckESP)
UnRegisterSymbol(ItemList)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
UnRegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
DeAlloc(FilterMode)
UnRegisterSymbol(LastItem)
DeAlloc(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_狂豹召喚怪物攻擊無延遲.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 ICS 狂豹獵人召喚怪物攻擊無延遲 (會斷線)
// 原創: 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(CheckRet1,256)
label(NoDelay1)
label(CheckRet2)
label(SetRet21)
label(SetRet22)
label(NoDelay21)
label(NoDelay22)
label(NoDelay23)
label(NoMobDmg)

CheckRet1:
cmp [esp],005CFC7D
jne 008B34DE
mov [esp],NoDelay1
jmp 008B34DE

NoDelay1:
test eax,eax
je 005cfe56
mov ecx,esi
call 005bcdb7
test eax,eax
je 005cfd85
mov eax,[esi]
push 01
lea ecx,[ebp-58]
push ecx
mov ecx,esi
call dword ptr [eax+08]
mov eax,[esi+000004b0]
mov ecx,[ebp-1c]
sub ecx,eax
cmp ecx,000007d0
//jl 005cfd85
jmp 005CFCB8

CheckRet2:
cmp [esp],005C8610
je SetRet21
cmp [esp],005C8657
je SetRet22
cmp [esp],005CFD2A
jne 008B3672
mov [esp],NoMobDmg
jmp 008B3672

SetRet21:
mov [esp],NoDelay21
jmp 008B3672

SetRet22:
mov [esp],NoDelay22
jmp 008B3672

NoDelay21:
test eax,eax
jne 005c892c
mov ecx,esi
call 005bc4dc
test eax,eax
je NoDelay23 // 005c865f
jmp 005C8623

NoDelay22:
test eax,eax
jne 005c892c

NoDelay23:
call 0088f5fd
lea edx,[esi+000004ac]
jmp 005C8693

NoMobDmg:
test eax,eax
je 005CFD6B // je 005cfd5b
jmp 005CFD2E

00B5E374:
dd CheckRet1

00B5E39C:
dd CheckRet2

[disable]
00B5E374:
dd 008B34DE

00B5E39C:
dd 008B3672

dealloc(CheckRet1)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
//秒數無敵、Miss無敵、笨怪、物品過濾、怪物不急退、跳怪不跳
[ENABLE]
RegisterSymbol(Main)
Alloc(Main, 4096)
RegisterSymbol(Time)
Alloc(Time, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MissTime)
Alloc(MissTime, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MissTimeCmp)
Alloc(MissTimeCmp, 4)
RegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
Alloc(FilterMode, 4)
RegisterSymbol(LastItem)
Alloc(LastItem, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MonsterNoJump)
Alloc(MonsterNoJump, 4)
Label(Nohurt)
Label(NohurtMain)
Label(NohurtMainI)
Label(NohurtMainII)
Label(StupidMonster)
Label(StupidMonsterMain)
Label(MobNoKB)
Label(MobNoKBMain)
Label(ItemFilter)
Label(ItemFilterMain)
Label(ItemFilterOr1)
Label(ItemFilterOr2)
Label(ItemBlackFilter)
Label(ItemWhiteFilter)
Label(SkipItem)
Label(EndFilter)
Label(MobNoJump)
Label(MobNoJumpMain)
Label(MobFast)
Label(MobFastMain)
Alloc(ItemList, 32768)

//==============
Time:		//無敵時間
DD FFFF8AD0	//30秒

MissTime:	//迴避次數
DD 3

FilterMode:	//物品過濾模式
DD 1		//0關 1黑名單模式 2白名單模式

MonsterNoJump:	//怪物不跳
DD 1
//==============
ItemList:
//請在以下加入物品清單

DD 1E8482 // 白色藥水 

DD 1F6EE0 // 箭矢
DD 1F72C8 // 弩箭矢
DD 1F95F0 // 海星鏢

DD 3D7E3C // 怪物卡
DD 3D8834 // 紅茶茶包
DD 3D8836 // 布塊

DD 3FA129 // 英雄鑰匙
DD 414EC5 // 神祕罐子
DD 3D8892 // 切片蛋糕
DD 3D87FF // 安迪的懷表
DD 3D882E // 紅色內衣 

DD 253F2F // 撲通撲通的心(右側用)
DD 253F2C // 三角飯糰(左側用)
DD 253B41 // 吃蟲寶石君
DD 253B40 // 吃蟲桔小姐


//童話村
DD 3D09A9 // 倒米棒 
DD 3D8838 // 填充棉花 
DD 3D09AA // 老虎腳印 
DD 3D09AB // 虎皮 


//水世界
DD 3D8839 // 溫暖氣泡
DD 3D09A1 // 海馬的尾巴 


//神木村
DD 3D888F // 鑽石7卡片
DD 3FA128 // 冰方塊

//桃花仙境
DD 3D0A15 // 頂針 
DD 3D883B // 火焰秘笈 

//請在以上加入物品清單
DD 00
//==============
Main:
Cmp [Esp+1c], 0086001E	//e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je Nohurt		//無敵
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008B862E	//33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je StupidMonster	//笨怪
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008B95F6	//6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je MobNoJump		//跳怪不跳
Cmp [Esp+34], 005CF1EA	//8b 55 40 8b cb e8 ?? ?? ff ff 83 7d ?? 01 75 10 8b cf
Je MobNoKB		//怪物不擊退
//Cmp [Esp+34], 005DC13B	//8B 5D ?? E9 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 7E ?? 8A 07
//Je MobFast		//怪物瞬移
Cmp [Esp+64], 004D715E	//8b 45 ?? 8b 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 f8 01
Je ItemFilter		//物品過濾

Jmp 006B28D9
//==============
Nohurt:
Mov [Esp+1c], NohurtMain
Jmp 006B28D9

StupidMonster:
Mov [Esp+1c], StupidMonsterMain
Jmp 006B28D9

MobNoJump:
Mov [Esp+1c], MobNoJumpMain
Jmp 006B28D9

MobNoKB:
Mov [Esp+34], MobNoKBMain
Jmp 006B28D9

MobFast:
Mov [Esp+34], MobFastMain
Jmp 006B28D9

ItemFilter:
Mov [Esp+64], ItemFilterMain
Jmp 006B28D9
//-------------------------
MobNoJumpMain:
Cmp [MonsterNoJump], 0
Je 008B95F6
Jmp 008b960a
//-------------------------
StupidMonsterMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000ea60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002b8]
Jmp  008B8643
//-------------------------
NohurtMain:
Call 0042ebce
Test byte ptr [Eax+000001b4], 02
Je   NohurtMainI
Jmp  0086002A
//==============
NohurtMainI:
Lea  Ecx, [Ebx+00003CF8]
Push [Time]
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MissTime]
Cmp  [MissTimeCmp], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jg   NohurtMainII
Mov  [Ebp+58], 0
inc  [MissTimeCmp]
Jmp  008605A7
//==============
NohurtMainII:
Mov  [MissTimeCmp], 0
Jmp  008605A7
//-------------------------
MobNoKBMain:
Mov  Edx, [Ebp+40]
Mov  Ecx, Ebx
Call 005bf796
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Call 005bcdda
Xor  Edx, Edx
Jmp  005cf20d
//-------------------------
ItemFilterMain:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp-1c]
Mov  Esi, [Ebp-50]
Mov  [Esi+1c], Al
Cmp  Eax, 01
Je   ItemFilterOr1
Cmp  Eax, 02
Je   ItemFilterOr1
Xor  Al, Al
Jmp  ItemFilterOr2

ItemFilterOr1:
Mov  Al, 01
ItemFilterOr2:
Mov  [Esi+1d], Al
Mov  [Esi+20], Edi
Mov  Edi, [Ebp+08]
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Call 00408574
Movzx Eax, Al
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [Esi+30], Eax
Call 004085d0

Push Esi
Mov  Esi, ItemList
Cmp  Eax, C350
JLE  EndFilter
Mov  [LastItem], Eax
Cmp  [FilterMode], 0
Je   EndFilter
Cmp  [FilterMode], 1
Je   ItemBlackFilter
Cmp  [FilterMode], 2
Je   ItemWhiteFilter


ItemBlackFilter:
Cmp  [Esi], 0
Je   EndFilter
Cmp  [Esi], Eax
Je   SkipItem
Add  Esi, 4
Jmp  ItemBlackFilter

ItemWhiteFilter:
Cmp  [Esi], 0
Je   SkipItem
Cmp  [Esi], Eax
Je   EndFilter
Add  Esi, 4
Jmp  ItemWhiteFilter

SkipItem:
Xor  Eax, Eax
EndFilter:
Pop  Esi
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [Esi+34], Eax
Jmp  004D7199
//-------------------------
MobFastMain:
mov ebx,[ebp+14]
cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
db 75 05 //jne +5
jmp 005DC22D
mov edi,[esi+30]
mov al,[edi]
cmp al,0b
je 005dc218
movzx ecx,al
xor eax,eax
inc eax
xor edx,edx
call 009464d0
mov ecx,[ebp+20]
or [ecx],eax
or [ecx+04],edx
mov ecx,esi

push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
push ecx
call 00404e51
pop ecx
pop ecx

push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
push ecx
call 00404e51  //標註起來是瞬1
pop ecx
pop ecx
movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
cmp eax,ecx
jl 005dc22d
mov ecx,esi
push esi
push edi
mov edi,edx
mov esi,ecx
lea edx,[esi+00000084]
mov ecx,edi
call 00408c26  //標註起來是瞬1,4  //標註起來直接斷線 
mov [esi+0000008c],eax
mov eax,edi
pop edi
pop esi
jmp 005DC18E
//-------------------------
00CA36F4:
dd Main
[DISABLE]
00CA36F4:
DD 006B28D9
//-------------------------
DeAlloc(Main)
UnRegisterSymbol(Main)
DeAlloc(Time)
UnRegisterSymbol(Time)
DeAlloc(MissTime)
UnRegisterSymbol(MissTime)
DeAlloc(MissTimeCmp)
UnRegisterSymbol(MissTimeCmp)
DeAlloc(FilterMode)
UnRegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
UnRegisterSymbol(MonsterNoJump)
DeAlloc(MonsterNoJump)
UnRegisterSymbol(LastItem)
DeAlloc(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// 原創: 007
// ICS: 冷羽楓痕 (修正斷線問題)

[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)
label(HookTime2)
label(InitTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 05

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp],0086DCDB
jne 008B374D

mov eax,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test eax,eax
je Normal

dec eax
push eax
push ecx
call 008B374D
pop ecx
pop eax
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
call 008B374D
ret

HookTime:
cmp [FakeTime],0
je InitTime

HookTime2:
mov eax,[FakeTime]
add eax,1FE
mov [FakeTime],eax
jmp 00d9eb79

InitTime:
mov [FakeTime],eax
push eax
lea eax,[HookTime2]
sub eax,00EB5653    // 00EB564E+5
mov [00EB564F],eax  // 00EB564E+1
pop eax
jmp 00d9eb79

00B5EADC:
dd SpeedUp

00EB564E:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00B5EADC:
dd 008B374D

00EB564E:
jmp 00d9eb79

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	No Empty Attack
// Version:	TWMS140
// Update:	Inndy
// Address：	00862A52
// EIP：	NoEmptyAtkICS
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(NoEmptyAtkICS,512)

NoEmptyAtkICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 00862A58
Jne  OffsetRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call OffsetRect

Push [Ebp-000001a4]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [Ebp-00000184]
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-00000180]
Push Eax
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-68]
Push Eax
Call 00435ff9
Mov  Ecx,Eax
Call 005d1d9e
Mov  [Ebp-78],Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Je   00862D4C //8b 85 ?? fe ff ff 89 85 ?? ?? ff ff 81 bd ?? ?? ff ff ?? ?? ?? ?? 74 02 eb 4c
Jmp  00862A8A

00CCA74C:
DD NoEmptyAtkICS

//以下註解取消為CRC數據
/*
00862A52:
Nop
Nop
Call NoEmptyAtkICS
*/
[DISABLE]
00CCA74C:
DD OffsetRect

00862A52:
db ff 15 4c a7 cc 00

DeAlloc(NoEmptyAtkICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 00827350	//83 be ?? ?? 00 00 00 74 ?? 51 8b c4 89 65
Jne  00816B11		//55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 56 57 33 FF
Call R2
Jmp  00816B11
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+00000480],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00B5B738:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00B5B738:
DD 00816B11

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	Limited Full Map Attack
// Version:	TWMS140
// Update:	Inndy
// EIP：	FullMapICS
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c0 75 08 ff 45 e8 83 c7 10 eb c9 8b 45
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
alloc(FullMapICS,64)

FullMapICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 005D1F31
Jne  IntersectRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call IntersectRect
Test Eax, Eax
Jmp  005D1F3D

00CCA7A0:
dd FullMapICS

//以下註解取消為CRC數據
/*
005D1F2B:
Nop
Nop
Call FullMapICS
*/
[Disable]

005D1F2B:

dealloc(FullMapICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS140/TWMS140_Packet_換頻.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 Auto Change Channel 
// Made by 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
Alloc(AutoCC, 128)
Alloc(PacketStruct, 16)
Alloc(PacketData, 7)
Alloc(Channel, 1)
CreateThread(AutoCC)

PacketStruct:     // 封包結構
DD 00             // 00
DD PacketData     // 封包資料位址
DD #07            // 封包長度
DD 00             // 00

PacketData:       // 換頻封包資料
DB 36 00 00 00 00 00 00

Channel:          // 目標頻道
DB #06

AutoCC:
mov ax,[Channel]
mov [PacketData+02],ax
mov eax,[00cc2798]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
mov [PacketData+03],eax
mov ecx,[00cbdd04]
push PacketStruct
push 00401005      // 假的返回位址 (因為有檢查返回位址)
push 004861a1      // 送封包
ret

[disable]
Dealloc(AutoCC)
Dealloc(PacketStruct)
Dealloc(PacketData)
Dealloc(Channel)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_MSCRCBYPASS(冷羽楓痕).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.41.1 MSCRC Bypass
// Made by 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(MSCRC,256)
alloc(FakeDump1,11)
alloc(FakeDump2,13)
label(MSCRC1)
label(MSCRC2)
label(OtherCheck)
label(MSCRC1Ret)
label(SetFakeCRCValue)
label(SetCRCValue1)
label(SetCRCValue2)
label(SetCRCValue3)
label(SetCRCValue4)
label(SetCRCValue5)
label(SetCRCValue6)

FakeDump1: // 00960394-3 ~ 00960394+7 共11個bytes
db 8b 5d 08 8a 11 80 c2 01 8b 4d 18

FakeDump2: // 004861BC-3 ~ 004861BC+9 共13個bytes
db 10 5e c3 6a 38 b8 1f 4c 97 00 e8 01 d8

MSCRC:
MSCRC1: // 檢測MSCRC2位址 00960394 - 8a 11 80 c2 01 8b 4d 18
cmp edx,00960391 // 00960394-3
jl OtherCheck
cmp edx,00960398 // 00960394+4
jg OtherCheck

sub edx,00960391 // 00960394-3
add edx,FakeDump1
jmp MSCRC1Ret

OtherCheck: // 檢測送出封包函式 004861BC - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
cmp edx,004861B9 // 004861BC-3
jl MSCRC1Ret
cmp edx,004861C2 // 004861BC+6
jg MSCRC1Ret

sub edx,004861B9 // 004861BC-3
add edx,FakeDump2

MSCRC1Ret:
push [edx]
jmp 00da1df5

MSCRC2:
call SetFakeCRCValue
push 0cef3ebe
jmp 00da130e

SetFakeCRCValue: // 更新: Hook該處，讀取[ebp+08]和[ebp+18]的值，其值每15秒變動一次，總共變動6次，之後的值都會重複
mov eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
cmp eax,00401324
je SetCRCValue1
cmp eax,004E5943
je SetCRCValue2
cmp eax,005C9F62
je SetCRCValue3
cmp eax,006AE581
je SetCRCValue4
cmp eax,00792BA0
je SetCRCValue5
cmp eax,008771BF
je SetCRCValue6
ret

SetCRCValue1:
mov [edx],70340F96
ret

SetCRCValue2:
mov [edx],DA19589C
ret

SetCRCValue3:
mov [edx],0312D034
ret

SetCRCValue4:
mov [edx],AE1BF8F7
ret

SetCRCValue5:
mov [edx],584C3BD3
ret

SetCRCValue6:
mov [edx],50050D69
ret

00DA38C9: // MSCRC1
jmp MSCRC1

00EEC9C9: // MSCRC2
jmp MSCRC2

[disable]
00DA38C9: // 更新: 搜尋 ff 32 e9 ? ? ? ?，會有好幾個，任意選一個做Hook，觀看被執行到最多次那個就是了
push [edx]
jmp 00da1df5

00EEC9C9: // 更新: 搜尋 8a 11 80 c2 01 (00960394)，在搜尋到的位址底下有個 jmp 00EXXXXX (009603C0) 就是了
push 0cef3ebe

dealloc(MSCRC)
dealloc(FakeDump1)
dealloc(FakeDump2)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_MSCRCBYPASS.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(Hook, 256)
Alloc(FakeDump, 10047488)
Alloc(MyCopyMemory, 128)
CreateThread(MyCopyMemory)

MyCopyMemory:
    mov     edi, FakeDump	//目標
    mov     esi, 00401000	//來源
    mov     ecx, 00265400	//長度 / 4
    repe    movsd
    ret

Hook:
    Label(MSCRCBypass)
    Label(BackToMS)
    Label(MSCRCCrack)
    Label(BackToCrack)

MSCRCBypass:
    Push Esi
    Cmp  Esi, 00401000
    Jnge BackToMS
    Cmp  Esi, 00D96000
    Jg   BackToMS
    Sub  Esi, 00401000
    Add  Esi, FakeDump	//Dump
    Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+18]
    Mov  Ecx, [Ecx]
    Xor  Ecx, Edx

BackToMS:
    And  Ecx, 000000FF
    Pop  Esi
    Jmp  009603A9

MSCRCCrack:
    Cmp  Edx, 009603A1
    Jnge BackToCrack
    Cmp  Edx, 009603A9
    Jg   BackToCrack
    Sub  Edx, 00401000
    Push Ebx
    Add  Edx, FakeDump	//Dump
    Pop  Ebx
    Add  Esp, 4
    Push [Edx]

BackToCrack:
    Jmp 00DCC2D5

009603A1:    //33 ca 81 e1 ff 00 00 00
    Jmp    MSCRCBypass
    Nop
00DA38C9:    //e9 ?? ?? 00 00 ff 32 e9 ?? ?? ff ff +1Adr
    Jmp    MSCRCCrack
    Nop
    Nop
//e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 51 51 8b cc
/*這段已經不需要了
004F22EA:
    Nop
    Nop
    Nop
    Nop
    Nop*/
[Disable]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS141 取得血、魔、經驗值
//原創：Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 007B8EB0

007BD8DC: // E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8D B7 ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
007BD8DC:
Call 007B8EB0

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

```txt
//-------------------------------
//吸飛/游怪 For twmsV141
//auther:aaaddress1

//tips:

//At The Place When You Enable

push [XY_Bit+04] // Y

pop [edx+28] // Bottom
pop [edx+1C] // Left
pop [edx+24] // Right
pop edx
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_怪物數量低於N無法攻擊.txt`:

```txt
// Twms V141.1
// 怪物數量低於N無法攻擊
// 更新：Inndy
[enable]
Alloc(StopAttack, 256)
Label(ReturnAttack)
RegisterSymbol(StopCount)
Alloc(StopCount, 4)

StopCount:
dd 1 //怪物數量

StopAttack:
push eax
mov eax,[00CC44FC]
mov eax,[eax+24]
cmp eax,[StopCount]
pop eax
jle 0047D353
jmp ReturnAttack

ReturnAttack:
cmp dword ptr [esi+000020a4],00
jmp 0047D31C

0047D315: // 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 00 75 ? 83 7C 24 ?? 00 75
jmp StopAttack
nop
nop
[disable]
0047D315:
db 83 be a4 20 00 00 00

DeAlloc(StopAttack)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_怪物走向.txt`:

```txt
//怪物走向  TwmsV141
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	83 bb ?? 00 00 00 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8d
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
// V140 008B6960 - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
// V141 008B80AC - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	83 be ?? ?? 00 00 03 57 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00
// V138 0089D627 - 83 be 98 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+00000298],03
// V140 008B98E4 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// V141 008BB030 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// 
// AOB：	8b 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 f8 01 0f 85 ?? 01 00 00
// V138 0089E802 - 8b 83 98 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
// V140 008BAE82 - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
// V141 008BC5CE - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	39 8e ?? ?? 00 00 7c
// V138 0089B435 - 39 8e 94 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+00000694],ecx
// V140 008B7AE0 - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
// V141 008B922C - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Registersymbol(XD)
alloc(XD,1024)
Label(XD)
alloc(XD1,64)
alloc(XD2,64)
alloc(XD3,64)
alloc(XD4,64)
Registersymbol(XD)
Registersymbol(XD1)
Registersymbol(XD2)
Registersymbol(XD3)
Registersymbol(XD4)
Registersymbol(Off)
alloc(Off,64)
Registersymbol(Key)
Alloc(Key, 4)

Off:  //開關
DD 1
Key:  //1:左 2:右 3:跟隨
DD 3

XD:
cmp dword ptr [Off],00
je XD1
cmp dword ptr [ebx+000002A0],01
je XD2
cmp dword ptr [ebx+000002A0],03
je XD2
jmp XD1

XD2:
push eax
cmp dword ptr [Key],01
je XD3
cmp dword ptr [Key],02
je XD4

mov eax,[00CBFF70]
mov eax,[eax+5A18]
sub eax,32
cmp [ebx+0000069C],eax
jnge XD4
add eax,64
cmp [ebx+0000069C],eax
jg XD3
pop eax
jmp XD1

XD3:
pop eax
mov [ebx+000000FC],FFFFFFFF
jmp XD1

XD4:
pop eax
mov [ebx+000000FC],00000001
jmp XD1

XD1:
fcom qword ptr [ebp-18]
fnstsw ax
push 008BC5C5
ret

008BC5C0:  // DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B ?? ?? 00 00 8B 83
jmp XD

[DISABLE]

008BC5C0:
DB DC 55 E8 DF E0


Dealloc(XD)
Dealloc(XD1)
Dealloc(XD2)
Dealloc(XD3)
Dealloc(XD4)
Unregistersymbol(XD)
Unregistersymbol(XD1)
Unregistersymbol(XD2)
Unregistersymbol(XD3)
Unregistersymbol(XD4)
Unregistersymbol(Off)
Dealloc(Off)
Unregistersymbol(Key)
Dealloc(Key)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_控制走怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(WalkingHook, 64)
Alloc(WalkingSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(WalkingSwitch)

WalkingHook:
Cmp  [WalkingSwitch], 1	// Right
Je   008BACC5			//6A 01 EB ?? DB 86 ?? 00 00 00 DC 5E
Cmp  [WalkingSwitch], 2	// Left
Je   008BACD9			//6A FF EB ?? 8B 8E ?? ?? 00 00 8B 01 8D 55 ?? 52
Cmp  [WalkingSwitch], 3	// Stop
Je   008BA7FF

Test Eax, Eax
Jg   008BA9A6
Jmp  008BA7FF

008BA7F9: //0F 8F ? ? 00 00 83 BE ? ? 00 00 00 0F 84
Jmp  WalkingHook
Nop
[Disable]
008BA7F9:
db 0F 8F A7 01 00 00

Dealloc(WalkingHook, 64)
Dealloc(WalkingSwitch, 4)
UnregisterSymbol(WalkingSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_攻擊不停(CSX).txt`:

```txt
//=================================================
// 攻擊不停 for Twms141
// 原作：未知
// Address : 008B7815
// JmpAddr : AtkNostop
//
// 功能:
// 0.關閉, 1.攻擊不停.
//
// 使用方法:
// 修改 AtkNsKey 的值即可.
//=================================================
[Enable]
Registersymbol(AtkNostop)
Alloc(AtkNostop, 256)
Registersymbol(AtkNsKey)
Alloc(AtkNsKey, 4)
Label(CSXReturn)
Label(NormalX)
//=================================================
AtkNsKey:
        Db      0
//=================================================
AtkNostop:
       Cmp     [AtkNsKey], 1
       Jne     NormalX
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00CBFF70]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4F58] //主動技能次數
       Cmp     Eax, 15 //放技能N次回原位
       Jg      NormalX
       Cmp     Eax, 14 //放技能N次偏移
       Jg      CSXReturn
       Mov     Eax, [00CBFF70]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4F68] //輔助技能次數
       Cmp     Eax, 5
       Jg      CSXReturn
       Pop     Eax
       Jmp     NormalX
CSXReturn:
       Mov     Eax, [00CBFF70]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1F84] //Char PID
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Jne     NormalX
       Add     Eax, 0A
       Jmp     NormalX
NormalX:
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Mov     Edi, [Ebp+10]
       Cmp     Edi, Ebx
       Jmp     008B781A
//=================================================
008B7815:
       //Enter CRC Pointer
       Jmp     AtkNostop
[Disable]
008B7815:
       //Return CRC Pointer
       Db      8B 7D 10 3B FB
Dealloc(CSEaxMode)
Dealloc(CSEax)
Unregistersymbol(CSEaxMode)
Unregistersymbol(CSEax)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_淫蕩火藥桶.txt`:

```txt
//v1.41 淫蕩火藥桶 by.aaaddress1
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetSkill1,16)
alloc(SetSkill2,128)
alloc(FullMapAttack,128)
//-----------------------------------
//全圖攻擊+腳下落物 (貌似有鎖率 加入此功能前請先測試)
//005D1450: // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 3B C3 74 ?? 2B 45 ?? 79
//call FullMapAttack
//原地卡炸藥桶
0052E3C1: // 0F 85 ?? ?? 00 00 39 5E ?? 0F 94 C0 84 C0
Jmp SetSkill2
Nop
//不限制間隔攻擊時間
0052E8DA: // ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 55 ?? 52 50 50 50 50 50 50
dd 0
//無限炸藥桶
0052E883: // 83 3B 00 74 ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? 00
db 90 90 90 90 90//jmp SetSkill1
//-----------------------------------
SetSkill1:
call 00890d49
jmp 0052e8a0
//-----------------------------------
SetSkill2:
push edi
lea ecx,[ebp-5C]
call 00401626
push edi
mov edi,[00CBFF70]
mov [edi+480], FFFFFFFF
lea ecx,[ebp-4C]
mov [ebp-04],0000000f
call 00401626
mov ecx,[esi+18]
mov byte ptr [ebp-04],10
lea eax,[ebp-1C]
push eax
jmp 0052E795 // 0052E33D
//-----------------------------------
FullMapAttack:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[00CBFF70]
push [edi+5a18]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0C]
call 00425E1D // 00425E14
push [edi+5a1c]
mov ecx,esi
call 00425E1D // 00425E14
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 0004
[DISABLE]
005D1450:
call 004302c3

0052E3C1:
DB 0f 85 a2 03 00 00

0052E8DA:
DD 80004003

0052E883:
DB 83 3B 00 74 18

dealloc(SetSkill1)
dealloc(SetSkill2)
dealloc(FullMapAttack)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_無延遲撿物.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(PreHackPacket, 128)
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)

PreHackPacket:
Mov Edi, [Esp+4] // PacketStruct
Mov Edi, [Edi+4] // PacketBuffer
Mov Eax, [Edi+3] // Time
Add Eax, [FakeTime]
Mov [Edi+3], Eax
Add [FakeTime],64 //100 = 0x64 // 200 = 0xC8 // 300 = 0x12C // 400 = 0x190
Jmp 004861BC

008F081E: // 撿物封包處理
Call PreHackPacket
//004D4A8E - 6a 28                      - push 28
//004D4BED - e8 b5 ba 41 00             - call 008f06a7

0047D264: // 無延遲撿物
And [Ecx+000020A4], 00
Ret 0004
DB 90 90 90
[DISABLE]
008F081E:
Call 004861BC

0047D264:
DB 8B 44 24 04 56 8B F1 89 86 A4 20 00 00 E8

Dealloc(PreHackPacket)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_簡化版集氣無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Label(AttackTimes)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],1 //此值與下列值互減得到的等於正常次數
jle 0085FD2B+5
call 00943080
cmp [AttackTimes],2 //此值至少要比上面的大1
jg Refresh
jmp 0085FD2B+5
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0
jmp 0085FD2B+5
//------------------------------------------------------------------
AttackTimes:
DD 0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085FD2B://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 04 00
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085F7FB://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
0085FD2B:
call 00943080

dealloc(Nodelay)

0085F7FB:
call 00890d49
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_讀取血魔.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS141 CRC 讀取血魔
//出處:s18leoare (至少我拿到的來源)
//更新:Inndy
//改寫:Inndy
//00B56680->007BD732	//6a ?? b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4d f0 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00 8d

[ENABLE]
Alloc(GetHPMP, 128)
Label(GetMaxMP)
Label(GetNowMP)
Label(GetMaxHP)
Label(GetNowHP)
Alloc(MaxMP, 4)
Alloc(NowMP, 4)
Alloc(MaxHP, 4)
Alloc(NowHP, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MaxMP)
RegisterSymbol(NowMP)
RegisterSymbol(MaxHP)
RegisterSymbol(NowHP)

GetHPMP:
Call 00942143
Pop Ebp
Cmp [Esp], 007BD88A //ff 76 ?? 8b d8 8d 46 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff ff b7
je GetMaxMP
Cmp [Esp], 007BD898 //ff b7 ?? ?? 00 00 81 c7 ?? ?? 00 00 57 89 45 ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 76 ?? 8b f8
je GetNowMP
Cmp [Esp], 007BD8AD //ff 76 ?? 8b f8 8d 46 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 83 c4 20 ff 75
je GetMaxHP
Cmp [Esp], 007BD8BB //83 c4 20 ff 75 ?? 8b ce
je GetNowHP
Ret

GetMaxMP:
Mov [MaxMP], Eax
Ret

GetNowMP:
Mov [NowMP], Eax
Ret

GetMaxHP:
Mov [MaxHP], Eax
Ret

GetNowHP:
Mov [NowHP], Eax
Ret

0043603E:	//e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 5d c3 8b 44 24 04 85 c0
Jmp GetHPMP
[DISABLE]
0043603E:
Call 00943ad3

DeAlloc(GetHPMP)
DeAlloc(MaxMP)
DeAlloc(NowMP)
DeAlloc(MaxHP)
DeAlloc(NowHP)
UnRegisterSymbol(MaxMP)
UnRegisterSymbol(NowMP)
UnRegisterSymbol(MaxHP)
UnRegisterSymbol(NowHP)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_CRC_超級停止呼吸.txt`:

```txt
//==================================
//停止呼吸終級版  TWMS141
//Created by Cam1596 
//UpDated bY: Dark9 2010/8/18 
//Description: No Breath 
//==================================
[Enable] 
008288B6: //C7 86 ?? ?? 00 00 88 13 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF
mov [esi+00000478],00000000
00861E4A: //C7 83 ?? ?? 00 00 88 13 00 00 39 38 74
mov [ebx+00000478],00000000 //Bypass Other Stuff Breath

//以下AOB分別兩組
//50 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 45 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 6A 01 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 4D FC FF
004EC2BF: //50 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 45 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 6A 01 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 4D FC FF 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2
db 55 //Bypass CC DC While Attacking
008F0D8E: //50 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 45 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 6A 01 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 4D FC FF 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
db 55 //Bypass CS DC While Attacking
[Disable] 
008288B6:
mov [esi+00000478],00001388
00861E4A:
mov [ebx+00000478],00001388
004EC2BF:
DB 50
008F0D8E:
push eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	AutoLR
// Version:	TWMS141
// Update:	Inndy
// EIP：	AutoLRMain
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 3b c7 0f 85
// Cortrol：	AutoLRRange
// 0: Off, Else:Range
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008C127E
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008C127E
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-08], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008C1501

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-08], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008C1501
//-----------------------------------------------
00CCCA80:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00CCCA80:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS140 ICS 定點生怪
//原創：不知道，據說是浪漫高層找的
//更新：Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(myHook, 1024)
Alloc(xMobPX, 4)
Alloc(xMobPY, 4)
Alloc(xMobPIO, 4)
Label(Dull0121)
Label(Dull013)
Label(Dull0122)
Label(Dull01221)
Label(Dull01222)
Label(Dull01223)
Label(Dull01224)
Label(Dull01225)

myHook:
    cmp [esp], 005CAE88	//8B 07 8B CF FF 90 ?? 00 00 00 50 8B CE
    jne 008B9B07	//55 8B EC 53 8B 5D 10 56 57
    cmp [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull0121
    pushad
    mov eax,[00cbff70]
    mov ebx,[eax+5A18]
    mov [xMobPX],ebx
    mov ebx,[eax+5A1C]
    mov [xMobPY],ebx
    popad
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    jmp Dull013
Dull0121:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
    jne Dull013
    push ecx
    mov ecx,[xMobPX]
    mov [esp+0c],ecx
    mov eax,[xMobPY]
    mov [esp+10],eax
    push eax
    mov ecx,[00cc4458]  // (地圖牆壁值) //a1 ?? ?? ?? 00 c3 8b c1 83 20 00 c3 8b c1
    call Dull0122
    mov ecx,eax
    mov [esp+20],ecx
    pop ecx

Dull013:
    jmp 008B9B07
Dull0122: // 00430223 // 0043021A // 0042D006
    //6A 14 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 33 F6 89 75 ?? 89 75 ?? 89 75
    push 14
    mov eax,0096746d
    call 009439c9
    xor esi,esi
    mov [ebp-10],esi
    mov [ebp-14],esi
    mov [ebp-04],esi
    cmp [ebp+08],esi
    je 0043025b
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    push eax
    lea eax,[ebp+08]
    push eax
    add ecx,00000088
    call 0042f860
    test eax,eax
    je Dull01221 
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    jmp Dull01222
Dull01221:
    mov [ebp-1c],esi
    lea eax,[ebp-20]
    mov [ebp-10],00000001
Dull01222:
    test byte ptr [ebp-10],01
    mov esi,[eax+04]
    je 00430279
    lea ecx,[ebp-20]
    //call 0042f7b5
    call Dull01224
Dull01223:
    or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
    lea ecx,[ebp-18]
    //call 0042f7b5
    call Dull01224
    mov eax,esi
    call 00943aa1
    ret 4
Dull01224:  //0042C5BA
    push esi
    mov esi,ecx
    cmp dword ptr [esi+04],00
    je Dull01225
    push 00
    call 0042eda1 // 0042ed98 // 0042bc79  //004b0657
    and dword ptr [esi+04],00
Dull01225:
    pop esi
    ret

00B60AE8:
DD myHook
[DISABLE]
00B60AE8:
DD 008B9B07

DeAlloc(myHook)
DeAlloc(xMobPX)
DeAlloc(xMobPY)
DeAlloc(xMobPIO)
```

```txt
//141慢速控怪e8 ? ? ? ? 23 7d e0 83 ff ff 75 56
[enable]

Je MobControl
Jmp 006B3ADB

Jmp 006B3ADB

mov eax,[Ebx+000002A0]
mov [Race],eax
Mov eax,[Ebx+000000FC]
mov [LR],eax
Mov Eax,[Ebx+69C]
mov [X],eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_打怪吸怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.41.1 ICS 打怪吸怪
// 原創: ms890110
// ICS: 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(Vac, 512)
alloc(VacXY, 8)
label(ForceVac)
label(ForceVac2)
label(Label1)
label(Label2)
label(InitMob)
label(Normal)
label(FullMapVac)
label(StartVac)
label(Normal01)
label(Normal02)
label(Normal03)

VacXY:
ReadMem([00cbff70]+5A18, 8)

Vac:
ForceVac:
cmp [esp], 005D1341	//eb 0e 8b ce e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 83 e0 01 53
jne 008B4C3C		//8b 81 ?? ?? 00 00 c3 8b 44 24 04 89 81 ?? ?? 00 00 c2 04 00 8b c1
mov [esp], ForceVac2
jmp 008B4C3C

ForceVac2:
push eax
mov ecx, esi
call 005cbc1d
and edi, [ebp-20]
cmp edi, ff
jne 005d13b7

mov ecx, esi
call 005bd083
cmp eax, edi
jle Label1

cmp [ebp-10], ebx
je 005d13b7

Label1:
cmp [esi+00000498], ebx
jne 005d13b7

mov ecx, esi
call 005bd101
test eax, eax
jne 005d13b7

mov ecx, esi
call 005bd01a
cmp eax, 03
je Label2

mov ecx, esi
call 005bd01a
cmp eax, 04
jne 005d13b7

Label2:
cmp [esi+000003f0], ebx
jne 005d13b7

push 64
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx

push eax
mov eax, [esi+00000110]
test eax, eax
je Normal

add eax, f4
cmp dword ptr [eax+000002a0], 00
je Normal
cmp dword ptr [eax+000002a0], 06
jg Normal
cmp dword ptr [eax+08], 00
je InitMob
cmp dword ptr [eax+08], 01
jne Normal

pop eax
push 00 // 怪物動作
jmp 005D13B0

InitMob:
inc [eax+08]

Normal:
pop eax
push FF
jmp 005D13B0

//--------------------------
FullMapVac:
cmp [esp], 005CDEF9	//8b 7d 08 83 c7 ?? 83 ff 02
jne 008B9B07		//55 8b ec 53 8b 5d 10 56 57
mov eax, [ebp-10]
cmp dword ptr [eax+08], 01
je StartVac
jmp 008B9B07

StartVac:
cmp [eax+2a0], 06
je 008B9B07
mov [esp+1c], 00

mov eax, [esp+18]
cmp eax, 04
je Normal01
cmp eax, 02
je Normal01
cmp eax, 05
je Normal01

/*
Normal01:
mov eax, [esp+14]
test eax, eax
je Normal02


Normal02:
mov eax, [esp+10]
test eax, eax
je Normal03
*/

Normal03:
push ecx
mov ecx, [ebp-10]
mov esi, [VacXY]
mov [esp+0c], esi
mov [ecx+238], esi
mov [ecx+69c], esi
mov eax, [VacXY+04]
sub eax, 5
mov [esp+10], eax
mov [ecx+23a], eax
mov [ecx+6a0], eax
mov [ecx+2a0], 06 // 定怪
pop ecx
jmp 008B9B07

00B60AF4:
dd ForceVac

00B60AE8:
dd FullMapVac

[disable]
00B60AF4: // 005D05B9 ff 90 ? 00 00 00 eb ? 8b ce e8 ? ? ? ? 83 e0 01
dd 008B4C3C

00B60AE8: // 005CD175 ff 17 8b 7d ? 83 c7 f9
dd 008B9B07

dealloc(Vac)
//TWMS140
// 005D05B9 call dword ptr [eax+00000090] => eax+90: 00B5E384, [eax+90]: 008B34F0
// 005CD175 call dword ptr [edi] => edi: 00B5E378, [edi]: 008B83BB
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_控怪+跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(JumpMobFall, 128)
Alloc(MobLR, 512)
Alloc(MobLRSwitch, 4)
Alloc(MobGoX, 4)
Alloc(JumpDown, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
RegisterSymbol(MobGoX)
RegisterSymbol(JumpDown)
Label(ControlMob)
Label(Back)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoMe)
Label(GoX)
Label(GetX)

JumpDown:
DD   1 // 跳怪掉落開關
MobLRSwitch:
DD   3 // 控怪開關，0關1左2右3跟隨4取點5定點

MobLR:
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 20
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+08]
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, [00CC4458]
Mov  Ebx, Ecx
Push Edi
//-----------------------------------
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 01
Je   ControlMob
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 03
Je   ControlMob
Jmp  Back

ControlMob:
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 00
Je   Back
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 01
Je   GoLeft
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 02
Je   GoRight
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Je   GoX
Mov  Edi, [00CBFF70]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+00005A18]
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 03
Je   GoMe
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 04
Je   GetX
Jmp  Back

GoMe:
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  Back

GetX:
Mov  [MobGoX], Edi
Mov  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Jmp  GoX

GoX:
Mov  Edi, [MobGoX]
Jmp  GoMe


GoRight:
Mov  [Ebx+00000000EC], 00000004
Mov  [Ebx+00000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Back

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ebx+00000000EC], 00000005
Mov  [Ebx+00000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Back
//-----------------------------------
Back:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 0
Je   008BC5B1
Lea  Edi,[Ebx+00000088]
Fld  qword ptr [Edi]
Fsub qword ptr [Eax]
Fstp qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fldz
Fcom qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fnstsw Ax
Test Ah,44
Jnp  008BCCE1
Mov  Eax,[Ebx+000002A0]
Cmp  Eax,01
Je   008BC5DD
Fstp st(0)
Cmp  Eax,03
Jmp  008BC97F

JumpMobFall:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 00
Je   008BB026
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 0C
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, Ecx
Cmp  dword ptr [Esi+000002A0], 03
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00CC4458]
Jmp 008BB0FF

00B60BE0:
DD MobLR

00B60BE4:
DD JumpMobFall
[DISABLE]
00B60BE0:
DD 008BC59D

00B60BE4:
DD 008BB026

Dealloc(JumpMobFall)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(MobLRSwitch)
Dealloc(MobGoX)
Dealloc(JumpDown)
UnregisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobGoX)
UnregisterSymbol(JumpDown)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_無敵.txt`:

```txt
//v.140. 人物不退+5次MISS [ICS] by.aaaddress1
[ENABLE]
alloc(Set,128)
label(set1)
label(normal)
label(keepzerohurt)
alloc(times,4)
Set:
cmp [esp],00861C25	//ff 75 ?? 8b 10 ff 75 ?? 8b c8 57 57
jne 0083E91E		//8b 81 00 3d 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 8b 81 ?? ?? 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 56
mov [esp],set1
jmp 0083E91E
set1:
inc [times]
cmp [times],4 //MISS 次數-1
jl keepzerohurt
mov [times],0
jmp normal
keepzerohurt:
mov [ebp+58],0
normal:
push 00       //人物不退
mov edx,[eax]
push 00       //人物不退
mov ecx,eax
push edi
push edi
push 20
call dword ptr [edx+58]
mov ecx,[ebp+48]
push 05
lea eax,[ebp+38]
push eax
mov [ebp+60],2710  //無敵時間(目前10秒)
jmp 00861C7D
00B5DEDC:
dd Set
[DISABLE]
00B5DEDC:
dd 0083E91E

dealloc(Set)
dealloc(times)
```

```txt
// Name：	Full God
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
//秒數無敵、Miss無敵、笨怪、物品過濾、怪物不急退、跳怪不跳
[ENABLE]
RegisterSymbol(Main)
Alloc(Main, 4096)
RegisterSymbol(Time)
Alloc(Time, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MissTime)
Alloc(MissTime, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MissTimeCmp)
Alloc(MissTimeCmp, 4)
RegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
Alloc(FilterMode, 4)
RegisterSymbol(LastItem)
Alloc(LastItem, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MonsterNoJump)
Alloc(MonsterNoJump, 4)
Label(Nohurt)
Label(NohurtMain)
Label(NohurtMainI)
Label(NohurtMainII)
Label(StupidMonster)
Label(StupidMonsterMain)
Label(MobNoKB)
Label(MobNoKBMain)
Label(ItemFilter)
Label(ItemFilterMain)
Label(ItemFilterOr1)
Label(ItemFilterOr2)
Label(ItemBlackFilter)
Label(ItemWhiteFilter)
Label(SkipItem)
Label(EndFilter)
Label(MobNoJump)
Label(MobNoJumpMain)
Label(MobFast)
Label(MobFastMain)
Alloc(ItemList, 32768)

//==============
Time:		//無敵時間
DD FFFF8AD0	//30秒

MissTime:	//迴避次數
DD 3

FilterMode:	//物品過濾模式
DD 1		//0關 1黑名單模式 2白名單模式

MonsterNoJump:	//怪物不跳
DD 1
//==============
ItemList:
//請在以下加入物品清單

DD 1E8482 // 白色藥水 

DD 1F6EE0 // 箭矢
DD 1F72C8 // 弩箭矢
DD 1F95F0 // 海星鏢

DD 3D7E3C // 怪物卡
DD 3D8834 // 紅茶茶包
DD 3D8836 // 布塊

DD 3FA129 // 英雄鑰匙
DD 414EC5 // 神祕罐子
DD 3D8892 // 切片蛋糕
DD 3D87FF // 安迪的懷表
DD 3D882E // 紅色內衣 

DD 253F2F // 撲通撲通的心(右側用)
DD 253F2C // 三角飯糰(左側用)
DD 253B41 // 吃蟲寶石君
DD 253B40 // 吃蟲桔小姐


//童話村
DD 3D09A9 // 倒米棒 
DD 3D8838 // 填充棉花 
DD 3D09AA // 老虎腳印 
DD 3D09AB // 虎皮 


//水世界
DD 3D8839 // 溫暖氣泡
DD 3D09A1 // 海馬的尾巴 


//神木村
DD 3D888F // 鑽石7卡片
DD 3FA128 // 冰方塊

//桃花仙境
DD 3D0A15 // 頂針 
DD 3D883B // 火焰秘笈 

//請在以上加入物品清單
DD 00
//==============
Main:
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008616DD	//e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je Nohurt		//無敵
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008B9D7A	//33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je StupidMonster	//笨怪
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008BAD42	//6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je MobNoJump		//跳怪不跳
Cmp [Esp+34], 005CFF6C	//8b 55 40 8b cb e8 ?? ?? ff ff 83 7d ?? 01 75 10 8b cf
Je MobNoKB		//怪物不擊退
Cmp [Esp+34], 005DCEBD	//8B 5D ?? E9 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 7E ?? 8A 07
Je MobFast		//怪物瞬移
Cmp [Esp+64], 004D7553	//8b 45 ?? 8b 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 f8 01
Je ItemFilter		//物品過濾

Jmp 006B3ADB
//==============
Nohurt:
Mov [Esp+1c], NohurtMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

StupidMonster:
Mov [Esp+1c], StupidMonsterMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

MobNoJump:
Mov [Esp+1c], 008BAD56//MobNoJumpMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

MobNoKB:
Mov [Esp+34], MobNoKBMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

MobFast:
//Mov [Esp+34], MobFastMain
//Jmp 006B3ADB

ItemFilter:
Mov [Esp+64], ItemFilterMain
Jmp 006B3ADB
//-------------------------
MobNoJumpMain:
Cmp  [MonsterNoJump], 0
Je   008BAD42
Jmp  008BAD56
//-------------------------
StupidMonsterMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000ea60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002b8]
Jmp  008B9D8F
//-------------------------
NohurtMain:
Call 0042ebd7
Test byte ptr [Eax+000001b4], 02
Je   NohurtMainI
Jmp  008616E9
//==============
NohurtMainI:
Lea  Ecx, [Ebx+00003CF8]
Push [Time]
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MissTime]
Cmp  [MissTimeCmp], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jg   NohurtMainII
Mov  [Ebp+58], 0
inc  [MissTimeCmp]
Jmp  00861C66	//e8 ?? ?? ?? ff e9 ?? ?? 00 00 6a 05
//==============
NohurtMainII:
Mov  [MissTimeCmp], 0
Jmp  00861C66
//-------------------------
MobNoKBMain:
Mov  Edx, [Ebp+40]
Mov  Ecx, Ebx
Call 005c0518
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Call 005bdb5c
Xor  Edx, Edx
Jmp  005CFF8F
//-------------------------
ItemFilterMain:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp-1c]
Mov  Esi, [Ebp-50]
Mov  [Esi+1c], Al
Cmp  Eax, 01
Je   ItemFilterOr1
Cmp  Eax, 02
Je   ItemFilterOr1
Xor  Al, Al
Jmp  ItemFilterOr2

ItemFilterOr1:
Mov  Al, 01
ItemFilterOr2:
Mov  [Esi+1d], Al
Mov  [Esi+20], Edi
Mov  Edi, [Ebp+08]
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Call 0040857d
Movzx Eax, Al
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [Esi+30], Eax
Call 004085d9

Push Esi
Mov  Esi, ItemList
Cmp  Eax, C350
JLE  EndFilter
Mov  [LastItem], Eax
Cmp  [FilterMode], 0
Je   EndFilter
Cmp  [FilterMode], 1
Je   ItemBlackFilter
Cmp  [FilterMode], 2
Je   ItemWhiteFilter


ItemBlackFilter:
Cmp  [Esi], 0
Je   EndFilter
Cmp  [Esi], Eax
Je   SkipItem
Add  Esi, 4
Jmp  ItemBlackFilter

ItemWhiteFilter:
Cmp  [Esi], 0
Je   SkipItem
Cmp  [Esi], Eax
Je   EndFilter
Add  Esi, 4
Jmp  ItemWhiteFilter

SkipItem:
Xor  Eax, Eax
EndFilter:
Pop  Esi
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [Esi+34], Eax
Jmp  004D758E
//-------------------------
MobFastMain:
mov ebx,[ebp+14]
cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
db 75 05 //jne +5
jmp 005DCFAF
mov edi,[esi+30]
mov al,[edi]
cmp al,0b
je 005dcf9a
movzx ecx,al
xor eax,eax
inc eax
xor edx,edx
call 00947e60
mov ecx,[ebp+20]
or [ecx],eax
or [ecx+04],edx
mov ecx,esi


//005DCEE9 - E8 4000FEFF                - call 005BCF2E
push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
mov eax,ecx
push ecx
call 00404e5a //瞬4
pop ecx
pop ecx


movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
cmp eax,ecx
jl 005dcfaf
mov ecx,esi


//005DCEFC - E8 2D00FEFF                - call 005BCF2E
push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
mov eax,ecx
push ecx
//call 00404e5a //瞬1
pop ecx
pop ecx


//005DCF01 - 8B D0                      - mov edx,eax
//005DCF03 - 0FBF 47 10                 - movsx eax,word ptr [edi+10]
//005DCF07 - 2B D0                      - sub edx,eax
//005DCF09 - 8B CE                      - mov ecx,esi
//005DCF0B - E8 70F7FFFF                - call 005DC680
jmp 005DCF10
//-------------------------
00CA593C:
dd Main
[DISABLE]
00CA593C:
DD 006B3ADB
//-------------------------
DeAlloc(Main)
UnRegisterSymbol(Main)
DeAlloc(Time)
UnRegisterSymbol(Time)
DeAlloc(MissTime)
UnRegisterSymbol(MissTime)
DeAlloc(MissTimeCmp)
UnRegisterSymbol(MissTimeCmp)
DeAlloc(FilterMode)
UnRegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
UnRegisterSymbol(MonsterNoJump)
DeAlloc(MonsterNoJump)
UnRegisterSymbol(LastItem)
DeAlloc(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.40.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// 原創: 007
// ICS: 冷羽楓痕 (修正斷線問題)

[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)
label(HookTime2)
label(InitTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 05

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp],0086F3AE	//8b 83 ?? 00 00 00 8b 4d ?? 83 c0
jne 008B4E99		//53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06 8b ce ff 50 ?? 8b d8 85 db 74

mov eax,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test eax,eax
je Normal

dec eax
push eax
push ecx
call 008B4E99
pop ecx
pop eax
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
call 008B4E99
ret

HookTime:
cmp [FakeTime],0
je InitTime

HookTime2:
mov eax,[FakeTime]
add eax,1FE
mov [FakeTime],eax
jmp 00DA130E

InitTime:
mov [FakeTime],eax
push eax
lea eax,[HookTime2]
sub eax,00EB7FC7    // 00EB7FC2+5
mov [00EB7FC3],eax  // 00EB7FC2+1
pop eax
jmp 00DA130E

00B6124C:
dd SpeedUp

00EB7FC2:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00B6124C:
dd 008B4E99

00EB7FC2:
jmp 00DA130E

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	No Empty Attack
// Version:	TWMS141
// Update:	Inndy
// EIP：	NoEmptyAtkICS
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(NoEmptyAtkICS,512)

NoEmptyAtkICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 00864117
Jne  OffsetRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call OffsetRect

Push [Ebp-000001a4]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [Ebp-00000184]
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-00000180]
Push Eax
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-68]
Push Eax
Call 00436002
Mov  Ecx,Eax
Call 005d2b20
Mov  [Ebp-78],Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Je   0086440B //8b 85 ?? fe ff ff 89 85 ?? ?? ff ff 81 bd ?? ?? ff ff ?? ?? ?? ?? 74 02 eb 4c
Jmp  00864149

00CCC9F4:
DD NoEmptyAtkICS

[DISABLE]
00CCC9F4:
DD OffsetRect

DeAlloc(NoEmptyAtkICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/TWMS141_ICS_限定全圖打.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	Limited Full Map Attack
// Version:	TWMS141
// Update:	Inndy
// EIP：	FullMapICS
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c0 75 08 ff 45 e8 83 c7 10 eb c9 8b 45
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
alloc(FullMapICS,64)

FullMapICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 005D2CB3
Jne  IntersectRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call IntersectRect
Test Eax, Eax
Jmp  005D2CBF

00CCCA48:
dd FullMapICS
[Disable]
00CCCA48:
dd IntersectRect

dealloc(FullMapICS)
```

```txt
人物X軸		00cbdcd0	5a18

//系統時間初始化

//系統時間取得CALL
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/研究中/Hotkey.txt`:

```txt
008CEAFD - 55                         - push ebp				//貌似是WindowMessage處理位址


008CEB12 - 8B 45 70                   - mov eax,[ebp+70]		//Eax設定點
......
008CEB58 - 3D 01010000                - cmp eax,00000101
008CEB5D - 0F86 DC000000              - jbe 008CEC3F			//跳轉點
008CEB63 - 3D 02010000                - cmp eax,00000102
008CEB68 - 0F84 A1000000              - je 008CEC0F
008CEB6E - 3D 03010000                - cmp eax,00000103
008CEB73 - 0F86 52030000              - jbe 008CEECB
008CEB79 - 3D 05010000                - cmp eax,00000105
008CEB7E - 0F86 BB000000              - jbe 008CEC3F			//跳轉點


008CECB1 - FF 33                      - push [ebx]				//Hotkey
008CECB3 - 50                         - push eax
008CECB4 - E8 EEEEFFFF                - call 008CDBA7


008CDD52 - FF 75 10                   - push [ebp+10]			//Hotkey
008CDD55 - 8B 8E A4000000             - mov ecx,[esi+000000A4]
008CDD5B - 8B 01                      - mov eax,[ecx]
008CDD5D - 57                         - push edi
008CDD5E - FF 10                      - call dword ptr [eax]


004E7B61 - 55                         - push ebp				//設定EBP
004E7B62 - 8B EC                      - mov ebp,esp
......
004E7C8C - E8 7E6D3800                - call 0086EA0F

0086EA3C - 8B 75 0C                   - mov esi,[ebp+0C]		//Hotkey
0086EA3F - 8D 4D E0                   - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
0086EA42 - C1 EE 10                   - shr esi,10
0086EA45 - 8D 7B 04                   - lea edi,[ebx+04]
0086EA48 - 8B 07                      - mov eax,[edi]
0086EA4A - 51                         - push ecx
0086EA4B - 81 E6 FF000000             - and esi,000000FF		//Hotkey
......
0086EE0B - 8B 0D B847CC00             - mov ecx,[00CC47B8]		//Base
0086EE11 - 6A 01                      - push 01
0086EE13 - FF 75 EC                   - push [ebp-14]
0086EE16 - E8 4562DDFF                - call 00645060

00645060 - 6A 48                      - push 48
00645062 - B8 B4BF9B00                - mov eax,009BBFB4
00645067 - E8 5DE92F00                - call 009439C9
0064506C - 8B D9                      - mov ebx,ecx
0064506E - A1 70FFCB00                - mov eax,[00CBFF70]		//人物基址
00645073 - 33 C9                      - xor ecx,ecx
00645075 - 89 4D F0                   - mov [ebp-10],ecx
00645078 - 3B C1                      - cmp eax,ecx
0064507A - 0F84 2D030000              - je 006453AD
00645080 - 8B 80 7C040000             - mov eax,[eax+0000047C]	//人物動作
00645086 - 83 E0 FE                   - and eax,FE
00645089 - 83 F8 12                   - cmp eax,12
0064508C - 0F84 1B030000              - je 006453AD
00645092 - 8B 45 08                   - mov eax,[ebp+08]
00645095 - 83 F8 2A                   - cmp eax,2A
00645098 - 75 0A                      - jne 006450A4
0064509A - C7 45 08 36000000          - mov [ebp+08],00000036
006450A1 - 8B 45 08                   - mov eax,[ebp+08]
006450A4 - 39 43 48                   - cmp [ebx+48],eax		//Offset
006450A7 - 75 0C                      - jne 006450B5
006450A9 - 8B 55 0C                   - mov edx,[ebp+0C]
006450AC - 3B 53 4C                   - cmp edx,[ebx+4C]
006450AF - 0F84 00030000              - je 006453B5
006450B5 - 89 43 48                   - mov [ebx+48],eax		//Offset
```

```txt
//[I n]放技能被拒絕
25 00 00

//[I n]Ping
09 00
//[Out]Ping
24 00

//長杖極速(煉獄巫師)
//紅色吸血術(煉獄巫師)

8F 00 [Time*4] 8D D2 E9 01 14 00 00 00

//[Out]點技能(藍色繩索、黃色繩索)
//好像有系統時間，沒注意看
8E 00 44 A3 F4 00 8B D2 E9 01 //黃色繩索
8E 00 1A A0 F4 00 8A D2 E9 01 //藍色繩索

//[Out]取消藍色繩索
90 00 8A D2 E9 01 00

//[Out]消耗使用第N項物品
6C 00 [Time*4] [N*1] 00 81 84 1E 00

//[Out]交換物品
68 00 [Time*4] [裝備=1,消耗=2,裝飾=3,其他=4*1byte] 01 00 02 00 FF FF

//[Out]丟錢
92 00 [Time*4] [Money*2] 00 00

//[Out]丟物品

//[Out]向上整理物品(1)

//[Out]順序整理物品(2)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/研究中/Twms.141 ICS 疾風控怪無敵怪瞬笨怪.txt`:

```txt
//cC8298
[enable]
Registersymbol(Main)
Alloc(Main, 512)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(MobControl)
Label(MobControlMain)
Label(MobControlLR)
Label(MobControlL)
Label(MobControlR)
Label(MobControlReturn)
Label(MobFast)
Label(MobFastMain)
Label(StupidMonster)
Label(StupidMonsterMain)
Alloc(x,4)

Main:
Cmp Dword Ptr [Esp+1c],008616DD //無敵e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je God
Cmp Dword Ptr [Esp+40],005D1359 //怪物控制e8 ? ? ? ? 23 7d e0 83 ff ff 75 56
Je MobControl
Cmp Dword Ptr [Esp+34],005DCEBD //怪物瞬移e8 ? ? ? ? 8b 5d 14 e9 e0 00 00 00
Je MobFast   
Cmp Dword Ptr [Esp+1c],008B9D7A //笨怪e8 ? ? ? ? 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00
Je StupidMonster       
Jmp 006B3ADB

God:
Mov [Esp+1c],GodMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

MobControl:
Mov [Esp+40],MobControlMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

MobFast:
Mov [Esp+34], MobFastMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

StupidMonster:
Mov [Esp+1c], StupidMonsterMain
Jmp 006B3ADB

GodMain:
Lea  Ecx, [Ebx+00003CF8] //8d 8b ? ? 00 00 50 e8 ? ? ? ? e9
Push FFFF8AD0
Jmp  00861C66
//-----------------------------------------------------------
MobControlMain:
Pushad
Mov Eax,[00cc7b68]
Mov Eax,[Eax+B0C]
Mov [x],Eax
Cmp Esi,0
Je MobControlReturn
Mov Eax,[Esi]
Cmp Eax,0
Je MobControlReturn
Cmp [Eax],0
Je MobControlReturn
Cmp [Eax],005D07D4 //68 b4 00 00 00 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 8b f1
Jne MobControlReturn
Mov Ebx,[Esi+110]
Cmp Ebx,0
Je MobControlReturn
Sub Ebx,C
Cmp Ebx,0
Je MobControlReturn
Cmp [Ebx+2A0],1
Je MobControlLR
Cmp [Ebx+2A0],3
Je MobControlLR
Jmp MobControlReturn

MobControlLR:
//Mov [Ebx+2A0],2 //怪物掉落
Mov Eax,[Ebx+69C]
Cmp Eax,[x]
Jg MobControlL
Jl MobControlR
Jmp MobControlReturn

MobControlL:
Mov [Ebx+000000FC],FFFFFFFF
Mov [Ebx+000000EC],5
Jmp MobControlReturn

MobControlR:
Mov [Ebx+000000FC],1
Mov [Ebx+000000EC],4
Jmp MobControlReturn

MobControlReturn:
Popad
Jmp 005D1359 //同位子
//----------------------------------------------------------

MobFastMain:
mov ebx,[ebp+14]
cmp dword ptr [esi+2c],00
db 75 05 //jne +5
jmp 005DCFAF
mov edi,[esi+30]
mov al,[edi]
cmp al,0b
je 005dcf9a
movzx ecx,al
xor eax,eax
inc eax
xor edx,edx
call 00947e60
mov ecx,[ebp+20]
or [ecx],eax
or [ecx+04],edx
mov ecx,esi
//call 005bcf2e
push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
mov eax,ecx
push ecx
call 00404e5a //瞬4
pop ecx
pop ecx
movsx ecx,word ptr [edi+10]
cmp eax,ecx
jl 005dcfaf
mov ecx,esi
push [ecx+0000008c]
add ecx,00000084
mov eax,ecx
push ecx
//call 00404e5a //瞬1
pop ecx
pop ecx
jmp 005DCF10

StupidMonsterMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000ea60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002b8]
Jmp  008B9D8F

00ca593c:
dd Main

[DISABLE]
00ca593c:
DD 006B3ADB

dealloc(Main)
unregistersymbol(Main)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/研究中/回覆血魔.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.41.1 定時回覆血魔
// Made by Inndy
[enable]
Alloc(SendPacket, 256)
Alloc(PacketStruct1, 16)
Alloc(PacketStruct2, 16)
Alloc(PacketData1, 19)
Alloc(PacketData2, 19)
Alloc(SendTime, 04)
Alloc(Switch, 04)
Alloc(FakeTime, 04)
Label(Normal)
Label(NextPacket)
Registersymbol(Switch)
CreateThread(SendPacket)

/*
8B 00 A7 20 E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00
8B 00 3D 21 E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00
8B 00 CB 47 E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00
8B 00 61 48 E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00
8B 00 EF 6E E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00
8B 00 85 6F E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00
8B 00 13 96 E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00
8B 00 A9 96 E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00
8B 00 37 BD E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00
8B 00 CD BD E3 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00

8B [=T i m e=] 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 [M p] 00
8B [=T i m e=] 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 [H p] 00 00 00
*/

// MP封包結構
PacketStruct1:
DD 00                   // 00
DD PacketData1          // 封包資料位址
DD #19                  // 封包長度
DD 00                   // 00

// HP封包結構
PacketStruct2:
DD 00                   // 00
DD PacketData2          // 封包資料位址
DD #19                  // 封包長度
DD 00                   // 00

PacketData1: // 放MP封包資料
//    Time_______                                  MP___
db 8B 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 00 00

PacketData2: // 放HP封包資料
//    Time_______                            HP___
db 8B 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 00 00 00 00

Switch: // 開關
dd 01

FakeTime:
readmem([00cc4a38]+1c, 04)

SendPacket:
cmp [Switch],00 // 設0關閉
je Normal

mov eax,[00cc4a38]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp eax,[SendTime]
jl SendPacket

add eax,000009C4 // 延遲時間(2500ms)
mov [SendTime],eax

add [FakeTime],3E8
mov eax,[FakeTime]
mov [PacketData1+02],eax // 假的時間
mov [PacketData2+02],eax // 假的時間

mov ecx,[00cbffa4] // !?
push SendPacket
push PacketStruct1
push 00401005 // 假的返回位址
push 004861BC // 送封包
ret

NextPacket:
mov ecx,[00cbffa4] // !?
push SendPacket
push PacketStruct2
push 00401005 // 假的返回位址
push 004861BC // 送封包
ret


Normal:
ret

[disable]

// 怪物基址 - 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? ?? 53 53 53 ff 70 ?? 8d 85 ?? ff ff ff
// 地圖基址 - 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? 00 00 8b ce e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 0f
// 時間基址 - A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 40 ?? C3
// !? - 8b 0d ? ? ? ? 8d 45 ? 50 e8 ? ? ? ? 6a 01 8b ce
// 送封包位址 - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS141/研究中/怪怪CALL.txt`:

```txt
008CDBA7 - 6A 00                      - push 00
008CDBA9 - B8 7429A100                - mov eax,00A12974 : [0824548B]
008CDBAE - E8 165E0700                - call 009439C9	//就是這個詭異的CALL

Push 0
Eax = 00A12974
Push {ReturnPoint}

Push Eax
Push fs:[00000000]
Eax = Esp+0C		//Eax指向參數1
Esp -= [Esp+0C]		//Esp減掉參數1
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Push Edi
[Eax] = Ebp		//參數1 = Ebp
Ebp = Eax		//Ebp指向參數1
Eax = Ebp ^ B4AF6BCB
Push Eax
Push [Ebp-04]
[Ebp-04] = FFFFFFFF
Eax = Ebp-0C
fs:[00000000] = Eax
Ret

參數1 = 原本Ebp
Ebp 指向 參數1
Esp -= 參數1 + 1C

Push Ebp
Sub Esp, 1C
Sub Esp, 參數1
```

```txt
call 00890D49
dec eax
mov dword ptr [esi+000020A8],eax
//以上三行也可以改成以下這行
//只是下面這行貌似會斷DC
//and dword ptr [esi+000020A8],00

inc eax
ret 8
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/BombRushSpeedUp.h.txt`:

```txt
DWORD BombRushSpeedUp_Call1 = 0x005D2AD3;
DWORD BombRushSpeedUp_Call2 = 0x005BDAAF;
DWORD ICS_Return = *(DWORD*)0x00CCC9F4;
DWORD SwitchBombRushSpeedUp = 0;
DWORD TIMES = 0;
void __declspec(naked) BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN();
DWORD BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN_addr = (DWORD)BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN ;
void __declspec(naked) BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN()
{
VMProtectBeginMutation("BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN");
__asm
{
LABEL_BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN_addr:
MOV ECX,[0x00CC44FC]
PUSHAD
PUSH 0
PUSH 0
PUSH 0
PUSH 0
PUSH 0
PUSH 0
PUSH 0
PUSH 01
LEA EAX,[EBP+0x60]
PUSH EAX
LEA EAX,[EBP+0x1C]
PUSH EAX
MOV [EBP+0x60],EBX
CALL DWORD PTR[BombRushSpeedUp_Call1]
INC [TIMES]
POPAD
CMP [TIMES],0x20
JL LABEL_BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN_addr
MOV [TIMES],0
Mov Eax,[Ebp+0x60]
Mov [Ebp+0x68],Eax
Cmp [Ebp+0x68],Ebx
Je Label_00838DAA
Mov Eax,[Ebp+0x68]
Mov Ecx,[Eax+0x00000180]
Cmp [Eax+0x0000031C],Ebx
Jne Label_00838D98
Mov Ecx,Eax
Call Dword Ptr [BombRushSpeedUp_Call2]
Mov Eax,[Ebp+0x68]
Cmp [Eax+0x000003F0],Ebx
Je Label_00838DAC
Mov [Ebp+0x68],Ebx
Mov Eax,[Ebp+0x68]
Cmp Eax,Ebx
Je Label_00838DAA
Mov Eax,[Eax+0x0000017C]
Push 00838DACh
Ret
Label_00838DAA:
Push 00838DAAh
Ret
Label_00838D98:
Push 00838D98h
Ret
Label_00838DAC:
Push 00838DACh
Ret
BombRushSpeedUp_Normal:
Push 00838D45h
Ret
}
VMProtectEnd();
}

void __declspec(naked) BombRushSpeedUp_asm()
{
VMProtectBeginMutation("BombRushSpeedUp_asm");
__asm
{
ICS_Entrance:
PUSH EAX
CMP [SwitchBombRushSpeedUp],1
JNE BACK
MOV EAX,[ESP+4]
CMP EAX,0x00838D3F
JNE BACK
MOV EAX,DWORD PTR [BombRushSpeedUp_MAIN_addr]
MOV [ESP+4],EAX
BACK:
POP EAX
Push [ICS_Return]
ret
}
VMProtectEnd();
}
void EnableBombRushSpeedUp()
{
VMProtectBeginUltra("EnableBombRushSpeedUp");
*(DWORD*)(0x00CCC9F4) = (DWORD)BombRushSpeedUp_asm;
VMProtectEnd();
}

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_WallVac(FlyMob).txt`:

```txt
//-------------------------------
//吸飛/游怪 For twmsV142
//auther:aaaddress1
//
//tips:
//First,Clear All Mob In Map.
//
//Second, All Fly Mob Will Appear
//At The Place When You Enable 
//This Script.
//-------------------------------
[ENABLE]
alloc(FlyMobVac,512) 
alloc(XY_Bit,8) 
//-------------------------------
XY_Bit:
readmem([00cbff70]+5A18,8)
//-------------------------------
FlyMobVac:
push edx
mov edx,[00CC4458]
push [XY_Bit] // X
push [XY_Bit] // X
push [XY_Bit+04] // Y
push [XY_Bit+04] // Y
pop [edx+20] // Top
pop [edx+28] // Bottom
pop [edx+1C] // Left
pop [edx+24] // Right
pop edx
jmp 005D136A // Je位址
//-------------------------------
005D131B: // 3B C7 7E 05 39
jmp FlyMobVac
nop
nop
//-------------------------------
005CFF39: // 7d 04 33 d2 eb 03
nop
nop
//-------------------------------
[DISABLE]

//-------------------------------
005CFF39:
DB 7D 04
```

```txt
//人物吸物   Twms137
[enable]
alloc(GetPlz,100)
alloc(UsePlz,100)
alloc(iXY,8)
label(GetRet)
label(UseRet)

004D3E9A:
nop
nop

008B4E11:
jmp 008B4E1D

004D4BDF:
jmp 004D4BF9

004D4BC9:
jmp GetPlz
GetRet:

008F0715:
jmp UsePlz
UseRet:

GetPlz:
call 00430603
mov ecx,[eax]
mov [iXY],ecx
mov ecx,[eax+04]
mov [iXY+04],ecx
jmp GetRet

UsePlz:
call 0041064C
mov edi,iXY
jmp UseRet+3
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_取得等級.txt`:

```txt
00685512 - 8b 44 24 04                - mov eax,[esp+04]	//Level
00685516 - 3d c8 00 00 00             - cmp eax,000000c8
0068551B - 7f 0d                      - jg 0068552a
0068551D - 83 f8 01                   - cmp eax,01
00685520 - 7d 03                      - jnl 00685525
00685522 - 33 c0                      - xor eax,eax
00685524 - 40                         - inc eax
00685525 - 8b 04 81                   - mov eax,[ecx+eax*4]
00685528 - eb 05                      - jmp 0068552f
0068552A - b8 ff ff ff 7f             - mov eax,7fffffff
0068552F - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004
00685532 - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]		//Level
00685536 - b9 30 c4 cc 00             - mov ecx,00ccc430	//EXP表
0068553B - e8 d2 ff ff ff             - call 00685512		//查詢升級所需EXP
00685540 - c3                         - ret

[ENABLE]
Alloc(GetLevel, 64)
Alloc(MyLevel, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MyLevel)
Alloc(EndLevel, 4)
RegisterSymbol(EndLevel)

GetLevel:
Mov  Eax, [Esp]
Mov  [MyLevel], Eax
Cmp  Eax, [EndLevel]
Jge  00000000
Mov  Ecx, 00CCC430
Jmp  0068553B

00685536:
Jmp  GetLevel
[DISABLE]
00685536:
DB   B9 30 C4 CC 00

Dealloc(GetLevel)
Dealloc(MyLevel)
UnregisterSymbol(MyLevel)
Dealloc(EndLevel)
UnregisterSymbol(EndLevel)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS142 取得血、魔、經驗值
//原創：Inndy
//ICSPointer: 00B56670
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 007B8DDD

007BD809: // E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8D B7 ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
007BD809:
Call 007B8DDD

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_怪物加速.txt`:

```txt
//v.142.怪物移動加速 by.aaaddress1
alloc(SetMap,128)
label(Back)
008B67BD:
jmp SetMap
nop

SetMap:
fld qword ptr [ebp-10]
cmp [esi+2a0],1
je 008B67BD+6
cmp [esi+2a0],3
je 008B67BD+6
Back:
fmul qword ptr [ebp-08]
jmp 008B67BD+6
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_怪物數量低於N無法攻擊.txt`:

```txt
// Twms V142
// 怪物數量低於N無法攻擊
// 更新：Inndy
[enable]
Alloc(StopAttack, 256)
Label(ReturnAttack)
RegisterSymbol(StopCount)
Alloc(StopCount, 4)

StopCount:
dd 1 //怪物數量

StopAttack:
push eax
mov eax,[00CC44FC]
mov eax,[eax+24]
cmp eax,[StopCount]
pop eax
jle 0047D2EF // Jne位址
jmp ReturnAttack

ReturnAttack:
cmp dword ptr [esi+000020a4],00
jmp 0047D2B8

0047D2B1: // 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 00 75 ? 83 7C 24 ?? 00 75
jmp StopAttack
nop
nop
[disable]
0047D2B1:
db 83 be a4 20 00 00 00

DeAlloc(StopAttack)
DeAlloc(StopCount)
UnRegisterSymbol(StopCount)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_惡魔布雷斯倍量攻擊.txt`:

```txt
//v142.惡魔布雷斯限定倍量攻擊 By.aaaddress1.
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetSkill,128)
alloc(Count,8)
label(ZeroAttack)
label(Nodelay)

SetSkill:
push edx
mov edx,[00cc4a38]
mov edx,[edx+1c]
cmp [Count],edx
jg ZeroAttack
mov eax,[ebx+00005A60]
mov [ebp+68],eax
add [ebp+68],1f4   //內定值時間符合正確時間戳記
mov eax,[ebp+68]
sub eax,[ebx+00004CEC]
inc [Count+04]
cmp [Count+04],03  //無延遲一次幾下
jl Nodelay
mov [Count+04],00
mov [Count],edx
add [Count],3e8    //無延遲間隔秒數
Nodelay:
pop edx
jmp 00870B64

ZeroAttack:
pop edx
jmp 00870B68

0081B957:
jmp 0081BCB1
nop
00870B47:
jmp SetSkill
nop
nop
nop
nop
[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_打怪吸怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.42.1 CRC 打怪吸怪

[enable]
alloc(Vac, 512)
alloc(VacXY, 8)
alloc(RangeY, 4)
alloc(VacTime, 4)
label(ForceVac)
label(InitMob)
label(Normal)
label(Normal2)
label(FullMapVac)
label(StartVac)
label(OtherCheck)
label(PassCheck)
registersymbol(Vac)

VacXY:
readmem([00cc7b68]+b0c, 8)

RangeY: // 吸怪範圍(上下各RangeY)
dd #300

VacTime: // 怪物出生到吸怪時間(毫秒)
dd #300

Vac:
ForceVac:
push eax
push ecx
mov ecx,[ebp-10]
test ecx,ecx
je Normal

cmp dword ptr [ecx+000002a0],00
je Normal
cmp dword ptr [ecx+000002a0],06
jg Normal

mov eax,[VacXY+04]
cmp eax,[ecx+6a0]
jl OtherCheck

sub eax,[ecx+6a0]
cmp eax,[RangeY]
jg Normal
jmp PassCheck

OtherCheck:
mov eax,[ecx+6a0]
sub eax,[VacXY+04]
cmp eax,[RangeY]
jg Normal

PassCheck:

cmp dword ptr [ecx+08],00
je InitMob

cmp dword ptr [ecx+08],01
jne InitMob

mov eax,[00cc4a38] //00890C81 - A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 40 ?? C3
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp dword ptr [ecx+04],eax
jg Normal

pop ecx
pop eax
jmp 005CDCA3

InitMob:
mov eax,[00cc4a38]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
add eax,[VacTime]
mov [ecx+04],eax
inc [ecx+08]

Normal:
pop ecx
pop eax
cmp edx,esi
jl 005ce19d
jmp 005CDCA3

//--------------------------
FullMapVac:
cmp [ebp+04],005CF779 // 攻擊怪物呼叫 - 8b 45 0c 3d 0f 26 31 00 75 ?
jne StartVac
//je Normal2

mov esi,[ebp-10]
cmp dword ptr [esi+08],01
jne Normal2
cmp dword ptr [esi+08],02
je Normal2
StartVac:
mov [esp+18],00

push ecx
mov ecx,[ebp-10]
mov [ecx+8],2
mov [ecx+000002a0],06 // 定怪
mov eax,[VacXY+04]
mov [esp+0c],eax //
mov [ecx+6a0],eax
mov esi,[VacXY]b
mov [esp+08],esi //
mov [ecx+69c],esi
pop ecx

Normal2:
call dword ptr [edi]
mov edi,[ebp+08]
jmp 005CDEAF

005CDC9B:
jmp ForceVac

005CDEAA:
jmp FullMapVac

008BD717:
jmp 008BD72F

005CFF2D:
jmp 005CFF3F

[disable]
008BD717:
mov eax,[esi+000002A0]
005CFF2D:
jne 005CFF3F
005CDC9B: // 3b d6 0f 8c ? ? ? ? 8b cb
cmp edx,esi
jl 005ce19d

005CDEAA: // ff 17 8b 7d ? 83 c7 f9
call dword ptr [edi]
mov edi,[ebp+08]

dealloc(Vac)
dealloc(RangeY)
dealloc(VacTime)
unregistersymbol(Vac)

// 005D05B9 call dword ptr [eax+00000090] => eax+90: 00B5E384, [eax+90]: 008B34F0
// 005CD175 call dword ptr [edi] => edi: 00B5E378, [edi]: 008B83BB

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_找技能控制源頭.txt`:

```txt
//v1.42.技能源頭探測 for twms.
//by.aaaddress1
//此數據可以快速挖到各個職業
//技能控制位置的"頭".
//
//使用方法:
//開啟數據後,對你想偵測之職業
//施放任何一項技能,即可看到該技能
//之控制源頭.(get值Hex=Adr)
[ENABLE]
alloc(skillset,128)
registersymbol(get)
alloc(get,4)
0084469C:
jmp skillset

skillset:
neg eax
sbb eax,eax
inc eax
push [esp]
pop [get]
ret
[DISABLE]
0084469C:
DB f7 d8 1b c0 40

dealloc(skillset)
unregistersymbol(get)
dealloc(get)
```

```txt
//TWMS142 技能加速
//Auther: Inndy
//不確定是否全職業
//請確保MP再50%以上
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Switch,4)
Alloc(FakeTime,4)
Alloc(TimeSet,256)
Alloc(FakeJmp,256)
Label(Truetime)

FakeJmp:
Cmp  [Switch], 00
Je   Truetime
Mov  Eax, [FakeTime]
Ret

Truetime:
Mov  Eax, [00CC4A38]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+1C]
Ret

TimeSet:
Mov  [Switch], 1
Add  [FakeTime], bb8
Call 00873112
Mov  [Switch], 0
Jmp  0087F8FB

0087E2DE:
jmp TimeSet

00890C81:
jmp FakeJmp
[DISABLE]
0087E2DE:
call 00873112

Dealloc(Switch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_換頻固定.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(SpawnControl,128)
Alloc(MapID,4)
Alloc(SpawnXY,8)
Label(rtnSPC)
Label(rtnNormal)
//MapIDPoint
//8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74 05 e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 83 3d
//89 86 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00 8b cf


SpawnXY:
readmem([00CBFF70]+5A18,8)
//8b 0d ?? ?? ?? ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8b ?? ?? 83 4d
//8b 0d ?? ?? ?? ?? 83 c4 ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? e9
//8b 0d ?? ?? ?? ?? 83 65 ?? ?? 83 65
//89 8e ?? ?? 00 00 8b 40 04 89 86 ?? ?? 00 00 8b 06

MapID:
readmem([00CC7B68]+0C38,4)

SpawnControl:
  push esi
  mov esi,[00CC7B68]
  mov esi,[esi+0C38]
  cmp [MapID],esi
  jnz rtnNormal

  mov ecx,[SpawnXY]
  mov [ebp-24],ecx
  mov eax,[SpawnXY+4]
  mov [ebp-20],eax
rtnNormal:
  pop esi
  lea eax,[ecx+00004CFC] //
  jmp rtnSPC

00852856:
//8d 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 38 00 74 15
  jmp SpawnControl
  db 90
  rtnSPC:

[DISABLE]
00852856:
  db 8d 83 fc 4c 00 00

dealloc(SpawnControl)
dealloc(MapID)
dealloc(SpawnXY)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_損血量控制+人物不退.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS142 損血量控制
//Auther: Inndy
//人物看到的損血量是正常值，其實有修改
[ENABLE]
Alloc(PreHackPacket, 128)
Label(Zero)
Alloc(LossHP, 4)
RegisterSymbol(LossHP)

PreHackPacket:
Mov  Eax, [Eax+04] // Packet Buffer
Mov  Ecx, [00CC8F80]
And  Ecx, 0000000F
Mov  [Eax+0C], Ecx
Mov  [Eax+18], Ecx
Mov  Eax, [Esp+04]
Mov  Ecx, [00CBFFA4]
Inc  [LossHP]

Cmp  [LossHP], 5
Jg   Zero
Jmp  00486158

Zero:
And  [LossHP], 0
Jmp  00486158

0086265F:
Call PreHackPacket

00861B52: // 人物不退
DB 6A 00 90 8B 10 6A 00 90
[DISABLE]
0086265F:
Call 00486158

00861B52:
DB FF 75 60 8B 10 FF 75 5C

Dealloc(PreHackPacket)
Dealloc(LossHP)
UnregisterSymbol(LossHP)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_攻擊不停(CSX).txt`:

```txt
//=================================================
// 攻擊不停 for Twms142
// 原作：未知
//
// 功能:
// 0.關閉, 1.攻擊不停.
//
// 使用方法:
// 修改 AtkNsKey 的值即可.
//=================================================
[Enable]
Alloc(AtkNostop, 256)
Label(CSXReturn)
Label(NormalX)
//=================================================
AtkNostop:
       Push    Eax
       Mov     Eax, [00CBFF70]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4F58] //主動技能次數
       Cmp     Eax, 15 //放技能N次回原位
       Jg      NormalX
       Cmp     Eax, 14 //放技能N次偏移
       Jg      CSXReturn
       Mov     Eax, [00CBFF70]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+4F68] //輔助技能次數
       Cmp     Eax, 5
       Jg      CSXReturn
       Pop     Eax
       Jmp     NormalX
CSXReturn:
       Mov     Eax, [00CBFF70]
       Mov     Eax, [Eax+1F84] //Char PID
       Cmp     Esi, Eax
       Pop     Eax
       Jne     NormalX
       Add     Eax, 0A
       Jmp     NormalX
NormalX:
       Mov     [Edi], Eax
       Mov     Edi, [Ebp+10]
       Cmp     Edi, Ebx
       Jmp     008B7752
//=================================================
008B774D: // 8B 7D 10 3B FB 74 ?? DD 46
       //Enter CRC Pointer
       Jmp     AtkNostop
[Disable]
008B774D:
       //Return CRC Pointer
       Db      8B 7D 10 3B FB
Dealloc(AtkNostop)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_昇龍刺擊.txt`:

```txt
//v1.4 昇龍刺擊位移函數 by.aaaddress1
alloc(SetSkill,128)

00868A59:
jmp SetSkill

SetSkill:
push 000002D0 //720 這是技能發動後移動值的最大量
push 1 //填入1則是在0.01秒內向右邊移動最大量的值
push 00 // 若填入-1則是0.01秒內向左移動最大量的值
mov ecx,[ebp-00001BCC]
call 008488C9
jmp 00868A6D




//v1.42 昇龍刺擊半屏幕攻擊 by.aaaddress1
00868266:
jmp 00868A2B
nop



//v142 無延遲雙弓昇龍刺擊半屏打 by.aaaddress1
//半成品 單秒內攻擊兩下會斷
alloc(Skill,128)

008693F2:
jmp Skill
Skill:
mov eax,[ebp-00000CB0]
mov [eax+40],0A //固定0x0a可以無延遲
mov [Count],00
jmp 008693F8

//008693E4://mov eax,[ebp+08]_add eax,0000065C
//jmp Skill//隨意更動可能會啟動最終攻擊

00828881:
nop
nop
nop
nop
nop
nop
00868266:
jmp 00868A2B
nop
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_火藥桶無延遲.txt`:

```txt
alloc(Fuckyou,256)
label(start)
alloc(v1,4)
alloc(v2,4)
alloc(v3,4)
alloc(v4,4)
alloc(v5,4)
alloc(v6,4)
registersymbol(v1)
registersymbol(v2)
registersymbol(v3)
registersymbol(v4)
registersymbol(v5)
registersymbol(v6)
v5:
dd 0
Fuckyou:
push [ebp+10]
lea eax,[ebp+1C]
push [ebp+0C]
push eax
call dword ptr [00CCC9F4]
mov ecx,[00CC44FC]
mov [v1],ebx
lea eax,[ebp+60]
mov [v2],eax
lea eax,[ebp+1c]
mov [v3],eax
mov eax,ebp
add eax,60
mov [v4],eax
start:
pushad
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 01
push [v2]
push [v3]
mov ebx,[v1]
mov [v4],ebx
call 005D2AD3
mov [v6],eax
popad
inc [v5]
cmp [v5],c8
jl start
jmp 00838D5E

00838D2F:
jmp Fuckyou

00838D96:
je 00838DAC
00838D8B:
nop
nop
00838D80:
nop
nop
00838D78:
nop
nop

005D2B23:
nop
nop
nop
nop
nop
nop

Alloc(CharActSet, 64)
Label(SetR)
Label(SetL)

CharActSet:
Cmp Eax, 8 // 向右
Je SetR
Cmp Eax, 9 // 向左
Je SetL
mov [esi+000003EC],eax
Jmp 0045663A+6
SetR:
Mov Eax, 4
mov [esi+000003EC],eax
Jmp 0045663A+6
SetL:
Mov Eax, 5
mov [esi+000003EC],eax
Jmp 0045663A+6

0045663A:
jmp CharActSet
nop

Alloc(SkillSet, 64)

SkillSet:
mov [esi+00000480],eax
Cmp Eax, 0000012B
Jne 00846DEB+6
Or  Eax, FFFFFFFF
mov [esi+00000480],eax
Jmp 00846DEB+6

00846DEB:

Nop
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_無延遲撿物.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS142 無延遲撿物
//Auther: Inndy
//008F0756 - E8 FD59B9FF                - call 00486158 // 發包
//008F075B - 33 FF                      - xor edi,edi
//008F075D - 47                         - inc edi
//008F075E - 57                         - push edi
//008F075F - 8B CE                      - mov ecx,esi
//008F0761 - E8 85CAB8FF                - call 0047D1EB // 設定不可撿物

//踹踹幹下面這段NOP掉
//008F05ED - 6a 00                      - push 00
//008F05EF - 6a 1e                      - push 1e
//008F05F1 - e8 b8 cc b8 ff             - call 0047d2ae
//008F05F6 - 85 c0                      - test eax,eax
//008F05F8 - 0f 84 7a 01 00 00          - je 008f0778
[ENABLE]
Alloc(PreHackPacket, 128)
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)

PreHackPacket:
Mov Edi, [Esp+4]    // PacketStruct
Mov Edi, [Edi+4]    // PacketBuffer
Mov Eax, [Edi+3]    // Time
Add Eax, [FakeTime] // 修改包包時間，達成不斷
Mov [Edi+3], Eax    // 寫入包包時間
Add [FakeTime],64   // 增加假的時間，可以調整看看
Mov [Esp], 008F0766 // 修改回跳點，跳過設定無法撿物
Jmp 00486158        // 跳回發包

008F0756:
Call PreHackPacket
[DISABLE]
008F0756:
Call 00486158

Dealloc(PreHackPacket)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

```txt
//無線機槍+導彈模式  TwmsV142
//By 守護者+aaaddress1

mov eax, 00001384
nop

//開機槍模式
0087662B: // 2B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 3D 88 13 00 00 0F
mov eax, 00001384
nop

//火焰無線模式
0087FD2C: // 7C ?? FF 37 E8
db eb

[disable]
008767A8:
db 2b 86 f8 4c 00 00

0087662B:
db 2b 86 64 5a 00 00

0087FD2C:
db 7c
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_狂狼連擊次數控制.txt`:

```txt
//v1.42. 狂郎職業瞬間集氣連擊次數 by.aaaddress1
alloc(Hit,128) 

00871085: //3B C6 7E ?? 39 B3
jmp Hit

Hit:
mov [ebx+00005b78],3e8//次數
mov ecx,[ebx+00005b7c]
jmp 008710B8 // {cmp ecx,[ebp+XX]}

/*
00871085 - 3b c6                      - cmp eax,esi
00871087 - 7e 3b                      - jle 008710c4
00871089 - 39 b3 78 5b 00 00          - cmp [ebx+00005b78],esi**
0087108F - 7e 33                      - jle 008710c4
00871091 - 8b 0d 60 fc cb 00          - mov ecx,[00cbfc60]
00871097 - 81 c1 bc 20 00 00          - add ecx,000020bc
0087109D - e8 01 f8 dc ff             - call 006408a3
008710A2 - 8b 8b 7c 5b 00 00          - mov ecx,[ebx+00005b7c]**
008710A8 - f7 d8                      - neg eax
008710AA - 1b c0                      - sbb eax,eax
008710AC - 25 b8 0b 00 00             - and eax,00000bb8
008710B1 - 05 88 13 00 00             - add eax,00001388
008710B6 - 03 c8                      - add ecx,eax
008710B8 - 3b 4d 68                   - cmp ecx,[ebp+68]**
*/
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.42.1 CRC 人物快速移動

[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)
label(HookTime2)
label(InitTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 03

SpeedUp:
mov ecx,[ebp+5c]
mov eax,[ecx]
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 0086F2D9 // +5

HookTime:
cmp [FakeTime],0
je InitTime

HookTime2:
mov eax,[FakeTime]
add eax,1FE
mov [FakeTime],eax
jmp 00da13d8

InitTime:
mov [FakeTime],eax
push eax
lea eax,[HookTime2]
sub eax,00EB6978    // 00EB6973+5
mov [00EB6974],eax  // 00EB6973+1
pop eax
jmp 00da13d8

0086F2D4:
jmp SpeedUp

00EB6973:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
0086F2D4: // 8b 4d ? 8b 01 ff 10 8b 83
mov ecx,[ebp+5c]
mov eax,[ecx]

00EB6973: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00da13d8

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)

// 用搜尋 dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
// 之後選4筆結果中的第4筆...往下找...連續push和jmp的倒數第4個就是了...

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_簡化版集氣無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(Nodelay, 128)
Label(AttackTimes)
Label(Refresh)
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Nodelay:
inc [AttackTimes]
cmp [AttackTimes],1 //此值與下列值互減得到的等於正常次數
jle 0085FC58+5
call 00942FB0
cmp [AttackTimes],2 //此值至少要比上面的大1
jg Refresh
jmp 0085FC58+5
//------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:
mov [AttackTimes],0
jmp 0085FC58+5
//------------------------------------------------------------------
AttackTimes:
DD 0
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085FC58://無延遲 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 83 C4 0C E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 04 00
jmp Nodelay
//------------------------------------------------------------------
0085F728://瞬間集氣 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 2B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 6A 1E 59
db 90 90 90 90 90
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[disable]
0085FC58:
call 00942FB0

dealloc(Nodelay)

0085F728:
call 00890C81
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_精準光速神奴無延遲控制板.txt`:

```txt
//v1.42 精準光速神奴無延遲控制板 by.aaaddress1
//Effort: 每秒三倍攻擊精準光速神孥射擊
alloc(Skill,128)
alloc(Count,8)
label(ZeroAttack)
label(Nodelay)

00857AE1:
jmp Skill
nop

Skill:
mov [ebp-000000A4],eax
mov eax,[ebp-000015B0]
push [eax+00004CE4]
mov ecx,[ebp-000015B0]
add ecx,00000090
call 00421107
mov ecx,[ebp+08]
call 0064E8CD
push edx
mov edx,[00cc4a38]
mov edx,[edx+1c]
cmp [Count],edx
jg ZeroAttack
cmp [Count+4],3
jl Nodelay
mov [Count+4],00
mov [Count],edx
add [Count],3e8
Nodelay:
pop edx
inc [Count+4]
jmp 00857F01

ZeroAttack:
pop edx
jmp 00857ED1
```

```txt
//==================================
//停止呼吸終級版  TWMS141
//Created by Cam1596 
//UpDated bY: Dark9 2010/8/18 
//Description: No Breath 
//==================================
[Enable] 
008287E3: //C7 86 ?? ?? 00 00 88 13 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF
mov [esi+00000478],00000000
00861D77: //C7 83 ?? ?? 00 00 88 13 00 00 39 38 74
mov [ebx+00000478],00000000 //Bypass Other Stuff Breath

//以下AOB分別兩組
//50 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 45 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 6A 01 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 4D FC FF
004EC2E8: //50 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 45 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 6A 01 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 4D FC FF 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2
db 55 //Bypass CC DC While Attacking
008F24D9: //50 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 8D 45 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 6A 01 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 4D FC FF 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
db 55 //Bypass CS DC While Attacking
[Disable] 
008287E3:

00861D77:
mov [ebx+00000478],00001388
004EC2E8:
DB 50
008F24D9:
push eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_遇人登出.txt`:

```txt
//遇人登出  TWMSv142
//Address：005DCB67 
//EIP：AutoDC
[Enable]
registersymbol(AutoDC)
registersymbol(DCx)
alloc(AutoDC,32)
alloc(DCx,4)

DCx:
dd 1  //人數

AutoDC:
pushad
mov eax,[00CC44F8]  
mov eax,[eax+2C]
cmp [DCx],eax
popad
ja 005DCB6F  
jmp 005DCC53 

005DCB67:
JMP AutoDC

[Disable]

005DCB67:
test eax,eax
je 005dcc53
lea eax,[ebp+08]

dealloc(AutoDC)
dealloc(DCx)
unregistersymbol(DCx)
unregistersymbol(AutoDC)
```
