`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_選腳選伺服器Hook.txt`:

```txt
//Hook Choose Character
//Auther: Inndy
//此數據能夠取得選擇角色時的ID
[ENABLE]
Alloc(HookCooseCharacter, 32)
Alloc(CharID, 4)
RegisterSymbol(CharID)

HookCooseCharacter:
Mov  Eax, [Eax+4]    // PacketBuffer
Mov  Eax, [Eax+2]    // Char ID
Mov  [CharID], Eax   // Char ID
Mov  Eax, [Esp+4]    // PacketStruct
Jmp  00486158        // Back to Sending Packet

00584E09:
Call HookCooseCharacter
[DISABLE]
00584E09:
Call 00486158

Dealloc(HookCooseCharacter)
Dealloc(CharID)
UnregisterSymbol(CharID)




//Hook Choose Server
//Auther: Inndy
//此數據能夠取得所選的伺服器和頻道
[ENABLE]
Alloc(HookCooseServer, 32)
Alloc(Server, 4)
RegisterSymbol(Server)
Alloc(Channel, 4)
RegisterSymbol(Channel)

HookCooseServer:
Mov  Eax, [Eax+4]    // PacketBuffer
Mov  Ax, [Eax+3]     // Server And Channel
Mov  [Server], Al    // Server
Mov  [Channel], Ah   // Channel
Mov  Eax, [Esp+4]    // PacketStruct
Jmp  00486158        // Back to Sending Packet

00580D07:
Call HookCooseServer
[DISABLE]
00580D07:
Call 00486158

Dealloc(HookCooseServer)
Dealloc(Server)
UnregisterSymbol(Server)
Dealloc(Channel)
UnregisterSymbol(Channel)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_CRC_騰空踢擊無延遲.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.42.1 每N秒騰空踢擊無延遲N下
// Made by 冷羽楓痕
// 說明：無延遲N下後，須等N秒才能再無延遲N下，每次無延遲最多只能2X下，超過一定會斷線

[enable]
alloc(CheckTime,256)
alloc(FakeTime,04)
alloc(NextTime,04)
alloc(NextTime2,04)
alloc(MaxAtkCount, 04)
alloc(NowAtkCount, 04)
label(MyFakeTime)
label(CheckTime2)
label(Normal)

MaxAtkCount: // 每MaxAtkCount秒無延遲MaxAtkCount次，超過2X會斷
DD #05

FakeTime:
readmem([00cc4a38]+1c, 04)

CheckTime:
cmp [ebp-000001A4],0160A176 // 騰空踢擊技能ID
jne Normal

mov eax,[00cc4a38] // 00890C81 - A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 40 ?? C3
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp eax,[NextTime]
jl CheckTime2

inc [NowAtkCount]
mov eax,[MaxAtkCount]
cmp eax,[NowAtkCount]
jge 00863972 // 無延遲

mov [NowAtkCount],00
imul eax,eax,3e8
push ebx
mov ebx,[00cc4a38]
mov ebx,[ebx+1c]
add ebx,eax
mov [NextTime],ebx
pop ebx
jmp 00863972

CheckTime2:
mov eax,[00cc4a38]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp eax,[NextTime2]
jl 008638FF

mov eax,[00cc4a38]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
add eax,000003e8
mov [NextTime2],eax
jmp 00863972

Normal:
call 00421107
jmp 008638FB

MyFakeTime:
mov eax,[FakeTime]
add eax,000003e8
mov [FakeTime],eax
jmp 00865728

0086D032:
jmp 0086d05e

008638F6:
jmp CheckTime

00865723:
jmp MyFakeTime

[disable]
0086D032: // 直接放 騰空踢擊
jne 0086d05e

008638F6: // 無延遲
call 00421107

00865723: // FakeTime
call 00890c81

dealloc(MyFakeTime)
dealloc(FakeTime)
dealloc(NextTime)
dealloc(NextTime2)
dealloc(NowAtkCount)
dealloc(MaxAtkCount)
```

```txt
alloc(CheckEsp,64)
label(GodMiss)

CheckEsp:

jne 00842B8E
mov [esp],GodMiss
jmp 00842B8E

GodMiss:

call 0065041a
push [ebx+000003cc]
mov [ebp-1c],eax
mov [ebp-18],edi
mov [ebp-44],edi
mov [ebp-48],edi
mov [ebp-10],edi
mov [ebp-5c],edi
mov [ebp-58],edi
mov [ebp-3c],edi
mov [ebp-64],edi
mov [ebp-60],edi
mov [ebp-40],edi
call 00458a8c
push [ebx+000003d0]
mov [ebp+3c],eax
call 00458a8c

mov [ebp-24],eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	AutoLR
// Version:	TWMS142
// Update:	Inndy
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 3b c7 0f 85
// Cortrol：	AutoLRRange
// 0: Off, Else:Range
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008C11B6
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008C11B6
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-08], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008C1439 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-08], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008C1439
//-----------------------------------------------
00CCCA80:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00CCCA80:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_完美超速撿物.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS142 ICS 完美超速撿物
//Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(NowTimes, 4)
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPickICS, 1024)
Label(MultiPick)
Label(ItemPick)

Label(NoDelayPickICS)
Label(NoDelayPick)
Label(NoDelayPick01)
Label(NoDelayPick02)
Label(NoDelayPick03)

//For MyFakeCall
Label(MyFakeCall)
Label(MyFakeCall01)
Label(MyFakeCall02)
Label(MyFakeCall03)
Label(MyFakeCall04)

SuperPickICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 0086D7FD
Jne  004929A9
Mov  [Esp], MultiPick
Jmp  004929A9

MultiPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [NowTimes], 09
ItemPick:
Push Eax
Call 004D4AB7
Mov  Ecx, [00CC7978]
Mov  Eax, [Esp]
Dec  [NowTimes]
Cmp  [NowTimes], 00
Jg   ItemPick
Call 004D4AB7
Jmp  0086D805

NoDelayPickICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 004D4BDD
Jne  PtInRect
Mov  [Esp], NoDelayPick
Jmp  PtInRect

NoDelayPick:
DB   85 c0                              //004D4BDD - test eax,eax
jne NoDelayPick01                        //004D4BDF - jne 004d4bf9
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //004D4BE1 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //004D4BE5 - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
call 004d3920                           //004D4BE8 - call 004d3920
DB   83 7d 08 00                        //004D4BED - cmp dword ptr [ebp+08],00
jne 004d4b17                            //004D4BF1 - jne 004d4b17
jmp NoDelayPick03                        //004D4BF7 - jmp 004d4c2a
NoDelayPick01:
DB   33 c0                              //004D4BF9 - xor eax,eax
DB   39 46 30                           //004D4BFB - cmp [esi+30],eax
jne NoDelayPick02                        //004D4BFE - jne 004d4c0e
DB   ff 76 34                           //004D4C00 - push [esi+34]
DB   8b 0d 54 fc cb 00                  //004D4C03 - mov ecx,[00cbfc54] : 06400ED4
call 00574410                           //004D4C09 - call 00574410
NoDelayPick02:
DB   8b 4d f0                           //004D4C0E - mov ecx,[ebp-10]
DB   50                                 //004D4C11 - push eax
DB   ff 76 20                           //004D4C12 - push [esi+20]
DB   57                                 //004D4C15 - push edi
call MyFakeCall
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //004D4C1B - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //004D4C1F - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
DB   89 5e 54                           //004D4C22 - mov [esi+54],ebx
call 004d3920                           //004D4C25 - call 004d3920
NoDelayPick03:
call 009439d1                           //004D4C2A - call 009439d1
DB   c2 04 00                           //004D4C2F - ret 0004



MyFakeCall:
DB   6a 14                              //008F05DF - push 14
DB   b8 61 70 a1 00                     //008F05E1 - mov eax,00a17061
call 009438f9                           //008F05E6 - call 009438f9
DB   8b f1                              //008F05EB - mov esi,ecx
DB   6a 00                              //008F05ED - push 00
DB   6a 1e                              //008F05EF - push 1e
call 0047d2ae                           //008F05F1 - call 0047d2ae
DB   85 c0                              //008F05F6 - test eax,eax
je MyFakeCall04                         //008F05F8 - je 008f0778
DB   8b 0d 70 ff cb 00                  //008F05FE - mov ecx,[00cbff70] : 00000000
call 004c42da                           //008F0604 - call 004c42da
DB   85 c0                              //008F0609 - test eax,eax
jne MyFakeCall04                        //008F060B - jne 008f0778
DB   8b 0d 70 ff cb 00                  //008F0611 - mov ecx,[00cbff70] : 00000000
call 004c42ed                           //008F0617 - call 004c42ed
DB   85 c0                              //008F061C - test eax,eax
jne MyFakeCall04                        //008F061E - jne 008f0778
DB   8b 0d 70 ff cb 00                  //008F0624 - mov ecx,[00cbff70] : 00000000
call 004c4300                           //008F062A - call 004c4300
DB   85 c0                              //008F062F - test eax,eax
jne MyFakeCall04                        //008F0631 - jne 008f0778
DB   a1 70 ff cb 00                     //008F0637 - mov eax,[00cbff70] : 00000000
DB   83 b8 74 3d 00 00 00               //008F063C - cmp dword ptr [eax+00003d74],00
jne MyFakeCall04                        //008F0643 - jne 008f0778
DB   8d 8e 88 21 00 00                  //008F0649 - lea ecx,[esi+00002188]
call 00651114                           //008F064F - call 00651114
DB   85 c0                              //008F0654 - test eax,eax
je MyFakeCall02                         //008F0656 - je 008f0699
DB   8d 45 0c                           //008F0658 - lea eax,[ebp+0c]
DB   68 89 17 00 00                     //008F065B - push 00001789
DB   50                                 //008F0660 - push eax
call 006b6d98                           //008F0661 - call 006b6d98
DB   8b c8                              //008F0666 - mov ecx,eax
call 0041ffc5                           //008F0668 - call 0041ffc5
DB   83 65 fc 00                        //008F066D - and dword ptr [ebp-04],00
DB   6a 0b                              //008F0671 - push 0b
DB   50                                 //008F0673 - push eax
call 0047d49e                           //008F0674 - call 0047d49e
DB   8b 45 0c                           //008F0679 - mov eax,[ebp+0c]
MyFakeCall01:
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //008F067C - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   59                                 //008F0680 - pop ecx
DB   59                                 //008F0681 - pop ecx
DB   85 c0                              //008F0682 - test eax,eax
je MyFakeCall04                         //008F0684 - je 008f0778
DB   83 c0 f4                           //008F068A - add eax,f4
DB   50                                 //008F068D - push eax
call 0040d826                           //008F068E - call 0040d826
DB   59                                 //008F0693 - pop ecx
jmp MyFakeCall04                        //008F0694 - jmp 008f0778
MyFakeCall02:
DB   8b 0d 70 ff cb 00                  //008F0699 - mov ecx,[00cbff70] : 00000000
call 0060eb41                           //008F069F - call 0060eb41
DB   85 c0                              //008F06A4 - test eax,eax
je MyFakeCall03                         //008F06A6 - je 008f06d1
DB   8d 45 08                           //008F06A8 - lea eax,[ebp+08]
DB   68 e9 1e 00 00                     //008F06AB - push 00001ee9
DB   50                                 //008F06B0 - push eax
call 006b6d98                           //008F06B1 - call 006b6d98
DB   8b c8                              //008F06B6 - mov ecx,eax
call 0041ffc5                           //008F06B8 - call 0041ffc5
DB   6a 0b                              //008F06BD - push 0b
DB   50                                 //008F06BF - push eax
DB   c7 45 fc 01 00 00 00               //008F06C0 - mov [ebp-04],00000001
call 0047d49e                           //008F06C7 - call 0047d49e
DB   8b 45 08                           //008F06CC - mov eax,[ebp+08]
jmp MyFakeCall01                        //008F06CF - jmp 008f067c
MyFakeCall03:
DB   ff 75 0c                           //008F06D1 - push [ebp+0c]
DB   8b 8e 94 46 00 00                  //008F06D4 - mov ecx,[esi+00004694]
call 004d5700                           //008F06DA - call 004d5700
DB   68 42 01 00 00                     //008F06DF - push 00000142
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F06E4 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00600954                           //008F06E7 - call 00600954
DB   c7 45 fc 02 00 00 00               //008F06EC - mov [ebp-04],00000002
call 0042ebfe                           //008F06F3 - call 0042ebfe
DB   8a 80 9c 01 00 00                  //008F06F8 - mov al,[eax+0000019c]
DB   88 45 f0                           //008F06FE - mov [ebp-10],al
DB   ff 75 f0                           //008F0701 - push [ebp-10]
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F0704 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 0041062e                           //008F0707 - call 0041062e
call 00890c81                           //008F070C - call 00890c81
DB   50                                 //008F0711 - push eax
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F0712 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 0041064c                           //008F0715 - call 0041064c
DB   8b 7d 08                           //008F071A - mov edi,[ebp+08]
DB   0f b7 07                           //008F071D - movzx eax,word ptr [edi]
DB   50                                 //008F0720 - push eax
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F0721 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00426c93                           //008F0724 - call 00426c93
DB   0f b7 47 04                        //008F0729 - movzx eax,word ptr [edi+04]
DB   50                                 //008F072D - push eax
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F072E - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00426c93                           //008F0731 - call 00426c93
DB   ff 75 0c                           //008F0736 - push [ebp+0c]
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F0739 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 0041064c                           //008F073C - call 0041064c
DB   ff 75 10                           //008F0741 - push [ebp+10]
DB   8d 4d e0                           //008F0744 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 0041064c                           //008F0747 - call 0041064c
DB   8b 0d a4 ff cb 00                  //008F074C - mov ecx,[00cbffa4] : 00000000
DB   8d 45 e0                           //008F0752 - lea eax,[ebp-20]
DB   50                                 //008F0755 - push eax
Mov Edi, [Esp]      // PacketStruct
Mov Edi, [Edi+4]    // PacketBuffer
Mov Eax, [Edi+3]    // Time
Add Eax, [FakeTime] // 修改包包時間，達成不斷
Mov [Edi+3], Eax    // 寫入包包時間
Add [FakeTime],64   // 增加假的時間，可以調整看看
push 008F0766
jmp  00486158
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //008F0766 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //008F076A - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
DB   89 be 5c 4a 00 00                  //008F076D - mov [esi+00004a5c],edi
call 00425e6b                           //008F0773 - call 00425e6b
MyFakeCall04:
call 009439d1                           //008F0778 - call 009439d1
DB   c2 0c 00                           //008F077D - ret 000c

00B5DEBC:
DD   SuperPickICS
00CCCA24:
DD   NoDelayPickICS
[DISABLE]
00B5DEBC:
DD   004929A9
00CCCA24:
DD   PtInRect

Dealloc(SuperPickICS)
```

```txt
//by.aaaddress1

dd NodelaySkillHook

NodelaySkillHook:
cmp dword ptr [esp],0082888A
jne 00818035
mov edi,ffffffff
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_控制走怪.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Hook, 256)
Label(Hook2)
Label(Hook21)

Hook:
Cmp  [Esp+0C], 008BA703
Jne  0050563B
Mov  [Esp+0C], Hook2
Jmp  0050563B

Hook2:
xor  ebx,ebx
inc  ebx
test eax,eax
je   Hook21
cmp  [eax+000001AC],000003FC
jne  Hook21
mov  ecx,[esi+0000064C]
push ebx
mov  edi,ebx
call 00425D87
Hook21:
mov  ecx,[esi+00000650]
call 00426302
test eax,eax
jmp  008BAC11 // 左走
jmp  008BABFD // 右走

00AF5E90:
DD   Hook
[DISABLE]
00AF5E90:
DD   0050563B

Dealloc(Hook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_控怪+跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(JumpMobFall, 128)
Alloc(MobLR, 512)
Alloc(MobLRSwitch, 4)
Alloc(MobGoX, 4)
Alloc(JumpDown, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
RegisterSymbol(MobGoX)
RegisterSymbol(JumpDown)
Label(ControlMob)
Label(Back)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoMe)
Label(GoMe_R)
Label(GoMe_L)
Label(GoPoint)
Label(GoX)
Label(GetX)

JumpDown:
DD   1 // 跳怪掉落開關
MobLRSwitch:
DD   3 // 控怪開關，0關1左2右3跟隨4取點5定點

MobLR:
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 20
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+08]
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, [00CC4458]
Mov  Ebx, Ecx
Push Edi
//-----------------------------------
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 01
Je   ControlMob
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 03
Je   ControlMob
Jmp  Back

ControlMob:
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 00
Je   Back
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 01
Je   GoLeft
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 02
Je   GoRight
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Je   GoX
Mov  Edi, [00CBFF70]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+00005A18]
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 04
Je   GetX
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 03
Je   GoMe
Jmp  Back

GoMe:
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00CBFF70]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+047C]
And  Edi, 01
Test Edi, Edi
Je   GoMe_R
Jne  GoMe_L
Pop  Edi
Jmp  Back

GoMe_R:
Pop  Edi
Add  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoMe_L:
Pop  Edi
Sub  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoPoint:
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  Back

GetX:
Mov  [MobGoX], Edi
Mov  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Jmp  GoX

GoX:
Mov  Edi, [MobGoX]
Sub  Edi, 2
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Add  Edi, 4
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jg   GoLeft
Mov  [Ebx+000002A0], 06
Jmp  GoMe


GoRight:
Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000004
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Back

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000005
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Back
//-----------------------------------
Back:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 0
Je   008BC5B1
Lea  Edi,[Ebx+00000088]
Fld  qword ptr [Edi]
Fsub qword ptr [Eax]
Fstp qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fldz
Fcom qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fnstsw Ax
Test Ah,44
Jnp  008BCC19
Mov  Eax,[Ebx+000002A0]
Cmp  Eax,01
Je   008BC515
Fstp st(0)
Cmp  Eax,03
Jmp  008BC8B7

JumpMobFall:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 00
Je   008BAF5E
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 0C
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, Ecx
Cmp  dword ptr [Esi+000002A0], 03
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00CC4458]
Jmp  008BB037

00B60BD0:
DD MobLR

00B60BD4:
DD JumpMobFall
[DISABLE]
00B60BD0:
DD 008BC4D5 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 8B 45 08 53 56 8B 35

00B60BD4:
DD 008BAF5E // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 8B F1 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 03

Dealloc(JumpMobFall)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(MobLRSwitch)
Dealloc(MobGoX)
Dealloc(JumpDown)
UnregisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobGoX)
UnregisterSymbol(JumpDown)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_無敵.txt`:

```txt
//v.142. 人物不退+5次MISS [ICS] by.aaaddress1
[ENABLE]
alloc(Set,128)
label(set1)
label(set2)
label(normal)
label(keepzerohurt)
alloc(times,4)
Set:
cmp [esp],00861B52 //ff 75 ?? 8b 10 ff 75 ?? 8b c8 57 57
jne 0083E84B //8b 81 00 3d 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 8b 81 ?? ?? 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 56
mov [esp],set1
jmp 0083E84B
set1:
//以下是損血量減少30%
Cmp [Ebp+58], 5 // 損血5滴以下不減少
Jl set2
Push Eax
Push Ecx
Push Edx
Mov Eax, [Ebp+58]
Imul Eax,Eax,07
Xor Edx, Edx
Mov Ecx, 0A
Idiv Ecx
Mov [Ebp+58], Eax
Pop Edx
Pop Ecx
Pop Eax
set2:
inc [times]
cmp [times],4 //MISS 次數-1
jl keepzerohurt
mov [times],0
jmp normal
keepzerohurt:
mov [ebp+58],0
normal:
push 00 //人物不退
mov edx,[eax]
push 00 //人物不退
mov ecx,eax
push edi
push edi
push 20
call dword ptr [edx+58]
mov ecx,[ebp+48]
push 05
lea eax,[ebp+38]
push eax
mov [ebp+60],2710 //無敵時間(目前10秒)
jmp 00861BAA // 設定閃爍時間位址+1
00B5DECC:
dd Set
[DISABLE]
00B5DECC:
dd 0083E84B

dealloc(Set)
dealloc(times)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_物理無敵.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	Full God
// Version:	TWMS141
// Update:	Inndy
// EIP：	FullGodICS
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c0 74 0e
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[Enable]
alloc(FullGodICS,64)

FullGodICS:
Cmp  [Esp],005D261E
Jne  IsRectEmpty
Add  Esp,4
Call IsRectEmpty
Test eax,eax
Jmp  005D2622 // Je+1

00CCCA4C:
dd FullGodICS
[Disable]
00CCCA4C:
dd IsRectEmpty

dealloc(FullGodICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
//秒數無敵、Miss無敵、笨怪、物品過濾、怪物不擊退、跳怪不跳、怪物瞬移
[ENABLE]
RegisterSymbol(Main)
Alloc(Main, 4096)
RegisterSymbol(Time)
Alloc(Time, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MissTime)
Alloc(MissTime, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MissTimeCmp)
Alloc(MissTimeCmp, 4)
RegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
Alloc(FilterMode, 4)
RegisterSymbol(LastItem)
Alloc(LastItem, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MonsterNoJump)
Alloc(MonsterNoJump, 4)
Label(Nohurt)
Label(NohurtMain)
Label(NohurtMainI)
Label(StupidMonster)
Label(StupidMonsterMain)
Label(MobNoKB)
Label(MobNoKBMain)
Label(ItemFilter)
Label(ItemFilterMain)
Label(ItemFilterOr1)
Label(ItemFilterOr2)
Label(ItemBlackFilter)
Label(ItemWhiteFilter)
Label(SkipItem)
Label(EndFilter)
Label(MobNoJump)
Label(MobNoJumpMain)
Label(MobFast)
Label(MobFastMain)
Alloc(ItemList, 32768)

//==============
Time:		//無敵時間
DD FFFF8AD0	//30秒

MissTime:	//迴避次數
DD 3

FilterMode:	//物品過濾模式
DD 1		//0關 1黑名單模式 2白名單模式

MonsterNoJump:	//怪物不跳
DD 1
//==============
ItemList:
//請在以下加入物品清單
DD 001F6EE0
DD 001F72C8
//請在以上加入物品清單
DD 00
//==============
Main:
Cmp [Esp+1c], 0086160A	//e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je Nohurt				//無敵
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008B9CB2	//33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je StupidMonster		//笨怪
Cmp [Esp+1c], 008BAC7A	//6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je MobNoJump			//跳怪不跳
Cmp [Esp+34], 005CFF29	//83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B CF
Je MobNoKB				//怪物不擊退
Cmp [Esp+34], 005DCE70	//8B 5D ?? E9 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 7E ?? 8A 07
Je MobFast				//怪物瞬移
Cmp [Esp+64], 004D757C	//8b 45 ?? 8b 75 ?? 88 46 ?? 83 f8 01
Je ItemFilter			//物品過濾

Jmp 006B3A46
//==============
Nohurt:
Mov [Esp+1C], NohurtMain
Jmp 006B3A46

StupidMonster:
Mov [Esp+1C], StupidMonsterMain
Jmp 006B3A46

MobNoJump:
Mov [Esp+1C], MobNoJumpMain
Jmp 006B3A46

MobNoKB:
Mov [Esp+34], MobNoKBMain
Jmp 006B3A46

MobFast:
Mov [Esp+34], MobFastMain
Jmp 006B3A46

ItemFilter:
Mov [Esp+64], ItemFilterMain
Jmp 006B3A46
//-------------------------
MobNoJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  edx,edx
Pop  ecx
Div  ecx
Test edx,edx
Cmp  [MonsterNoJump], 1
Je   008BAC8E // Jne Adr
Cmp  [MonsterNoJump], 2
Je   008BAC85 // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  008BAC81 // Test Edx, Edx
//-------------------------
StupidMonsterMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000ea60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002b8]
Jmp  008B9CC7 // Push Edx
//-------------------------
NohurtMain:
Call 0042EBFE
Mov  Eax, FFFF8AD0 // 無敵30秒
Mov  Ecx, [MissTime]
Cmp  [MissTimeCmp], Ecx
Jg   NohurtMainI
Mov  [Ebp+58], 0
Inc  [MissTimeCmp]
Jmp  00861B8C	//8d 8b ?? ?? 00 00 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff e9 ?? ?? 00 00 6a 05
//==============
NohurtMainI:
Mov  [MissTimeCmp], 0
Jmp  00861B8C
//-------------------------
MobNoKBMain:
Jmp  005CFF3B
//-------------------------
ItemFilterMain:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp-1c]
Mov  Esi, [Ebp-50]
Mov  [Esi+1c], Al
Cmp  Eax, 01
Je   ItemFilterOr1
Cmp  Eax, 02
Je   ItemFilterOr1
Xor  Al, Al
Jmp  ItemFilterOr2

ItemFilterOr1:
Mov  Al, 01
ItemFilterOr2:
Mov  [Esi+1d], Al
Mov  [Esi+20], Edi
Mov  Edi, [Ebp+08]
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Call 0040858b // ifCall1
Movzx Eax, Al
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [Esi+30], Eax
Call 004085e7 // ifCall2

Push Esi
Mov  Esi, ItemList
Cmp  Eax, C350
Jle  EndFilter
Mov  [LastItem], Eax
Cmp  [FilterMode], 0
Je   EndFilter
Cmp  [FilterMode], 1
Je   ItemBlackFilter
Cmp  [FilterMode], 2
Je   ItemWhiteFilter


ItemBlackFilter:
Cmp  [Esi], 0
Je   EndFilter
Cmp  [Esi], Eax
Je   SkipItem
Add  Esi, 4
Jmp  ItemBlackFilter

ItemWhiteFilter:
Cmp  [Esi], 0
Je   SkipItem
Cmp  [Esi], Eax
Je   EndFilter
Add  Esi, 4
Jmp  ItemWhiteFilter

SkipItem:
Xor  Eax, Eax
EndFilter:
Pop  Esi
Mov  Ecx, Edi
Mov  [Esi+34], Eax
Jmp  004D75B7
//-------------------------
MobFastMain:
Mov  Ebx, [Ebp+14]
Cmp  dword ptr [Esi+2c], 00
DB   75 05 //jne +5
Jmp  005DCF62 // Jne下一行
Mov  Edi, [Esi+30]
Mov  Al, [Edi]
Cmp  Al,0B
Je   005dcf4d
Movzx Ecx, Al
Xor  Eax, Eax
Inc  Eax
Xor  Edx, Edx
Call 00947d90 // fmCall1
Mov Ecx, [Ebp+20]
Or [Ecx], Eax
Or [Ecx+04], Edx
Mov Ecx, Esi


//005DCE9C - e8 40 00 fe ff             - call 005bcee1
Push [ecx+0000008c]
Add  Ecx, 00000084
Mov  Eax, Ecx
Push Ecx
Call 00404e68 //瞬1 // fmCall2
Pop  Ecx
Pop  Ecx


Movsx Ecx, word ptr [Edi+10]
Cmp  Eax, Ecx
Jl   005dcf62
Mov  Ecx, Esi


//005DCEAF - e8 2d 00 fe ff             - call 005bcee1
Push [ecx+0000008c]
Add  Ecx, 00000084
Mov  Eax, Ecx
Push Ecx
//Call 00404e68 //瞬4
Pop  Ecx
Pop  Ecx


Jmp  005DCEC3
//-------------------------
00CA592C:
dd Main
[DISABLE]
00CA592C:
DD 006B3A46
//-------------------------
DeAlloc(Main)
UnRegisterSymbol(Main)
DeAlloc(Time)
UnRegisterSymbol(Time)
DeAlloc(MissTime)
UnRegisterSymbol(MissTime)
DeAlloc(MissTimeCmp)
UnRegisterSymbol(MissTimeCmp)
DeAlloc(FilterMode)
UnRegisterSymbol(FilterMode)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
UnRegisterSymbol(MonsterNoJump)
DeAlloc(MonsterNoJump)
UnRegisterSymbol(LastItem)
DeAlloc(LastItem)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS142_ICS_血控無敵.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(ICSEntry, 128)
Label(DamageControl)
Label(Back)

ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 00861B52 //ff 75 ?? 8b 10 ff 75 ?? 8b c8 57 57
Jne  0083E84B //8b 81 00 3d 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 8b 81 ?? ?? 00 00 85 c0 74 05 83 c0 f4 eb 02 33 c0 85 c0 74 04 83 c0 10 c3 33 c0 c3 56
Mov  [Esp], DamageControl
Jmp  0083E84B

DamageControl:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58]
Test Eax, Eax
Je   Back
Mov  Eax, [00CC8F80]
And  Eax, 3
Add  Eax, 2
Back:
Mov  [Ebp+58], Eax
Pop  Eax
Push 00
Mov  Edx, [Eax]
Push 00
Mov  Ecx, Eax
Push Edi
Push Edi
Push 20
Call dword ptr [Edx+58]
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+48]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+38]
Push eax
Mov  [Ebp+60], 2710
Jmp  00861BAA // 設定閃爍時間位址+1

00B5DECC:
DD ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00B5DECC:
DD 0083E84B

Dealloc(ICSEntry)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/TWMS145_ICS_控怪+跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS145 ICS 控怪走向 + 跳怪掉落
// Auther: Inndy
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	83 bb ?? 00 00 00 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8d
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
// V140 008B6960 - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
// V145 008E326C - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	83 be ?? ?? 00 00 03 57 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00
// V138 0089D627 - 83 be 98 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+00000298],03
// V140 008B98E4 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// V145 008E6272 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// 
// AOB：	8b 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 f8 01 0f 85 ?? ?? 00 00
// V138 0089E802 - 8b 83 98 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
// V140 008BAE82 - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
// V145 008E781E - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB：	39 8e ?? ?? 00 00 7c
// V138 0089B435 - 39 8e 94 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+00000694],ecx
// V140 008B7AE0 - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
// V145 008E445E - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(JumpMobFall, 128)
Alloc(MobLR, 512)
Alloc(MobLRSwitch, 4)
Alloc(MobGoX, 4)
Alloc(JumpDown, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
RegisterSymbol(MobGoX)
RegisterSymbol(JumpDown)
Label(ControlMob)
Label(Back)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoMe)
Label(GoMe_R)
Label(GoMe_L)
Label(GoPoint)
Label(GoX)
Label(GetX)

JumpDown:
DD   1 // 跳怪掉落開關
MobLRSwitch:
DD   3 // 控怪開關，0關1左2右3跟隨4取點5定點

MobLR:
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 20
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+08]
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, [00D215C0]
Mov  Ebx, Ecx
Push Edi
//-----------------------------------
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 01
Je   ControlMob
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 03
Je   ControlMob
Jmp  Back

ControlMob:
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 00
Je   Back
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 01
Je   GoLeft
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 02
Je   GoRight
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Je   GoX
Mov  Edi, [00D1D0DC]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+00005E0C]
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 04
Je   GetX
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 03
Je   GoMe
Jmp  Back

GoMe:
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00D1D0DC]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+0494]
And  Edi, 01
Test Edi, Edi
Je   GoMe_R
Jne  GoMe_L
Pop  Edi
Jmp  Back

GoMe_R:
Pop  Edi
Add  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoMe_L:
Pop  Edi
Sub  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoPoint:
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  Back

GetX:
Mov  [MobGoX], Edi
Mov  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Jmp  GoX

GoX:
Mov  Edi, [MobGoX]
Sub  Edi, 2
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Add  Edi, 4
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoMe


GoRight:
Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000004
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Back

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000005
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Back
//-----------------------------------
Back:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 0
Je   008E7801
Lea  Edi,[Ebx+00000088]
Fld  qword ptr [Edi]
Fsub qword ptr [Eax]
Fstp qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fldz
Fcom qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fnstsw Ax
Test Ah,44
Jnp  008E7F31
Mov  Eax,[Ebx+000002A0]
Cmp  Eax,01
Je   008E782D
Fstp st(0)
Cmp  Eax,03
Jmp  008E7BCF // Jne To...

JumpMobFall:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 00
Je   008E6268
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 0C
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, Ecx
Cmp  dword ptr [Esi+000002A0], 03
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00D215C0]
Jmp  008E6341 // Jne To...

00BB5BC8:
DD MobLR

00BB5BCC:
DD JumpMobFall
[DISABLE]
00BB5BC8:
DD 008E77ED // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 8B 45 08 53 56 8B 35

00BB5BCC:
DD 008E6268 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 8B F1 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 03

Dealloc(JumpMobFall)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(MobLRSwitch)
Dealloc(MobGoX)
Dealloc(JumpDown)
UnregisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobGoX)
UnregisterSymbol(JumpDown)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/v142.不封號吸怪.txt`:

```txt
//v142. 不封號吸怪 By.ms890110 , Fixed By.aaaddress1
//只吸400y範圍內的怪物.
[ENABLE]

Alloc(MobVac, 1024)
Alloc(VacXY, 8)
Alloc(MobVacXY, 8)
Label(StartVac)
Label(BackToVac)
Label(DropVac)
Label(NormalRet)
Label(InitMob)

VacXY:
readmem([00cc7b68]+b0c, 8)

MobVac:
Pushad
Mov  Ebx, Esi
Mov  Eax, [Ebx+00000110]
Sub  Eax, 0C
Mov  Ebx, Eax   // Ebx = MonsterEsi
Add  Eax, 10    // Eax = MonsterEsi+10
Mov  Edi, [Eax] // Edi = [MonsterEsi+10]
Mov  Ecx, Eax   // Ecx = MonsterEsi+10
Add  Edi, 00000084
Cmp  [Ebx+04], 01
Jl   InitMob
Push [Ebx+000006a0] // Y
Push [Ebx+0000069c] // X
Pop  [MobVacXY]
Pop  [MobVacXY+04]

Push Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [VacXY+04]
Add  Ecx, #200
Cmp  [Ebx+6a0], Ecx
Jg   DropVac
Sub  Ecx, #400
Cmp  [Ebx+6a0], Ecx
Jl   BackToVac
Push [VacXY+04]
Push [VacXY]
Mov  [Ebx+000002a0], 06
Pop  [MobVacXY]
Pop  [MobVacXY+04]
BackToVac:
Pop  Ecx
StartVac:
Push 0
Push 0
Push 0
Push 0
Push [MobVacXY+04]
Push [MobVacXY]
Push 1
Call dword ptr[Edi]
NormalRet:
Popad
Mov  Ecx, Esi
Call 005BD036
Jmp  005D1371

DropVac:
Sub  [MobVacXY+04], #20
Jmp  BackToVac

InitMob:
Inc  [Ebx+04]
Jmp  NormalRet

005D136C:
jmp MobVac


[DISABLE]
005D136C:
Call 005BD036

Dealloc(MobVac)
Dealloc(VacXY)
Dealloc(MobVacXY)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS142/吸怪.txt`:

```txt

Alloc(MobVac,512)
label(InitMob)
label(normal)
label(vacborn)
Alloc(tmp,4)
registersymbol(tmp)
Alloc(addr,4)
registersymbol(addr)
Alloc(VacXY,8)
VacXY:
readmem([00cc7b68]+b0c, 8)
MobVac:
call 0042E8DB
pushad
mov ebx,esi
mov eax,[ebx+00000110]
add eax,F4
mov [tmp],eax
mov eax,[tmp]
add eax,10
mov ebx,[tmp]
cmp [ebx+4],0
je InitMob
push eax
call 00890C81
cmp eax,[ebx+4]
pop eax
jg normal
cmp [ebx+2a0],6
jne vacborn
push eax
call 00890C81
cmp eax,[ebx+4]
pop eax
jl normal
mov edi,[eax]
mov ecx,eax
add edi,00000084
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push [VacXY+4]
push [VacXY]
push 1
call dword ptr[edi]
mov edi,[edi]
mov [addr],edi
normal:
popad
jmp 005D14DC+5

vacborn:
mov [ebx+2a0],6
pushad
call 00890C81
add eax,#1500
mov [ebx+4],eax
popad

mov edi,[eax]
mov ecx,eax
add edi,00000084
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push [ebx+8]
push [ebx+24]
push 1
call dword ptr[edi]
mov edi,[edi]
mov [addr],edi
popad
jmp 005D14DC+5

InitMob:
mov eax,[ebx+69c]
mov [ebx+24],eax
mov eax,[ebx+6a0]
mov [ebx+8],eax

call 00890C81
add eax,#4200

mov [ebx+4],eax
jmp normal



005D14DC:
jmp MobVac
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/142.惡魔布雷斯倍量攻擊.txt`:

```txt
//v142.惡魔布雷斯限定倍量攻擊 By.aaaddress1.
[ENABLE]
alloc(SetSkill,128)
alloc(Count,8)
label(ZeroAttack)
label(Nodelay)
SetSkill:
push edx
mov edx,[00cc4a38]
mov edx,[edx+1c]
cmp [Count],edx
jg ZeroAttack
mov eax,[ebx+00005A60]
mov [ebp+68],eax
sub eax,2710
mov eax,[ebp+68]
sub eax,[ebx+00004CEC]
inc [Count+04]
cmp [Count+04],03
jl Nodelay
mov [Count+04],00
mov [Count],edx
add [Count],3e8
Nodelay:
pop edx
jmp 00870B64

ZeroAttack:
pop edx
jmp 00870B68

0081B957:
jmp 0081BCB1
nop
00870B47:
jmp SetSkill
nop
nop
nop
nop
[DISABLE]
0081B957:
je 0081B96A
cmp [eax],ebx
je 0081B96A
mov eax,[eax]

00870B47:
mov eax,[ebp+68]
sub eax,[ebx+00005A60]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/OpenProcess IAT Hook (To Protect Process).txt`:

```txt
// OpenProcess IAT Hook (To Protect Process)
// Win XP Sp1.2. Test ok
// write to any process to Spy OpenProcess API
// Script By aaaddress1.
[enable]
alloc(OpenProcessHook,2048) 
registersymbol(OpenProcessHook) 
alloc(ProtectHwnd,64)
registersymbol(ProtectHwnd)

OpenProcessHook: 
mov edi,edi 
push ebp 
mov ebp,esp 
push ecx
mov ecx,[ProtectHwnd]
cmp [ebp+10],ecx  //Check Pid
pop ecx
jne OpenProcess+5
mov [ebp+10],00000000
jmp OpenProcess+5 

OpenProcess: 
jmp OpenProcessHook
[disable] 
OpenProcess: 
mov edi,edi 
push ebp 
mov ebp,esp 
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/TWMS144_CRC_無延遲撿物.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS144 無延遲撿物
//Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(PreHackPacket, 128)
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)

PreHackPacket:
Mov Edi, [Esp+4]    // PacketStruct
Mov Edi, [Edi+4]    // PacketBuffer
Mov Eax, [Edi+3]    // Time
Add Eax, [FakeTime] // 修改包包時間，達成不斷
Mov [Edi+3], Eax    // 寫入包包時間
Add [FakeTime],64   // 增加假的時間，可以調整看看
Mov [Esp], 0090CB2D // 修改回跳點，跳過設定無法撿物
Jmp 00488BE1        // 跳回發包

0090CB1D:
Call PreHackPacket
[DISABLE]
0090CB1D:
Call 00488BE1

Dealloc(PreHackPacket)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

```txt
//V1.42.伺服器人物XY驗證攻擊不停 By.aaaddress1
alloc(ChangX,128)

inc [IncCount]

jle BackToSetNewX
mov [IncCount],00
BackToSetNewX:

add [edi],esi
push [edi]

004577AF:
call ChangX
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/V138 定點生怪 ics.txt`:

```txt

//V138 定點生怪 ics
[enable]
registersymbol(xuHook)
alloc(xuHook, 512)
//====定點生怪
label(Hook09)
alloc(Dull09,512)
label(Dull092)
label(Dull0921)
label(Dull093)
alloc(xMobPX,4)
alloc(xMobPY,4)
alloc(xMobPIO,4)
//==========
xMobPIO:
dd 0
xMobPX:
dd 0
xMobPY:
dd 0
//======
xuHook:
  cmp dword ptr [esp+8c], 005c1f51
  je Hook09
  jmp 0069C088
Hook09:
  mov [esp+8c], Dull09
  jmp 0069C088
//==================
Dull09:
db 8b f8                      //- mov edi,eax
db 8d 8e 0c 01 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+0000010c]
db 57                        //- push edi
call 005b8dca
db ff 75 7c                  //- push [ebp+7c]
db 8b ce                      //- mov ecx,esi
call 005b403b
db 8b c8                  //- mov ecx,eax
call 005b46e4
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8d 46 04                  //- lea eax,[esi+04]
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b cf                      //- mov ecx,edi
call 0089af7b
db 8d 8e d0 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005d0]
call 00423250
db 8d 8e dc 05 00 00          //- lea ecx,[esi+000005dc]
db 89 45 6c                  //- mov [ebp+6c],eax
call 00423250
db ff 75 68                  //- push [ebp+68]
db 89 45 54                  //- mov [ebp+54],eax
db 83 c7 10                  //- add edi,10
db 8b 07                      //- mov eax,[edi]
db 8b ce                      //- mov ecx,esi
db 89 45 60                  //- mov [ebp+60],eax
call 005b49f4
db 50                        //- push eax
db 8b 45 60                  //- mov eax,[ebp+60]
db 53                        //- push ebx
db 53                        //- push ebx
db ff 75 6c                  //- push [ebp+6c]
db 8b cf                      //- mov ecx,edi
db ff 75 54                  //- push [ebp+54]
db 53                        //- push ebx
cmp dword ptr [eax+7c],0089c0fe
jne 005c1fb9
call Dull092
jmp 005c1fbc


Dull092:
  cmp  [xMobPIO],1
  je Dull0921
  pushad
  mov eax,[00c8efe0]
  mov ebx,[eax+b18]
  mov [xMobPX],ebx
  mov ebx,[eax+b1c]
  mov [xMobPY],ebx
  popad
  mov [xMobPIO],1
  jmp Dull093
Dull0921:
  cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
  jne Dull093
  push ecx
  mov ecx,[xMobPX]
  mov [esp+0c],ecx
  mov eax,[xMobPY]
  mov [esp+10],eax
  push eax
  mov ecx,[00c8e730]
  call 0042d006
  mov ecx,eax
  mov [esp+20],ecx
  pop ecx
  xor eax,eax
  xor edx,edx
  
Dull093:
  jmp 0089c0fe
//==========
00c71084:
dd xuHook
//==========
[disable]
00c71084:
dd 0069C088
//=========
dealloc(xMobPIO)
dealloc(xMobPX)
dealloc(xMobPY)
dealloc(Dull09)
unregistersymbol(xuHook)
dealloc(xuHook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/v1.42. 惡魔變形倍量攻擊 by.aaaddress1.txt`:

```txt
//v1.42. 惡魔變形倍量攻擊 by.aaaddress1
//P.s. 攻擊時間間隔建議不低於500(系統偵測以500豪秒為一個單位偵測).
[ENABLE]
alloc(Nodelay,128)
alloc(TimeTicket,08)
Nodelay:
call 0065136E
mov ecx,[ebp+08]
sub ecx,[esi+00004CFC]
add eax,2710               //時間提速10秒
push edx
mov edx,[00cc4a38]
mov edx,[edx+1c]
cmp [TimeTicket],edx
pop edx
jg 008768C2
inc [TimeTicket+04]
cmp [TimeTicket+04],0A     //每次進行十倍攻擊
jl 00876863
push edx
mov edx,[00cc4a38]
push [edx+1c]
pop [TimeTicket]
pop edx
mov [TimeTicket+04],00
add [TimeTicket],1f4       //目前為正常間隔時間=500ms
jmp 00876863
00876851:
jmp Nodelay

[DISABLE]
00876851:
call 0065136E
mov ecx,[ebp+08]
sub ecx,[esi+00004CFC]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/v1.44.活動範圍修改 by.aaaddress1..txt`:

```txt
//v1.44.活動範圍修改 by.aaaddress1.
//效果:可以讓怪物吸至指定xy,
//並且人物只能在該(x,y)左右200範圍處移動.

alloc(Vac,128)
alloc(XY,08)
label(SetHumanMapRang)
label(SetMobMapRang)
label(Return)

XY:
dd 00//吸怪的點的X
dd 00//吸怪的點的Y

Vac:
mov esi,[00CF7DD8]
cmp dword ptr [esp+08],0086f7a7 //人物活動範圍
je SetHumanMapRang
cmp dword ptr [esp+08],008D7EDB //怪物活動範圍
je SetMobMapRang
ret
SetMobMapRang:
push eax
mov eax,[XY+00]
mov [esi+1c],eax//設定怪物左牆
mov [esi+24],eax//設定怪物右牆
mov eax,[XY+04]
mov [esi+28],eax//設定怪物上牆
mov [esi+20],eax//設定怪物下牆
pop eax
jmp Return
SetHumanMapRang:
push eax
mov eax,[XY+00]
sub eax,00c8
mov [esi+1c],eax//設定人物左牆
add eax,00190
mov [esi+24],eax//設定人物右牆
pop eax
Return:
add esi,1C
jmp 008D2DFA

008D2DF1:
jmp Vac
nop

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/v142. 羅莉無延遲.txt`:

```txt
//v142. 羅莉無延遲(與Z大影片效果相同版)
// By.aaaddress1.
alloc(NodelaySkill01,32)
alloc(NodelaySkill02,64)
alloc(NodelaySkill03,128)
alloc(CountTicket,08)
0044F17C:
jmp NodelaySkill01 //Bypass NoAttack
00828881:
jmp NodelaySkill02 //ByPass AttackTimes1
00857F4A:
jmp NodelaySkill03 //Control Attack

NodelaySkill01:
mov [esi+374],09
mov eax,[esi+374]
jmp 0044F1B4

NodelaySkill02:
mov edi,FFFFFFFF
mov [esi+00000480],edi
call dword ptr [eax+20]
mov [esi+00003DE8],00
jmp 008288EC

NodelaySkill03:
call 008287BE
mov eax,[00cc4a38]
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp [CountTicket],eax
jg 00857F53
inc [CountTicket+04]
cmp [CountTicket+04],03
jl 00857F83
mov [CountTicket+04],00
mov [CountTicket],eax
add [CountTicket],BB8
jmp 00857F83
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/v142.惡魔殺手復仇反盾.txt`:

```txt
//v142.惡魔殺手復仇反盾. By.aaaddress1.
//參考連撞(原創:zgenden , 更新:Smilelovefish)
//
//效果:
//持續無延遲反盾,直到Hp低於[Hp損傷設定值],停止反盾後,
//開始自動恢復Hp.
//
///備註:
//三轉力量防禦至少1點
//使用時必須開啟反盾技能(黑暗復仇).
//
// 攻擊威力=每次Hp損傷*4
//
[Enable]
Alloc(SSTime, 32)
Alloc(Time, 16)
Alloc(PreHackPacket, 512)
alloc(HurtHpControl,4)
alloc(NoHurt,128)
label(Hurt)
label(SetTheSkillSub)
Alloc(PreHackPacket, 128)
alloc(OnOff,4)
label(ReturnTheHurtSub)
label(Attack)

HurtHpControl: //Hp損傷設定值 ( *4=每次撞怪殺傷力)
dd #200

PreHackPacket:
Mov Eax, [Eax+04]
mov ecx,[00cc4800]
mov ecx,[ecx+1814]
cmp ecx,[HurtHpControl]
jg Attack
mov ecx,00
mov [OnOff],00
jmp ReturnTheHurtSub
Attack:
mov [OnOff],1
Mov Ecx, [HurtHpControl]
ReturnTheHurtSub:
Mov [Eax+0C], Cx
Mov Eax, [Esp+04]
Mov Ecx, [00CBFFA4]
Jmp 00486158

NoHurt:
cmp [OnOff],1
je Hurt
mov eax,64
jmp SetTheSkillSub
Hurt:
mov eax,00
SetTheSkillSub:
mov ecx,eax
mov eax,[ebp-74]
jmp 00861232

SSTime:
Add [Time], 1388
Mov Eax, [Time]
Jmp 0086247F
//-----------------
0086265F:
Call PreHackPacket
0086122D:
jmp NoHurt
00861BA3:
mov [ebp+60],64     //每次反盾間隔100毫秒
0086247A:
Jmp SSTime
//-----------------
[Disable]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/v142快速換圖.txt`:

```txt

地圖基址 : 00cc79a0
時間基址 : 00cc4b40
!? : 00cbfde4
送封包位址 : 00486121

// TWMS V1.42 反覆送開店封包
// Made by 冷羽楓痕
// 說明: 送多次封包後，系統會將人物傳送至自由市場，出口會在勇士之村

[enable]
Alloc(SendPacket, 128)
Alloc(PacketStruct, 16)
Alloc(PacketData, 13)
Alloc(SendTime,04)
Alloc(Switch, 04)
label(Normal)
Registersymbol(Switch)
CreateThread(SendPacket)

PacketStruct: // 封包結構
DD 00 // 00
DD PacketData // 封包資料位址
DD #13 // 封包長度
DD 00 // 00

Switch: // 開關 (若一直無法進自由，設0關閉吧)
dd 00

PacketData: // 開店封包資料
DB C7 00 06 04 00 00 00 01 00 20 6E 4E 00

SendPacket:
cmp [Switch],00
je Normal

mov eax,[0CC7B68] // 地圖
mov eax,[eax+C38]
cmp eax,363D7F80 // 自由市場入口地圖ID: 910000000
je Normal

mov eax,[00CC4A38] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp eax,[SendTime]
jl SendPacket

add eax,64
mov [SendTime],eax
mov ecx,[00CBFFA4] // !?
push SendPacket
push PacketStruct
push 00401005 // 假的返回位址
push 00486158 // 送封包
ret

Normal:
ret

[disable]

// 地圖基址 - 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? 00 00 8b ce e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 0f
// 地圖ID偏移 - ff b6 ?? ?? 00 00 8d 86 ?? ?? 00 00 51 8b cc 89 65 fc
// 時間基址 - A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 40 ?? C3
// !? - 8B      8D   50 E8     6A  8B  E8     83    8D   E8     E8     C2   6A  B8     E8     6A
// 送封包位址 - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/v144.給私服用的反盾.txt`:

```txt
//v144.給私服用的反盾
//PG血控: Inndy.aaddress1
//反盾化: 祤痕
//不過私服還是有個小檢測是必須損1滴才能啟動
[Enable]
Alloc(Initialize,32)
Alloc(PGuard, 128)
Alloc(PGuardVal, 4)
Alloc(SSTime, 32)
Alloc(Time, 16)
Alloc(MYKB,512)
label(AllMap)
00D00638:
DD MYKB

MYKB:
Cmp [Esp],005E2C7B
je AllMap
Cmp  [Esp], 005E2696 //83 4d fc ff 8d 4d f0 85 c0
Jne  IntersectRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call IntersectRect
or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
lea ecx,[ebp-10]
test eax,eax
jmp 005e26cb
AllMap:
jmp 005E2C87

PGuardVal:
DD 99999 //反彈傷害數值
//-----------------
Time:
readmem([00CF83B8]+1C, 8)

PGuard:
Mov Eax, [Eax+04]
Mov Ecx, 1
Mov [Eax+0C], Cx
Push [PGuardVal]
Pop Ecx
Mov [Eax+1F], Cx
Mov Eax, [Esp+04]
Mov Ecx,[00CF3924]
Jmp 00488BE1
//-----------------
0087FA47:
Call PGuard

Initialize:
Mov [ebp+58],0
Mov [ebp+60],0
Jmp 0087EF7C+5

SSTime:
Add [Time], 1388
Mov Eax, [Time]
Jmp 0087F85F+5
//-----------------
0087EF7C:
Jmp Initialize
//-----------------
0087F85F:
Jmp SSTime
[Disable]
0087EF7C:
Mov [Ebp+60],000005DC
0087FA47:
Call 00488BE1
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/人物無敵+不退,for twms 任何版本 by.aaaddress1..txt`:

```txt
//人物無敵+不退,for twms 任何版本 by.aaaddress1.
alloc(AutoUpDateScript,256)
label(FoundAddress01)
label(FoundAddress02)
label(SearchArrayOfBytesNoBack)
label(SearchArrayOfBytesTimeBlock)
CreateThread(AutoUpDateScript)


AutoUpDateScript:
mov eax,00861AFF
SearchArrayOfBytesNoBack:
cmp [eax],390CC483 //人物不退Array Of Bytes
je FoundAddress01
inc eax
jmp SearchArrayOfBytesNoBack

FoundAddress01:
mov [eax+03],759021EB
mov ecx,00861B93
SearchArrayOfBytesTimeBlock:
cmp [ecx],DC6045C7 //人物無敵Array Of Bytes
je FoundAddress02
inc ecx
jmp SearchArrayOfBytesTimeBlock

FoundAddress02:
mov [ecx+03],00002710 //無敵秒數
ret
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/全圖撿取物品  TWMSV142.txt`:

```txt
//全圖撿取物品  TWMSV142
//auther:aaaddress1
//可以撿取任何人/怪物所掉出的物品.
[ENABLE]
alloc(GetXY,128)
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(XY,20)

GetXY:
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[esp+0c]
push [edi]
pop [XY]
push [edi+04]
pop [XY+08]
jmp 0043021D
//=========================================================
004D7666:
call GetXY
//=========================================================
SetXY:
push esi
push edi
push [XY]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 00425D87
push [XY+08]
mov ecx,esi
call 00425D87
pop edi
mov eax,esi
pop esi
ret 04

004577AF:
call SetXY

[DISABLE]
004577AF:  //SetXY
call 00430217
004D7666:  //GetXY
call 00430217
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/吸跳怪.txt`:

```txt
//v.131.1 定點吸跳怪(防封)
//auther:aaaddress1
[ENABLE]
alloc(Vac,128)
alloc(rec,50)
label(Start_VacMob)
007CA437:
jmp Vac
rec:
dd 00
Vac:
cmp [rec],00
jne Start_VacMob
push eax
push edx
mov eax,[00acf52c]
mov eax,[eax+17a8]
sub eax,0c
mov edx,[eax+1a0]
mov [rec],edx
mov edx,[eax+1a4]
mov [rec+08],edx
mov edx,[eax+1a8]
mov [rec+10],edx
pop edx
pop eax
Start_VacMob:
push [rec]
pop [esi+1a0]
push [rec+08]
pop [esi+1a4]
push [rec+10]
pop [esi+1a8]
mov [esi+1e8],0
cmp [esi+000001b0],ebx
jmp 007CA44B
[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS144/走路加速(007)  Twms142.txt`:

```txt
//走路加速(007)  Twms142
[enable]
Label(return)
Label(normal)
Registersymbol(speed)
Alloc(speed, 4)
Registersymbol(Walking_speed)
Alloc(Walking_speed, 128)

speed:
dd 1 //數值越大速度越快 (0為正常)

Walking_speed:
push esi
mov esi,[speed]

return:
cmp esi,0
je normal

dec esi
push eax
push ecx
call dword ptr [eax]
pop ecx
pop eax
jmp return

normal:
pop esi
call dword ptr [eax]
mov eax,[esi+30]
jmp 0088360F+5

0088360F:
jmp Walking_speed

[disable]

0088360F:  //FF  8B   89   85  74  8D   50 E8     8B   59 8B
call dword ptr [eax]
mov eax,[esi+30]
mov [ebp-10],eax

Unregistersymbol(speed)
Dealloc(speed)
Unregistersymbol(Walking_speed)
Dealloc(Walking_speed)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_CALL.txt`:

```txt
丟錢
間隔0xC8
00934F1B - 68 C8000000                - push 000000C8

Mov  Ecx, [00A70B44]
Push #100
Call 00934EC1




送出表情
Push FFFFFFFF
Push 00000000
Push 00000002 // 2號表情：笑臉
Mov  Ecx, [00D1CDA4]
Call 0093676D




顯示文字
Push 00000000
Push 00000000
Push 00000000
Push FFFFFFFF
Push 0000000D //00:白色 01:綠色 02:粉紅色 03:橘色 04:淺粉紅 05:淺綠 06:灰色 07:黃色 08:淺黃色 09:藍色 0A:灰白底黑字 0B:淺粉紅 0C:灰藍底藍字
Push Text
Mov  Ecx, [00D21948]
Call 007E2D87




撿取物品
Push Point
Mov  Ecx, [00D24C58]
Call 004DA523




取得目前XY
Push MyXY
Mov  Ecx, [00D1D0DC] // 人物Base
Add  Ecx, 4
Call dword ptr [00BB28F0] // 00495DF0
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS145 取得血、魔、經驗值
//007E2D00 - E8 96C1FFFF                - call 007DEE9B
//原創：Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 007DEE9B

007E2D00: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
007E2D00:
Call 007DEE9B

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_CRC_攻擊不顯傷害.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS145 CRC 攻擊不顯示傷害
//E8 ?? ?? ?? FF FF 76 ?? 89 45 ?? 8D 46 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF FF 76 ?? 89 45 ?? 8D 46 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF FF 76 ?? 89 45 ?? 8D 46 ?? 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF
//第四組
//Call源:005E5A33 - E8 E1F3FFFF                - call 005E4E19
[ENABLE]
005E4F03:
DB 90 90 90 90 90
[DISABLE]
005E4F03:
DB E8 D0 FF E1 FF
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_4444.txt`:

```txt
//TwMS v1.45_ICS_DFMode
[Enable]
alloc(DFMODE,512)
Label(FakeCall1)
Label(FakeCall2)
Label(HookFun1)
Label(HookFun2)

DFMODE:
CMP [ESP+8],1D905C4
JNZ 006720de
MOV [ESP+8],1D909B0
JMP 006720de
Ret

FakeCall1:
CMP [ESP+0C],008A6964 //8d 88 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 59 85 c0 0f 85
JNE 0050C513
MOV [ESP+0C],HookFun1
JMP 0050C513 //b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04 e8

HookFun1:
lea ecx,[eax+000001a8]
call 004609db
push eax
call 005348a0
pop ecx
test eax,eax
mov esi,[ebp+5c]
push [esi+000003e4]
call 00459f18
push [esi+000003e8]
mov [ebp+78],eax
call 00459f18
pop ecx
pop ecx
mov ecx,[00d1cd9c]
mov [ebp+00],eax
xor eax,eax
push eax
mov [ebp+58],eax
mov [ebp+28],eax
lea eax,[ebp+58]
push eax
push edi
push ebx
call DFMODE
Jmp 008A69B9

FakeCall2:
CMP [ESP],008A9771 //50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 33 ff 59 85 c0 74 ?? 8b
JNE 0086A0EA
MOV [ESP],HookFun2
JMP 0086A0EA //6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9

HookFun2:
push eax
call 00490c4b
xor ebx,ebx
pop ecx

mov eax,[ebp+14]

mov ecx,[00d1cd9c]
push ebx
lea eax,[ebp+6c]
push eax
push edi
push [ebp+4c]
mov [ebp+6c],ebx
call DFMODE
JMP 008A9819

00B46298:
DD FakeCall1

00BB2964:
DD FakeCall2

[Disable]
00B46298:
DD 0050C513

00BB2964:
DD 0086A0EA
dealloc(DFMODE)
```

```txt
alloc(ItemVac,64)

dd ItemVac

cmp [esp],004DA65C
je SetItemXY
cmp [esp],004D9904
jne PtInRect
mov [esp],004D9908
jmp PtInRect
SetItemXY:
push eax
mov eax,[esp+0c]
mov [ebx],eax
mov eax,[esp+10]
mov [edi+04],eax
pop eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	AutoLR
// Version:	TWMS145
// Update:	Inndy
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 3b c7 0f 85
// Cortrol：	AutoLRRange
// 0: Off, Else:Range
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008EC54F
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008EC54F
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008EC819 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008EC819
//-----------------------------------------------
00D2A118:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00D2A118:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_人物損血不退（冷羽）.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.45.1
// 6.人物不後退 Ret 008D32C3

[Enable]
alloc(Check6, 256)
alloc(Check6_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Check6_Switch)

Check6_Switch:
DD 00

Check6:
cmp dword ptr [esp],008DF41D // (1)
jne My_Ret
cmp [Check6_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

mov [ebp+18],00000000 // Y
mov [ebp+14],00000000 // X

My_Ret:
push 008DF4A5 // (2) call 008DF4A5 - 53 55 8b 6c 24 0c 56 33 c0 57 8b f1 83 fd 0d
ret

00BB62EC:
DD Check6

[Disable]
00BB62EC: // (3) [9/10] Search 008DF4A5
DD 008DF4A5

// 008DF417 - (1) [2/2] ff 90 ? ? ? ? 0f bf 45 ? 89 45 ? 0f bf 45 ? db 45 ? 83 ec ? 89 45 ? 8d 4e ? dd 5c 24 ? db 45 ? dd 1c 24 e8 

dealloc(Check6)
dealloc(Check6_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Check6_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_全圖吸物.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
alloc(ItemVac,64)
label(SetItemXY)

00D2A0BC:
DD ItemVac

ItemVac:
cmp [esp],004DA65C
je SetItemXY
cmp [esp],004D9904
jne PtInRect
mov [esp],004D9908    // "Add2+04" - 不斷線
jmp PtInRect

SetItemXY:
push eax
mov eax,[esp+0C]      // [esp+0C]: 地上物品X
mov [ebx],eax            // [edi+00]: 封包物品X (人物X)
mov eax,[esp+10]      // [esp+10]: 地上物品Y
mov [ebx+04],eax      // [edi+04]: 封包物品Y (人物Y)
pop eax
mov [esp],004DA678    // Add1+02 "jne 004DA678"- 可撿物
jmp PtInRect

[disable]
00D2A0BC:
DD PtInRect

Dealloc(ItemVac)
```

```txt
// TWMS145 ICS 取得Hwnd
// 0090B4B5 - FF 15 78A0D200             - call dword ptr [00D2A078]
[ENABLE]

Alloc(Hwnd, 4)
RegisterSymbol(Hwnd)

HwndHook:
Cmp  [Esp], 0090B4BB
Jne  CreateWindowExA
Add  Esp, 4
Call CreateWindowExA
Mov  [Hwnd], Eax
Jmp  0090B4BB

00D2A078:
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_可變速怪物瞬移.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS145 ICS 可變速怪物瞬移
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// ICS: Inndy
// 180不要找我（茶
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MobFast, 512)
Label(My005F16EF)
Label(My005F1705)

MobFast:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
sub esp,3C
push ebx
push esi
push edi
mov ebx,ecx
lea eax,[ebp-3C]
push eax
lea eax,[ebp-34]
push eax
lea eax,[ebp-0C]
push eax
lea esi,[ebx+28]
fld qword ptr [esi]
lea eax,[ebx+000000EC]
push eax
fstp qword ptr [ebp-14]
fld qword ptr [ebx+30]
lea eax,[ebp-04]
push eax
fstp qword ptr [ebp-1C]
fld qword ptr [ebx+38]
lea eax,[ebp-2C]
push eax
fstp qword ptr [ebp-24]
fld qword ptr [ebx+40]
lea eax,[ebp-24]
push eax
fstp qword ptr [ebp-2C]
fld qword ptr [ebx+68]
lea eax,[ebp-1C]
push eax
fstp qword ptr [ebp-34]
fld qword ptr [ebx+70]
xor edi,edi
lea eax,[ebp-14]
fstp qword ptr [ebp-3C]
push eax
lea ecx,[ebx+000001D8]
mov [ebp-0C],edi
mov [ebp-08],edi
mov [ebp-04],edi
call My005F16EF
jmp 008E042D

My005F16EF:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
sub esp,28
push esi
mov esi,ecx
cmp dword ptr [esi+2C],00
jne My005F1705
xor eax,eax
jmp 005F1A09
My005F1705:
push ebx
push edi
push [esi+00000080]
lea eax,[esi+78]
push eax
call 00404ED8
pop ecx
pop ecx
mov ecx,esi
mov edi,eax
call 005CE940
mov eax, 3ff
jmp 005F1721

00BB5BF4:
DD  MobFast
[DISABLE]
00BB5BF4:
DD  008E03BF

Dealloc(MobFast)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_完全無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.45.1
// 1.完全無敵30秒
// 2.完全無敵

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(Check1_OldTime,4)
alloc(Check1_Switch,4)
alloc(Check2_Switch,4)
label(My_Jne)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Check1_Switch)
registersymbol(Check2_Switch)

Check1_Switch: // 完全無敵30秒
DD 00

Check2_Switch: // 完全無敵
DD 00

GodMode:
cmp [esp],0088944A // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12
jne My_Ret

cmp [Check2_Switch],01
je My_Jne

cmp [Check1_Switch],00
je My_Ret

mov eax,[00d21b80] // 時間基址 008BA99F - A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 40 ?? C3
mov eax,[eax+1c]
cmp eax,[Check1_OldTime]
jl My_Jne

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [Check1_OldTime],eax

My_Ret: // 正常損血
push 00897A72 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

My_Jne: // 無敵
mov [esp],0088b534 // ICS下面的JMP jne 0088b534
push 00897A72
ret

00BB2924:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00BB2924: // [1/1]
DD 00897A72 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(Check1_OldTime)
dealloc(Check1_Switch)
dealloc(Check2_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Check1_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Check2_Switch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS145 ICS 定點生怪
//原創：不知道，據說是浪漫高層找的
//更新：Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(myHook, 1024)
Alloc(xMobPX, 4)
Alloc(xMobPY, 4)
Alloc(xMobPIO, 4)
Label(Dull0121)
Label(Dull013)
Label(Dull0122)
Label(Dull01221)
Label(Dull01222)
Label(Dull01223)
Label(Dull01224)
Label(Dull01225)

myHook:
    cmp [esp], 005DF75C	//8B 07 8B CF FF 90 ?? 00 00 00 50 8B CE
    jne 008E4D39	//55 8B EC 53 8B 5D 10 56 57
    cmp [xMobPIO],1
    je Dull0121
    pushad
    mov eax,[00D1D0DC]
    mov ebx,[eax+5E0C]
    mov [xMobPX],ebx
    mov ebx,[eax+5E10]
    mov [xMobPY],ebx
    popad
    mov [xMobPIO],1
    jmp Dull013
Dull0121:
    cmp dword ptr [esp+18],02
    jne Dull013
    push ecx
    mov ecx,[xMobPX]
    mov [esp+0c],ecx
    mov eax,[xMobPY]
    mov [esp+10],eax
    push eax
    mov ecx,[00D215C0]  // (地圖牆壁值) //a1 ?? ?? ?? 00 c3 8b c1 83 20 00 c3 8b c1
    call Dull0122
    mov ecx,eax
    mov [esp+20],ecx
    pop ecx

Dull013:
    jmp 008E4D39
Dull0122: // 00430223 // 0043021A // 0042D006
    //6A 14 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 33 F6 89 75 ?? 89 75 ?? 89 75
    push 14
    mov eax,00993223
    call 0096f7b9
    xor esi,esi
    mov [ebp-10],esi
    mov [ebp-14],esi
    mov [ebp-04],esi
    cmp [ebp+08],esi
    je 00430d08
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    push eax
    lea eax,[ebp+08]
    push eax
    add ecx,00000088
    call 0043027a
    test eax,eax
    je Dull01221 
    lea eax,[ebp-18]
    jmp Dull01222
Dull01221:
    mov [ebp-1c],esi
    lea eax,[ebp-20]
    mov [ebp-10],00000001
Dull01222:
    test byte ptr [ebp-10],01
    mov esi,[eax+04]
    je 00430d26
    lea ecx,[ebp-20]
    //call 004301b9
    call Dull01224
Dull01223:
    or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
    lea ecx,[ebp-18]
    //call 004301b9
    call Dull01224
    mov eax,esi
    call 0096f891
    ret 4
Dull01224:  //0042C5BA
    push esi
    mov esi,ecx
    cmp dword ptr [esi+04],00
    je Dull01225
    push 00
    call 0042f6e5 // 0042ed98 // 0042bc79  //004b0657
    and dword ptr [esi+04],00
Dull01225:
    pop esi
    ret

00BB5AD0:
DD myHook
[DISABLE]
00BB5AD0:
DD 008E4D39

DeAlloc(myHook)
DeAlloc(xMobPX)
DeAlloc(xMobPY)
DeAlloc(xMobPIO)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_寵物玩家.txt`:

```txt
//v.1.4.5. CrackShield 寵物玩家 by.aaaddress1.
alloc(SetXY,128)
alloc(Offset,08)
alloc(OnOff,04)
label(NextStep00)


Offset:
dd #00
dd #00

SetXY:
cmp [esp],0077B3D5 //or 0077B292
je 00495DF0
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
push ecx
push ecx
lea eax,[ebp-08]
push eax
add ecx,000020F0
call 00431EBF
mov ecx,[00D1CDA4]
mov [ecx+20c4],00
mov ecx,ebp
sub ecx,08
Push ecx
Mov  Ecx,[0D24C58]
Call 004DA523
inc [Offset+00]
cmp [Offset+00],#350
jl NextStep00
mov [Offset+00],#-350
NextStep00:
mov ecx,[Offset+00]
mov eax,[Offset+04]
add [ebp-08],ecx
add [ebp-04],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-08]
mov eax,[ebp+08]
jmp 00495E0A

00BB28E0+10:
dd SetXY

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_控怪+跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS145 ICS 控怪+ 跳怪掉落
// Auther: Inndy
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB??83 bb ?? 00 00 00 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8d
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
// V140 008B6960 - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
// V145 008E326C - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB??83 be ?? ?? 00 00 03 57 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00
// V138 0089D627 - 83 be 98 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+00000298],03
// V140 008B98E4 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// V145 008E6272 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
//
// AOB??8b 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 f8 01 0f 85 ?? ?? 00 00
// V138 0089E802 - 8b 83 98 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
// V140 008BAE82 - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
// V145 008E781E - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB??39 8e ?? ?? 00 00 7c
// V138 0089B435 - 39 8e 94 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+00000694],ecx
// V140 008B7AE0 - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
// V145 008E445E - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(JumpMobFall, 128)
Alloc(MobLR, 512)
Alloc(MobLRSwitch, 4)
Alloc(MobGoX, 4)
Alloc(JumpDown, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
RegisterSymbol(MobGoX)
RegisterSymbol(JumpDown)
Label(ControlMob)
Label(Back)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoMe)
Label(GoMe_R)
Label(GoMe_L)
Label(GoPoint)
Label(GoX)
Label(GetX)

JumpDown:
DD   1 // 跳怪掉落開關
MobLRSwitch:
DD   3 // 0關1左2右3跟隨4取點5定點

MobLR:
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 20
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+08]
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, [00D215C0]
Mov  Ebx, Ecx
Push Edi
//-----------------------------------
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 01
Je   ControlMob
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 03
Je   ControlMob
Jmp  Back

ControlMob:
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 00
Je   Back
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 01
Je   GoLeft
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 02
Je   GoRight
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Je   GoX
Mov  Edi, [00D1D0DC]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+00005E0C]
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 04
Je   GetX
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 03
Je   GoMe
Jmp  Back

GoMe:
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00D1D0DC]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+0494]
And  Edi, 01
Test Edi, Edi
Je   GoMe_R
Jne  GoMe_L
Pop  Edi
Jmp  Back

GoMe_R:
Pop  Edi
Add  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoMe_L:
Pop  Edi
Sub  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoPoint:
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  Back

GetX:
Mov  [MobGoX], Edi
Mov  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Jmp  GoX

GoX:
Mov  Edi, [MobGoX]
Sub  Edi, 2
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Add  Edi, 4
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoMe


GoRight:
Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000004
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Back

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000005
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Back
//-----------------------------------
Back:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 0
Je   008E7801
Lea  Edi,[Ebx+00000088]
Fld  qword ptr [Edi]
Fsub qword ptr [Eax]
Fstp qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fldz
Fcom qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fnstsw Ax
Test Ah,44
Jnp  008E7F31
Mov  Eax,[Ebx+000002A0]
Cmp  Eax,01
Je   008E782D
Fstp st(0)
Cmp  Eax,03
Jmp  008E7BCF // Jne To...

JumpMobFall:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 00
Je   008E6268
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 0C
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, Ecx
Cmp  dword ptr [Esi+000002A0], 03
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00D215C0]
Jmp  008E6341 // Jne To...

00BB5BC8:
DD MobLR

00BB5BCC:
DD JumpMobFall
[DISABLE]
00BB5BC8:
DD 008E77ED // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 8B 45 08 53 56 8B 35

00BB5BCC:
DD 008E6268 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 8B F1 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 03

Dealloc(JumpMobFall)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(MobLRSwitch)
Dealloc(MobGoX)
Dealloc(JumpDown)
UnregisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobGoX)
UnregisterSymbol(JumpDown)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_無限雙倍標箭彈.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.45.1
// 3.無限標箭彈 ICS點: call dword ptr [eax+4c]
// 5.雙倍標箭彈 ICS Ret: 0042F520

[enable]
alloc(Check3, 256)
alloc(Check3_Switch, 04)
alloc(Check5_Switch, 04)
label(My_Call1)
label(My_Call2)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Check3_Switch)
registersymbol(Check5_Switch)

Check3_Switch: // 無限標箭彈
DD 00

Check5_Switch: // 雙倍標箭彈
DD 00

Check3:
cmp [esp+0c],0087F97A // 往下找第三個CALL // [2/2] e8 ? ? ? ? f7 d8 1b c0 f7 d8 89 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 8d ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? f7 d8 1b c0 f7 d8 89
jne My_Ret

cmp [Check3_Switch],01
je My_Call1
cmp [Check5_Switch],01
je My_Call2

push 0050C513 // ICS Ret
ret

My_Call1:
mov [ebp-00000214],1
cmp [Check5_Switch],01
je My_Call2
push 0050C513 // ICS Ret
ret

My_Call2:
mov [ebp-00000210],1

My_Ret:
push 0050C513 // ICS Ret
ret

00B46298:
DD Check3

[disable]
00B46298: // [1/50] Search 0050C513
DD 0050C513 // ICS Ret - b9 ? ? ? 00 e9 ? ? ? ? ff 74 24 04 e8 ? ? ? ? c2 08 00

dealloc(Check3)
dealloc(Check3_Switch)
dealloc(Check5_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Check3_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Check5_Switch)

// 無形之箭   [ebp-00000154]
// 無限標箭彈 [ebp-00000214]
// 雙倍標箭彈 [ebp-00000210]

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0088A360 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008E4FAC // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008E5F84 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 005E478E // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  006D34B2
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   0088A8D5
And  Ecx, F
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+60], #30000
Jmp  0088A901
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002B8]
Jmp  008E4FC1
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   008E5F98           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   008E5F8F           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  008E5F8B           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   005E47A1           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   005E47A5
Jmp  005E478E
//------------------------------
00D02D84:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00D02D84:
DD   006D34B2

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_神速撿物.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS145 ICS 神速撿物
//Auther: Inndy

/*

CRC Version

[ENABLE]
Alloc(MultiPick, 128)
Label(LoopPick)

MultiPick:
Mov  Eax, 0A
LoopPick:
Dec  Eax
Push Eax
Push [Esp+04]
Mov  Ecx, [00D24C58]
Call 004DA523
Pop  Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Jne  LoopPick
Add  Esp, 4
Jmp  008968E4

008968DF: // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 06 8D 4D ?? 51 8B CE FF 50 10 8B 4D F0 50
Jmp  MultiPick
[DISABLE]
008968DF:
Call 004DA523

Dealloc(MultiPick)







[ENABLE]
Alloc(FixPacket, 128)
Alloc(FixTime, 4)

FixTime:
DD   0

FixPacket:
Mov  [Esp], 009196E7
Mov  Edi, [Esp+04]   // PacketStruct
Mov  Edi, [Edi+04]   // PacketBuffer
Mov  Eax, [Edi+03]   // Time
Add  Eax, [FixTime]  // 修改包包時間，達成不斷
Mov  [Edi+03], Eax   // 寫入包包時間
Add  [FixTime],#90   // 增加假的時間，可以調整看看
Jmp  004894F4

009196D7:
Call FixPacket
[DISABLE]
009196D7:
DB E8 18 FE B6 FF

Dealloc(FixPacket)
Dealloc(FixTime)

*/
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
RegisterSymbol(FakeTime)
Alloc(SuperPickICS, 1024)
Label(MultiPick)
Label(LoopPick)

Label(NoDelayPickICS)
Label(NoDelayPick)
Label(Dark004da678)
Label(Dark004da68d)
Label(Dark004da6ab)

//For MyFakeCall

Label(Dark009195fd)
Label(Dark0091961a)
Label(Dark009196f9)

SuperPickICS:

Jne  00495DF0
Mov  [Esp], MultiPick
Jmp  00495DF0

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, Edi

Mov  Eax, 0A
LoopPick:
Dec  Eax
Push Eax
Push [Esp+04]
Mov  Ecx, [00D24C58]
Call 004DA523
Pop  Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Jne  LoopPick
Add  Esp, 4
Jmp  008968E4

NoDelayPickICS:

Jne  PtInRect
Mov  [Esp], NoDelayPick
Jmp  PtInRect

NoDelayPick:
DB   85 c0                              //004DA65C - test eax,eax
jne Dark004da678                        //004DA65E - jne 004da678
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //004DA660 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //004DA664 - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
call 004d931e                           //004DA667 - call 004d931e
DB   83 7d f0 00                        //004DA66C - cmp dword ptr [ebp-10],00
jne 004da59a                            //004DA670 - jne 004da59a
jmp Dark004da6ab                        //004DA676 - jmp 004da6ab
Dark004da678:
DB   33 c0                              //004DA678 - xor eax,eax
DB   39 46 30                           //004DA67A - cmp [esi+30],eax
jne Dark004da68d                        //004DA67D - jne 004da68d
DB   ff 76 34                           //004DA67F - push [esi+34]
DB   8b 0d 98 cd d1 00                  //004DA682 - mov ecx,[00d1cd98] : 0FC428F4
call 00584531                           //004DA688 - call 00584531
Dark004da68d:

DB   ff 76 20                           //004DA68E - push [esi+20]
DB   8b cf                              //004DA691 - mov ecx,edi
DB   53                                 //004DA693 - push ebx
call MyFakeCall                         //004DA694 - call 00919560
DB   8b 45 08                           //004DA699 - mov eax,[ebp+08]
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //004DA69C - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff

Dark004da6ab:

DB   c2 04 00                           //004DA6B0 - ret 0004
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS145 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)
label(HookTime2)
label(InitTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 008984B6 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 008E0059
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 008984B6

HookTime:
cmp [FakeTime],0
je InitTime

HookTime2:
mov eax,[FakeTime]
add eax,1FE
mov [FakeTime],eax
jmp 00DFEC70

InitTime:
mov [FakeTime],eax
push eax
lea eax,[HookTime2]
sub eax,00F1A07C    // 00F1A076+5
mov [00F1A077],eax  // 00F1A076+1
pop eax
jmp 00DFEC70

00BB624C:
dd SpeedUp

00F1A076:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00BB624C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 008E0059 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00F1A076: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00DFEC70

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_終極神速撿物.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS145 ICS 終極神速撿物走路自動撿取
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(PickTimes, 4)
Alloc(AutoPick, 256)
Label(GoBack)
Label(PickUp)

AutoPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 008EC54F
Jne  GetFocus
Pushad
Push Esp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Mov  [PickTimes], 05
PickUp:
Dec  [PickTimes]
Push 00
Push 00
Push Esp
Mov  Ecx, [00D1D0DC] // 人物Base
Add  Ecx, 4
Call dword ptr [00BB28F0] // 00495DF0
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00D21B80]
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00D24C58]
Call 004DA523
Mov  Ebx, [00D21B80]
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Sub  [Ebx+1C], Ecx
Test Eax, Eax
Je   GoBack
Add  [FakeTime], 3C
Mov  Eax, [00D1CDA4]
And  [Eax+20C4], 00
GoBack:
Cmp  [PickTimes], 00
Jg   PickUp
Leave
Popad
Jmp  GetFocus

00D2A118:
DD AutoPick
[DISABLE]
00D2A118:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
Dealloc(PickTimes)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	No Empty Attack
// Version:	TWMS145
// Update:	Inndy
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(NoEmptyAtkICS,512)

NoEmptyAtkICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 0088D05D
Jne  OffsetRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call OffsetRect

Push [Ebp-000001AC]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [Ebp-0000018C]
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-00000188]
Push Eax
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-6C]
Push Eax
Call 00436DF5
Mov  Ecx,Eax
Call 005E7386
Mov  [Ebp-7C],Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Je   0088D363 //8b 85 ?? fe ff ff 89 85 ?? ?? ff ff 81 bd ?? ?? ff ff ?? ?? ?? ?? 74 02 eb 4c
//0088D309 - 75 58                      - jne 0088D363
Jmp  0088D08F

00D2A08C:
DD NoEmptyAtkICS

[DISABLE]
00D2A08C:
DD OffsetRect

DeAlloc(NoEmptyAtkICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_退怪模式.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS 1.45 退怪模式
//原創 max大大
//更新+ICS:冰Smith
//Address:005E477F
//AAttackDir:0怪不動 1怪退正常 2怪退遠 3怪反退到底 A怪退到底
//EIP:AABack
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AABack)
registersymbol(AABackOnOff)
registersymbol(AAttackDir)
alloc(AABack_ICS, 256)
alloc(AABack, 128)
alloc(AABackOnOff, 4)
alloc(AAttackDir, 4)
label(doAABackNormal)
label(AABack_Hook)

00d02d84:
dd AABack_ICS

AABack_ICS:
Cmp [Esp+34], 005E4784
JE AABack_Hook
jmp 006D34B2

AABack_Hook:
mov [esp+34],AABack
jmp 006D34B2

AABack:
call 005d1f7b
cmp [AABackOnOff],0
jz doAABackNormal
push eax
mov eax,[AAttackDir]
mov [ebp+3c],eax
pop eax

doAABackNormal:
cmp dword ptr [ebp+3c],01
jmp 005E4792

AABackOnOff:
dd 1  // {0: 關閉 | 1: 開啟 }

AAttackDir:
dd 4 //遠攻者可改2
    // 0: 怪不動
    // 1: 怪退後一點點 (正常值)
    // 2: 怪退後很多點
    // 3: 怪反方向退到底
    // A(以上): 怪退到底

//005E4789:
//JMP AABack

[DISABLE]
00d02d84:
dd 006D34B2
//005E4789:
//call 005d1f7b
//cmp dword ptr [ebp+3c],01

dealloc(AABack)
dealloc(AABackOnOff)
dealloc(AAttackDir)
unregistersymbol(AABack)
unregistersymbol(AABackOnOff)
unregistersymbol(AAttackDir)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS145/TWMS145_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)

//-----------------------------------------------

DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0084E770	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65
Jne  0083CCE9
Call R2
Jmp  0083CCE9
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0

Ret
```
