`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/CRC分析.txt`:

```txt
DWORD crc_32_tab[255];

void GenerateCRC32Table()
{
	DWORD crc, i, j;
	for (i = 0; i < 256; i++)
	{
		crc = i;
		for (j = 8; j > 0; j--)
		{
			crc >>= 1;
			if (crc & 1)
				crc ^= 0xEDB88320;
		}
		crc_32_tab[i] = crc;
	}
}

DWORD GenerateCRC32(char* DataBuf, DWORD len)
{
	DWORD oldcrc32;
	DWORD crc32;
	DWORD oldcrc;
	DWORD charcnt;
	char c, t;
	oldcrc32 = 0x00000000;				//初值為0
	charcnt = 0;
	while(len--)
	{
		t = (oldcrc32 >> 24) & 0xFF;	//要移出的字節的值
		oldcrc = crc_32_tab[t];			//根據移出的字節的值查表
		c = DataBuf[charcnt];			//新移進來的字節值
		oldcrc32 = (oldcrc32 << 8) | c;	//將新移進來的字節值添在寄存器末字節中
		oldcrc32 ^= oldcrc;				//將寄存器與查出的值進行xor運算
		charcnt++;
	}
	crc32 = oldcrc32;
	return crc32;
}

shr -> 右位移 ( sh[R] -> Right )
shl -> 左位移 ( sh[L] -> Left  )

//TWMS146

00997F85 - c7 85 58 ff ff ff 00 00 00 00 - mov [ebp-000000a8],00000000
00997F8F - c7 45 cc 00 00 00 00       - mov [ebp-34],00000000
00997F96 - eb 09                      - jmp 00997fa1
00997F98 - 8b 4d cc                   - mov ecx,[ebp-34]			// 已經運算長度
00997F9B - 83 c1 01                   - add ecx,01
00997F9E - 89 4d cc                   - mov [ebp-34],ecx
00997FA1 - 8b 55 cc                   - mov edx,[ebp-34]
00997FA4 - 3b 55 c8                   - cmp edx,[ebp-38]			// 總長度
00997FA7 - 0f 83 63 02 00 00          - jae 00998210
00997FAD - 8b 45 cc                   - mov eax,[ebp-34]
00997FB0 - 3b 85 74 ff ff ff          - cmp eax,[ebp-0000008c]
00997FB6 - 0f 85 07 02 00 00          - jne 009981c3				// 運算
00997FBC - e9 be 53 5c 00             - jmp 00f5d37f

009981C3 - 33 c0                      - xor eax,eax
009981C5 - 03 c2                      - add eax,edx
009981C7 - 8b 55 18                   - mov edx,[ebp+18]			// Ptr 2 CRC
009981CA - 83 e8 08                   - sub eax,08
009981CD - 8b 02                      - mov eax,[edx]
009981CF - c1 e8 08                   - shr eax,08
009981D2 - 33 c9                      - xor ecx,ecx
009981D4 - 8b c8                      - mov ecx,eax
009981D6 - c1 e1 08                   - shl ecx,08
009981D9 - 8b 4d 08                   - mov ecx,[ebp+08]			// 計算起始處
009981DC - 03 4d cc                   - add ecx,[ebp-34]
009981DF - 33 d2                      - xor edx,edx
009981E1 - 8b 5d 08                   - mov ebx,[ebp+08]
009981E4 - 8a 11                      - mov dl,[ecx]
009981E6 - 80 c2 01                   - add dl,01
009981E9 - 8b 4d 18                   - mov ecx,[ebp+18]
009981EC - 8b 09                      - mov ecx,[ecx]
009981EE - 80 ea 01                   - sub dl,01
009981F1 - 33 ca                      - xor ecx,edx
009981F3 - 81 e1 ff 00 00 00          - and ecx,000000ff
009981F9 - 83 f1 16                   - xor ecx,16
009981FC - 83 f1 16                   - xor ecx,16
009981FF - 33 04 8d 44 8f d4 00       - xor eax,[ecx*4+00d48f44]	// CRC表（跟正常的CRC表不同）
00998206 - 8b 55 18                   - mov edx,[ebp+18]
00998209 - 89 02                      - mov [edx],eax
0099820B - e9 88 fd ff ff             - jmp 00997f98
00998210 - e9 77 6d 5c 00             - jmp 00f5ef8c




009981C7 - 8b 55 18                   - mov edx,[ebp+18]
009981CD - 8b 02                      - mov eax,[edx]
009981CF - c1 e8 08                   - SHR EAX,08
009981D9 - 8b 4d 08                   - mov ecx,[ebp+08]
009981DC - 03 4d cc                   - add ecx,[ebp-34]
009981E1 - 8b 5d 08                   - mov ebx,[ebp+08]
009981E9 - 8b 4d 18                   - mov ecx,[ebp+18]
009981EC - 8b 09                      - mov ecx,[ecx]              // [Ecx] = 讀取記憶體 (4 Bytes)
009981F3 - 81 e1 ff 00 00 00          - and ecx,000000ff
009981FF - 33 04 8d 44 8f d4 00       - xor eax,[ecx*4+00d48f44]   // 00d48f44 = Hash Table
00998206 - 8b 55 18                   - mov edx,[ebp+18]
00998209 - 89 02                      - mov [edx],eax
0099820B - e9 88 fd ff ff             - jmp 00997f98

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_CRC_MSCRCBYPASS(冷羽楓痕).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.46.1 MSCRC Bypass
// Made by 冷羽楓痕
// Update by Inndy

[enable]
alloc(MSCRC,256)
alloc(FakeDump1,11)
alloc(FakeDump2,13)
label(MSCRC1)
label(MSCRC2)
label(OtherCheck)
label(MSCRC1Ret)
label(SetFakeCRCValue)
label(SetCRCValue1)
label(SetCRCValue2)
label(SetCRCValue3)
label(SetCRCValue4)
label(SetCRCValue5)
label(SetCRCValue6)
//8A 11 80 C2 01
//009981E4
FakeDump1: // 009981E4-3 ~ 009981E4+7 共11個bytes
db 8B 5D 08 8A 11 80 C2 01 8B 4D 18
//6A ?? B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 05
//0048997F
FakeDump2: // 0048997F-3 ~ 0048997F+9 共13個bytes
db 10 5E C3 6A 38 B8 79 D2 9A 00 E8 5E 1F

MSCRC:
MSCRC1: // 檢測MSCRC2位址 009981E4 - 8a 11 80 c2 01 8b 4d 18
cmp edx,009981E1 // 009981E4-3
jl OtherCheck
cmp edx,009981E8 // 009981E4+4
jg OtherCheck

sub edx,009981E1 // 009981E4-3
add edx,FakeDump1
jmp MSCRC1Ret

OtherCheck: // 檢測送出封包函式 0048997F - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
cmp edx,0048997C // 0048997F-3
jl MSCRC1Ret
cmp edx,00489985 // 0048997F+6
jg MSCRC1Ret

sub edx,0048997C // 0048997F-3
add edx,FakeDump2

MSCRC1Ret:
//MSCRC1原本動作
push [edx]
jmp 00e12a59

MSCRC2:
call SetFakeCRCValue
//MSCRC2原本動作
push 0b845396
jmp 00e11e38

SetFakeCRCValue: // 更新: Hook該處，讀取[ebp+08]和[ebp+18]的值，其值每15秒變動一次，總共變動6次，之後的值都會重複
mov eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
cmp eax,00401324
je SetCRCValue1
cmp eax,004EEE1E
je SetCRCValue2
cmp eax,005DC918
je SetCRCValue3
cmp eax,006CA412
je SetCRCValue4
cmp eax,007B7F0C
je SetCRCValue5
cmp eax,008A5A06
je SetCRCValue6
ret

SetCRCValue1:
mov [edx],7F6C3F92
ret

SetCRCValue2:
mov [edx],6E9928C8
ret

SetCRCValue3:
mov [edx],F725B583
ret

SetCRCValue4:
mov [edx],BBCDE95E
ret

SetCRCValue5:
mov [edx],97D5BD80
ret

SetCRCValue6:
mov [edx],4F15E3ED
ret

00E1D95D: // MSCRC1
jmp MSCRC1
nop
nop

00F5EF8C: // MSCRC2
jmp MSCRC2

[disable]
00E1D95D: // 更新: 搜尋 ff 32 e9，會有好幾個，任意選一個做Hook，觀看被執行到最多次那個就是了
db ff 32 e9 f5 50 ff ff
00F5EF8C: // 更新: 搜尋 8a 11 80 c2 01 (00960394)，在搜尋到的位址底下有兩個第二個就是了
push 0b845396

dealloc(MSCRC)
dealloc(FakeDump1)
dealloc(FakeDump2)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_CRC_冷羽式CRCBYPASS更新工具.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 CRC 冷羽式CRCBYPASS更新工具
// Auther: Inndy
// Address: 00F5EF8C
// EIP: mGetCRC
[ENABLE]
Alloc(mGetCRC, 256)
Alloc(Index, 4)
Alloc(Values, 48)
Label(Return)
RegisterSymbol(mGetCRC)
RegisterSymbol(Values)
RegisterSymbol(Index)

mGetCRC:
push ecx
mov  ecx, [Index]
cmp  ecx, #12
jge  Return
mov  eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov  edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
mov  edx, [edx]
mov  [Values+ecx*4], eax
inc  ecx
mov  [Values+ecx*4], edx
inc  ecx
mov  [Index], ecx
Return:
mov  eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov  edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
pop  ecx
push 0b845396
jmp  00e11e38
[DISABLE]
Dealloc(Index)
Dealloc(Values)
Dealloc(mGetCRC)
UnRegisterSymbol(mGetCRC)
UnRegisterSymbol(Values)
UnRegisterSymbol(Index)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00BBBBD8] = 007EB770
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 007E7AC8

007EB92C: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
007EB92C:
Call 007E7AC8

Dealloc(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_CRC_快捷鍵水量顯示.txt`:

```txt
// Twms v146.1 快捷鍵水量顯示
[enable]
registersymbol(Main)
alloc(Main,512)
registersymbol(Shift)
alloc(Shift,4)
registersymbol(Ins)
alloc(Ins,4)
registersymbol(Home)
alloc(Home,4)
registersymbol(PageUp)
alloc(PageUp,4)
registersymbol(Ctrl)
alloc(Ctrl,4)
registersymbol(Del)
alloc(Del,4)
registersymbol(End)
alloc(End,4)
registersymbol(PageDown)
alloc(PageDown,4)
registersymbol(Time)
alloc(Time,4)
Label(Return)
Label(Z1)
Label(Z2)
Label(Z3)
Label(Z4)
Label(Z5)
Label(Z6)
Label(Z7)
Label(Z8)

Main:
inc [Time]
cmp [Time],1
je Z1
cmp [Time],2
je Z2
cmp [Time],3
je Z3
cmp [Time],4
je Z4
cmp [Time],5
je Z5
cmp [Time],6
je Z6
cmp [Time],7
je Z7
cmp [Time],8
je Z8
jmp Return


Z1:
mov [Shift],eax
jmp Return

Z2:
mov [Ins],eax
jmp Return

Z3:
mov [Home],eax
jmp Return

Z4:
mov [PageUp],eax
jmp Return

Z5:
mov [Ctrl],eax
jmp Return

Z6:
mov [Del],eax
jmp Return

Z7:
mov [End],eax
jmp Return

Z8:
mov [PageDown],eax
mov [Time],0
jmp Return

Return:
mov [ebx+08],eax
jmp 007E3E35

007E3DAC:
jmp Main
[disable]
007E3DAC:
mov [ebx+08],eax
jmp 007E3E35
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	AutoLR
// Version:	TWMS146
// Update:	Inndy
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 3b c7 0f 85
// Cortrol：	AutoLRRange
// 0: Off, Else:Range
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008F8092
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008F8092
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008F835C // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008F835C
//-----------------------------------------------
00D3D7C8:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00D3D7C8:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_控怪+跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 控怪+ 跳怪掉落
// Auther: Inndy
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB	83 bb ?? 00 00 00 00 0f 84 ?? 00 00 00 8d
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
// V140 008B6960 - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
// V145 008E326C - 83 bb fc 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000fc],00
// V146 008EEDAF - 83 BB FC000000 00          - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000FC],00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB	83 be ?? ?? 00 00 03 57 8b 3d ?? ?? ?? 00
// V138 0089D627 - 83 be 98 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+00000298],03
// V140 008B98E4 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// V145 008E6272 - 83 be a0 02 00 00 03       - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002a0],03
// V146 008F1DB5 - 83 BE A0020000 03          - cmp dword ptr [esi+000002A0],03
//
// AOB	8b 83 ?? ?? 00 00 83 f8 01 0f 85 ?? ?? 00 00
// V138 0089E802 - 8b 83 98 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+00000298]
// V140 008BAE82 - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
// V145 008E781E - 8b 83 a0 02 00 00          - mov eax,[ebx+000002a0]
// V146 008F3361 - 8B 83 A0020000             - mov eax,[ebx+000002A0]
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// AOB	39 8e ?? ?? 00 00 7c
// V138 0089B435 - 39 8e 94 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+00000694],ecx
// V140 008B7AE0 - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
// V145 008E445E - 39 8e 9c 06 00 00          - cmp [esi+0000069c],ecx
// V146 008EFFA1 - 39 8E 9C060000             - cmp [esi+0000069C],ecx
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// 怪物牆值
// AOB	8B 8E ?? 00 00 00 2B C8 89 4D ?? DB 45
//	[1/2]
// V146 008EAE4C - 8B 8E DC000000             - mov ecx,[esi+000000DC]
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(JumpMobFall, 128)
Alloc(MobLR, 512)
Alloc(MobLRSwitch, 4)
Alloc(MobGoX, 4)
Alloc(JumpDown, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
RegisterSymbol(MobGoX)
RegisterSymbol(JumpDown)
Label(ControlMob)
Label(Back)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoMe)
Label(GoMe_R)
Label(GoMe_L)
Label(GoPoint)
Label(GoX)
Label(GetX)

JumpDown:
DD   1 // 跳怪掉落開關
MobLRSwitch:
DD   3 // 0關1左2右3跟隨4取點5定點

MobLR:
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 20
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+08]
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, [00D34B80]
Mov  Ebx, Ecx
Push Edi
//-----------------------------------
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 01
Je   ControlMob
Cmp  [Ebx+000002A0], 03
Je   ControlMob
Jmp  Back

ControlMob:
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 00
Je   Back
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 01
Je   GoLeft
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 02
Je   GoRight
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Je   GoX
Mov  Edi, [00D38410]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+00000F90]
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 04
Je   GetX
Cmp  [MobLRSwitch], 03
Je   GoMe
Jmp  Back

GoMe:
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00D3069C]
Mov  Edi, [Edi+00000494]
And  Edi, 01
Test Edi, Edi
Je   GoMe_R
Jne  GoMe_L
Pop  Edi
Jmp  Back

GoMe_R:
Pop  Edi
Add  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoMe_L:
Pop  Edi
Sub  Edi, 64
Jmp  GoPoint

GoPoint:
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  Back

GetX:
Mov  [MobGoX], Edi
Mov  [MobLRSwitch], 05
Jmp  GoX

GoX:
Mov  Edi, [MobGoX]
Sub  Edi, 2
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jl   GoRight
Add  Edi, 4
Cmp  [Ebx+0000069C], Edi
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoMe


GoRight:
//Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000004
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Back

GoLeft:
//Mov  [Ebx+000000EC], 00000005
Mov  [Ebx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Back
//-----------------------------------
Back:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 0
Je   008F3344 // Lea Edi
Lea  Edi,[Ebx+00000088]
Fld  qword ptr [Edi]
Fsub qword ptr [Eax]
Fstp qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fldz
Fcom qword ptr [Ebp-18]
Fnstsw Ax
Test Ah,44
Jnp  008F3A74
Mov  Eax,[Ebx+000002A0]
Cmp  Eax,01
Je   008F3370 // fcomp qword ptr [ebp-18]
Fstp st(0)
Cmp  Eax,03
Jmp  008F3712 // Jne To...

JumpMobFall:
Cmp  [JumpDown], 00
Je   008F1DAB
Push Ebp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Sub  Esp, 0C
Push Ebx
Push Esi
Mov  Esi, Ecx
Cmp  dword ptr [Esi+000002A0], 03
Push Edi
Mov  Edi, [00D34B80]
Jmp  008F1E84 // Jne To...

00BC6A98:
DD MobLR

00BC6A9C:
DD JumpMobFall
[DISABLE]
00BC6A98:
DD 008F3330 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 8B 45 08 53 56 8B 35

00BC6A9C:
DD 008F1DAB // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 8B F1 83 BE ?? ?? 00 00 03

Dealloc(JumpMobFall)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(MobLRSwitch)
Dealloc(MobGoX)
Dealloc(JumpDown)
UnregisterSymbol(MobLRSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobGoX)
UnregisterSymbol(JumpDown)
```

```txt
Jne  00873D8F // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74
Mov  [Ebp+20], 38FFFFFF
Jmp  00873D8F

00BC3834:
DD   Hook
[DISABLE]
```

```txt
// 無形之箭   [ebp-00000154]

Jne  Return

00B55FE8:
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],00894750 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12
jne Normal

mov eax,[00D35140] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 008A330F // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],00896AB4 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 008A330F
ret

00BC37F4:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00BC37F4: // [1/1]
DD 008A330F // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0089567B // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008F0AEF // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008F1AC7 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 005E7A1C // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  006D7B49
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   00895BF0 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  00895C1C
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002B8]
Jmp  008F0B04 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   008F1ADB           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   008F1AD2           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  008F1ACE           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   005E7A2F           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   005E7A33
Jmp  005E7A1C
//------------------------------
00D1613C:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00D1613C:
DD   006D7B49

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 008A2154
Jne  0049627B
Add  Esp, 4
Call 0049627B
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00D35140]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00D38220]
Call 004DB708
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00D35140]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00D30364]
And  [Eax+20C4], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00D30364]
And  [Eax+20C4], 0
And  [Eax+20C8], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00D38220]
Call 004DB708
Jmp  008A215C

00BC37C0:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00BC37C0:
DD   0049627B

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_神速撿物.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS146 ICS 神速撿物
//Auther: Inndy

/*

CRC Version

[ENABLE]
Alloc(MultiPick, 128)
Label(LoopPick)

MultiPick:
Mov  Eax, 09 // 多撿幾個
LoopPick:
Dec  Eax
Push Eax
Push [Esp+04]
Mov  Ecx, [00D38220]
Call 004DB708
Pop  Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Jne  LoopPick
Mov  Ecx, [00D38220]
Call 004DB708
Jmp  008A215C

008A2157: // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 06 8D 4D ?? 51 8B CE FF 50 10 8B 4D F0 50
Jmp  MultiPick
[DISABLE]
008A2157:
Call 004DB708

Dealloc(MultiPick)
*/
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
RegisterSymbol(FakeTime)
Alloc(SuperPickICS, 1024)
Label(MultiPick)
Label(LoopPick)

Label(NoDelayPickICS)
Label(NoDelayPick)
Label(Dark004da678)
Label(Dark004da68d)
Label(Dark004da6ab)

//For MyFakeCall
Label(MyFakeCall)
Label(Dark009195fd)
Label(Dark0091961a)
Label(Dark009196f9)
Label(Dark00919652)

SuperPickICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 008968DC
Jne  00495DF0
Mov  [Esp], MultiPick
Jmp  00495DF0

MultiPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, Edi

Mov  Eax, 0A
LoopPick:
Dec  Eax
Push Eax
Push [Esp+04]
Mov  Ecx, [00D24C58]
Call 004DA523
Pop  Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Jne  LoopPick
Add  Esp, 4
Jmp  008968E4

NoDelayPickICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 004DA65C // 85 C0 75 18 83 4D
Jne  PtInRect
Mov  [Esp], NoDelayPick
Jmp  PtInRect

NoDelayPick:
DB   85 c0                              //004DA65C - test eax,eax
jne Dark004da678                        //004DA65E - jne 004da678
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //004DA660 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //004DA664 - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
call 004d931e                           //004DA667 - call 004d931e
DB   83 7d f0 00                        //004DA66C - cmp dword ptr [ebp-10],00
jne 004da59a                            //004DA670 - jne 004da59a
jmp Dark004da6ab                        //004DA676 - jmp 004da6ab
Dark004da678:
DB   33 c0                              //004DA678 - xor eax,eax
DB   39 46 30                           //004DA67A - cmp [esi+30],eax
jne Dark004da68d                        //004DA67D - jne 004da68d
DB   ff 76 34                           //004DA67F - push [esi+34]
DB   8b 0d 98 cd d1 00                  //004DA682 - mov ecx,[00d1cd98] : 0FC428F4
call 00584531                           //004DA688 - call 00584531
Dark004da68d:
DB   50                                 //004DA68D - push eax
DB   ff 76 20                           //004DA68E - push [esi+20]
DB   8b cf                              //004DA691 - mov ecx,edi
DB   53                                 //004DA693 - push ebx
call MyFakeCall                         //004DA694 - call 00919560
DB   8b 45 08                           //004DA699 - mov eax,[ebp+08]
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //004DA69C - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //004DA6A0 - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
DB   89 46 54                           //004DA6A3 - mov [esi+54],eax
call 004d931e                           //004DA6A6 - call 004d931e
Dark004da6ab:
call 0096f891                           //004DA6AB - call 0096f891
DB   c2 04 00                           //004DA6B0 - ret 0004

MyFakeCall:
DB   6a 14                              //919560 - push 14
DB   b8 1a 7d a4 00                     //919562 - mov eax,00a47d1a
call 0096f7b9                           //919567 - call 0096f7b9
DB   8b f1                              //0091956C - mov esi,ecx
DB   6a 00                              //0091956E - push 00
DB   6a 1e                              //919570 - push 1e
call 00480679                           //919572 - call 00480679
DB   85 c0                              //919577 - test eax,eax
je Dark009196f9                         //919579 - je 009196f9
DB   8b 0d dc d0 d1 00                  //0091957F - mov ecx,[00d1d0dc] : 5572DC0C
call 004c95eb                           //919585 - call 004c95eb
DB   85 c0                              //0091958A - test eax,eax
jne Dark009196f9                        //0091958C - jne 009196f9
DB   8b 0d dc d0 d1 00                  //919592 - mov ecx,[00d1d0dc] : 5572DC0C
call 004c95fe                           //919598 - call 004c95fe
DB   85 c0                              //0091959D - test eax,eax
jne Dark009196f9                        //0091959F - jne 009196f9
DB   8b 0d dc d0 d1 00                  //009195A5 - mov ecx,[00d1d0dc] : 5572DC0C

jne Dark009196f9                        //009195B2 - jne 009196f9

jne Dark009196f9                        //009195C4 - jne 009196f9

je Dark009196f9                         //919605 - je 009196f9

Dark0091961a:

call 0042f508                           //919674 - call 0042f508

DB   ff 75 f0                           //919682 - push [ebp-10]
DB   8d 4d e0                           //919685 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00410ca5                           //919688 - call 00410ca5
call 008ba99f                           //0091968D - call 008ba99f
DB   50                                 //919692 - push eax
DB   8d 4d e0                           //919693 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00410cc3                           //919696 - call 00410cc3
DB   8b 7d 08                           //0091969B - mov edi,[ebp+08]
DB   0f b7 07                           //0091969E - movzx eax,word ptr [edi]
DB   50                                 //009196A1 - push eax
DB   8d 4d e0                           //009196A2 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00427475                           //009196A5 - call 00427475
DB   0f b7 47 04                        //009196AA - movzx eax,word ptr [edi+04]
DB   50                                 //009196AE - push eax
DB   8d 4d e0                           //009196AF - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00427475                           //009196B2 - call 00427475
DB   ff 75 0c                           //009196B7 - push [ebp+0c]
DB   8d 4d e0                           //009196BA - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00410cc3                           //009196BD - call 00410cc3
DB   ff 75 10                           //009196C2 - push [ebp+10]
DB   8d 4d e0                           //009196C5 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00410cc3                           //009196C8 - call 00410cc3
DB   8b 0d 0c d1 d1 00                  //009196CD - mov ecx,[00d1d10c] : 06535064
DB   8d 45 e0                           //009196D3 - lea eax,[ebp-20]
DB   50                                 //009196D6 - push eax
Mov  Edi, [Esp]      // PacketStruct
Mov  Edi, [Edi+04]   // PacketBuffer
Mov  Eax, [Edi+03]   // Time
Add  Eax, [FixTime]  // 修改包包時間，達成不斷
Mov  [Edi+03], Eax   // 寫入包包時間
Add  [FixTime],#90   // 增加假的時間，可以調整看看
Push 009196E7
Jmp  004894F4
DB   83 4d fc ff                        //91960000000 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   8d 4d e4                           //009196EB - lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
DB   89 be a8 4c 00 00                  //009196EE - mov [esi+00004ca8],edi
call 0042664d                           //009196F4 - call 0042664d
Dark009196f9:
call 0096f891                           //009196F9 - call 0096f891
DB   c2 0c 00                           //009196FE - ret 000c


00BB28F0:
DD   SuperPickICS
00D2A0BC:
DD   NoDelayPickICS
[DISABLE]
00BB28F0:
DD   00495DF0
00D2A0BC:
DD   PtInRect

Dealloc(FakeTime)
Dealloc(SuperPickICS)
UnregisterSymbol(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 008A3D53 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 008EBB9C
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 008A3D53

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00E11E38

00BC711C:
dd SpeedUp

00F2A8CD:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00BC711C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 008EBB9C // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00F2A8CD: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00E11E38

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_終極神速撿物.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 終極神速撿物走路自動撿取
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(PickTimes, 4)
Alloc(AutoPick, 256)
Label(GoBack)
Label(PickUp)

AutoPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 008F8092
Jne  GetFocus
Pushad
Push Esp
Mov  Ebp, Esp
Mov  [PickTimes], 05
PickUp:
Dec  [PickTimes]
Push 00
Push 00
Push Esp
Mov  Ecx, [00D3069C] // 人物Base
Add  Ecx, 4
Call dword ptr [00BC37C0] // 0049627B
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00D35140]
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00D38220]
Call 004DB708
Mov  Ebx, [00D35140]
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Sub  [Ebx+1C], Ecx
Test Eax, Eax
Je   GoBack
Add  [FakeTime], 3C
Mov  Eax, [00D30364]
And  [Eax+20C4], 00
GoBack:
Cmp  [PickTimes], 00
Jg   PickUp
Leave
Popad
Jmp  GetFocus

00D3D7C8:
DD AutoPick
[DISABLE]
00D3D7C8:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
Dealloc(PickTimes)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_超級笨怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V146 ICS
// 超級笨怪

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],008F472B // e8 ? ? ? ? 3b c7 75 ? 33 c0 eb ? 83 be ? ? ? ? 06
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

mov [esi+000002a8],00

My_Ret:
push 008EB867 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee
ret

00BC693C:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00BC693C: // [5/10] Search 008DFD24
DD 008EB867

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.1/TWMS146_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	No Empty Attack
// Version:	TWMS146
// Update:	Inndy
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(NoEmptyAtkICS,512)

NoEmptyAtkICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 008986FF
Jne  OffsetRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call OffsetRect

Push [Ebp-000001AC]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [Ebp-0000018C]
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-00000188]
Push Eax
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-6C]
Push Eax
Call 00436F65
Mov  Ecx,Eax
Call 005EA614
Mov  [Ebp-7C],Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Je   00898A05 //8b 85 ?? fe ff ff 89 85 ?? ?? ff ff 81 bd ?? ?? ff ff ?? ?? ?? ?? 74 02 eb 4c
Jmp  00898731

00D3D73C:
DD NoEmptyAtkICS

[DISABLE]
00D3D73C:
DD OffsetRect

DeAlloc(NoEmptyAtkICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.2/TWMS146.2_CRC_冷羽式CRCBYPASS更新工具.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146.2 CRC 冷羽式CRCBYPASS更新工具
// Auther: Inndy
// Address: 00F5E35B
// EIP: mGetCRC
[ENABLE]
Alloc(mGetCRC, 256)
Alloc(Index, 4)
Alloc(Values, 48)
Label(Return)
RegisterSymbol(mGetCRC)
RegisterSymbol(Values)
RegisterSymbol(Index)

mGetCRC:
push ecx
mov  ecx, [Index]
cmp  ecx, #12
jge  Return
mov  eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov  edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
mov  edx, [edx]
mov  [Values+ecx*4], eax
inc  ecx
mov  [Values+ecx*4], edx
inc  ecx
mov  [Index], ecx
Return:
mov  eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov  edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
pop  ecx
push 0BF7471F
jmp  00E11F6D
[DISABLE]
Dealloc(Index)
Dealloc(Values)
Dealloc(mGetCRC)
UnRegisterSymbol(mGetCRC)
UnRegisterSymbol(Values)
UnRegisterSymbol(Index)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.2/TWMS146_CRC_MSCRCBYPASS(冷羽楓痕).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V1.46.2 MSCRC Bypass
// Made by 冷羽楓痕
// Update by Inndy

[enable]
alloc(MSCRC,256)
alloc(FakeDump1,11)
alloc(FakeDump2,13)
label(MSCRC1)
label(MSCRC2)
label(OtherCheck)
label(MSCRC1Ret)
label(SetFakeCRCValue)
label(SetCRCValue1)
label(SetCRCValue2)
label(SetCRCValue3)
label(SetCRCValue4)
label(SetCRCValue5)
label(SetCRCValue6)
//8A 11 80 C2 01
//009981E4
FakeDump1: // 00998284-3 ~ 00998284+7 共11個bytes
db 8B 5D 08 8A 11 80 C2 01 8B 4D 18
//6A ?? B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 05
//0048997F
FakeDump2: // 00489998-3 ~ 00489998+9 共13個bytes
db 10 5E C3 6A 38 B8 27 D3 9A 00 E8 E5 1F

MSCRC:
MSCRC1: // 檢測MSCRC2位址 00998284 - 8a 11 80 c2 01 8b 4d 18
cmp edx,00998281 // 00998284-3
jl OtherCheck
cmp edx,00998288 // 00998284+4
jg OtherCheck

sub edx,00998281 // 00998284-3
add edx,FakeDump1
jmp MSCRC1Ret

OtherCheck: // 檢測送出封包函式 00489998 - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
cmp edx,00489995 // 00489998-3
jl MSCRC1Ret
cmp edx,0048999E // 00489998+6
jg MSCRC1Ret

sub edx,00489995 // 00489998-3
add edx,FakeDump2

MSCRC1Ret:
//MSCRC1原本動作
push [edx]
jmp 00E12A6C

MSCRC2:
call SetFakeCRCValue
//MSCRC2原本動作
push 0BF7471F
jmp 00E11F6D

SetFakeCRCValue: // 更新: Hook該處，讀取[ebp+08]和[ebp+18]的值，其值每15秒變動一次，總共變動6次，之後的值都會重複
mov eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
/*
00401324
CAE1A58F

004EEE1E
3074FE4F

005DC918
278D79F0

006CA412
7161DDB2

007B7F0C
5AA4A876

008A5A06
701E861F
*/
cmp eax,00401324
je SetCRCValue1
cmp eax,004EEE1E
je SetCRCValue2
cmp eax,005DC918
je SetCRCValue3
cmp eax,006CA412
je SetCRCValue4
cmp eax,007B7F0C
je SetCRCValue5
cmp eax,008A5A06
je SetCRCValue6
ret

SetCRCValue1:
mov [edx],CAE1A58F
ret

SetCRCValue2:
mov [edx],3074FE4F
ret

SetCRCValue3:
mov [edx],278D79F0
ret

SetCRCValue4:
mov [edx],7161DDB2
ret

SetCRCValue5:
mov [edx],5AA4A876
ret

SetCRCValue6:
mov [edx],701E861F
ret

00E143CF: // MSCRC1
jmp MSCRC1
nop
nop

00F5E35B: // MSCRC2
jmp MSCRC2

[disable]
00E143CF: // 更新: 搜尋 ff 32 e9，會有好幾個，任意選一個做Hook，觀看被執行到最多次那個就是了
db FF 32 E9 96 E6 FF FF          

00F5E35B: // 更新: 搜尋 8a 11 80 c2 01 (00960394)，在搜尋到的位址底下有兩個第二個就是了
push 0BF7471F

dealloc(MSCRC)
dealloc(FakeDump1)
dealloc(FakeDump2)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146.3 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00BBCC08] = 007EB966, End At 007EBBA6
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-20
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 007E7CBE

007EBB22: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
007EBB22:
db e8 97 c1 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 008F828F
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    008F828F
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008F8559 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   008F8559
//-----------------------------------------------
00D3E7C8:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00D3E7C8:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_標彈箭控制.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146.3 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0088ACA3 - 89 85 ac fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000154],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0088ACBA - 89 85 ec fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000214],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0088ACD1 - 89 85 f0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000210],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0088ADFD // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000214], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000210], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  0050D8B5

00B57008:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00B57008: // [1/1]
DD  0050D8B5 // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04

Dealloc(UnlimitedWeapon)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146.3 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-20

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],0089494D // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00D36140] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 008A350C // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],00896CB1 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 008A350C
ret

00BC4824:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00BC4824: // [1/1]
DD 008A350C // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00895878 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008F0CEC // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008F1CC4 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 005E7AA6 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  006D7BF0
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   00895DED // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  00895E19
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002B8]
Jmp  008F0D01 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   008F1CD8           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   008F1CCF           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  008F1CCB           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   005E7AB9           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   005E7ABB           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  005E7AA6
//------------------------------
00D1713C:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00D1713C:
DD   006D7BF0

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 008A2351 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  00496294
Add  Esp, 4
Call 00496294
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00D36140]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00D39220]
Call 004DB77B
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00D36140]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00D31364]
And  [Eax+000020C8], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00D31364]
And  [Eax+000020C8], 0
And  [Eax+000020CC], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00D39220]
Call 004DB77B
Jmp  008A2359

00BC47F0:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00BC47F0:
DD   00496294

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146.3 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-20
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 008A3F50 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 008EBD99
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 008A3F50

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00E12F97

00BC814C:
dd SpeedUp

00F2B83C:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00BC814C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 008EBD99 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00F2B83C: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00E12F97

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_超級笨怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146.3 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-20

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 01

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],008F4928 // 3b c7 75 ? 33 c0 eb ? 83 be ? ? ? ? 06
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

mov [esi+000002a8],00 // 39 be ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 8d 8e ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0

My_Ret:
push 008EBA64
ret

00BC796C:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00BC796C: // [5/10]
DD 008EBA64 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_近戰不揮空.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	No Empty Attack
// Version:	TWMS146.3
// UpdateTime:	2012-06-20
// Update:	Inndy
// Aob：	ff 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 ff b5 ?? ?? ff ff 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00 6a 00
//------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENABLE]
Alloc(NoEmptyAtkICS,512)

NoEmptyAtkICS:
Cmp  [Esp], 008988FC
Jne  OffsetRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call OffsetRect

Push [Ebp-000001AC]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [Ebp-0000018C]
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-00000188]
Push Eax
Lea  Eax,[Ebp-6C]
Push Eax
Call 00436F65
Mov  Ecx,Eax
Call 005EA69E
Mov  [Ebp-7C],Eax
Test Eax, Eax
Je   00898C02 //8b 85 ?? fe ff ff 89 85 ?? ?? ff ff 81 bd ?? ?? ff ff ?? ?? ?? ?? 74 02 eb 4c
Jmp  0089892E

00D3E73C:
DD NoEmptyAtkICS

[DISABLE]
00D3E73C:
DD OffsetRect

DeAlloc(NoEmptyAtkICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 00858588	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008468B0
Call R2
Jmp  008468B0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+00000498],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00BC47CC:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00BC47CC:   // [4/5]
DD 008468B0 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS146.3/TWMS146.3_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00D3169C]+00006290, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+0000069C], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 008F45D7	// 55 8B EC 53 56 8B F1 DD
Ret

00BC7AE8:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00BC7AE8:
dd 008F45D7

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

```txt
6a ?? 8d 4d ?? 88 83 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff c7

進入拍賣
30 01
68 ?? ?? 00 00 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 8d 45 ?? 50 c7

離開商場/拍賣

6a ?? 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_MSCRCBypass(冷羽楓痕).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 CRC MSCRCBypass(冷羽楓痕)
// Update by Inndy

[enable]
alloc(MSCRC,256)
alloc(FakeDump1,11)
alloc(FakeDump2,13)
label(MSCRC1)
label(MSCRC2)
label(OtherCheck)
label(MSCRC1Ret)
label(SetFakeCRCValue)
label(SetCRCValue1)
label(SetCRCValue2)
label(SetCRCValue3)
label(SetCRCValue4)
label(SetCRCValue5)
label(SetCRCValue6)
// 8A 11 80 C2 01
FakeDump1: // 009F4CA4-3 ~ 009F4CA4+7 共11個bytes
db 8B 5D 08 8A 11 80 C2 01 8B 4D 18
//6A ?? B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 05
//0048997F
FakeDump2: // 004925CE-3 ~ 004925CE+9 共13個bytes
db 10 5E C3 6A 38 B8 A1 AA A0 00 E8 CF 5D

MSCRC:
MSCRC1: // 檢測MSCRC2位址 009F4CA4 - 8a 11 80 c2 01 8b 4d 18
cmp edx,009F4CA1 // 009F4CA4-3
jl OtherCheck
cmp edx,009F4CA8 // 009F4CA4+4
jg OtherCheck

sub edx,009F4CA1 // 009F4CA4-3
add edx,FakeDump1
jmp MSCRC1Ret

OtherCheck: // 檢測送出封包函式 004925CE - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
cmp edx,004925CB // 004925CE-3
jl MSCRC1Ret
cmp edx,004925D4 // 004925CE+6
jg MSCRC1Ret

sub edx,004925CB // 004925CE-3
add edx,FakeDump2

MSCRC1Ret:
//MSCRC1原本動作
push [edx]
jmp 00E90AE1

MSCRC2:
call SetFakeCRCValue
//MSCRC2原本動作
push 0CB58B21
jmp 00E8FF6A

SetFakeCRCValue: // 更新: Hook該處，讀取[ebp+08]和[ebp+18]的值，其值每15秒變動一次，總共變動6次，之後的值都會重複
mov eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
cmp eax,00401324
je SetCRCValue1
cmp eax,004FDF43
je SetCRCValue2
cmp eax,005FAB62
je SetCRCValue3
cmp eax,006F7781
je SetCRCValue4
cmp eax,007F43A0
je SetCRCValue5
cmp eax,008F0FBF
je SetCRCValue6
ret

SetCRCValue1:
mov [edx],9CCB2FB5
ret

SetCRCValue2:
mov [edx],4C6BFAAE
ret

SetCRCValue3:
mov [edx],8AE1B69C
ret

SetCRCValue4:
mov [edx],04B23A33
ret

SetCRCValue5:
mov [edx],F1D56DA7
ret

SetCRCValue6:
mov [edx],E852FF0F
ret

00E926CE: // MSCRC1
jmp MSCRC1
nop
nop

00FE0633: // MSCRC2
jmp MSCRC2

[disable]
00E926CE: // 更新: 搜尋 ff 32 e9，會有好幾個，任意選一個做Hook，觀看被執行到最多次那個就是了
          // [1/3] //e9 ?? ?? ?? ?? ff 32 e9
db FF 32 E9 0C E4 FF FF        

00FE0633: // 更新: 搜尋 8a 11 80 c2 01 (00960394)，在搜尋到的位址底下有兩個第二個就是了
push 0CB58B21


dealloc(MSCRC)
dealloc(FakeDump1)
dealloc(FakeDump2)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_冷羽式CRCBYPASS更新工具.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 CRC 冷羽式CRCBYPASS更新工具
// Auther: Inndy
// Address: 00FE0633
// EIP: mGetCRC
[ENABLE]
Alloc(mGetCRC, 256)
Alloc(Index, 4)
Alloc(Values, 48)
Alloc(TextBuffer, 256)
Label(Caption)
Label(Text)
Label(Return)
RegisterSymbol(mGetCRC)
RegisterSymbol(Values)
RegisterSymbol(Index)

mGetCRC:
push ecx
mov  ecx, [Index]
cmp  ecx, #12
jge  Return
mov  eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov  edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
mov  edx, [edx]
mov  [Values+ecx*4], eax
inc  ecx
mov  [Values+ecx*4], edx
inc  ecx
mov  [Index], ecx
cmp  [Index], #12
jl   Return
push 40
push Caption
push Text
mov  ecx, [00DB2500]
push [ecx+04]
call MessageBoxA
Return:
mov  eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov  edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值
pop  ecx
push 0cb58b21
jmp  00e8ff6a

TextBuffer:
Caption:
db   'JIA' 27 's MSCRC Update Tool Tips' 00

Text:
db   'Done..Please Dump Values...' 00

00FE0633:
jmp  mGetCRC
[DISABLE]
00FE0633:
push 0cb58b21

Dealloc(Index)
Dealloc(Values)
Dealloc(mGetCRC)
Dealloc(TextBuffer)
UnRegisterSymbol(mGetCRC)
UnRegisterSymbol(Values)
UnRegisterSymbol(Index)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C26618] = 00831643, End At 00831883
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-29
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0082DADA

008317FF: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008317FF:
db e8 d6 c2 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_快捷鍵水量顯示.txt`:

```txt
// Twms v147.2 快捷鍵水量顯示
[enable]
registersymbol(Main)
alloc(Main,512)
registersymbol(Shift)
alloc(Shift,4)
registersymbol(Ins)
alloc(Ins,4)
registersymbol(Home)
alloc(Home,4)
registersymbol(PageUp)
alloc(PageUp,4)
registersymbol(Ctrl)
alloc(Ctrl,4)
registersymbol(Del)
alloc(Del,4)
registersymbol(End)
alloc(End,4)
registersymbol(PageDown)
alloc(PageDown,4)
registersymbol(Time)
alloc(Time,4)
Label(Return)
Label(Z1)
Label(Z2)
Label(Z3)
Label(Z4)
Label(Z5)
Label(Z6)
Label(Z7)
Label(Z8)

Main:
inc [Time]
cmp [Time],1
je Z1
cmp [Time],2
je Z2
cmp [Time],3
je Z3
cmp [Time],4
je Z4
cmp [Time],5
je Z5
cmp [Time],6
je Z6
cmp [Time],7
je Z7
cmp [Time],8
je Z8
jmp Return


Z1:
mov [Shift],eax
jmp Return

Z2:
mov [Ins],eax
jmp Return

Z3:
mov [Home],eax
jmp Return

Z4:
mov [PageUp],eax
jmp Return

Z5:
mov [Ctrl],eax
jmp Return

Z6:
mov [Del],eax
jmp Return

Z7:
mov [End],eax
jmp Return

Z8:
mov [PageDown],eax
mov [Time],0
jmp Return

Return:
mov [ebx+08],eax
jmp 008290c2

00829037:
jmp Main
db 90 90 90
[disable]
00829037:
db 89 43 08 e9 83 00 00 00

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V147.2 怪不反擊
// Cmp [Esp+34], 0060256C // [1/2] // 57 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FE FF 39
[Enable]
00602599: // 75 ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FE FF
// (DIRECT) // [2/2] // 8B 45 ?? 83 C0 F3 83
jmp 006027a9 // (REF) // 74 ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FE FF 85 C0 75 ?? 57
nop
nop
nop
nop
 
[Disable]
00602599:
jne 006025a9
mov ecx,esi
call 005fb221

// TWMS V147.2 範圍外怪不反擊
// 0060269C - ff 90 a8 00 00 00          - call dword ptr [eax+000000a8]
// FF 90 ?? 00 00 00 85 C0 74 ?? 8D 4E 04
[Enable]
00602788: // [2/2] // 75 ?? 6A 64 ?? ?? ?? ?? ?? 6A 01
db 74

[Disable]
00602788:
db 75
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_活動範圍修改.txt`:

```txt
//v1.47.2.活動範圍修改 by.aaaddress1.
//效果:可以讓怪物吸至指定xy,
//並且人物只能在該(x,y)左右200範圍處移動.

alloc(Vac,128)
alloc(XY,08)
label(SetHumanMapRang)
label(SetMobMapRang)
label(Return)

XY:
dd 00//吸怪的點的X
dd 00//吸怪的點的Y

Vac:
mov esi,[00DB1F28] // 牆值Base
cmp dword ptr [esp+08],008D6CF2 //人物活動範圍
je SetHumanMapRang
cmp dword ptr [esp+08],00946BC8 //怪物活動範圍
je SetMobMapRang
ret
SetMobMapRang:
push eax
mov eax,[XY+00]
mov [esi+1c],eax//設定怪物左牆
mov [esi+24],eax//設定怪物右牆
mov eax,[XY+04]
mov [esi+28],eax//設定怪物上牆
mov [esi+20],eax//設定怪物下牆
pop eax
jmp Return
SetHumanMapRang:
push eax
mov eax,[XY+00]
sub eax,00c8
mov [esi+1c],eax//設定人物左牆
add eax,00190
mov [esi+24],eax//設定人物右牆
pop eax
Return:
add esi,1C
jmp 00941AB1

00941AA8:
jmp Vac
nop
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_黑屏.txt`:

```txt
// 8b 75 08 74 23 8d 45 0c 50 e8 // -2
// 
// Gr2D_DX9.dll
// 
// 52206D01 - 85 f6                      - test esi,esi
// 52206D03 - 8b 75 08                   - mov esi,[ebp+08]
// 52206D06 - 74 23                      - je 52206d2b
// 
// 
// Gr2D_DX8.dll
// 
// 5040678B - 85 f6                      - test esi,esi
// 5040678D - 8b 75 08                   - mov esi,[ebp+08]
// 50406790 - 74 23                      - je 504067b5
// 
[ENABLE]
GR2D_DX8.dll+6790:
db eb
GR2D_DX9.DLL+6D06:
db eb
[DISABLE]
GR2D_DX8.dll+6790:
db 74
GR2D_DX9.DLL+6D06:
db 74
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_CRC_龍捲風加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 CRC 龍捲風加速
[Enable]
// 龍捲風無延遲
// By Aaaddress1
Alloc(NoDelayICS, 64)
Label(NoDelay)

NoDelayICS:
Cmp [Esp+54], 008B580F
Jne 0051A625
Mov [Esp+54], NoDelay
Jmp 0051A625

NoDelay:
Mov Eax,[Ebp+68]
Jmp 008B5832

00BBA208:
DD NoDelayICS
//-----------------------------------------------------
// 清除技能動作
008C4B7E:
DB 90 90 90 90 90 90
//-----------------------------------------------------
// 龍捲風無限隻數
// By Aaaddress1
005486F4:
mov eax, 7FFFFFFF
jmp 0054870C
db 90 90 90 90 90
//-----------------------------------------------------
// 修改人物動作
// By Aaaddress1
alloc(ControlHumanSide,32)

ControlHumanSide:
mov eax,[ecx+000000DC]
and eax, 8
test eax,eax
je 00942959
xor [ecx+000000DC],C
mov eax,[ecx+000000DC]
ret

00C334AC:
dd ControlHumanSide
//-----------------------------------------------------
[Disable]
00BBA208:
DD 0051A625

DeAlloc(NoDelayICS)


008C4B7E:
db 89 86 9c 04 00 00

005486F4:
db DB FF 75 F0 8B 4D EC 8B BE EC 00 00 00 50 FF B6 CC 00 00 00 E8 A7 F3 16 00

00C334AC:
dd 00942959

dealloc(ControlHumanSide)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_ItemVac.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
alloc(ItemVac,256)
label(SetItemXY)
alloc(PickNoDc,64)

PickNoDc:
cmp [esp],00942BF4 // 85 C0 74 ?? 8B 06 5F
jne 0094F4BA // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 8B 1D ?? ?? ?? 00 56 8B F1 57
xor eax,eax
ret 0004

ItemVac:
cmp [esp],004E5DA9 // 85 c0 75 ?? 83 4d fc ff 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ff ff
je SetItemXY
cmp [esp],004E5051 // 85 C0 74 07 39 5D ?? 75
jne PtInRect
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

SetItemXY:
mov eax,[esp+08]
mov [ebx],eax
mov eax,[esp+0C]
mov [ebx+04],eax
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

00DBB00C:
dd ItemVac

00C335B8:
DD PickNoDc

[disable]
00DBB00C:
dd PtInRect

00C335B8:
DD 0094F4BA

dealloc(ItemVac)
dealloc(PickNoDc)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 0094F5AB
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    0094F5AB
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0094F87E // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0094F87E
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBB068:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBB068:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_吸怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobVac, 1024)
Alloc(VacXY, 8)
Alloc(LimitY, 4)
Label(ForceVac)
Label(StartVac)
Label(EndVac)
Label(NormalVal)
Label(ContinueVac)

VacXY:
ReadMem([[00DAD994]+2260]+214, 8)

LimitY: // 0為不限制
DD   #500

MobVac:
Cmp  [Esp], 00602F39 //EB ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 E0 01 53 83 C8 1A
Jne  00942959
Add  Esp, 4

mov eax, [ecx+000000dc]

push eax
mov ecx,esi
call 005FD7C0
and edi,[ebp-24]
cmp edi,ffffffff
jne StartVac
mov ecx,esi
call 005E15B9
cmp eax,edi
jle 00602F69
cmp [ebp-14],ebx
je StartVac
cmp [esi+000004a8],ebx
jne StartVac
mov ecx,esi
call 005E15E3
test eax,eax
jne StartVac
mov ecx,esi
call 005E158F
cmp eax, 03
je ForceVac
mov ecx,esi
call 005E158F
cmp eax, 04
jne StartVac
jmp ForceVac

ForceVac:
cmp [esi+000003fc],ebx
jne StartVac
push 64
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ebx
push ffffffff
mov ecx,esi
call 005FF2C1
jmp StartVac

StartVac:
pushad
mov ebx,esi
mov eax,[ebx+00000114] // 8B 83 ?? ?? 00 00 3B C6 74 ?? 83 C0 F4 89 45 F0
sub eax, 0c
mov ebx, eax

Cmp  [LimitY], 0
Je   ContinueVac
Mov  Eax, [Ebx+000006A0]
Sub  Eax, [VacXY+04]
Cmp  Eax, 0
Jge  NormalVal
Neg  Eax
NormalVal:
Cmp  Eax, [LimitY]
Jg   EndVac
ContinueVac:

Cmp  [Ebx+04], 1
Je   EndVac
Mov  [Ebx+04], 1
Mov  Eax, [VacXY]
Mov  [Ebx+0000069C], Eax
Mov  word ptr [Ebx+00000238], Ax
Mov  Eax, [VacXY+04]
Mov  [Ebx+000006A0], Eax
Mov  word ptr [Ebx+0000023A], Ax
Mov  Eax, Ebx
add eax, 10
mov ecx,eax
mov edi,[eax]
push 0
push 0
push 0
push 0
push [VacXY+4]
push [VacXY]
push 1
call dword ptr [edi+00000084] // ff ?? ?? 00 00 00 8b ?? ?? ?? 00 00 83 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 00 74
EndVac:
popad

jmp 00602FAF

00C32C84:
DD MobVac

[Disable]
00C32C84: //[5/10]
dd 00942959 // 8b 81 dc 00 00 00 c3

DeAlloc(MobVac)
DeAlloc(VacXY)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 定點生怪

// ICS:
// 005F0BF3 - ff 95 84 00 00 00 - call dword ptr [ebp+00000084]
// 005F0BF9 - 8b 87 84 01 00 00 - mov eax,[edi+00000184]

// CALL:
// 009479C5 - 55    - push ebp
// 009479C6 - 8b ec - mov ebp,esp
// 009479C8 - 53    - push ebx
// 009479C9 - 56    - push esi
// 009479CA - 57    - push edi
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FixedPoint, 8)
Alloc(FixedSpawn, 256)
Label(SpawnRet)
Label(Delay)
Alloc(value, 4)
FixedPoint:
ReadMem([00DAD994]+65B4, 8)

FixedSpawn:
Cmp [Esp], 005F0BF9
Jne SpawnRet
Add [value],1
Mov [Esp+18], 02
Mov [Esp+04], 01
Cmp [Esi+08],0
Je  Delay
Mov dword ptr [Esi+000002A0], 06
Mov Eax, [FixedPoint]
Mov [Esp+08], Eax
Mov word ptr [Esi+00000238], Ax
Mov Eax, [FixedPoint+04]
Mov [Esp+0C], Eax
Mov word ptr [Esi+0000023A], Ax
Push Ecx
Mov Ecx, [00DB1F28]	// \
Push Eax			// |------> 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 50 E8 ?? ?? FF FF 89 ?? ?? E8
Call 0043107E		// /
Mov [Esp+20], Eax	// 原 [Esp+1C]
Pop Ecx

SpawnRet:
Jmp 009479C5

Delay:
Mov [Esp+04], 0
Mov [Esi+08],1
Jmp SpawnRet

00C32C78:
DD FixedSpawn
[DISABLE]
00C32C78:
DD 009479C5

Dealloc(FixedPoint)
Dealloc(FixedSpawn)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_怪物無反應+定怪.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
RegisterSymbol(NoReaction)
Alloc(NoReaction, 64)
RegisterSymbol(TMDMove)
Alloc(TMDMove, 128)
Label(NoReactionStart)
Label(Fake1)
Label(Fake2)

NoReaction:
cmp [esp+14], 00601A9B
jne  008F7580
mov [esp+14], NoReactionStart
jmp 008F7580

NoReactionStart:
xor edx,edx
jmp 00601AA7

TMDMove:
cmp [esp],0094B8CC
jne 005FA699
add esp,04
call 005FA699
test eax,eax
je Fake1
mov eax,[esi+18]
cmp eax,ebx
je Fake1
lea edi,[eax-04]
jmp Fake2

Fake1:
xor edi,edi
jmp Fake2

Fake2:
cmp edi,ebx
je 0094B8FB
mov ecx,edi
jmp 0094B8E9


00C2F4E4:
dd NoReaction

00BC4A44:
dd TMDMove

[disable]
00C2F4E4:
dd 008F7580

00BC4A44:
dd 005FA699
```

```txt
Jne 05340CDE

Lea Eax, [Eax+04]
Cmp word ptr [Eax], 00F9
Jne Back
Mov [Esp+18], 00492C9B
Back:

Jmp 05340CDE
```

```txt
[ENABLE]

MapID:
ReadMem([00DB5A90]+10BC, 4)

SpawnXY:

SetSpawn:

Jne  GetProcessHeap
Mov  [Esp+74], SetSpawnMain
Jmp  GetProcessHeap

SetSpawnMain:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00DB5A90]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+10BC]
Cmp  Eax, [MapID]
Pop  Eax
Jne  008D6CCF
Push [SpawnXY]
Push [SpawnXY+04]
Pop  [Ebp-1C]
Pop  [Ebp-20]
Jmp  008D6CCF
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_攻擊不停.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 攻擊不停
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyCSX, 512)
Label(CSX_Lbl00945526)
Label(CSX_Lbl009454f4)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455c4)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455f0)
Label(CSX_Lbl00945561)
Label(CSX_Lbl00945582)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455a3)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455c4)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455cd)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455d6)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455e1)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455ec)
Label(CSX_Lbl009455ee)
Label(AtkNoStop)
Label(CSXReturn)


MyCSX:
db 55                                    // 009454d3 - push ebp
db 8b ec                                 // 009454d4 - mov ebp,esp
db 53                                    // 009454d6 - push ebx
db 56                                    // 009454d7 - push esi
db 8b 75 08                              // 009454d8 - mov esi,[ebp+08]
db 33 db                                 // 009454db - xor ebx,ebx
db 57                                    // 009454dd - push edi
db 39 5e 14                              // 009454de - cmp [esi+14],ebx
je CSX_Lbl00945526                       // 009454e1 - je CSX_Lbl00945526
db 8b 46 14                              // 009454e3 - mov eax,[esi+14]
db 3b c3                                 // 009454e6 - cmp eax,ebx
jne CSX_Lbl009454f4                      // 009454e8 - jne CSX_Lbl009454f4
db 68 03 40 00 80                        // 009454ea - push 80004003
call 009d7880                            // 009454ef - call 009d7880
CSX_Lbl009454f4:
db 83 ec 10                              // 009454f4 - sub esp,10
db 8b 08                                 // 009454f7 - mov ecx,[eax]
db 8b fc                                 // 009454f9 - mov edi,esp
db 53                                    // 009454fb - push ebx
db 53                                    // 009454fc - push ebx
db 53                                    // 009454fd - push ebx
db 53                                    // 009454fe - push ebx
db ff 75 18                              // 009454ff - push [ebp+18]
db 8d 75 2c                              // 00945502 - lea esi,[ebp+2c]
db ff 75 14                              // 00945505 - push [ebp+14]
db a5                                    // 00945508 - movsd
db ff 75 10                              // 00945509 - push [ebp+10]
db a5                                    // 0094550c - movsd
db ff 75 0c                              // 0094550d - push [ebp+0c]
db a5                                    // 00945510 - movsd
db 50                                    // 00945511 - push eax
db a5                                    // 00945512 - movsd
db ff 91 8c 00 00 00                     // 00945513 - call dword ptr [ecx+0000008c]
db 3b c3                                 // 00945519 - cmp eax,ebx
jnl CSX_Lbl009455c4                      // 0094551b - jnl CSX_Lbl009455c4
jmp CSX_Lbl009455f0                      // 00945521 - jmp CSX_Lbl009455f0
CSX_Lbl00945526:
db 8b 0d 00 25 db 00                     // 00945526 - mov ecx,[00db2500] : 00000000
call 009454ae                            // 0094552c - call 009454ae
db 89 45 08                              // 00945531 - mov [ebp+08],eax
db db 45 08                              // 00945534 - fild dword ptr [ebp+08]
db 8b 7d 0c                              // 00945537 - mov edi,[ebp+0c]
db dc 35 a8 87 bb 00                     // 0094553a - fdiv qword ptr [00bb87a8] : 0000
db dd 5d 34                              // 00945540 - fstp qword ptr [ebp+34]
db 3b fb                                 // 00945543 - cmp edi,ebx
je CSX_Lbl00945561                       // 00945545 - je CSX_Lbl00945561
db dd 46 3c                              // 00945547 - fld qword ptr [esi+3c]
db 51                                    // 0094554a - push ecx
db dc 66 1c                              // 0094554b - fsub qword ptr [esi+1c]
db 51                                    // 0094554e - push ecx
db dc 4d 34                              // 0094554f - fmul qword ptr [ebp+34]
db dc 46 1c                              // 00945552 - fadd qword ptr [esi+1c]
db dd 1c 24                              // 00945555 - fstp qword ptr [esp]
call 004e4185                            // 00945558 - call 004e4185
db 59                                    // 0094555d - pop ecx
db 59                                    // 0094555e - pop ecx
//====================================================================
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00DAD994]
Cmp  Esi, [Eax+2260]
Jne  CSXReturn
Cmp  [Eax+5664], 14
Jge  AtkNoStop
Cmp  [Eax+5674], 05
Jge  AtkNoStop
Jmp  CSXReturn

AtkNoStop:
Add  [Esp], 0A

CSXReturn:
Pop eax
//====================================================================
db 89 07                                 // 0094555f - mov [edi],eax
CSX_Lbl00945561:
db 8b 7d 10                              // 00945561 - mov edi,[ebp+10]
db 3b fb                                 // 00945564 - cmp edi,ebx
je CSX_Lbl00945582                       // 00945566 - je CSX_Lbl00945582
db dd 46 44                              // 00945568 - fld qword ptr [esi+44]
db 51                                    // 0094556b - push ecx
db dc 66 24                              // 0094556c - fsub qword ptr [esi+24]
db 51                                    // 0094556f - push ecx
db dc 4d 34                              // 00945570 - fmul qword ptr [ebp+34]
db dc 46 24                              // 00945573 - fadd qword ptr [esi+24]
db dd 1c 24                              // 00945576 - fstp qword ptr [esp]
call 004e4185                            // 00945579 - call 004e4185
db 59                                    // 0094557e - pop ecx
db 59                                    // 0094557f - pop ecx
db 89 07                                 // 00945580 - mov [edi],eax
CSX_Lbl00945582:
db 8b 7d 14                              // 00945582 - mov edi,[ebp+14]
db 3b fb                                 // 00945585 - cmp edi,ebx
je CSX_Lbl009455a3                       // 00945587 - je CSX_Lbl009455a3
db dd 46 3c                              // 00945589 - fld qword ptr [esi+3c]
db 51                                    // 0094558c - push ecx
db dc 66 1c                              // 0094558d - fsub qword ptr [esi+1c]
db 51                                    // 00945590 - push ecx
db dc 4d 34                              // 00945591 - fmul qword ptr [ebp+34]
db dc 46 1c                              // 00945594 - fadd qword ptr [esi+1c]
db dd 1c 24                              // 00945597 - fstp qword ptr [esp]
call 004e4185                            // 0094559a - call 004e4185
db 59                                    // 0094559f - pop ecx
db 59                                    // 009455a0 - pop ecx
db 89 07                                 // 009455a1 - mov [edi],eax
CSX_Lbl009455a3:
db 8b 7d 18                              // 009455a3 - mov edi,[ebp+18]
db 3b fb                                 // 009455a6 - cmp edi,ebx
je CSX_Lbl009455c4                       // 009455a8 - je CSX_Lbl009455c4
db dd 46 44                              // 009455aa - fld qword ptr [esi+44]
db 51                                    // 009455ad - push ecx
db dc 66 24                              // 009455ae - fsub qword ptr [esi+24]
db 51                                    // 009455b1 - push ecx
db dc 4d 34                              // 009455b2 - fmul qword ptr [ebp+34]
db dc 46 24                              // 009455b5 - fadd qword ptr [esi+24]
db dd 1c 24                              // 009455b8 - fstp qword ptr [esp]
call 004e4185                            // 009455bb - call 004e4185
db 59                                    // 009455c0 - pop ecx
db 59                                    // 009455c1 - pop ecx
db 89 07                                 // 009455c2 - mov [edi],eax
CSX_Lbl009455c4:

db 3b c3                                 // 009455c7 - cmp eax,ebx
je CSX_Lbl009455cd                       // 009455c9 - je CSX_Lbl009455cd
db 89 18                                 // 009455cb - mov [eax],ebx
CSX_Lbl009455cd:

db 3b c3                                 // 009455d0 - cmp eax,ebx
je CSX_Lbl009455d6                       // 009455d2 - je CSX_Lbl009455d6
db 89 18                                 // 009455d4 - mov [eax],ebx
CSX_Lbl009455d6:
db 8b 45 24                              // 009455d6 - mov eax,[ebp+24]
db d9 ee                                 // 009455d9 - fldz
db 3b c3                                 // 009455db - cmp eax,ebx
je CSX_Lbl009455e1                       // 009455dd - je CSX_Lbl009455e1
db dd 10                                 // 009455df - fst qword ptr [eax]
CSX_Lbl009455e1:
db 8b 45 28                              // 009455e1 - mov eax,[ebp+28]
db 3b c3                                 // 009455e4 - cmp eax,ebx
je CSX_Lbl009455ec                       // 009455e6 - je CSX_Lbl009455ec

jmp CSX_Lbl009455ee                      // 009455ea - jmp CSX_Lbl009455ee
CSX_Lbl009455ec:

db 5b                                    // 009455f2 - pop ebx
db 5d                                    // 009455f3 - pop ebp
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_標彈箭控制.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	008DB6CE - 89 85 a8 fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000158],eax
// 無限標箭彈	008DB6E5 - 89 85 ec fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000214],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	008DB6FC - 89 85 f0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000210],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 008DB837 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000214], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000210], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  0051A625

00BBA208:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00BBA208: // [1/50]
DD  0051A625 // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-29

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],008E7650 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00DB2500] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 008F7580 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],008E9A01 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 008F7580
ret

00C2F4E4:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C2F4E4: // [1/1]
DD 008F7580 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_熱鍵.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS Hotkey
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyHotkey, 256)
Label(HotkeyReturn)
Label(WallVac)

MyHotkey:
Cmp  [Esp], 008BB973
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Esp+08], 0067EF57
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Movzx Eax, byte ptr [Ebp+08]
Cmp  Eax, 3F // F5
Je   WallVac
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

WallVac:
Mov  Eax, [00DAD994]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+2260]
Lea  Eax, [Eax+214]
Push [Eax]   // L
Push [Eax+4] // T
Push [Eax]   // R
Push [Eax+4] // B
Mov  Eax, [00DB1F28]
Pop  [Eax+28] // B
Pop  [Eax+24] // R
Pop  [Eax+20] // T
Pop  [Eax+1C] // L
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

HotkeyReturn:
Jmp  006CE722

00BCB110:
DD   MyHotkey
[DISABLE]
00BCB110:
DD   006CE722

Dealloc(MyHotkey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008E85D9 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00947C41 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00948E0E // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 00601A8D // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  00700511
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   008E8B3E // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  008E8B6A
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002B8]
Jmp  00947C56 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00948E22           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00948E19           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00948E15           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   00601AA0           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   00601AA2           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  00601A8D
//------------------------------
00D927C4:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00D927C4:
DD   00700511

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 008F62C3 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  0049F350
Add  Esp, 4
Call 0049F350
Mov  Ecx, 5 // 撿物倍率，如果把下面的註解掉請多+1
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00DB2500]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00DB5898]
Call 004E5C70
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00DB2500]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00DAD700]
And  [Eax+000020D4], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
// 以下這段註解掉不限速
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00DAD700]
And  [Eax+000020D4], 0
And  [Eax+000020D8], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00DB5898]
Call 004E5C70
// 以上這段註解掉不限速
Jmp  008F62CB

00C2F4B0:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00C2F4B0:
DD   0049F350

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-29
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 008F8219 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00942BB6
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 008F8219

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00E8FF6A

00C3341C:
dd SpeedUp

00FAAD8E:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C3341C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00942BB6 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00FAAD8E: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00E8FF6A

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 緩降
// Auther: Inndy
// 0094F936: // 7e 14 - jle 0094f94c
// db 90 90
[ENABLE]
alloc(ICS, 32)
alloc(MyWay, 128)

ICS:
cmp [esp], 0094F8C9 // 85 C0 74 ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8D 86
jne 00942ADB
mov [esp], MyWay
jmp 00942ADB

MyWay:
// Je跳
lea eax,[esi+000002b4]
cmp [eax],1e
db 7d 02
db 89 18
mov ecx, [eax]
fldz
jmp 0094F94c // Jle To...

00C334C4:
DD ICS
[DISABLE]
00C334C4: // [9/10]
DD 00942ADB // 83 C1 F0 E9 ?? ?? FF FF 8B 44

dealloc(ICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_超級笨怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-06-29

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],0094BB92 // 3b c7 75 ? 33 c0 eb ? 83 be ? ? ? ? 06
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

mov [esi+000002A8],00 // 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 8d 8e ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 75

My_Ret:
push 00942881
ret

00C32C14:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C32C14: // [5/10]
DD 00942881 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)
```

```txt
// TWMS 147.2 ICS 近戰不揮空

[ENABLE]
registersymbol(MYNA)
alloc(MYNA,256)
label(MYNA00)
label(MYNA000)

MYNA:
cmp [esp],008EB8E6
jne OffsetRect
mov [esp],MYNA00
jmp OffsetRect

MYNA00:
movzx eax,byte ptr [ebp-0000011D]
test eax,eax
je MYNA000
jmp 008EB8F1

MYNA000:
push [ebp-000001B0]
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push [ebp-00000190]
lea eax,[ebp-0000018C]
push eax
lea eax,[ebp-6C]
push eax
call 00437424
mov ecx,eax
call 00604468
mov [ebp-0000214C],eax
mov eax,[ebp-0000214C]
mov [ebp-7C],eax
jmp 008EB968

00DBAFDC:
DD MYNA

[DISABLE]
00DBAFDC:
DD OffsetRect

dealloc(MYNA)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_退怪模式.txt`:

```txt
//TWMS1.47.2 退怪模式
//Address:00601A7E
//AAttackDir:0怪不動 1怪退正常 2怪退遠 3怪反退到底 A怪退到底 C怪物跳躍
//EIP:AABack
//e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8b 55 40 8b cb
[ENABLE]
registersymbol(AABack)
registersymbol(AABackOnOff)
registersymbol(AAttackDir)
alloc(AABack, 128)
alloc(AABackOnOff, 4)
alloc(AAttackDir, 4)
label(doAABackNormal)
alloc(ICSEntry, 128)

ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp+34], 00601A83
Jne  00700511
Mov  [Esp+34], AABack
Jmp  00700511

AABack:
//call 005ef24d
cmp [AABackOnOff],0
jz doAABackNormal
push eax
mov eax,[AAttackDir]
mov [ebp+3c],eax
pop eax

doAABackNormal:
mov edx,[ebp+40]
jmp 00601A86

AABackOnOff:
dd 1  // {0: 關閉 | 1: 開啟 }

AAttackDir:
dd a //遠攻者可改2
    // 0: 怪不動
    // 1: 怪退後一點點 (正常值)
    // 2: 怪退後很多點
    // 3: 怪反方向退到底
    // A(以上): 怪退到底
    // C: 怪物跳躍

//00601A7E:
//JMP AABack

00D927C4:
DD   ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
//00601A7E:
//call 005ef24d
//mov edx,[ebp+40]

00D927C4:
DD   00700511

dealloc(ICSEntry)
dealloc(AABack)
dealloc(AABackOnOff)
dealloc(AAttackDir)
unregistersymbol(AABack)
unregistersymbol(AABackOnOff)
unregistersymbol(AAttackDir)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008A39C9	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  00891B32
Call R2
Jmp  00891B32
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+0000049C],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C2F48C:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C2F48C:   // [4/5]
DD 00891B32 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

```txt
//ICS by aaaddress1.
alloc(IcsNoShakeWeapon,32)

IcsNoShakeWeapon:
                  // 008E493E or 008EBDC1
cmp dword ptr [esp], xxxxxxxx // [-3 or -4] // ff 70 04 8d 85 ?? ?? ff ff 50 8b 8d ?? ?? ff ff 83 c1 04 8b 85 ?? ?? ff ff 8b 40 04 ff 50 10 ff 30 8b 8d ?? ?? ff ff 81 c1 ?? ?? 00 00
jne 005E2400 // +3 // c2 08 00 55 8b ec ?? ?? 8d 45 f8 50 81
add esp,04
pop eax
sub ecx,04
jmp 008EBCEF // 8b 85 ?? ?? ff ff 89 85 ?? ?? ff ff 81 bd ?? ?? ff ff ?? ?? ?? 01 74 02

00BC44D4: // [4/5]
dd IcsNoShakeWeapon
```

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：	Limited Full Map Attack
```
