`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00DAD994]+000065B4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+0000069C], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0094B7B3	// 55 8B EC 53 56 8B F1 DD
Ret

00C32D90:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C32D90:
dd 0094B7B3

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_龍捲風加速N合一.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 龍捲風加速N合一
// 此數據就跟Aaaddress1一樣淫蕩，請小心使用
// 並且有請A_____Aaddress1把它改的更淫蕩（？
// PS：配合全圖、攻擊不停風味更佳
//======================================================================
[Enable]
// 龍捲風無延遲
// By Aaaddress1
Alloc(NoDelayICS, 64)
Label(NoDelay)

NoDelayICS:
Cmp [Esp+54], 008B580F
Jne 0051A625
Mov [Esp+54], NoDelay
Jmp 0051A625

NoDelay:
Mov Eax,[Ebp+68]
Jmp 008B5832

00BBA208:
DD NoDelayICS
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
// 清除技能動作
Alloc(NoSkillAction, 64)

NoSkillAction:
Cmp  [Esp], 008C4B89
Jne  00891B32
Or   [Esi+0000049C], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  00891B32

00C2F48C:
DD NoSkillAction
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
// 龍捲風無限隻數
// By Aaaddress1
Alloc(UnlimitedAttacks, 512)

UnlimitedAttacks:
Cmp  [Esp], 005486CD
Jne  008F7512
Add  Esp, 04
xor eax,eax
cmp [esi+000000D0],eax
jne 00548729
cmp [ebp+08],eax
je 00548729
push eax
lea eax,[ebp+08]
push eax
lea ecx,[esi+000000E4]
call 0046B329
test eax,eax
jne 00548729
mov eax, 7FFFFFFF
jmp 0054870C

00C2F4E8:
DD   UnlimitedAttacks
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
// 修改人物動作
// By Aaaddress1
alloc(ControlHumanSide,32)

ControlHumanSide:
mov eax,[ecx+000000DC]
and eax, FFFFFFFE
cmp eax, 8
jne 00942959
xor [ecx+000000DC],C
mov eax,[ecx+000000DC]
ret

00C334AC:
dd ControlHumanSide
//======================================================================
[Disable]
// 龍捲風無延遲
00BBA208:
DD   0051A625

DeAlloc(NoDelayICS)
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
// 清除技能動作
00C2F48C:
DD   00891B32

Dealloc(NoSkillAction)
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
00C2F4E8:
DD   008F7512

Dealloc(UnlimitedAttacks)
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
// 修改人物動作
00C334AC:
dd 00942959

dealloc(ControlHumanSide)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS147.2_ICS_龍捲風定點無延遲.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 ICS 龍捲風定點 + 無延遲攻擊
[ENABLE]
Alloc(TornadoNoDelay, 512)
Label(FakeCall1)
Label(FakeCall2)
//==================================================================================
TornadoNoDelay:
Cmp  [Esp], 008B57A9
Jne  OffsetRect
Add  Esp, 4
Call OffsetRect
Label(Tornado008b57ce)
Label(Tornado008b57e4)
db 53                                    // 008b57a9 - push ebx
db 53                                    // 008b57aa - push ebx
db 89 5d 64                              // 008b57ab - mov [ebp+64],ebx
db 8d 45 64                              // 008b57ae - lea eax,[ebp+64]
db 53                                    // 008b57b1 - push ebx
db 38 5d 73                              // 008b57b2 - cmp [ebp+73],bl
je Tornado008b57ce                       // 008b57b5 - je 008b57ce
db 8b 0d 74 5a db 00                     // 008b57b7 - mov ecx,[00db5a74] : 00000000
db 6a 01                                 // 008b57bd - push 01
db 53                                    // 008b57bf - push ebx
db 6a 01                                 // 008b57c0 - push 01
db 50                                    // 008b57c2 - push eax
db 8d 45 20                              // 008b57c3 - lea eax,[ebp+20]
db 50                                    // 008b57c6 - push eax
call 005e5f81                            // 008b57c7 - call 005e5f81
jmp Tornado008b57e4                      // 008b57cc - jmp 008b57e4
Tornado008b57ce:
db 8b 0d cc 1f db 00                     // 008b57ce - mov ecx,[00db1fcc] : 00000000
db 53                                    // 008b57d4 - push ebx
db 53                                    // 008b57d5 - push ebx
db 53                                    // 008b57d6 - push ebx
db 53                                    // 008b57d7 - push ebx
db 6a 01                                 // 008b57d8 - push 01
db 50                                    // 008b57da - push eax
db 8d 45 20                              // 008b57db - lea eax,[ebp+20]
db 50                                    // 008b57de - push eax
call 00604468                            // 008b57df - call 00604468
Tornado008b57e4:
db 8b 45 64                              // 008b57e4 - mov eax,[ebp+64]
db 89 45 68                              // 008b57e7 - mov [ebp+68],eax
db 39 5d 68                              // 008b57ea - cmp [ebp+68],ebx
je 008b5830                              // 008b57ed - je 008b5830
db 8b 45 68                              // 008b57ef - mov eax,[ebp+68]
db 8b 88 84 01 00 00                     // 008b57f2 - mov ecx,[eax+00000184]
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
db 50                                    // 008b5832 - push eax
db 8b cf                                 // 008b5833 - mov ecx,edi
call FakeCall1                           // 008b5835 - call 0054854f
jmp 008B583A
//==================================================================================
FakeCall1:
Label(Tornado0054859c)
Label(Tornado00548594)
db 6a 1c                                 // 0054854f - push 1c
db b8 c9 7b a2 00                        // 00548551 - mov eax,00a27bc9
call 009d83a9                            // 00548556 - call 009d83a9
db 8b f1                                 // 0054855b - mov esi,ecx
db 8b 4e 10                              // 0054855d - mov ecx,[esi+10]
db 83 65 f0 00                           // 00548560 - and dword ptr [ebp-10],00
db 85 c9                                 // 00548564 - test ecx,ecx
je Tornado0054859c                       // 00548566 - je 0054859c
db 8b 01                                 // 00548568 - mov eax,[ecx]
db ff 50 14                              // 0054856a - call dword ptr [eax+14]
db 85 c0                                 // 0054856d - test eax,eax
je Tornado0054859c                       // 0054856f - je 0054859c
db 8b 0d 94 d9 da 00                     // 00548571 - mov ecx,[00dad994] : 00000000
db 85 c9                                 // 00548577 - test ecx,ecx
je Tornado0054859c                       // 00548579 - je 0054859c
db 8d 45 e8                              // 0054857b - lea eax,[ebp-18]
db 50                                    // 0054857e - push eax
call 00547c56                            // 0054857f - call 00547c56
db 8b 45 ec                              // 00548584 - mov eax,[ebp-14]
db 85 c0                                 // 00548587 - test eax,eax
je Tornado00548594                       // 00548589 - je 00548594
db 8b 80 10 01 00 00                     // 0054858b - mov eax,[eax+00000110]
db 89 45 f0                              // 00548591 - mov [ebp-10],eax
Tornado00548594:
db 8d 4d e8                              // 00548594 - lea ecx,[ebp-18]
call 0046c318                            // 00548597 - call 0046c318
Tornado0054859c:
db 8b 5e 14                              // 0054859c - mov ebx,[esi+14]
db 89 5d ec                              // 0054859f - mov [ebp-14],ebx
db 85 db                                 // 005485a2 - test ebx,ebx
je 005487d5                              // 005485a4 - je 005487d5
db 8b be d0 00 00 00                     // 005485aa - mov edi,[esi+000000d0]
db 85 ff                                 // 005485b0 - test edi,edi
je 005485cc                              // 005485b2 - je 005485cc
call 0091c58d                            // 005485b4 - call 0091c58d
db 3b f8                                 // 005485b9 - cmp edi,eax
jg 005487d5                              // 005485bb - jg 005487d5
db 85 ff                                 // 005485c1 - test edi,edi
je 005485cc                              // 005485c3 - je 005485cc
db 8b ce                                 // 005485c5 - mov ecx,esi
call FakeCall2                           // 005485c7 - call 00547f3d
jmp 005485CC
//==================================================================================
FakeCall2:
db 6a 54                                 // 00547f3d - push 54
db b8 83 7b a2 00                        // 00547f3f - mov eax,00a27b83
call 009d83a9                            // 00547f44 - call 009d83a9
db 8b f1                                 // 00547f49 - mov esi,ecx
db 33 db                                 // 00547f4b - xor ebx,ebx
db 39 9e d0 00 00 00                     // 00547f4d - cmp [esi+000000d0],ebx
je 0054844a                              // 00547f53 - je 0054844a
db 8b 86 c8 00 00 00                     // 00547f59 - mov eax,[esi+000000c8]
db bf 68 bf da 00                        // 00547f5f - mov edi,00dabf68
db 3d 09 e3 50 00                        // 00547f64 - cmp eax,0050e309
jne 0054830d
db 39 5e 18                              // 00547f6f - cmp [esi+18],ebx
db 0f 94 c1                              // 00547f72 - sete cl
db 84 c9                                 // 00547f75 - test cl,cl
db 0f 94 c1                              // 00547f77 - sete cl
db 84 c9                                 // 00547f7a - test cl,cl
je 0054830d
jmp 00547f82
//==================================================================================
00DBAFDC:
DD TornadoNoDelay
[DISABLE]
00DBAFDC:
DD OffsetRect

Dealloc(TornadoNoDelay)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.2/TWMS1472._Else_反覆送開店封包.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.2 反覆送開店封包

// Made by 冷羽楓痕
// 說明: 送多次封包後，系統會將人物傳送至自由市場，出口會在勇士之村
 

[Enable]
Alloc(SendPacket, 128)
Alloc(PacketStruct, 16)
Alloc(PacketData, 13)
Alloc(SendTime,04)
Alloc(Switch, 04)
Alloc(Message, 32)
Alloc(Caption, 8)
Label(Normal)
Registersymbol(Switch)
CreateThread(SendPacket)
 
PacketStruct:       // 封包結構
DD 00               // NULL
DD PacketData       // 封包資料位址
DD #13              // 封包長度
DD 00               // NULL
 
Switch:             // 開關 (若一直無法進自由，設0關閉吧)
dd 01
 
PacketData:         // 開店封包資料
DB D4 00 06 04 00 00 00 01 00 20 6E 4E 00
 
SendPacket:
Cmp [Switch],00
Je  Normal
 
Mov Eax, [00DB5A90] // 地圖
Mov Eax, [Eax+10BC]
Cmp Eax, 363D7F80   // 自由市場入口地圖ID: 910000000
Je  Normal
 
Call 0091C58D       // 時間
Cmp  Eax,[SendTime]
Jl   SendPacket
 
Add  Eax,64
Mov  [SendTime],Eax
Push PacketStruct
Call 00425F2E
Add  Esp, 4
Jmp  SendPacket
 
Normal:
Push 00010040
Push Caption
Push Message
Push 0
Call MessageBoxA
Ret

Message:
DB   b6 4b a4 df a4 70 b4 a3 a5 dc a1 47 a4 77 b8 67 a5 69 a5 48 c3 f6 b3 ac bc c6 be da 00

Caption:
DB   b4 a3 a5 dc 00

[disable]

Dealloc(SendPacket)
Dealloc(PacketStruct)
Dealloc(PacketData)
Dealloc(SendTime)
Dealloc(Switch)	
 
// 地圖基址   - 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? 00 00 8b ce e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 0f
// 地圖ID偏移 - ff b6 ?? ?? 00 00 8d 86 ?? ?? 00 00 51 8b cc 89 65 fc
// 時間基址   - A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 40 ?? C3
//    !?      - 8b 0d ? ? ? ? 8d 45 ? 50 e8 ? ? ? ? 6a 01 8b ce
// 送封包位址 - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
// 封包標頭   - 68 ?? 00 00 00 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 6A ?? 8D 4D
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C26698] = 0083166D, End At 008318AD
// Level: 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 33 ?? ?? 83 C4 0C 3B
// UpdateTime: 2012-07-25
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0082DB04

00831829: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
00831829:
db e8 d6 c2 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_DATA_封包相關位址.txt`:

```txt
ECX		// 00DADA94 // 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 FF
發送	// 0049252A // 6A 38 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 89 4D ?? A1 3C 00 40 00
接收	// 00492B28 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B ?? 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D

// 快速發包
00425F2E - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]
00425F32 - 8b 0d 94 da da 00          - mov ecx,[00dada94] : 00000000
00425F38 - e8 ed c5 06 00             - call 0049252a
00425F3D - c3                         - ret

004926BF - e8 f9 e9 f6 ff             - call 004010bd
004926C4 - 8b 47 08                   - mov eax,[edi+08]

004010C0 - ff 15 c4 27 d9 00          - call dword ptr [00D927C4] : 0070052D

0049278E - e8 ce 5e 54 00             - call 009d8661
00492793 - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004




00492B3E - e8 df ea ff ff             - call 00491622
00492B43 - 8b 7d 08                   - mov edi,[ebp+08]

0049105B - ff 15 94 b0 ae 00          - call dword ptr [00aeb094] : 05310C78

00492BF7 - e8 65 5a 54 00             - call 009d8661
00492BFC - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_DATA_物品陣列分析.txt`:

```txt
0099A1A0 - push ebp                                                             ; 取得物品數量CALL int __stdcall GetItemCount(int ItemId, int Const1, int Const2) // int Count = GetItemCount(Id, 1, 0);
0099A1A1 - mov ebp,esp                                                          ; 
0099A1A3 - push ecx                                                             ; 分配空間
0099A1A4 - push ecx                                                             ; 分配空間
0099A1A5 - mov ecx,[00dad720] : 00DBFA80                                        ; 
0099A1AB - push ebx                                                             ; \
0099A1AC - push esi                                                             ; |->保護暫存器
0099A1AD - push edi                                                             ; /
0099A1AE - lea eax,[ebp-08]                                                     ; 暫存空間內8Bytes結構體
0099A1B1 - push eax                                                             ; 
0099A1B2 - call 00422464                                                        ; 
0099A1B7 - mov esi,[eax+04]                                                     ; 
0099A1BA - lea ecx,[ebp-08]                                                     ; 
0099A1BD - call 00421554                                                        ; 
0099A1C2 - mov eax,[ebp+08]                                                     ; ItemID
0099A1C5 - cdq                                                                  ; 
0099A1C6 - mov ecx,000f4240                                                     ; 1000000
0099A1CB - idiv ecx                                                             ; 除法, Eax = Type, Ecx = SubID
0099A1CD - push [ebp+10]                                                        ; 0
0099A1D0 - mov edi,[00dad724] : 00000000                                        ; 
0099A1D6 - push [ebp+0c]                                                        ; 1
0099A1D9 - mov ecx,esi                                                          ; 
0099A1DB - push [ebp+08]                                                        ; ItemID
0099A1DE - push eax                                                             ; ItemType
0099A1DF - call 004cafdf                                                        ; 物品陣列在裡面
0099A1E4 - mov ebx,eax                                                          ; ItemCount
0099A1E6 - movzx eax,byte ptr [ebp+0c]                                          ; 
0099A1EA - push eax                                                             ; 
0099A1EB - push [ebp+08]                                                        ;
0099A1EE - mov ecx,edi                                                          ;
0099A1F0 - push esi                                                             ;
0099A1F1 - call 00598217                                                        ;
0099A1F6 - pop edi                                                              ; \
0099A1F7 - pop esi                                                              ; |->還原暫存器、累加
0099A1F8 - add eax,ebx                                                          ; |
0099A1FA - pop ebx                                                              ; /
0099A1FB - leave                                                                ;
0099A1FC - ret 000c                                                             ;
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; 
                                                                                ; ItemType, ItemID, 1, 0
004CAFDF - 6A 14                      - push 14                                 ; 區域變數 * (5 + 7)
004CAFE1 - B8 2F5AA100                - mov eax,00A15A2F                        ; SEH
004CAFE6 - E8 9ED55000                - call 009D8589                           ; Set Ebp, Alloc Memory In Stack
004CAFEB - 8B F9                      - mov edi,ecx                             ; 保存Ecx
004CAFED - FF 75 08                   - push [ebp+08]                           ; Param1: ItemType
004CAFF0 - 83 65 F0 00                - and dword ptr [ebp-10],00               ; 區域變數4 = 0; (用來計算數量的區域變數)
004CAFF4 - E8 95B5F5FF                - call 0042658E                           ; 此CALL取得物品數量
004CAFF9 - 33 DB                      - xor ebx,ebx                             ; 
004CAFFB - 43                         - inc ebx                                 ; Ebx = 1;
004CAFFC - 3B C3                      - cmp eax,ebx                             ; Cmp Eax, 01
004CAFFE - 89 45 EC                   - mov [ebp-14],eax                        ; 保存返回值
004CB001 - 7C 4E                      - jnge 004CB051                           ; 上面的CALL失敗時跳躍
004CB003 - 6A 00                      - push 00                                 ; Param4
004CB005 - 53                         - push ebx                                ; Param3: 01
004CB006 - FF 75 08                   - push [ebp+08]                           ; Param2: ItemType
004CB009 - 8D 45 E0                   - lea eax,[ebp-20]                        ; Buffer
004CB00C - 50                         - push eax                                ; Param1: ptr: Ebp-20
004CB00D - 8B CF                      - mov ecx,edi                             ; 還原Ecx
004CB00F - E8 29C0F5FF                - call 0042703D                           ; 又一個他媽不知道蔥三小的CALL
004CB014 - 8B 70 04                   - mov esi,[eax+04]                        ; 返回結構體取值, Esi指向結構體
004CB017 - 8D 4D E0                   - lea ecx,[ebp-20]                        ; 區域變數8
004CB01A - E8 DBB8F5FF                - call 004268FA                           ; 不知道幹三小
004CB01F - 85 F6                      - test esi,esi                            ; Esi指向結構體
004CB021 - 74 28                      - je 004CB04B                             ; 
004CB023 - 80 7D 10 00                - cmp byte ptr [ebp+10],00                ; [Ebp+10] == 0, Cmp 0, 0
004CB027 - 75 0B                      - jne 004CB034                            ; 必不跳
004CB029 - 8B 06                      - mov eax,[esi]                           ; Esi指向結構體
004CB02B - 8B CE                      - mov ecx,esi                             ; 
004CB02D - FF 50 08                   - call dword ptr [eax+08]                 ; 
004CB030 - 85 C0                      - test eax,eax                            ; 
004CB032 - 75 17                      - jne 004CB04B                            ; 
004CB034 - 8D 4E 0C                   - lea ecx,[esi+0C]                        ; Esi指向結構體
004CB037 - E8 A3BDF5FF                - call 00426DDF                           ; 一堆複雜的計算, FUCK
004CB03C - 3B 45 0C                   - cmp eax,[ebp+0C]                        ; ItemID 比對物品ID
004CB03F - 75 0A                      - jne 004CB04B                            ; 
004CB041 - 8B 06                      - mov eax,[esi]                           ; 
004CB043 - 8B CE                      - mov ecx,esi                             ; 
004CB045 - FF 50 4C                   - call dword ptr [eax+4C]                 ; 估計是取得某一格的物品有多少
004CB048 - 01 45 F0                   - add [ebp-10],eax                        ; 區域變數4
004CB04B - 43                         - inc ebx                                 ; 迴圈計數
004CB04C - 3B 5D EC                   - cmp ebx,[ebp-14]                        ; 判斷迴圈是否跳出
004CB04F - 7E B2                      - jle 004CB003                            ; 迴圈下一圈
004CB051 - 83 7D 14 00                - cmp dword ptr [ebp+14],00               ; Call Source的Buffer (?)
004CB055 - 75 4D                      - jne 004CB0A4                            ; 
004CB057 - FF 75 0C                   - push [ebp+0C]                           ; ItemID
004CB05A - 8B 0D 24D7DA00             - mov ecx,[00DAD724] : [0A607704]         ; 
004CB060 - E8 BA7C0C00                - call 00592D1F                           ; 
004CB065 - 85 C0                      - test eax,eax                            ; 
004CB067 - 74 3B                      - je 004CB0A4                             ; 
004CB069 - 6A 01                      - push 01                                 ; Param4
004CB06B - 57                         - push edi                                ; Param3
004CB06C - FF 75 0C                   - push [ebp+0C]                           ; Param2: ItemID
004CB06F - 8D 45 E8                   - lea eax,[ebp-18]                        ; 
004CB072 - 50                         - push eax                                ; Param1
004CB073 - E8 CEF5FFFF                - call 004CA646                           ; 
004CB078 - 83 C4 10                   - add esp,10                              ; __cdecl Restore Stack (4 Params)
004CB07B - 8B 4D EC                   - mov ecx,[ebp-14]                        ; 
004CB07E - 83 65 FC 00                - and dword ptr [ebp-04],00               ; 區域變數1
004CB082 - 85 C9                      - test ecx,ecx                            ; 
004CB084 - 74 12                      - je 004CB098                             ; 
004CB086 - 80 7D 10 00                - cmp byte ptr [ebp+10],00                ; [Ebp+10] == Param3 == 1, Cmp 01, 00
004CB08A - 75 09                      - jne 004CB095                            ; 必跳
004CB08C - 8B 01                      - mov eax,[ecx]                           ; 
004CB08E - FF 50 08                   - call dword ptr [eax+08]                 ; 
004CB091 - 85 C0                      - test eax,eax                            ; 
004CB093 - 75 03                      - jne 004CB098                            ; 
004CB095 - FF 45 F0                   - inc [ebp-10]                            ; 區域變數4
004CB098 - 83 4D FC FF                - or dword ptr [ebp-04],FF                ; 區域變數1
004CB09C - 8D 4D E8                   - lea ecx,[ebp-18]                        ; 
004CB09F - E8 56B8F5FF                - call 004268FA                           ; 
004CB0A4 - 8B 45 F0                   - mov eax,[ebp-10]                        ; 區域變數4
004CB0A7 - E8 B5D55000                - call 009D8661                           ; 
004CB0AC - C2 1000                    - ret 0010                                ; 
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 0094F592
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    0094F592
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0094F865 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0094F865
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBB088:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBB088:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_換頻固定.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS 147.3 ICS 換頻固定

[ENABLE]
Alloc(SpawnXY,8)
Alloc(MapID,4)
Alloc(SetSpawn,256)
Label(SetSpawnMain)

MapID:
ReadMem([00DB5AB0]+000010BC, 4)

SpawnXY:
ReadMem([00DB5AB0]+00000F90, 8)

SetSpawn:
Cmp  [esp+74],008d6cf9
Jne  GetProcessHeap
Mov  [Esp+74],SetSpawnMain
Jmp  GetProcessHeap

SetSpawnMain:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00db5ab0]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+10BC]
Cmp  Eax, [MapID]
Pop  Eax
Jne  008D6CF9
Push [SpawnX]
Push [SpawnY]
Pop  [Ebp-1C]
Pop  [Ebp-20]
Jmp  008D6CF9

00DBAED4:
DD    SetSpawn
[DISABLE]
00DBAEB4:
DD    GetProcessHeap

DeAlloc(SetSpawn)
DeAlloc(SpawnXY)
DeAlloc(MapID)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_標彈箭控制.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	008DB6F8 - 89 85 a8 fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000158],eax
// 無限標箭彈	008DB70F - 89 85 ec fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000214],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	008DB726 - 89 85 f0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000210],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 008DB861 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000214], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000210], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  0051A641

00BBA208:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00BBA208: // [1/1]
DD  0051A641 // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04

Dealloc(UnlimitedWeapon)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-07-25

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],008E767A // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00DB2520] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 008F75AA // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],008E9A2B // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 008F75AA
ret

00C2F564:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C2F564: // [1/1]
DD 008F75AA // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008E8603 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00947C28 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00948DF5 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 00601AA9 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0070052D
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   008E8B68 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  008E8B94
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002B8]
Jmp  00947C3D // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00948E09           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00948E00           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00948DFC           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   00601ABC           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   00601AC0           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  00601AA9
//------------------------------
00D927C4:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00D927C4:
DD   0070052D

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS146 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 008F62ED // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  0049F2AA
Add  Esp, 4
Call 0049F2AA
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00DB2520]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00DB58B8]
Call 004E5BC5
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00DB2520]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00DAD720]
And  [Eax+000020D4], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00DAD720]
And  [Eax+000020D4], 0
And  [Eax+000020D8], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00DB58B8]
Call 004E5BC5
Jmp  008F62F5

00C2F530:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00C2F530:
DD   0049F2AA

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-07-25
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 008F8243 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00942B9D
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 008F8243

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00E8FF60

00C3349C:
dd SpeedUp

00FA92AF:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C3349C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00942B9D // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00FA92AF: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00E8FF60

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_緩降.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 ICS 緩降
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
alloc(SlowFall, 64)

SlowFall:
cmp [esp], 0094F8B0 // 85 C0 74 ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8D 86
jne 00942AC2
add esp, 04
call 00942AC2
// Je跳
db 8d 86 b4 02 00 00                     // 0094f90a - lea eax,[esi+000002b4]
db 83 38 1e                              // 0094f910 - cmp dword ptr [eax],1e
db 7d 02                                 // 0094f913 - jnl 0094f917
db 89 18                                 // 0094f915 - mov [eax],ebx
db 8b 08                                 // 0094f917 - mov ecx,[eax]
db d9 ee                                 // 0094f919 - fldz
jmp 0094F91F // Jle+1

00C33544:
DD SlowFall
[DISABLE]
00C33544: // [9/10]
DD 00942AC2 // 83 C1 F0 E9 ?? ?? FF FF 8B 44

dealloc(SlowFall)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_超級笨怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-07-25

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],0094BB79 // 3b c7 75 ? 33 c0 eb ? 83 be ? ? ? ? 06
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

mov [esi+000002A8],00 // 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 8d 8e ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 75

My_Ret:
push 00942868
ret

00C32C94:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C32C94: // [5/10]
DD 00942868 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.3 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-07-26
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008A39F3	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  00891B5C
Call R2
Jmp  00891B5C
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+0000049C],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C2F50C:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C2F50C:   // [4/5]
DD 00891B5C // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_隱藏姓名(CS).txt`:

```txt
//TWMS147.3 ICS 隱藏姓名(CS)

[Enable]
Alloc(NoNameICS, 64)

NoNameICS:
Cmp [Esp], 008B6BFC
Jne 0049EB90
Mov [Esp], 008B6C0B
Jmp 0049EB90

00C2F57C:
DD NoNameICS
[Disable]
00C2F57C:
DD 0049EB90
DeAlloc(NoNameICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.3/TWMS147.3_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00DAD9B4]+000065B4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+0000069C], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0094B79A	// 55 8B EC 53 56 8B F1 DD
Ret

00C32E10:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C32E10:
dd 0094B79A

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C26698] = 008318FD, End At 00831B3D
// Level: 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 33 ?? ?? 83 C4 0C 3B
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-01
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0082DD94

00831AB9: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
00831AB9:
db e8 d6 c2 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_CRC_怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS V147.4 怪不反擊
[Enable]
0060281A: // 75 ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FE FF
// (DIRECT) // [2/2] // 8B 45 ?? 83 C0 F3 83
jmp 00602A2A // (REF) // 74 ?? 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FE FF 85 C0 75 ?? 57
DB 90 90 90 90
 
[Disable]
0060281A:
DB 75 0E 8B CE E8 7F 8C FF FF




// TWMS V147.4 範圍外怪不反擊
// 0060291D - ff 90 a8 00 00 00          - call dword ptr [eax+000000a8]
// FF 90 ?? 00 00 00 85 C0 74 ?? 8D 4E 04
[Enable]
00602A09: // [2/2] // 75 ?? 6A 64 53 53 53 53 53 6A 01
db 74

[Disable]
00602A09:
db 75




KiKi = 怪物 ID 的 esi, 也就是全圖區段的 esi 範圍..
此範圍是所有的玩家共用, 其 esi 是怪物資料區.
也就是所謂的 KiKi esi 資料區, 其轉換式為下.
mov eax, [esi+00000114] // esi = KiKi
lea eax, [eax-0c] // eax = Monster esi

Monster esi = 怪控區段的 esi, 也就是我們常用怪控方向的 esi 範圍.
此範圍為玩家所有, 只有玩家能控制此區段的怪物, 別人控制不到.
也就是我們所謂的怪物控制資料區, 其轉換式為下.
mov eax, esi // esi = Monster esi
mov eax, [eax+18]
sub eax, 4 // eax = KiKi esi


[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],0094BE09 // 3b c7 75 ? 33 c0 eb ? 83 be ? ? ? ? 06
jne My_Ret

push esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+000003f8], 0
pop esi

My_Ret:
push 00942AF8
ret

00C32C94:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C32C94: // [5/10]
DD 00942AF8 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

```txt
// 8B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 FF 70 ?? 83 C0 ?? 50
0048770F - 8B 86 E8200000             - mov eax,[esi+000020E8]

0098F2A8 - 39 9E E8200000             - cmp [esi+000020E8],ebx
0098F467 - 8B 8E E8200000             - mov ecx,[esi+000020E8]
```

```txt
接收	// 00492B28 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B ?? 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D

// 快速發包
00425F2E - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]
00425F32 - 8b 0d 94 da da 00          - mov ecx,[00dada94] : 070CF064
00425F38 - e8 ed c5 06 00             - call 0049252a
00425F3D - c3                         - ret

004926BF - e8 f9 e9 f6 ff             - call 004010bd

004010C0 - ff 15 c4 27 d9 00          - call dword ptr [00D927AC] : 0070052D

0049278E - e8 ce 5e 54 00             - call 009d8661
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_DATA_怪物資料.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 怪物不移動
// Auther: Inndy
[Enable]
Alloc(MobStatic, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)

MobStatic:
DB 8B C1               // 00941B39 - mov eax,ecx
DB 8B 48 08            // 00941B3B - mov ecx,[eax+08]
DB 53                  // 00941B3E - push ebx
DB 8B 5C 24 0C         // 00941B3F - mov ebx,[esp+0C]
DB 56                  // 00941B43 - push esi
DB 8D 50 F0            // 00941B44 - lea edx,[eax-10]
DB F7 DA               // 00941B47 - neg edx
DB 57                  // 00941B49 - push edi
DB 8B 7C 24 10         // 00941B4A - mov edi,[esp+10]
DB 1B D2               // 00941B4E - sbb edx,edx
DB 23 D0               // 00941B50 - and edx,eax
DB 52                  // 00941B52 - push edx
DB 8D B0 DC 00 00 00   // 00941B53 - lea esi,[eax+000000DC]
DB FF 36               // 00941B59 - push [esi]
// DB 89 B8 EC 00 00 00   // 00941B5B - mov [eax+000000EC],edi // 怪物走向寫入點，但是人物也會流過這裡，要判斷是否為怪物

Push Esi
Sub  Esi, 20

Cmp  [Esi+000002A0], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Esi+000002A0], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Mov  [Esi+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Pop  Esi
Push 00941B61
Ret

00C32CB0:
dd MobStatic
[Disable]
00C32CB0:
dd 00941B39 // [5/10]

Dealloc(MobStatic)











0094BA2A - 55                         - push ebp
0094BA2B - 8B EC                      - mov ebp,esp
0094BA2D - 53                         - push ebx
0094BA2E - 56                         - push esi
0094BA2F - 8B F1                      - mov esi,ecx
0094BA31 - DD 46 28                   - fld qword ptr [esi+28]
0094BA34 - 57                         - push edi
0094BA35 - E8 26ED0800                - call 009DA760
0094BA3A - DD 46 30                   - fld qword ptr [esi+30]
0094BA3D - 89 86 9C060000             - mov [esi+0000069C],eax // 寫入怪物X軸
0094BA43 - E8 18ED0800                - call 009DA760
0094BA48 - 8D 8E CC060000             - lea ecx,[esi+000006CC]
0094BA4E - 89 86 A0060000             - mov [esi+000006A0],eax // 寫入怪物Y軸

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_Hotkey.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS Hotkey + KamiTeleport
// F6 抓取滑鼠位址, F7 瞬移
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyHotkey, 512)
Label(HotkeyReturn)
Label(SetTeleportXY)
Label(Teleport)

MyHotkey:
Cmp  [Esp], 008BBC2D // 0F B6 C0 5E C3
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Esp+08], 0067F1D8 // 85 C0 75 ?? 8B 4B ?? 89
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Ebp+0C], 1
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Movzx Eax, byte ptr [Ebp+08]
Mov  [01006004], Eax
Cmp  Eax, 40 // F6
Je   SetTeleportXY
Cmp  Eax, 41 // F7
Je   Teleport
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

SetTeleportXY:
Mov  Eax, [00DB251C]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+00000978]
Push [Eax+00000088] // Y
Push [Eax+0000008C] // X
Mov  Eax, [00DAD9B4]
Pop  [Eax+00005450] // X
Pop  [Eax+00005454] // Y
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

Teleport:
Mov  Eax, [00DAD9B4]
Mov  [Eax+00005448], 1
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

HotkeyReturn:
Jmp  006CE9CE

00BCB110:
DD   MyHotkey
[DISABLE]
00BCB110:
DD   006CE9CE // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 33 C9 39 08 0F 95 C1 8A C1 C3 33 C0 C3 F6

Dealloc(MyHotkey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 0094F822
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    0094F822
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0094FAF5 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0094FAF5
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBB088:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBB088:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_採集微加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 採集微加速
// Auther: Inndy
// 因為採集基本上是由SV端控制，所以瞬間發送所有封包也沒輒
// 發送->接收 才能發送下一個包
// 終極加速就是收包後馬上發送採集包
//
// 以下 Esi == [00DAD9B4] (CharBase)
// 008C6AB1 - FF 8E 70680000             - dec [esi+00006870]     // 採集次數 (4 -> 0)
// 008C6AB7 - A1 8C5ADB00                - mov eax,[00DB5A8C]     // 間隔時間
// 008C6ABC - 8B 40 5C                   - mov eax,[eax+5C]
// 008C6AC2 - 89 86 6C680000             - mov [esi+0000686C],eax // 下一次的時間
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Faster, 64)

Faster:
Cmp [Esp], 008F5ECB
Jne 008BBDD8
Mov Eax, [00DB5A8C]
Mov [Eax+5C], #480 // 請斟酌調整...原本是720
Jmp 008BBDD8

00C2F53C:
DD Faster
[DISABLE]
00C2F53C:
DD 008BBDD8

Dealloc(Faster)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_換頻固定.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS 147.4 ICS 換頻固定

[ENABLE]
Alloc(SpawnXY,8)
Alloc(MapID,4)
Alloc(SetSpawn,256)
Label(SetSpawnMain)

MapID:
ReadMem([00DB5AB0]+000010BC, 4)

SpawnXY:
ReadMem([00DB5AB0]+00000F90, 8)

SetSpawn:
Cmp  [esp+74],008D6F89 // 50 8D 8E ?? ?? 00 00 89 45 ?? E8 ?? ?? ? FF 3B F3
Jne  GetProcessHeap
Mov  [Esp+74],SetSpawnMain
Jmp  GetProcessHeap

SetSpawnMain:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00db5ab0]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+10BC]
Cmp  Eax, [MapID]
Pop  Eax
Jne  008D6F89
Push [SpawnX]
Push [SpawnY]
Pop  [Ebp-1C]
Pop  [Ebp-20]
Jmp  008D6F89

00DBAED4:
DD    SetSpawn
[DISABLE]
00DBAEB4: // FF 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 50 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 30
DD    GetProcessHeap

DeAlloc(SetSpawn)
DeAlloc(SpawnXY)
DeAlloc(MapID)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-01

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],008E790A // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00DB2520] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
jmp Normal

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],008E9CBB // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
Normal: // 正常損血
push 008F783A // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

00C2F564:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C2F564: // [1/1]
DD 008F783A // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 008E8893 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00947EB8 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00949085 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 00601D0E // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  007007BD
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   008E8DF8 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  008E8E24
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002B8]
Jmp  00947ECD // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00949099           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00949090           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  0094908C           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   00601D21           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   00601D25           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  00601D0E
//------------------------------
00D927AC:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00D927AC:
DD   007007BD

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)

Je   NormalPick

Mov  Ecx, [00DB58B8]

Pop  Ecx
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-01
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 008F84D3 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00942E2D
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 008F84D3

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00E901E7

00C3349C:
dd SpeedUp

00FAEA19:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C3349C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00942E2D // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00FAEA19: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00E901E7

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-01
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008A3C83	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  00891DEC
Call R2
Jmp  00891DEC
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+0000049C],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C2F50C:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C2F50C:   // [4/5]
DD 00891DEC // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_重機槍可移動.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 重機槍可移動
[Enable]
Alloc(Super_ICS,256)
Alloc(Super_Hook,128)
Alloc(Super2_Hook,128)
Label(SuperAttack)
Label(Superdolly)

Super_ICS:
cmp [esp+04], 008F4A3C // [3/6] // +2 // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 85 C0 0F 85 ?? ?? 00 00 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 0F 85 ?? ?? 00 00
je Super_Hook
cmp [esp+04], 008BCF9C // [1/2] // 85 C0 75 ?? 8B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 85 C0 74
je Super2_Hook
jmp 008F783A


Super_Hook: // 重機槍移動可攻擊 
mov [esp+4],SuperAttack
jmp 008F783A

Super2_Hook: // 重機槍可移動
mov [esp+4],Superdolly
jmp 008F783A

SuperAttack:
db 85 c0                     // 008F4A3C - test eax,eax
jne 008f5283                 // 008F4A3E - jne 008f5283
db 39 9e ec 53 00 00         // 008F4A44 - cmp [esi+000053ec],ebx
jne 008f5283                 // 008F4A4A - jne 008f5283
db 8d be 90 00 00 00         // 008F4A50 - lea edi,[esi+00000090]
db 8b cf                     // 008F4A56 - mov ecx,edi
call 00420c7a                // 008F4A58 - call 00420c7a
db 83 f8 ff                  // 008F4A5D - cmp eax,ff
db 7f 0f                     // 008F4A60 - jg 008f4a71
db 39 9e 18 23 00 00         // 008F4A62 - cmp [esi+00002318],ebx
db 74 07                     // 008F4A68 - je 008f4a71
db 8b cf                     // 008F4A6A - mov ecx,edi
db e8 e9 61 b6 ff            // 008F4A6C - call 0045ac5a
db 8b ce                     // 008F4A71 - mov ecx,esi
call 008bcf1c                // 008F4A73 - call 008bcf1c
db 85 c0                     // 008F4A78 - test eax,eax
jne 008f4b26
jmp 008F4A80

Superdolly:
test eax,eax
jne 008bcff2
// mov eax,[esi+000053fc] // 此行省略
JMP 008BCFA6 // 跳下一行

00C2F564:
dd Super_ICS
[Disable]
00C2F564:   // [1/1]
dd 008F783A // A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 05 ?? ?? 00 00 C3 81

Dealloc(Super_ICS)
Dealloc(Super_Hook)
Dealloc(Super2_Hook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS147.4/TWMS147.4_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00DAD9B4]+000065B4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A0], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+0000069C], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0094BA2A	// 55 8B EC 53 56 8B F1 DD
Ret

00C32E10:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C32E10:
dd 0094BA2A

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/DynamicEditTechnology.txt`:

```txt
*Buff = rand()
*(Buff+1) = Ror(Result ^ *Buff, 5)
*(Buff+2) = *(Buff+1) + Ror(*Buff ^ 0xBAADF00D, 5)

*Buff = 0
*(Buff+1) = 20000003
*(Buff+2) = 8DD56F83

00E164E8

6DD56F80

// GetValue
{
	int result;
	result = DynamicData[0] ^ __ROL__(DynamicData[1], 5);
	if ( DynamicData[1] + __ROR__(DynamicData[0] ^ 0xBAADF00D, 5) != DynamicData[2] ) Dead();
	return result;
}
// SetValue
{
	int result;
	DynamicData[0] = 0;
	DynamicData[1] = __ROR__(Value, 5);
	DynamicData[2] = DynamicData[1] + 0x6DD56F80;
	return result;
}
// 55 8B EC 8B 45 08 8B 50 04 8B 08
004058A9 - 55                         - push ebp
004058AA - 8B EC                      - mov ebp,esp
004058AC - 8B 45 08                   - mov eax,[ebp+08]
004058AF - 8B 50 04                   - mov edx,[eax+04]
004058B2 - 8B 08                      - mov ecx,[eax]
004058B4 - 8B C2                      - mov eax,edx
004058B6 - C1 C0 05                   - rol eax,05
004058B9 - 33 C1                      - xor eax,ecx
004058BB - 81 F1 0DF0ADBA             - xor ecx,BAADF00D
004058C1 - C1 C9 05                   - ror ecx,05
004058C4 - 03 CA                      - add ecx,edx
004058C6 - 3B 4D 0C                   - cmp ecx,[ebp+0C]
004058C9 - 74 15                      - je 004058E0 // 沒跳就Error Code: 5  Access Denied
004058CB - 68 2851CD00                - push 00CD5128
004058D0 - 8D 45 08                   - lea eax,[ebp+08]
004058D3 - 50                         - push eax
004058D4 - C7 45 08 05000000          - mov [ebp+08],00000005
004058DB - E8 236F6000                - call 00A0C803
004058E0 - 5D                         - pop ebp
004058E1 - C3                         - ret 
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_CRC_MSCRCBYPASS.txt`:

```txt
// CRC MSCRCBypass TWMS148
// (冷羽楓痕)
// Update by Inndy

[enable]
alloc(MSCRC,256)
alloc(FakeDump1,11)
alloc(FakeDump2,13)
label(MSCRC1)
label(MSCRC2)
label(OtherCheck)
label(MSCRC1Ret)
label(SetFakeCRCValue)
label(SetCRCValue1)
label(SetCRCValue2)
label(SetCRCValue3)
label(SetCRCValue4)
label(SetCRCValue5)
label(SetCRCValue6)
// 8A 11 80 C2 01
FakeDump1: //00A290B4-3 ~ 00A290B4+7 共11個bytes
db 8B 5D 08 8A 11 80 C2 01 8B 4D 18

//6A ?? B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 05
FakeDump2: //00495B26-3 ~ 00495B26+7 共13個bytes
db 10 5E C3 6A 38 B8 2F F5 A3 00 E8 C7 6B

MSCRC:
MSCRC1: // 檢測MSCRC2位址 00A290B4 - 8a 11 80 c2 01 8b 4d 18
cmp edx,00A290B1 // 009F5114-3
jl OtherCheck
cmp edx,00A290B8 // 009F5114+4
jg OtherCheck

sub edx,00A290B1 // 009F5114-3
add edx,FakeDump1
jmp MSCRC1Ret

OtherCheck: // 檢測送出封包函式 00495B26 - 6a 38 b8 ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 89 4d ? a1 3c 00 40 00
cmp edx,00495B23 // 0049252A-3
jl MSCRC1Ret
cmp edx,00495B2C // 0049252A+6
jg MSCRC1Ret

sub edx,00495B23 // 0049252A-3
add edx,FakeDump2

MSCRC1Ret:
//MSCRC1原本動作
push [edx]
jmp 00EE4A75

MSCRC2:
call SetFakeCRCValue
//MSCRC2原本動作
push 11198B5A
jmp 00EE3F4A

SetFakeCRCValue: // 更新: Hook該處，讀取[ebp+08]和[ebp+18]的值，其值每15秒變動一次，總共變動6次，之後的值都會重複
mov eax,[ebp+08] // CRC計算起始位置
mov edx,[ebp+18] // CRC值

cmp eax,00401324
je SetCRCValue1
cmp eax,0050678C
je SetCRCValue2
cmp eax,0060BBF4
je SetCRCValue3
cmp eax,0071105C
je SetCRCValue4
cmp eax,008164C4
je SetCRCValue5
cmp eax,0091B92C
je SetCRCValue6
ret

SetCRCValue1:
mov [edx],E7297A8C
ret

SetCRCValue2:
mov [edx],33218B78
ret

SetCRCValue3:
mov [edx],95B27755
ret

SetCRCValue4:
mov [edx],81F0E4E2
ret

SetCRCValue5:
mov [edx],147D04DC
ret

SetCRCValue6:
mov [edx],9BF78678
ret

00EE8630: // MSCRC1
jmp MSCRC1
nop
nop

01034594: // MSCRC2
jmp MSCRC2

[disable]
00EE8630: // 更新: 搜尋 ff 32 e9，會有好幾個，任意選一個做Hook，觀看被執行到最多次那個就是了
// [1/3] //e9 ?? ?? ?? ?? ff 32 e9
//db FF 32 E9 07 FA FF FF 
push [edx]
jmp 00EE4A75

01034594: // 更新: 搜尋 8a 11 80 c2 01 (00960394)，在搜尋到的位址底下有兩個JMP第二個就是了
push 11198B5A

dealloc(MSCRC)
dealloc(FakeDump1)
dealloc(FakeDump2)
```

```txt
// TWMS148.1 CRC 一秒製作完成
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
007D5BBA: // 7C 07 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8B CE
DB 90 90
[DISABLE]
007D5BBA:
DB 7C 07


[00C6241C]=007D5A01

0098D0B5 - A1 3CAADF00                - mov eax,[00DFAA3C] : [00000000]
0098D0BA - 8B 38                      - mov edi,[eax]
0098D0BC - 50                         - push eax
0098D0BD - 8B CE                      - mov ecx,esi
0098D0BF - E8 DDE8FFFF                - call 0098B9A1
0098D0C4 - 8B 07                      - mov eax,[edi]
0098D0C6 - 8B CF                      - mov ecx,edi
0098D0C8 - FF 10                      - call dword ptr [eax]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_CRC_取得其他玩家ID.txt`:

```txt
//148.1 Monster 人物object Id 取得 By.aaaddress1.
// j 會隨機噴一個地址,該地址以char格式讀取會是
//地圖內任意玩家的ID.
alloc(MyGetObjectId,128)
RegisterSymbol(MyGetObjectId)
alloc(j,04)
RegisterSymbol(j)
MyGetObjectId://adr = 007F1F4C
mov [ecx],ebx
push 007F1F53
cmp dword ptr [esp+04],00
push edi
mov edi,ecx
je 00422CC3
push esi
mov esi,[esp+10]
cmp esi,FF
jne 00422CE0
push [esp+0C]
push 00422CDD
mov ecx,[esp+04]
test ecx,0003
je 00A0EA30
mov al,[ecx]
mov [j],ecx
jmp 00A0EA0E
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C6E878] = 0085F43F, End At 007D90F1
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-15
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0085A933

0085F60B: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
0085F60B:
db e8 23 b3 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_DATA_XY處理CALL.txt`:

```txt
alloc(z,512)
RegisterSymbol(z)
alloc(LastGet,04)
RegisterSymbol(LastGet)
label(Back)
z:
cmp [esp],0045d488 //人物XY
je Back
cmp [esp],0060F572 //怪物XY
je Back
cmp [esp],0098C83A //滑鼠XY(GetFocus下)
je Back
cmp [esp],006097C2 //怪物死亡時XY
je Back
cmp [esp],004ED480 //物品XY
je Back
cmp [esp],004E8AED //其他玩家XY
je Back
cmp [esp],008E3C19 //"新"紅點的XY
je Back
push [esp]
pop [LastGet]
Back:
ret 04
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_DATA_物品陣列.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyTestProc, 512)
Alloc(ItemList, 1024)
RegisterSymbol(ItemList)
Label(GetItemCount)
Label(LoopGetItem)
Label(EndLoop)
Label(Failed)
CreateThread(MyTestProc)

MyTestProc:
Push 2
Call GetItemCount
Ret

GetItemCount: // 55 8B EC 51 51 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 53 56 57
Push Ebp
Mov Ebp, Esp
Sub Esp, 20

Mov Ecx, [00E01440]
Lea Eax, [Ebp-20]
Push Eax
Call 00422851
Mov Esi, [Eax+04]
Lea Ecx, [Ebp-20]
Call 004218DE
Mov Ecx, Esi
//====================
Mov  Edi, Ecx
Push [Ebp+08]
And  [Ebp-10], 0
call 0042691F
xor ebx,ebx
inc ebx
cmp eax,ebx
mov [ebp-14],eax
jl Failed

LoopGetItem:
push 00
push ebx
push [Ebp+08]
lea eax,[ebp-20]
push eax
mov ecx,edi
call 00427414
mov esi,[eax+04]
lea ecx,[ebp-20]
call 00426D13
test esi,esi
je EndLoop
mov eax,[esi]
mov ecx,esi
call dword ptr [eax+08]
test eax,eax
jne EndLoop
lea ecx,[esi+0C]
call 00427238 // ItemID
Mov [ItemList+Ebx*8-8], Eax
mov eax,[esi]
mov ecx,esi
call dword ptr [eax+4C] // ItemCount
Mov [ItemList+Ebx*8-4], Eax
EndLoop:
inc ebx
cmp ebx,[ebp-14]
jle LoopGetItem

Failed:
Leave
Ret  0004
[DISABLE]
Dealloc(MyTestProc)
Dealloc(ItemList)
UnregisterSymbol(ItemList)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_EIP_人物飛天.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 EIP 人物飛天
// Address = 00971FB0
// EIP = Fly
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Fly, 64)
RegisterSymbol(Fly)
Label(NotFly)

Fly:
Cmp  [Ebp+04], 00974572
Jne  NotFly
Fldz
Jmp  00971FBD
NotFly:
Fld  qword ptr [Ebp+0C]
Fdiv qword ptr [Ebp+14]
Jmp  00971FB6

//00971FB0:
Jmp  Fly
Nop
[DISABLE]
00971FB0:
DB   DD 45 0C DC 75 14

Dealloc(Fly)
UnregisterSymbol(Fly)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_Hotkey.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS Hotkey + KamiTeleport
// F6 抓取滑鼠位址, F7 瞬移
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyHotkey, 512)
Label(HotkeyReturn)
Label(SetTeleportXY)
Label(Teleport)

MyHotkey:
Cmp  [Esp], 008EB8E1 // 0F B6 C0 C3 0F
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Esp+08], 006A05F8 // 85 C0 75 ?? 8B 4B ?? 89
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Ebp+0C], 1
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Movzx Eax, byte ptr [Ebp+08]
Mov  [01006004], Eax
Cmp  Eax, 40 // F6
Je   SetTeleportXY
Cmp  Eax, 41 // F7
Je   Teleport
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

SetTeleportXY:
Mov  Eax, [00E0624C]
Mov  Eax, [Eax+00000978]
Push [Eax+00000088] // Y
Push [Eax+0000008C] // X
Mov  Eax, [00E016DC]
Pop  [Eax+00005E78] // X
Pop  [Eax+00005E7C] // Y
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

Teleport:
Mov  Eax, [00E0624C]
Mov  [Eax+00005E70], 1
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

HotkeyReturn:
Jmp  006F1A0C

00C112A8:
DD   MyHotkey
[DISABLE]
00C112A8:
DD   006F1A0C // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 33 C9 39 08 0F 95 C1 8A C1 C3 33 C0 C3 F6

Dealloc(MyHotkey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_ItemVac.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
alloc(ItemVac,256)
label(SetItemXY)
alloc(FixedSSAction,64)

FixedSSAction:
cmp [esp],00973078 // 85 C0 74 ?? 8B 06 5F
jne 00980051 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 8B 1D ?? ?? ?? 00 56 8B F1 57
add esp, 04
call 00980051
xor eax,eax
jmp 00973078

ItemVac:
cmp [esp],004EA986 // 85 c0 75 ?? 83 4d fc ff 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ff ff 83 7d f0 00 0f 85
je SetItemXY
cmp [esp],004E9C2E // 85 C0 74 07 39 5D ?? 75
jne PtInRect
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

SetItemXY:
mov eax,[esp+08]
mov [ebx],eax
mov eax,[esp+0C]
mov [ebx+04],eax
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

00E0EF94:
dd ItemVac

00C7B848:
DD FixedSSAction

[disable]
00E0EF94:
dd PtInRect

00C7B848:
DD 00980051

dealloc(ItemVac)
dealloc(FixedSSAction)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00980142
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00980142
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00980415 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00980415
//-----------------------------------------------
00E0EFF0:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00E0EFF0:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_人物飛天.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 人物飛天
// ICS: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyFly, 1024)

Label(MyFly009744da)
Label(MyFly009744be)
Label(MyFly00974536)
Label(MyFly009744c0)
Label(MyFly00974536)
Label(MyFly0097450c)

MyFly:
Cmp  [Esp], 00974475
Jne  00973A17
Add  Esp, 04
Call 00973A17
db 85 c0                                 // 00974475 - test eax,eax
je 00974613                              // 00974477 - je 00974613
db 8b 86 50 01 00 00                     // 0097447d - mov eax,[esi+00000150]
db 8d 48 24                              // 00974483 - lea ecx,[eax+24]
call 0043109f                            // 00974486 - call 0043109f
db dc 0d 60 a7 c7 00                     // 0097448b - fmul qword ptr [00c7a760] : 0000
db dd 5d bc                              // 00974491 - fstp qword ptr [ebp-44]
db dd 45 c4                              // 00974494 - fld qword ptr [ebp-3c]
db dc 0d 58 a7 c7 00                     // 00974497 - fmul qword ptr [00c7a758] : D41D
db dd 5d b4                              // 0097449d - fstp qword ptr [ebp-4c]
db d9 ee                                 // 009744a0 - fldz
db 39 9e 18 01 00 00                     // 009744a2 - cmp [esi+00000118],ebx
je MyFly009744da                         // 009744a8 - je 009744da
db 39 9e 1c 01 00 00                     // 009744aa - cmp [esi+0000011c],ebx
jne MyFly009744be                        // 009744b0 - jne 009744be
db dc 5d e4                              // 009744b2 - fcomp qword ptr [ebp-1c]
db df e0                                 // 009744b5 - fnstsw ax
db f6 c4 05                              // 009744b7 - test ah,05
jp MyFly00974536                         // 009744ba - jp 00974536
jmp MyFly009744c0                        // 009744bc - jmp 009744c0
MyFly009744be:
db dd d8                                 // 009744be - fstp st(0)
MyFly009744c0:
db db 86 24 01 00 00                     // 009744c0 - fild dword ptr [esi+00000124]
db dc 0d 50 a7 c7 00                     // 009744c6 - fmul qword ptr [00c7a750] : 0000
db dc 35 10 52 bf 00                     // 009744cc - fdiv qword ptr [00bf5210] : 0000
db dd 5d e4                              // 009744d2 - fstp qword ptr [ebp-1c]
jmp 00974575                             // 009744d5 - jmp 00974575
MyFly009744da:
db dc 5d e4                              // 009744da - fcomp qword ptr [ebp-1c]
db df e0                                 // 009744dd - fnstsw ax
db f6 c4 05                              // 009744df - test ah,05
jp MyFly00974536                         // 009744e2 - jp 00974536
db 38 9e c4 00 00 00                     // 009744e4 - cmp [esi+000000c4],bl
je MyFly0097450c                         // 009744ea - je 0097450c
db dd 45 bc                              // 009744ec - fld qword ptr [ebp-44]
db dd 05 98 24 c0 00                     // 009744ef - fld qword ptr [00c02498] : 0000
db dc c9                                 // 009744f5 - fmul st(1),st(0)
db dd 05 08 50 bf 00                     // 009744f7 - fld qword ptr [00bf5008] : 0000
db dc fa                                 // 009744fd - fdiv st(2),st(0)
db d9 ca                                 // 009744ff - fxch st(2)
db dd 5d bc                              // 00974501 - fstp qword ptr [ebp-44]
db dc 4d c4                              // 00974504 - fmul qword ptr [ebp-3c]
db de f1                                 // 00974507 - fdivrp st(1),st(0)
db dd 5d c4                              // 00974509 - fstp qword ptr [ebp-3c]
MyFly0097450c:
db dd 45 dc                              // 0097450c - fld qword ptr [ebp-24]

db 8b 4d 08                              // 00971f98 - mov ecx,[ebp+08]

db df e0                                 // 00971fa9 - fnstsw ax
db f6 c4 41                              // 00971fab - test ah,41
jne 00971fef                             // 00971fae - jne 00971fef
//db dd 45 0c                              // 00971fb0 - fld qword ptr [ebp+0c]
fldz
db dc 75 14                              // 00971fb3 - fdiv qword ptr [ebp+14]
db dc 4d 24                              // 00971fb6 - fmul qword ptr [ebp+24]
db dc 01                                 // 00971fb9 - fadd qword ptr [ecx]
db dd 11                                 // 00971fbb - fst qword ptr [ecx]
db d8 d9                                 // 00971fbd - fcomp st(0),st(1)
db df e0                                 // 00971fbf - fnstsw ax

jne 00971fef                             // 00971fc4 - jne 00971fef
db dd 19                                 // 00971fc6 - fstp qword ptr [ecx]
db 5d                                    // 00971fc8 - pop ebp
db c3                                    // 00971fc9 - ret

00C7B6DC:
DD   MyFly
```

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 挖礦/製作 四合一懶人包
// Auther: Inndy
// 快速挖礦 + 挖礦無間隔 + 快速製作



[ENABLE]
// 快速挖礦
Alloc(Mining, 512)

Mining:

Jne  008F0861

Call 008F0861
Push Eax
Call 0046A237
Pop  Ecx

Jne  0092895D

jg Mining008f6a86                        // 008f6a76 - jg 008f6a86
jmp Mining008f6a7d                       // 008f6a78 - jmp 008f6a7d

DD Mining
//===================================
// 挖礦無間隔
Alloc(MiningNoInterval, 128)

MiningNoInterval:
push [ebp+0c]
push 009270de
push esi
push edi
mov esi,ecx

push 00
call 0048aba4
mov ecx,[esp+0c]
call 00408b5e
mov ecx,[esp+0c]
mov edi,eax
call 00408b5e
jmp 008FF629

0092717E:
DD MiningNoInterval
//===================================
// 快速製作
Alloc(UltraMaking, 64)

UltraMaking:
push 18
mov eax,00ab921e
call 00a0c6f9
mov esi,ecx
mov ecx,[esi+00000114]
call 0045c0bf
lea ecx,[esi+00000118]
call 004404a9
mov eax,[esi+000000a0]
xor ebx,ebx
sub eax,ebx
je 007D5BBC
jmp 007D5A35

00C6241C:
DD UltraMaking

// 快速挖礦

DD 008F0861

//===================================
// 挖礦無間隔

//===================================
// 快速製作
```

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0090BA87 - 89 85 a8 fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000158],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0090BA9E - 89 85 ec fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000214],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0090BAB5 - 89 85 f0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000210],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0090BBF0 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000214], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000210], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  0051FB4E

00BFDDA0:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-15

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],00917B75 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E06250] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 00927EC5 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],00919F7C // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 00927EC5
ret

00C7775C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C7775C: // [1/1]
DD 00927EC5 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00918B0E // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0097872C // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00979ACB // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0060B253 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  00726AC5
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   00919076 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  009190A2
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  00978741 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00979ADF           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00979AD6           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00979AD2           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0060B266           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0060B26A           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0060B253
//------------------------------
00DE5FEC:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00DE5FEC:
DD   00726AC5

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 00926BE7 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004A2C9E
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004A2C9E
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E06250]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E096C0]
Call 004EA84D
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E06250]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E01440]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E01440]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
And  [Eax+000020E0], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E096C0]
Call 004EA84D
Jmp  00926BEF

00C77728:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00C77728:
DD   004A2C9E

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-15
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 00928A9C // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 0097303A
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 00928A9C

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00EE3F4A

00C7B6AC:
dd SpeedUp

00FFDCF7:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C7B6AC: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 0097303A // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00FFDCF7: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00EE3F4A

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-15

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],0097C702 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+0000041C], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 009733B8
ret

00C7AE94:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C7AE94: // [5/10]
DD 009733B8 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS148.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-08-15
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008D2E4C	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008C04CC
Call R2
Jmp  008C04CC
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004A0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C77704:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C77704:   // [4/5]
DD 008C04CC // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

```txt
Jmp  008F0861
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_雙倍鏢箭彈-砲桶無延遲-馬上換頻.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS147.4 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	008DB988 - 89 85 a8 fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000158],eax
// 無限標箭彈	008DB99F - 89 85 ec fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000214],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	008DB9B6 - 89 85 f0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000210],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon,1024)
Label(DoubleAttack)
Label(PushNoDelay1)
Label(PushNoDelay2)
Label(NoBTCNoDC1)
Label(NoBTCNoDC2)
Label(NoBTCNoDCFakeJe1)
Label(UnlimitedWeaponRet)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp [Esp+10], 0090bbf0 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Je  DoubleAttack
Cmp [Esp+54], 008e559d
Je PushNoDelay1
Cmp [Esp+0c], 00503259
Je NoBTCNoDC1
jmp UnlimitedWeaponRet

PushNoDelay1:
mov [esp+54],PushNoDelay2
jmp UnlimitedWeaponRet

NoBTCNoDC1:
Mov [Esp+0C],NoBTCNoDC2
Jmp UnlimitedWeaponRet

PushNoDelay2:
call 0051fb4e
Mov Eax,[Ebp+68]
Jmp 008E55C0

NoBTCNoDC2:
cmp eax,edi
je NoBTCNoDCFakeJe1
test byte ptr [eax+000001bc],10
je NoBTCNoDCFakeJe1
push edi
push edi
push edi
push edi
push edi
push edi
push ecx
mov eax,esp
mov [ebp+08],esp
push 00000105
jmp 0050323d

NoBTCNoDCFakeJe1:
push 48
lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
call 00654067
push [ebp+08]
lea ecx,[ebp-1c]
mov [ebp-04],edi
call 00412a66
call 0094cef2
push ebp
jmp 00503297

DoubleAttack:
Mov  [ebp-00000158], 1 // 無形之箭
Mov  [Ebp-00000214], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000210], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
jmp UnlimitedWeaponRet

UnlimitedWeaponRet:
jmp 0051fb4e 

00BFDDA0:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00BFDDA0: // [1/51]
DD  0051fb4e // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04

Dealloc(UnlimitedWeapon)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS148.1/TWMS148.1_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E016DC]+00006FDC, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0097C2D2	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00C7B010:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C7B010:
dd 0097C2D2

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```
