`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C76BD0] = 00861E6C
// UpdateTime: 2012-09-22
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0085D35F

00862038: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
00862038:
db e8 22 b3 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_DATA_半成品物品陣列.txt`:

```txt
long Doggy_00422828 = 0x00422828;
long Doggy_004218b5 = 0x004218b5;
long Doggy_005a274b = 0x005a274b;


// 55 8B EC 51 51 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 53 56 57
DB   0x55                                                   //009D0F49 - push ebp
DB   0x8b,0xec                                              //009D0F4A - mov ebp,esp
DB   0x51                                                   //009D0F4C - push ecx
DB   0x51                                                   //009D0F4D - push ecx
DB   0x8b,0x0d,0x00,0xbc,0xe0,0x00                          //009D0F4E - mov ecx,[00e0bc00] : 00E1E508
DB   0x53                                                   //009D0F54 - push ebx
DB   0x56                                                   //009D0F55 - push esi
DB   0x57                                                   //009D0F56 - push edi
DB   0x8d,0x45,0xf8                                         //009D0F57 - lea eax,[ebp-08]
DB   0x50                                                   //009D0F5A - push eax
Call Doggy_00422828                                         //009D0F5B - call 00422828
DB   0x8b,0x70,0x04                                         //009D0F60 - mov esi,[eax+04]
DB   0x8d,0x4d,0xf8                                         //009D0F63 - lea ecx,[ebp-08]
Call Doggy_004218b5                                         //009D0F66 - call 004218b5
DB   0x8b,0x45,0x08                                         //009D0F6B - mov eax,[ebp+08]
DB   0x99                                                   //009D0F6E - cdq
DB   0xb9,0x40,0x42,0x0f,0x00                               //009D0F6F - mov ecx,000f4240
DB   0xf7,0xf9                                              //009D0F74 - idiv ecx
DB   0xff,0x75,0x10                                         //009D0F76 - push [ebp+10]
DB   0x8b,0x3d,0x04,0xbc,0xe0,0x00                          //009D0F79 - mov edi,[00e0bc04] : 00000000
DB   0xff,0x75,0x0c                                         //009D0F7F - push [ebp+0c]
DB   0x8b,0xce                                              //009D0F82 - mov ecx,esi
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //009D0F84 - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x50                                                   //009D0F87 - push eax

Call FakeCall

DB   0x8b,0xd8                                              //009D0F8D - mov ebx,eax
DB   0x0f,0xb6,0x45,0x0c                                    //009D0F8F - movzx eax,byte ptr [ebp+0c]
DB   0x50                                                   //009D0F93 - push eax
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //009D0F94 - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x8b,0xcf                                              //009D0F97 - mov ecx,edi
DB   0x56                                                   //009D0F99 - push esi
Call Doggy_005a274b                                         //009D0F9A - call 005a274b
DB   0x5f                                                   //009D0F9F - pop edi
DB   0x5e                                                   //009D0FA0 - pop esi
DB   0x03,0xc3                                              //009D0FA1 - add eax,ebx
DB   0x5b                                                   //009D0FA3 - pop ebx
DB   0xc9                                                   //009D0FA4 - leave
DB   0xc2,0x0c,0x00                                         //009D0FA5 - ret 000c
DB   0x6a,0x10                                              //009D0FA8 - push 10












long Doggy_00a0f499 = 0x00a0f499;
long Doggy_004268f6 = 0x004268f6;
long Doggy_004273eb = 0x004273eb;
long Doggy_00426cea = 0x00426cea;

long Doggy_0059cf3c = 0x0059cf3c;
long Doggy_004cf9c9 = 0x004cf9c9;

FakeCall:
DB   0x6a,0x14                                              //004D034D - push 14
DB   0xb8,0x1a,0xdc,0xa4,0x00                               //004D034F - mov eax,00a4dc1a
Call Doggy_00a0f499                                         //004D0354 - call 00a0f499
DB   0x8b,0xf9                                              //004D0359 - mov edi,ecx
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //004D035B - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x83,0x65,0xf0,0x00                                    //004D035E - and dword ptr [ebp-10],00
Call Doggy_004268f6                                         //004D0362 - call 004268f6
DB   0x33,0xdb                                              //004D0367 - xor ebx,ebx
DB   0x43                                                   //004D0369 - inc ebx
DB   0x3b,0xc3                                              //004D036A - cmp eax,ebx
DB   0x89,0x45,0xec                                         //004D036C - mov [ebp-14],eax
jnge Doggy004d03bf                                          //004D036F - jnge 004d03bf
Doggy004d0371:
DB   0x6a,0x00                                              //004D0371 - push 00
DB   0x53                                                   //004D0373 - push ebx
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //004D0374 - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x8d,0x45,0xe0                                         //004D0377 - lea eax,[ebp-20]
DB   0x50                                                   //004D037A - push eax
DB   0x8b,0xcf                                              //004D037B - mov ecx,edi
Call Doggy_004273eb                                         //004D037D - call 004273eb
DB   0x8b,0x70,0x04                                         //004D0382 - mov esi,[eax+04]
DB   0x8d,0x4d,0xe0                                         //004D0385 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
Call Doggy_00426cea                                         //004D0388 - call 00426cea
DB   0x85,0xf6                                              //004D038D - test esi,esi
je Doggy004d03b9                                            //004D038F - je 004d03b9
DB   0x80,0x7d,0x10,0x00                                    //004D0391 - cmp byte ptr [ebp+10],00
jne Doggy004d03a2                                           //004D0395 - jne 004d03a2
DB   0x8b,0x06                                              //004D0397 - mov eax,[esi]
DB   0x8b,0xce                                              //004D0399 - mov ecx,esi
DB   0xff,0x50,0x08                                         //004D039B - call dword ptr [eax+08]
DB   0x85,0xc0                                              //004D039E - test eax,eax
jne Doggy004d03b9                                           //004D03A0 - jne 004d03b9
Doggy004d03a2:
DB   0x8d,0x4e,0x0c                                         //004D03A2 - lea ecx,[esi+0c]
Call Doggy_0042720f                                         //004D03A5 - call 0042720f
//DB   0x3b,0x45,0x0c                                         //004D03AA - cmp eax,[ebp+0c] // ItemID
//jne Doggy004d03b9                                           //004D03AD - jne 004d03b9
//在這裡保存ID (Eax)
DB   0x8b,0x06                                              //004D03AF - mov eax,[esi]
DB   0x8b,0xce                                              //004D03B1 - mov ecx,esi
DB   0xff,0x50,0x4c                                         //004D03B3 - call dword ptr [eax+4c]
DB   0x01,0x45,0xf0                                         //004D03B6 - add [ebp-10],eax // ItemCount
//在這裡保存數量 (Eax)
Doggy004d03b9:
DB   0x43                                                   //004D03B9 - inc ebx
DB   0x3b,0x5d,0xec                                         //004D03BA - cmp ebx,[ebp-14]
jle Doggy004d0371                                           //004D03BD - jle 004d0371
Doggy004d03bf:
DB   0x83,0x7d,0x14,0x00                                    //004D03BF - cmp dword ptr [ebp+14],00
jne Doggy004d0412                                           //004D03C3 - jne 004d0412
DB   0xff,0x75,0x0c                                         //004D03C5 - push [ebp+0c]
DB   0x8b,0x0d,0x04,0xbc,0xe0,0x00                          //004D03C8 - mov ecx,[00e0bc04] : 00000000
Call Doggy_0059cf3c                                         //004D03CE - call 0059cf3c
DB   0x85,0xc0                                              //004D03D3 - test eax,eax
je Doggy004d0412                                            //004D03D5 - je 004d0412
DB   0x6a,0x01                                              //004D03D7 - push 01
DB   0x57                                                   //004D03D9 - push edi
DB   0xff,0x75,0x0c                                         //004D03DA - push [ebp+0c]
DB   0x8d,0x45,0xe8                                         //004D03DD - lea eax,[ebp-18]
DB   0x50                                                   //004D03E0 - push eax
Call Doggy_004cf9c9                                         //004D03E1 - call 004cf9c9
DB   0x83,0xc4,0x10                                         //004D03E6 - add esp,10
DB   0x8b,0x4d,0xec                                         //004D03E9 - mov ecx,[ebp-14]
DB   0x83,0x65,0xfc,0x00                                    //004D03EC - and dword ptr [ebp-04],00
DB   0x85,0xc9                                              //004D03F0 - test ecx,ecx
je Doggy004d0406                                            //004D03F2 - je 004d0406
DB   0x80,0x7d,0x10,0x00                                    //004D03F4 - cmp byte ptr [ebp+10],00
jne Doggy004d0403                                           //004D03F8 - jne 004d0403
DB   0x8b,0x01                                              //004D03FA - mov eax,[ecx]
DB   0xff,0x50,0x08                                         //004D03FC - call dword ptr [eax+08]
DB   0x85,0xc0                                              //004D03FF - test eax,eax
jne Doggy004d0406                                           //004D0401 - jne 004d0406
Doggy004d0403:
DB   0xff,0x45,0xf0                                         //004D0403 - inc [ebp-10]
Doggy004d0406:
DB   0x83,0x4d,0xfc,0xff                                    //004D0406 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   0x8d,0x4d,0xe8                                         //004D040A - lea ecx,[ebp-18]
Call Doggy_00426cea                                         //004D040D - call 00426cea
Doggy004d0412:
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_DATA_取得角色ID.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 取得角色ID
[[00e0bc00]+20F0]+4

// 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 89 45 ?? 39 B9
005E0120 - 8b 0d 00 bc e0 00          - mov ecx,[00e0bc00] : 00E1E508

// 8B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 FF 70 ?? 83 C0 ?? 50
0048B67B - 8b 86 f0 20 00 00          - mov eax,[esi+000020f0]

// 以下為147.4
0098F2A8 - 39 9E E8200000             - cmp [esi+000020E8],ebx
0098F467 - 8B 8E E8200000             - mov ecx,[esi+000020E8]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_DATA_封包相關位址.txt`:

```txt
ECX		// 00E0BF8C // 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 FF
發送	// 004964A4 // 6A 38 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 89 4D ?? A1 3C 00 40 00
接收	// 00496C00 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B ?? 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D

// 快速發包 // FF 74 24 04 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
004262F2 - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]
004262F6 - 8b 0d 8c bf e0 00          - mov ecx,[00e0bf8c] : 00000000
004262FC - e8 a3 01 07 00             - call 004964a4
00426301 - c3                         - ret

// 發包過濾、ICS
// ICS上層
00E2C8A6 - e8 97 54 5d ff             - call 00401d42
00E2C8AB - 9c                         - pushfd

// ICS入口（疾風） // FF 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 C0 74 ?? Eb ?? 6A 00
004010C0 - ff 15 ec 5f de 00          - call dword ptr [00DE5FEC] : 00726AC5

// 離開發包
00495D8E - e8 3e 6a 57 00             - call 00a0c7d1
00495D93 - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004





// 收包過濾、ICS
// ICS上層 // E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8B 7D 08 83 65 FC 00 8B
0049613E - e8 d8 ea ff ff             - call 00494c1b
00496143 - 8b 7d 08                   - mov edi,[ebp+08]

// ICS入口 // FF 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 56 8B F1 8B 06 8B 50 ?? 8B 4C 24 08 C1
00494601 - ff 15 94 70 b2 00          - call dword ptr [00b27094] : 05720B4E

// 離開收包 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 04 00 6A 40 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B
004961F7 - e8 d5 65 57 00             - call 00a0c7d1
004961FC - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_Hotkey.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS Hotkey
[ENABLE]
Alloc(MyHotkey, 512)
Label(HotkeyReturn)
Label(SetTeleportXY)
Label(Teleport)

MyHotkey:
Cmp  [Esp], 008EE83C // 0F B6 C0 C3 0F
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Esp+08], 006A2C20 // 85 C0 75 ?? 8B 4B ?? 89
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Cmp  [Ebp+0C], 1
Jne  HotkeyReturn
Movzx Eax, byte ptr [Ebp+08]
Mov  [01E2FFEC], Eax
Cmp  Eax, 40 // F6
Je   SetTeleportXY
Cmp  Eax, 41 // F7
Je   Teleport
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

SetTeleportXY:
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

Teleport:
Jmp  HotkeyReturn

HotkeyReturn:
Jmp  006F392F

00C19078:
DD   MyHotkey
[DISABLE]
00C19078:
DD   006F392F // E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 33 C9 39 08 0F 95 C1 8A C1 C3 33 C0 C3 F6

Dealloc(MyHotkey)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_ItemVac(加大X範圍).txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Alloc(ItemVac,256)
Label(SetItemXY)
Label(ExitVac)

ItemVac:
Cmp  [Esp], 004EB686 // 85 c0 75 ?? 83 4d fc ff 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ff ff 83 7d f0 00 0f 85
Je   SetItemXY
Cmp  [Esp], 004Ea92E // 85 C0 74 07 39 5D ?? 75
Jne  PtInRect
Xor  Eax,Eax
Inc  Eax
Ret  000C

SetItemXY:
Sub  [Eax], 10 // L
Add  [Eax+08], 10 // R
Push [Esp+0C]
Push [Esp+0C]
Push Eax
Call PtInRect
Test Eax, Eax
Je   ExitVac
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [Esp+0C]
Mov  [Ebx], Eax
Mov  Eax, [Esp+10]
Mov  [Ebx+04], Eax
Pop  Eax
ExitVac:
Ret  000C

00E1986C:
DD   ItemVac

[disable]
00E1986C:
DD   PtInRect

DEalloc(ItemVac)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_ItemVac.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
alloc(ItemVac,256)
label(SetItemXY)
label(Vac)
alloc(FixedSSAction,64)
alloc(ItemVacMode, 4)

ItemVacMode:
dd 1 // 0關閉 1加大X軸 2全圖

FixedSSAction:
cmp [ItemVacMode],2
jl 00982B77
cmp [esp],00975B16 // 85 C0 74 ?? 8B 06 5F
jne 00982B77 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 8B 1D ?? ?? ?? 00 56 8B F1 57
add esp, 04
call 00982B77
xor eax,eax
jmp 00975B16

ItemVac:
cmp [esp],004EB686 // 85 c0 75 ?? 83 4d fc ff 8d 4d ?? e8 ?? ?? ff ff 83 7d f0 00 0f 85
je Vac
cmp [esp],004EA92E // 85 C0 74 07 39 5D ?? 75
jne PtInRect
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

Vac:
cmp [ItemVacMode],0
je PtInRect
cmp [ItemVacMode],2
je SetItemXY

Sub  [Eax], 10 // L
Add  [Eax+08], 10 // R
Push [Esp+0C]
Push [Esp+0C]
Push Eax
Call PtInRect
Test Eax, Eax
Jne  SetItemXY
Ret  000C

SetItemXY:
mov eax,[esp+08]
mov [ebx],eax
mov eax,[esp+0C]
mov [ebx+04],eax
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

00E1986C:
dd ItemVac

00C83E38:
DD FixedSSAction

[disable]
00E1986C:
dd PtInRect

00C83E38:
DD 00982B77

dealloc(ItemVac)
dealloc(FixedSSAction)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00982C68
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00982C68
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00982F3B // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00982F3B
//-----------------------------------------------
00E198C8:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00E198C8:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_定點生怪C.txt`:

```txt
//149.1 定點生怪
[enable]
alloc(xuHookGPH,4096)
label(xuHookGPHR)
label(xuGPH01)
label(xuGPH011)
label(xuGPH012)
label(xuGPH02)
label(xuGPH0A)
label(xuGPH0AR)
alloc(xMobPIO,4)
alloc(xMobPX,4)
alloc(xMobPY,4)
//==========
xMobPIO:
dd 0
xMobPX: 
dd 0
xMobPY: 
dd 0
//==========
xuHookGPH:
  cmp [esp],0060B267 
  je xuGPH01
  cmp [esp],0060B30C
  je xuGPH02
  jmp xuHookGPHR

xuGPH01:

  push eax
  push ebx
  cmp [xMobPIO],1
  je xuGPH011
  cmp [00E0BE9C],0
  je xuGPH011
 
  mov eax,[00e0be9c]
  mov ebx,[eax+70e4]
  mov [xMobPX],ebx
  mov ebx,[eax+70e8]
  mov [xMobPY],ebx
  mov [xMobPIO],1
xuGPH011:
  pop ebx
  pop eax
  cmp [xMobPIO],1
  jne xuHookGPHR
  push eax
  call xuGPH0A
  cmp eax,1
  pop eax
  jne xuHookGPHR
  push ecx

mov ecx,[00e14118]
mov ecx,[ecx+10c0]


cmp ecx,0E4E4374  
  mov [esp+0c],000240
  mov [esp+10],FFFFFD14
je xuGPH012



  mov ecx,[xMobPX] 
  mov [esp+0c],ecx
  mov ecx,[xMobPY] 
  mov [esp+10],ecx



xuGPH012:
  mov ecx,[esp+10] 
  push ecx
  mov ecx,[00e10438]
  call 004313ce
  mov [esp+20],0
  pop ecx
  jmp xuHookGPHR

xuGPH02:
  push eax
  call xuGPH0A
  cmp eax,1
  pop eax
  jne xuHookGPHR
  
  mov [ecx+298],06 
  jmp xuHookGPHR

xuGPH0A:  
  push ecx
  mov ecx,0
  cmp esi,0
  je xuGPH0AR
  mov eax,[esi]
  cmp eax,0
  je xuGPH0AR
  cmp [eax],0
  je xuGPH0AR
  cmp [eax],00610DB1
  jne xuGPH0AR
  mov ecx,1

xuGPH0AR:
  xor eax,eax
  mov eax,ecx
  pop ecx
  ret

xuHookGPHR:
jmp 0097AF4E

00C834E8:
dd xuHookGPH
[disable]
00C834E8:
dd 0097AF4E
dealloc(xMobPIO)
dealloc(xMobPX)
dealloc(xMobPY)
dealloc(xuHookGPH)
```

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0090F2F1 - 89 85 a8 fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000158],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0090F308 - 89 85 ec fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000214],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0090F31F - 89 85 f0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000210],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0090F45A // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000214], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000210], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  00520C9B

00C05AB0:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00C05AB0: // [1/1]
DD  00520C9B // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_滑鼠移動.txt`:

```txt
//================================
//TwMS v149.1_ICS_滑鼠移動
//更新:lovely99
//================================
[Enable]
Registersymbol(Ics_CSX)
Registersymbol(CSXon)
Registersymbol(CSX)
Alloc(Ics_CSX,128)
Alloc(CSX,1024)
Alloc(CSXon,4)
Label(CSXReturnX)
Label(CSXReturnY)
Label(HookCSX)
Label(MouserX)
Label(MouserY)

CSXon: //0關 1滑鼠移動 
DD 1

Ics_CSX:
PUSH EBP
MOV  EBP,ESP
PUSH EBX
PUSH ESI
MOV  ESI,[EBP+08]
XOR  EBX,EBX
PUSH EDI
CMP  [ESI+14],EBX
JE   HookCSX
JMP  00978874

HookCSX:
MOV  ECX,[00E10A10]
CALL 0097883F
MOV  [EBP+08],EAX
FILD [EBP+08]
MOV  EDI,[EBP+0C]
FDIV [00C04030]
FSTP [EBP+34]
CMP  EDI,EBX
JE   009788F2
FLD  [ESI+3C]
PUSH ECX
FSUB [ESI+1C]
PUSH ECX
FMUL [EBP+34]
FADD [ESI+1C]
FSTP [ESP]
CALL 004E99EE
POP  ECX
POP  ECX
JMP  CSX

CSX:
CMP  [CSXon],1
JE   MouserX
JMP  CSXReturnX

CSXReturnX:
MOV  [EDI],EAX
MOV  EDI,[EBP+10]
JMP  009788F5

CSXReturnY:
MOV  [EDI],EAX
MOV  EDI,[EBP+14]
CMP  EDI,EBX
JMP  00978916

//------------------滑鼠移動
MouserX:
PUSH EAX
MOV  EAX,[00E0BE9C]  //CHAR PID 8B 0D  8D 45  50 8D 45  50 E8
MOV  EAX,[EAX+2364]  //6A FF FF B6 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B CE E8
CMP  ESI,EAX
POP  EAX
JNE  CSXReturnX
PUSH EAX
MOV  EAX,[00E10A0C]  //滑鼠點擊 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 57 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8D 45
MOV  EAX,[EAX+978]
MOV  EAX,[EAX+84]  //X-8C
MOV  [EDI],EAX
POP  EAX
MOV  EDI,[EBP+10]
CMP  EDI,EBX
JE   MouserY
JMP  CSXReturnX+5

MouserY:
PUSH EAX
MOV  EAX,[00E0BE9C]  //CHAR PID
MOV  EAX,[EAX+2364]
CMP  ESI,EAX
POP  EAX
JNE  CSXReturnY
PUSH EAX
MOV  EAX,[00E10A0C]  //滑鼠點擊
MOV  EAX,[EAX+978]
MOV  EAX,[EAX+88]  //Y
MOV  [EDI], EAX
POP  EAX
MOV  EDI,[EBP+14]
JMP  CSXReturnY+5

//------------------滑鼠移動

00C83DE8:  //9 4BY 
DD Ics_CSX
[Disable]
00C83DE8:
DD 00978864

UnRegistersymbol(CSX)
DeAlloc(CSX)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-09-22

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],0091B24C // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E10A10] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 0092AF3E // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],0091D63A // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 0092AF3E
ret

00C7FD4C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C7FD4C: // [1/1]
DD 0092AF3E // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0091C1E5 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0097B1CA // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0097C569 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0060D834 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  007291DA
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   0091C734 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  0091C760
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  0097B1DF // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   0097C57D           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   0097C574           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  0097C570           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0060D847           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0060D84B           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0060D834
//------------------------------
00DF062C:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00DF062C:
DD   007291DA

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 00929B9F // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004A357B
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004A357B
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E10A10]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E13F28]
Call 004EB54D
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E10A10]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E0BC00]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E0BC00]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
And  [Eax+000020E0], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E13F28]
Call 004EB54D
Jmp  00929BA7

00C7FD18:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00C7FD18:
DD   004A357B

Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-09-22
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 0092BB27 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00975AD8
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 0092BB27

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00EFAEEA

00C83C9C:
dd SpeedUp

0100E182:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C83C9C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00975AD8 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

0100E182: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00EFAEEA

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-09-22

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],0097F1A0 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+28]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+0000041C], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 00975E56
ret

00C83484:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C83484: // [5/10]
DD 00975E56 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-09-22
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008D6468	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008C337A
Call R2
Jmp  008C337A
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004A0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C7FCF4:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C7FCF4:   // [4/5]
DD 008C337A // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.1/TWMS149.1_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E0BE9C]+000070E4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0097ED70	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00C83600:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C83600:
dd 0097ED70

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.2 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C76D90] = 0086200D, End At 007DBC39
// UpdateTime: 2012-10-18
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0085D500

008621D9: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008621D9:
db e8 22 b3 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_DATA_取得角色ID.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.2 取得角色ID
[[00e0bc40]+20F0]+4

// 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 89 45 ?? 39 B9
005E02C9 - 8b 0d 40 bc e0 00          - mov ecx,[00e0bc40]

// 8B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 FF 70 ?? 83 C0 ?? 50
0048B62E - 8b 86 f0 20 00 00          - mov eax,[esi+000020f0]

// 以下為147.4
0098F2A8 - 39 9E E8200000             - cmp [esi+000020E8],ebx
0098F467 - 8B 8E E8200000             - mov ecx,[esi+000020E8]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_DATA_封包相關位址.txt`:

```txt
ECX		// 00e0bfcc // 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 FF
發送	// 004964A6
接收	// 00496C02 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B ?? 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D

// 快速發包 // FF 74 24 04 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
004262F2 - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]
004262F6 - 8b 0d cc bf e0 00          - mov ecx,[00e0bfcc] : 00000000
004262FC - e8 a5 01 07 00             - call 004964a6
00426301 - c3                         - ret

// 發包過濾、ICS
// ICS上層
00E2C8A6 - e8 97 54 5d ff             - call 00401d42
00E2C8AB - 9c                         - pushfd















//以下未更新
// ICS入口（疾風） // FF 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 85 C0 74 ?? Eb ?? 6A 00
004010C0 - ff 15 ec 5f de 00          - call dword ptr [00DE5FEC] : 00726AC5

// 離開發包
00495D8E - e8 3e 6a 57 00             - call 00a0c7d1
00495D93 - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004





// 收包過濾、ICS
// ICS上層 // E8 ?? ?? FF FF 8B 7D 08 83 65 FC 00 8B
0049613E - e8 d8 ea ff ff             - call 00494c1b
00496143 - 8b 7d 08                   - mov edi,[ebp+08]

// ICS入口 // FF 15 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 56 8B F1 8B 06 8B 50 ?? 8B 4C 24 08 C1
00494601 - ff 15 94 70 b2 00          - call dword ptr [00b27094] : 05720B4E

// 離開收包 // E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 04 00 6A 40 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 89 4D ?? A1 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B
004961F7 - e8 d5 65 57 00             - call 00a0c7d1
004961FC - c2 04 00                   - ret 0004
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_Else_999吸怪.txt`:

```txt
[enable]
Registersymbol(VacMain)
Alloc(VacMain, 64)
Registersymbol(DoVac999)
Alloc(DoVac999, 256)
Registersymbol(VacToggle)
Alloc(VacToggle,4)
Alloc(ChrX,4)
Alloc(ChrY,4)
Label(VacTimer)
Label(VacEnd)
Label(NextMob)
CreateThread(VacMain)

VacMain:
	mov eax,[00E14158]
	push [eax+F98]
	pop [ChrX]
	push [eax+F9C]
	pop [ChrY]
	mov [VacToggle],1
VacTimer:
	push #4000
	call Sleep
	call DoVac999
	cmp [VacToggle],00
		jne VacTimer
	ret

DoVac999:
	pushad
	mov esi,[00E0BC40]
	test esi,esi
		je VacEnd
	mov esi,[esi+4AD4]
	test esi,esi
		je VacEnd
	mov esi,[esi+28]
	test esi,esi
		je VacEnd
	sub esi,00000010
NextMob:
	mov eax,[esi+14]//eax=CMob
	mov [eax+00000244],1//定怪
	pushad
	mov eax,[eax+0000012C]
	add eax,F4
	add eax,10
	mov ecx,eax
	mov eax,[eax]
	push 0
	push 0
	push 0
	push 0
	push [ChrY]
	push [ChrX]
	push 1
	call dword ptr [eax+84]
	popad
	mov esi,[esi+04]
	test esi,esi
		jne NextMob
VacEnd:
	popad
	ret

[disable]
VacToggle:
dd 0

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00982E09
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00982E09
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   009830DC // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   009830DC
//-----------------------------------------------
00E19908:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00E19908:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 標彈箭控制
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-10-18

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],0091B3ED // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E10A50] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 0092B0DF // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],0091D7DB // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 0092B0DF
ret

00C7FF0C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C7FF0C: // [1/1]
DD 0092B0DF // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0091C386 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0097B36B // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0097C70A // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0060D9DD // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0072937B
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   0091C8D5 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  0091C901
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  0097B380 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   0097C71E           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   0097C715           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  0097C711           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0060D9F0           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0060D9F4           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0060D9DD
//------------------------------
00DF0624:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00DF0624:
DD   0072937B

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 00929D40 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004A357F
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004A357F
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E10A50]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E13F68]
Call 004EB54F
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E10A50]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E0BC40]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E0BC40]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
And  [Eax+000020E0], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E13F68]
Call 004EB54F
Jmp  00929D48

00C7FED8:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00C7FED8:
DD   004A357F

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-10-18
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 0092BCC8 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00975C79
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 0092BCC8

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 00EF9FA6

00C83E5C:
dd SpeedUp

010176AF:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C83E5C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00975C79 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

010176AF: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp 00EF9FA6

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_超級笨怪.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-10-18

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],0097F341 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E

My_Ret:
push 00975FF7
ret

00C83644:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C83644: // [5/10]
DD 00975FF7 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-10-18
[ENABLE]

Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)

Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008D6609	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008C351B
Call R2
Jmp  008C351B
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Cmp  [R2KEY],00
Jne  R2_Return
Mov  Edi,FFFFFFFF
R2_Return:
Inc  [R2KEY]
And  [R2KEY], 3
Mov  [Esi+000004A0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C7FEB4:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C7FEB4:   // [4/5]
DD 008C351B // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6
```

```txt
// TWMS149.2 ICS 降低損血量

// UpdateTime: 2012-10-19
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)

Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)

RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 0091D018 // 6a 64 99 59 f7 f9 83 f8 ?? 0f 85 ?? 00 00 00 8b ce
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 0061120A // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 00611404
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58]
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+58], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  008F384B

00C7FF4C:
DD   RHNFB
[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS149.2/TWMS149.2_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E0BEDC]+000070E4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0097EF11	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00C837C0:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C837C0:
dd 0097EF11

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C80FD8] = 00867D24, End At 00867F74
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-01
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 00863217

00867EF0: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
00867EF0:
db e8 22 b3 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

```txt
// 150.1 快速挖礦
[Enable]
//Bypass Timestamp
00900042: // 7C ?? 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 7F 03
db 90 90

//Bypass Slash-limit
0090004A:
db EB

//Bypass time between mines
009099AA: // 75 0E 57 6A
db 90 90
[Disable]
00900042:
db 7C 31

0090004A:
db 7F

009099AA:
db 75 0e
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_DATA_封包相關位址.txt`:

```txt
ECX		// 00e1856c // 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 FF
發送	// 004965d0
接收	// 00496D8E // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B ?? 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D

// 快速發包 // FF 74 24 04 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
004262E3 - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]
004262E7 - 8b 0d 6c 85 e1 00          - mov ecx,[00e1856c] : 00000000
004262ED - e8 de 02 07 00             - call 004965d0
004262F2 - c3                         - ret
```

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(HookEsp,64)
Alloc(KamiVac,256)
Label(KamiVacRet)
//-------------------
Alloc(Range,4)
Alloc(Time,4)
alloc(XD,4)
//-------------------
Range:
dd 0

HookEsp:
Cmp [Esp+3C],00622611//
Je KamiVac
Jmp 0072C5C3//

KamiVac:
Pushad
Mov Esi,[00e1cabc]
Cmp [Esi+24],0
Je KamiVacRet
//-------------------
Mov Esi,[Esi+28]
Mov Esi,[Esi+04]
Mov Esi,[Esi+134]
Mov Esi,[Esi+24]
Mov Eax,[Esi+58]
Sub Eax,[Range]
Mov Edi,[Esi+5C]
//-------------------
mov ebx,[00E1847C]
mov [ebx+5F78],eax
mov [ebx+5F7C],edi
mov [ebx+5F70],01
//-------------------
KamiVacRet:
Popad
Jmp 0072C5C3//

00Dfca4c:
DD HookEsp
[Disable]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 009895B7
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    009895B7
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0098988A // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   0098988A
//-----------------------------------------------
00E25EC0:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00E25EC0:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	00915BDA - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	00915BF1 - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax

Mov  [Ebp-00000220], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-01

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],00921C7E // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E1CFF0] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 00931AFE // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],0092406C // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 00931AFE
ret

00C8A15C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C8A15C: // [1/1]
DD 00931AFE // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00922C17 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00981B2F // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00982ECE // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 00610721 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0072C5C3
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   00923166 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  00923192
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  00981B44 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00982EE2           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00982ED9           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00982ED5           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   00610734           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   00610738           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  00610721
//------------------------------
00DFCA4C:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00DFCA4C:
DD   0072C5C3

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 0093075F // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004A3704
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004A3704
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E1CFF0]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E20510]
Call 004EC355
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E1CFF0]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E181E0]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E181E0]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
And  [Eax+000020E0], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E20510]
Call 004EC355
Jmp  00930767

DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]

DD   004A3704

Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-01
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 009326E7 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 0097C43D
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 009326E7

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 009a8db6

00C8E0AC:
dd SpeedUp

00F872A9:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00C8E0AC: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 0097C43D // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00F872A9:
jmp 009a8db6

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-01

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],00985B05 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000424], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 0097C7BB
ret

00C8D894:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C8D894: // [5/10]
DD 0097C7BB // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-01
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008DCA50	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008C9843
Call R2
Jmp  008C9843
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004A4],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C8A104:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C8A104:   // [4/5]
DD 008C9843 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_降低損血量+怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.1 ICS 降低損血量
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-01
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)
Label(Normal)
Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)

RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 009238A9 // 6a 64 99 59 f7 f9 83 f8 ?? 0f 85 ?? 00 00 00 8b ce
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 00613F4E // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 00614148
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58]
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+58], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  008F9C92

00C8A19C:
DD   RHNFB
[DISABLE]
00C8A19C: // [1/1]
DD   008F9C92 // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74

Dealloc(RHNFB)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.1/TWMS150.1_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E1847C]+000070E4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 009856D5	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00C8DA10:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C8DA10:
dd 009856D5

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_CRC_AAFullMap.txt`:

```txt
//v150.2 真.全圖 By.aaaddress1.
alloc(SetMobXY,128)
alloc(SetNoDC,128)
SetMobXY:
lea ecx,[esi+00000634]
push 006149FD
push esi
push edi
mov edi,[esp+0c]
mov esi,[00e1847c]
mov esi,[esi+70e4] //X
sub esi,32
mov [edi],esi
push [edi]
mov esi,ecx
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 00426BFC
mov ecx,[00e1847c]
mov ecx,[ecx+70e8]//Y
mov [edi+04],ecx
jmp 00431471

SetNoDC:
lea ecx,[esi+00000634]
push 00614AFD
push esi
mov esi,ecx
push edi
lea ecx,[esi+0c]
call 0042717E
mov edi,[esp+0c]
mov [edi],ecx
mov eax,[edi]
mov ecx,esi
call 0042717E
mov [edi+04],01
mov eax,[edi+04]
db 5F 5E C2 04 00

00614AEB://8d 8e ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 75 03 6a 00 c3 [2/2]
jmp SetNoDC
nop
006149F2://8d 8e ? ? ? ? e8 ? ? ? ? 8b 86 ? ? ? ? 3b c3 74 1c [2/2]
jmp SetMobXY
nop
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_CRC_SafeTeleport.txt`:

```txt
//v150.2 防封KiKiTelePort瞬移 By.aaaddress1.
//小號在半空中連續順移五分鐘測試未紅.
alloc(KiKiTeleport,128)
alloc(XY,08)
alloc(Sw,04)
registersymbol(Sw)

XY:
Readmem([00E20700]+F98, 08)

Sw: //瞬移開關.
dd 01

KiKiTeleport:
cmp [Sw],ebx
je 0092F6AC
mov [esi+5F70],ebx // Switch
mov ebx,[ebp-10]
sub ebx,03E8
mov [esi+5F80],ebx // Y + 4
mov ebx,[XY+00]
mov [esi+5F78],ebx // X
mov ebx,[XY+04]
mov [esi+5F7C],ebx // Y
xor ebx,ebx
mov [Sw],ebx
jmp 0092F3ED

0092F3E1: // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 0F 84 ?? ?? 00 00 8B 86 ?? ?? 00 00 2B
jmp KiKiTeleport
nop
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00C80FE0] = 00867D59, End At 00867FA9
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0086324C

00867F25: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
00867F25:
db e8 22 b3 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_CRC_單機版.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 CRC 單機版
[ENABLE]              
alloc(scp,128)
registersymbol(scp)

scp:
mov eax,ff
push eax
call 0094a8af
jmp 005216fa


005213C9: // 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E9 ?? ?? 00 00 8D 90 ?? ?? FF FF 83 FA
jmp scp
nop
[DISABLE]
005213C9:
db 50 E8 E0 94 42 00

dealloc(scp)
unregistersymbol(scp)
```

```txt
// 150.2 快速挖礦
[Enable]
//Bypass Timestamp
00900077: // 7C ?? 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 7F 03
db 90 90

//Bypass Slash-limit
0090007F:
db EB

//Bypass time between mines
009099DF: // 75 0E 57 6A
db 90 90
[Disable]
00900077:
db 7C 31

0090007F:
db 7F

009099DF:
db 75 0e
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_DATA_Packet.txt`:

```txt
// 開啟商店
69 00 00 1D 00 00 [X*2] [Y*2]
69 00 00 1D 00 00 C3 02 8F FF // 黃金海岸商店
69 00 64 1A 00 00 3A FE E2 FF // 倉庫
69 00 FD 37 00 00 A7 00 C2 00 // 神木村商店

// 離開商店
6C 00 03

// 賣物
6C 00 [00=買,01=賣] [第幾格*2] [ItemID*04] [Count*2]
6C 00 01 01 00 80 84 1E 00 01 00 // 紅色藥水 @ 1 * 1
6C 00 01 02 00 80 84 1E 00 01 00 // 紅色藥水 @ 2 * 1
6C 00 01 01 00 A6 05 10 00 01 00 // 黑十字鎖子甲 @ 1 * 1
6C 00 01 01 00 36 8C 3D 00 01 00 // 小橘子片 @ 1 * 1

// 買物
6C 00 [00=買,01=賣] [Position*2] [ID*4] [Count*2] [Price*4]
6C 00 00 00 00 80 84 1E 00 01 00 05 00 00 00 // 紅色藥水 @ 1 * 1
6C 00 00 00 00 80 84 1E 00 02 00 05 00 00 00 // 紅色藥水 @ 1 * 2
6C 00 00 01 00 81 84 1E 00 01 00 30 00 00 00 // 橘色藥水 @ 2 * 1



// 商店資料

// 黃金海岸商店
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_DATA_封包相關位址.txt`:

```txt
ECX		// 00E1856C // 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 FF
發送	// 004965d2
接收	// 00496D90 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B ?? 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 8D

// 快速發包 // FF 74 24 04 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3
004262E3 - ff 74 24 04                - push [esp+04]
004262E7 - 8b 0d 6c 85 e1 00          - mov ecx,[00e1856c] : 00000000
004262ED - e8 e0 02 07 00             - call 004965d2
004262F2 - c3                         - ret

00F17604 - 0F85 65B9FCFF - jne 00EE2F6F // ThreadId Bypass-> jmp

01008305 - 64 A1 18000000        - mov eax,fs:[00000018]	// TEB
0100830B - E8 481FFCFF           - call 00FCA258
00FCA258 - 66 0FBE C9            - movsx cx,cl
00FCA25C - 59                    - pop ecx
00FCA25D - 8B 80 B8060000        - mov eax,[eax+000006B8]	// TID

// TID Bypass
Mov Eax,fs:[18]
Push [Eax+000006B8]

Push [TID]
Pop  [Eax+000006B8]

Pop  [Eax+000006B8]

// Read Out TID
00FCA29B - E8 ADB74CFF           - call 00495A4D
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_DATA_損血CALL.txt`:

```txt
//v150.2 死亡逃獄 
//原創:貌似是冒險島俠侶
//Fixed By. aaaddress1
Alloc(LoseHP, 256)
Alloc(Hook,64)

LoseHP:
pushad
mov ecx,[00E1847C]
push 01
push 01
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push 00
push #01 // 單次扣血量 
call 00921C61
popad
ret

Hook:
cmp [esp],0088EF6F
jne PtInRect
call LoseHP
jmp PtInRect

00E25E64:
dd Hook
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_DATA_物品陣列.txt`:

```txt
// 55 8B EC 51 51 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 53 56 57
// 第三個CALL
void __declspec(naked) __stdcall (*ItemList)(int type, int DB01, int DB00);
DB   0x55                                                   //009D7D4D - push ebp
DB   0x8b,0xec                                              //009D7D4E - mov ebp,esp
DB   0x51                                                   //009D7D50 - push ecx
DB   0x51                                                   //009D7D51 - push ecx
DB   0x8b,0x0d,0xe0,0x81,0xe1,0x00                          //009D7D52 - mov ecx,[00e181e0] : 00E2AB58
DB   0x53                                                   //009D7D58 - push ebx
DB   0x56                                                   //009D7D59 - push esi
DB   0x57                                                   //009D7D5A - push edi
DB   0x8d,0x45,0xf8                                         //009D7D5B - lea eax,[ebp-08]
DB   0x50                                                   //009D7D5E - push eax
Mov  Eax,0x00422812                                         //009D7D5F - call 00422812
Call Eax                                                    //
DB   0x8b,0x70,0x04                                         //009D7D64 - mov esi,[eax+04]
DB   0x8d,0x4d,0xf8                                         //009D7D67 - lea ecx,[ebp-08]
Mov  Eax,0x0042189f                                         //009D7D6A - call 0042189f
Call Eax                                                    //
DB   0x8b,0x45,0x08                                         //009D7D6F - mov eax,[ebp+08]
DB   0x99                                                   //009D7D72 - cdq
DB   0xb9,0x40,0x42,0x0f,0x00                               //009D7D73 - mov ecx,000f4240
DB   0xf7,0xf9                                              //009D7D78 - idiv ecx
DB   0xff,0x75,0x10                                         //009D7D7A - push [ebp+10]
DB   0x8b,0x3d,0xe4,0x81,0xe1,0x00                          //009D7D7D - mov edi,[00e181e4] : 00000000
DB   0xff,0x75,0x0c                                         //009D7D83 - push [ebp+0c]
DB   0x8b,0xce                                              //009D7D86 - mov ecx,esi
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //009D7D88 - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x50                                                   //009D7D8B - push eax
Call FakeCall
DB   0x8b,0xd8                                              //009D7D91 - mov ebx,eax
DB   0x0f,0xb6,0x45,0x0c                                    //009D7D93 - movzx eax,byte ptr [ebp+0c]
DB   0x50                                                   //009D7D97 - push eax
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //009D7D98 - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x8b,0xcf                                              //009D7D9B - mov ecx,edi
DB   0x56                                                   //009D7D9D - push esi
Mov  Eax,0x005a51b1                                         //009D7D9E - call 005a51b1
Call Eax                                                    //
DB   0x5f                                                   //009D7DA3 - pop edi
DB   0x5e                                                   //009D7DA4 - pop esi
DB   0x03,0xc3                                              //009D7DA5 - add eax,ebx
DB   0x5b                                                   //009D7DA7 - pop ebx
DB   0xc9                                                   //009D7DA8 - leave
DB   0xc2,0x0c,0x00                                         //009D7DA9 - ret 000c











long Doggy_00a169e9 = 0x00a169e9;long Doggy_004268e7 = 0x004268e7;long Doggy_004273dc = 0x004273dc;long Doggy_00426cba = 0x00426cba;long Doggy_0042717e = 0x0042717e;long Doggy_0059f97e = 0x0059f97e;long Doggy_004cfff3 = 0x004cfff3;long Doggy_00a16ac1 = 0x00a16ac1;

DB   0x6a,0x14                                              //004D09F1 - push 14
DB   0xb8,0xc9,0x51,0xa5,0x00                               //004D09F3 - mov eax,00a551c9
Call Doggy_00a169e9                                         //004D09F8 - call 00a169e9
DB   0x8b,0xf9                                              //004D09FD - mov edi,ecx
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //004D09FF - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x83,0x65,0xf0,0x00                                    //004D0A02 - and dword ptr [ebp-10],00
Call Doggy_004268e7                                         //004D0A06 - call 004268e7
DB   0x33,0xdb                                              //004D0A0B - xor ebx,ebx
DB   0x43                                                   //004D0A0D - inc ebx
DB   0x3b,0xc3                                              //004D0A0E - cmp eax,ebx
DB   0x89,0x45,0xec                                         //004D0A10 - mov [ebp-14],eax
// 在這裡保存欄位數量 (Eax)
jnge Doggy004d0a63                                          //004D0A13 - jnge 004d0a63
Doggy004d0a15:
DB   0x6a,0x00                                              //004D0A15 - push 00
DB   0x53                                                   //004D0A17 - push ebx
DB   0xff,0x75,0x08                                         //004D0A18 - push [ebp+08]
DB   0x8d,0x45,0xe0                                         //004D0A1B - lea eax,[ebp-20]
DB   0x50                                                   //004D0A1E - push eax
DB   0x8b,0xcf                                              //004D0A1F - mov ecx,edi
Call Doggy_004273dc                                         //004D0A21 - call 004273dc
DB   0x8b,0x70,0x04                                         //004D0A26 - mov esi,[eax+04]
DB   0x8d,0x4d,0xe0                                         //004D0A29 - lea ecx,[ebp-20]
Call Doggy_00426cba                                         //004D0A2C - call 00426cba
DB   0x85,0xf6                                              //004D0A31 - test esi,esi
je Doggy004d0a5d                                            //004D0A33 - je 004d0a5d
DB   0x80,0x7d,0x10,0x00                                    //004D0A35 - cmp byte ptr [ebp+10],00
jne Doggy004d0a46                                           //004D0A39 - jne 004d0a46
DB   0x8b,0x06                                              //004D0A3B - mov eax,[esi]
DB   0x8b,0xce                                              //004D0A3D - mov ecx,esi
DB   0xff,0x50,0x08                                         //004D0A3F - call dword ptr [eax+08]
DB   0x85,0xc0                                              //004D0A42 - test eax,eax
jne Doggy004d0a5d                                           //004D0A44 - jne 004d0a5d
Doggy004d0a46:
DB   0x8d,0x4e,0x0c                                         //004D0A46 - lea ecx,[esi+0c]
Call Doggy_0042717e                                         //004D0A49 - call 0042717e
// 在這裡保存ID (Eax)
DB   0x8b,0x06                                              //004D0A53 - mov eax,[esi]
DB   0x8b,0xce                                              //004D0A55 - mov ecx,esi
DB   0xff,0x50,0x4c                                         //004D0A57 - call dword ptr [eax+4c]
DB   0x01,0x45,0xf0                                         //004D0A5A - add [ebp-10],eax
// 在這裡保存數量 (Eax)
Doggy004d0a5d:
DB   0x43                                                   //004D0A5D - inc ebx
DB   0x3b,0x5d,0xec                                         //004D0A5E - cmp ebx,[ebp-14]
jle Doggy004d0a15                                           //004D0A61 - jle 004d0a15
Doggy004d0a63:
DB   0x83,0x7d,0x14,0x00                                    //004D0A63 - cmp dword ptr [ebp+14],00
jne Doggy004d0ab6                                           //004D0A67 - jne 004d0ab6
DB   0xff,0x75,0x0c                                         //004D0A69 - push [ebp+0c]
DB   0x8b,0x0d,0xe4,0x81,0xe1,0x00                          //004D0A6C - mov ecx,[00e181e4] : 00000000
Call Doggy_0059f97e                                         //004D0A72 - call 0059f97e
DB   0x85,0xc0                                              //004D0A77 - test eax,eax
je Doggy004d0ab6                                            //004D0A79 - je 004d0ab6
DB   0x6a,0x01                                              //004D0A7B - push 01
DB   0x57                                                   //004D0A7D - push edi
DB   0xff,0x75,0x0c                                         //004D0A7E - push [ebp+0c]
DB   0x8d,0x45,0xe8                                         //004D0A81 - lea eax,[ebp-18]
DB   0x50                                                   //004D0A84 - push eax
Call Doggy_004cfff3                                         //004D0A85 - call 004cfff3
DB   0x83,0xc4,0x10                                         //004D0A8A - add esp,10
DB   0x8b,0x4d,0xec                                         //004D0A8D - mov ecx,[ebp-14]
DB   0x83,0x65,0xfc,0x00                                    //004D0A90 - and dword ptr [ebp-04],00
DB   0x85,0xc9                                              //004D0A94 - test ecx,ecx
je Doggy004d0aaa                                            //004D0A96 - je 004d0aaa
DB   0x80,0x7d,0x10,0x00                                    //004D0A98 - cmp byte ptr [ebp+10],00
jne Doggy004d0aa7                                           //004D0A9C - jne 004d0aa7
DB   0x8b,0x01                                              //004D0A9E - mov eax,[ecx]
DB   0xff,0x50,0x08                                         //004D0AA0 - call dword ptr [eax+08]
DB   0x85,0xc0                                              //004D0AA3 - test eax,eax
jne Doggy004d0aaa                                           //004D0AA5 - jne 004d0aaa
Doggy004d0aa7:
DB   0xff,0x45,0xf0                                         //004D0AA7 - inc [ebp-10]
Doggy004d0aaa:
DB   0x83,0x4d,0xfc,0xff                                    //004D0AAA - or dword ptr [ebp-04],ff
DB   0x8d,0x4d,0xe8                                         //004D0AAE - lea ecx,[ebp-18]
Call Doggy_00426cba                                         //004D0AB1 - call 00426cba
Doggy004d0ab6:
DB   0x8b,0x45,0xf0                                         //004D0AB6 - mov eax,[ebp-10]
Call Doggy_00a16ac1                                         //004D0AB9 - call 00a16ac1
DB   0xc2,0x10,0x00                                         //004D0ABE - ret 0010
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_人物動作控制.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 控制人物面向
// Auther: aaaddress1
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
[ENABLE]
alloc(ControlHumanSide,32)

ControlHumanSide:
//mov [ecx+000000DC],04 //動作
mov eax,[ecx+000000DC]
and eax,1
or eax,4
ret

00C8E144:
dd ControlHumanSide
[DISABLE]
00C8E144:
dd 0097C8C8
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 009895EC
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    009895EC
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   009898BF // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   009898BF
//-----------------------------------------------
00E25EC0:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00E25EC0:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 人物損血不退
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
// [c2 14 00]應該等於[c2 14 00]
[ENABLE]
00C8E10C:
DD 0097BBE3
[DISABLE]
00C8E10C: // [9/10]
DD 0097BBAA // [2/3] 55 8B EC 56 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06 FF 90
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_全圖撞擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 全圖撞擊
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07

[ENABLE]
Alloc(FullMapHit, 64)

FullMapHit:
Cmp [Esp], 00615A11  // 83 4d fc ff 8d 4d f0 85 c0
Jne IntersectRect
Xor Eax, Eax
Inc Eax, Eax
Ret 000C

00E25E88:
DD FullMapHit

[DISABLE]
00E25E88:
DD IntersectRect

DeAlloc(FullMapHit)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_單體多體.txt`:

```txt
//自動轉換攻擊模式
//自動調整單體或多體攻擊
[Enable]
alloc(HookK01,512)
label(DullK01)
label(DullK02)
label(DullK03)
label(xDukSubPro)
label(xDukSubPro1)
label(xDukSubPro2)
alloc(xDukCnt,4)
alloc(xDukCnt1,4)
alloc(xDukCnt2,4)
//============
xDukCnt:  //0.正常模式 1.限定全圖
dd 1
xDukCnt1:  //計值用,勿改
dd 0
xDukCnt2:  //計值用,勿改
dd 0
//============
HookK01:
  cmp [esp],00615fB8
  jne IntersectRect
  mov [esp],DullK01
  jmp IntersectRect
//============
DullK01:
  add eax,[xDukCnt]
  test eax,eax
  je 00615FBC
  mov eax,[ebp+0c]
  mov ecx,[ebp-10]
  call xDukSubPro

DullK02:
  mov [eax+ecx*4],ebx
  inc ecx
  inc [xDukCnt2]
  push eax
  mov eax,[xDukCnt2]
  cmp eax,[xDukCnt1]
  pop eax
  jge DullK03
  cmp ecx,[ebp+10]
  jl DullK02

DullK03:
  mov [xDukCnt2],0
  mov [ebp-10],ecx
  jmp 00615FD0

xDukSubPro:
  pushad
  //====取得怪物數量
  mov eax,[00E1CABC]
  mov eax,[eax+24]
  sub eax,1  //扣除角色
  //====
  cmp eax,[ebp+10]
  mov [xDukCnt1],1
  jge xDukSubPro2
  cmp eax,1
  jge xDukSubPro1
  mov eax,1

xDukSubPro1:
  mov ecx,eax
  mov eax,[ebp+10]
  xor edx,edx
  div ecx
  mov [xDukCnt1],eax
  
xDukSubPro2:
  popad
  ret
//============
00e25e88:
dd HookK01
//============
[Disable]
00e25e88:
dd IntersectRect
//============
dealloc(xDukCnt2)
dealloc(xDukCnt1)
dealloc(xDukCnt)
dealloc(HookK01
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_怪物不放輔助.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 怪物不放輔助
[enable]
Alloc(MobSkillHook,32)

00DFCA4C:
DD MobSkillHook

MobSkillHook:
cmp [esp+3C],00607E4B
jne 0072C5C5
mov [esp+3C],00607E8D
jmp 0072C5C5

[disable]
00DFCA4C:
DD 0072C5C5

DeAlloc(MobSkillHook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_攻擊不顯示傷害.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 攻擊不顯示傷害
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
// 00613348 - call dword ptr [eax+50]
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Hook, 32)

Hook:
Cmp  [Ebp+04], 00613C42 // 8d 45 cc 50 8b cb e8 ?? ?? ff ff ff
Jne  008F9CC7 // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74
Mov  [Ebp+20], 38FFFFFF
Jmp  008F9CC7

00C8A1A4:
DD   Hook
[DISABLE]
00C8A1A4: // [1/1]
DD   008F9CC7

Dealloc(Hook)
```

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 標彈箭控制
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],00921CB3 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E1CFF0] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 00931B33 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],009240A1 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 00931B33
ret

00C8A164:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00C8A164: // [1/1]
DD 00931B33 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00922C4C // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00981B64 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00982F03 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 00610723 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0072C5C5
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   0092319B // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+48], #30000
Jmp  009231C7
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  00981B79 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00982F17           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00982F0E           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00982F0A           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   00610736           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0061073A           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  00610723
//------------------------------
00DFCA4C:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00DFCA4C:
DD   0072C5C5

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 00930794 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004A3706
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004A3706
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E1CFF0]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E20510]
Call 004EC357
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E1CFF0]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E181E0]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E181E0]
And  [Eax+000020DC], 0
And  [Eax+000020E0], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E20510]
Call 004EC357
Jmp  0093079C

00C8A130:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]

DD   004A3706
```
