`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 0093271C // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 0097C472
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 0093271C

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
pushad
push 010A4474
jmp 0106f0c6

00C8E0B4:
dd SpeedUp

010A446E:
jmp HookTime
nop

[disable]
00C8E0B4: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 0097C472 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

010A446E: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
DB 60 e8 52 ac fc ff

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],00985B3A // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000424], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 0097C7F0
ret

00C8D89C:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00C8D89C: // [5/10]
DD 0097C7F0 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 008DCA85	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008C9878
Call R2
Jmp  008C9878
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004A4],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00C8A10C:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00C8A10C:   // [4/5]
DD 008C9878 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

```txt
// TWMS150.2 ICS 降低損血量
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-11-07
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)
Label(Normal)
Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)

RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 009238DE // 6a 64 99 59 f7 f9 83 f8 ?? 0f 85 ?? 00 00 00 8b ce
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 00613F50 // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 0061414A
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58]
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+58], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  008F9CC7

00C8A1A4:
DD   RHNFB
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS150.2/TWMS150.2_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E1847C]+000070E4, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 0098570A	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00C8DA18:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00C8DA18:
dd 0098570A

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

```txt
// 55 8B EC 51 51 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 53 56 57
// 第三個CALL
void __declspec(naked) __stdcall (*ItemList)(int type, int DB01, int DB00);
00A1B185 - 55                         - push ebp
00A1B186 - 8b ec                      - mov ebp,esp
00A1B188 - 51                         - push ecx
00A1B189 - 51                         - push ecx
00A1B18A - 8b 0d a0 d7 e8 00          - mov ecx,[00e8d7a0] : 00EA20C0
00A1B190 - 53                         - push ebx
00A1B191 - 56                         - push esi
00A1B192 - 57                         - push edi

00A1B196 - 50                         - push eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_人物損血不退.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 人物損血不退
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-09
// [c2 14 00]應該等於[c2 14 00]
[ENABLE]
00CF58EC:
DD 009B9DB1
[DISABLE]

DD 009B9D78 // [2/3] 55 8B EC 56 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06 FF 90
```

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0094D24F - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0094D266 - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0094D27D - 89 85 e0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000220],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0094D3B8 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000224], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000220], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  0052F227

00C71908:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-09

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],0095AAA4 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E92390] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 0096C52B // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],0095CFF9 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 0096C52B
ret

00CF18BC:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00CF18BC: // [1/1]
DD 0096C52B // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0095BB65 // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 009BFDEB // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 009C11A0 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0062B31C // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0074B5EF
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   0095C0C2 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+3C], #30000
Jmp  0095C0EE
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  009BFE00 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   009C11B4           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   009C11AB           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  009C11A7           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0062B32F           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0062B333           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0062B31C
//------------------------------
00E71014:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00E71014:
DD   0074B5EF

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 0096B0EE // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004AC763
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004AC763
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E92390]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E96098]
Call 004F923D
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E92390]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E8D7A0]
And  [Eax+000020E4], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E8D7A0]
And  [Eax+000020E4], 0
And  [Eax+000020E8], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E96098]
Call 004F923D
Jmp  0096B0F6

00CF1888:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00CF1888:
DD   004AC763

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-09
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 0096D3C3 // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 009BA64E
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 0096D3C3

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00CF5894:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00CF5894: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 009BA64E // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-09

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],009C3DD7 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000488], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 009BA9CC
ret

00CF505C:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00CF505C: // [5/10]
DD 009BA9CC // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-09
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0090F43A	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008FA029
Call R2
Jmp  008FA029
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004B8],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00CF1864:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00CF1864:   // [4/5]
DD 008FA029 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.1/TWMS151.1_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E8DA4C]+00007928, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 009C39A7	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00CF51D8:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00CF51D8:
dd 009C39A7

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_CRC_AAFullMap.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 CRC AAFullMap
// by.aaaddress1.
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FullMap, 128)

FullMap:
db 56 57 8b 7c 24 0c

pushad
mov ecx, [00E8DA4C] // Char Base
add ecx, 04
push edi
call 004AC765
popad

jmp 00432FC4 // push [edi]

0062F7C0: // [2/2] // e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8b 86 ?? ?? ?? ?? 3b c3 74 1c
Call FullMap

0062F8C0: // Bypass // [2/2] // 75 03 6A 00 C3
db eb
[DISABLE]
0062F7C0:
call 00432fbe

0062F8C0: // Bypass
db 75

Dealloc(FullMap)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00CE8508] = 00897EDA, End At 008F684E
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-10
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 0089433B

008980A6: // [5/5] E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC ?? 8B CC 89 65 ?? 68 00 01 00 00 68 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008980A6:
db e8 90 c2 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

```txt
[Enable]
//Bypass Timestamp
00936425: // 7C ?? 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 7F 03
db 90 90

//Bypass Slash-limit
0093642D:
db EB

//Bypass time between mines
0094053B: // 75 0E 57 6A
db 90 90
[Disable]

db 7C 31

0093642D:

0094053B:
db 75 0e
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_DATA_怪物走動.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 怪物走向資料

// 跳怪走向固定
009C0EA3:
Ret

// 走怪走向固定
009C0A93:
Ret



// 底下的CALL進去之後會決定怪物走向，直接jmp 009c3cf1就維持走向
// 所以怪物走向先改0
009C3C89 - 8b 86 a8 02 00 00          - mov eax,[esi+000002a8] // MonsterType
009C3C8F - 2b c3                      - sub eax,ebx
009C3C91 - 74 46                      - je 009c3cd9 // Type == 0
009C3C93 - 48                         - dec eax
009C3C94 - 74 3a                      - je 009c3cd0 // Type == 1
009C3C96 - 48                         - dec eax
009C3C97 - 48                         - dec eax
009C3C98 - 74 2d                      - je 009c3cc7 // Type == 3
009C3C9A - 48                         - dec eax
009C3C9B - 74 1a                      - je 009c3cb7 // Type == 4
009C3C9D - 48                         - dec eax
009C3C9E - 48                         - dec eax
009C3C9F - 74 0d                      - je 009c3cae // Type == 6
009C3CA1 - 48                         - dec eax
009C3CA2 - 48                         - dec eax
009C3CA3 - 75 4c                      - jne 009c3cf1 // Type != 9
009C3CA5 - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi // Type == 9
009C3CA7 - e8 0a d0 ff ff             - call 009c0cb6
009C3CAC - eb 43                      - jmp 009c3cf1
009C3CAE - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
009C3CB0 - e8 17 d6 ff ff             - call 009c12cc
009C3CB5 - eb 3a                      - jmp 009c3cf1
009C3CB7 - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
009C3CB9 - e8 6e da ff ff             - call 009c172c
009C3CBE - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
009C3CC0 - e8 a4 f7 ff ff             - call 009c3469
009C3CC5 - eb 2a                      - jmp 009c3cf1
009C3CC7 - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
009C3CC9 - e8 d5 d1 ff ff             - call 009c0ea3 // 處理跳怪
009C3CCE - eb 21                      - jmp 009c3cf1
009C3CD0 - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
009C3CD2 - e8 bc cd ff ff             - call 009c0a93
009C3CD7 - eb 18                      - jmp 009c3cf1
009C3CD9 - 8b ce                      - mov ecx,esi
009C3CDB - e8 e1 cb ff ff             - call 009c08c1
009C3CE0 - eb 0f                      - jmp 009c3cf1



// 處理跳怪
009C0EA3 - 55                         - push ebp
009C0EA4 - 8b ec                      - mov ebp,esp
009C0EA6 - 83 ec 10                   - sub esp,10
009C0EA9 - 56                         - push esi
009C0EAA - 57                         - push edi
009C0EAB - 8b f1                      - mov esi,ecx
009C0EAD - 33 ff                      - xor edi,edi
009C0EAF - 39 be bc 00 00 00          - cmp [esi+000000bc],edi
009C0EB5 - 74 0f                      - je 009c0ec6
009C0EB7 - 8d 4e 10                   - lea ecx,[esi+10]
009C0EBA - 8b 01                      - mov eax,[ecx]
009C0EBC - 57                         - push edi
009C0EBD - 57                         - push edi
009C0EBE - ff 50 3c                   - call dword ptr [eax+3c]
009C0EC1 - e9 f8 03 00 00             - jmp 009c12be
009C0EC6 - a1 00 20 e9 00             - mov eax,[00e92000] : 06BA64FC
009C0ECB - 89 45 f4                   - mov [ebp-0c],eax
009C0ECE - e8 3a 8a ff ff             - call 009b990d
009C0ED3 - 85 c0                      - test eax,eax
009C0ED5 - 0f 84 d8 03 00 00          - je 009c12b3
009C0EDB - 53                         - push ebx
009C0EDC - 8d 9e 64 06 00 00          - lea ebx,[esi+00000664]
009C0EE2 - 8b 0b                      - mov ecx,[ebx]
009C0EE4 - e8 ff ad c5 ff             - call 0061bce8
009C0EE9 - 85 c0                      - test eax,eax
009C0EEB - 74 42                      - je 009c0f2f
009C0EED - 8b 0b                      - mov ecx,[ebx]
009C0EEF - 57                         - push edi
009C0EF0 - e8 46 8b c0 ff             - call 005c9a3b
009C0EF5 - 39 be fc 00 00 00          - cmp [esi+000000fc],edi
009C0EFB - 74 32                      - je 009c0f2f
009C0EFD - 8b 8e 68 06 00 00          - mov ecx,[esi+00000668]
009C0F03 - e8 c7 7a a6 ff             - call 004289cf
009C0F08 - dd 46 30                   - fld qword ptr [esi+30]
009C0F0B - 51                         - push ecx
009C0F0C - 51                         - push ecx
009C0F0D - dd 1c 24                   - fstp qword ptr [esp]
009C0F10 - 8b d8                      - mov ebx,eax
009C0F12 - e8 6e 67 b3 ff             - call 004f7685
009C0F17 - 59                         - pop ecx
009C0F18 - 59                         - pop ecx
009C0F19 - 3b c3                      - cmp eax,ebx
009C0F1B - 75 12                      - jne 009c0f2f
009C0F1D - 8b 96 fc 00 00 00          - mov edx,[esi+000000fc]
009C0F23 - 8d 4e 10                   - lea ecx,[esi+10]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_人物動作控制.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
// TWMS151.2 ICS 控制人物面向
// Auther: aaaddress1
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16
alloc(ControlHumanSide,32)

ControlHumanSide:
mov eax,[ecx+000000DC]
ret

00CF5924:
dd ControlHumanSide
[DISABLE]
00CF5924:
dd 009BAB2D
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 009C79FF
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    009C79FF
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-08], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   009C7CFE // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-08], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   009C7CFE
//-----------------------------------------------
00E9C5F0:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00E9C5F0:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_人物損血不退.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 人物損血不退
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16
// [c2 14 00]應該等於[c2 14 00]
[ENABLE]
00CF58EC:
DD 009B9E3A
[DISABLE]
00CF58EC: // [9/10]
DD 009B9E01 // [2/3] 55 8B EC 56 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06 FF 90
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_全圖撞擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 全圖撞擊
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16

[ENABLE]
Alloc(FullMapHit, 64)

FullMapHit:
Cmp [Esp], 00630874  // 83 4d fc ff 8d 4d f0 85 c0
Jne IntersectRect
Xor Eax, Eax
Inc Eax, Eax
Ret 000C

00E9C5B8:
DD FullMapHit

[DISABLE]
00E9C5B8:
DD IntersectRect

DeAlloc(FullMapHit)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_攻擊不顯示傷害.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 攻擊不顯示傷害
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16
// 0062E001 - call dword ptr [eax+50]
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Hook, 32)

Hook:
Cmp  [Ebp+04], 0062E998 // 8d 45 cc 50 8b cb e8 ?? ?? ff ff ff
Jne  00930231 // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74
Mov  [Ebp+20], 38FFFFFF
Jmp  00930231

00CF18FC:
DD   Hook
[DISABLE]
00CF18FC: // [1/1]
DD   00930231

Dealloc(Hook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_標彈箭控制.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0094D2D8 - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0094D2EF - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0094D306 - 89 85 e0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000220],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0094D441 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000224], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000220], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  0052F229

00C71908:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00C71908: // [1/1]
DD  0052F229 // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04

Dealloc(UnlimitedWeapon)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],0095AB2D // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00E92390] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 0096C5B4 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],0095D082 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 0096C5B4
ret

00CF18BC:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00CF18BC: // [1/1]
DD 0096C5B4 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 0095BBEE // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 009BFE74 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 009C1229 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0062B31E // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0074B5F1
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+58]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   0095C14B // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+58], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+4C]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+3C], #30000
Jmp  0095C177
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002C0]
Jmp  009BFE89 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   009C123D           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   009C1234           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  009C1230           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0062B331           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0062B335           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0062B31E
//------------------------------
00E71014:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00E71014:
DD   0074B5F1

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 0096B177 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004AC765
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004AC765
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E92390]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00E96098]
Call 004F923F
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00E92390]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00E8D7A0]
And  [Eax+000020E4], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00E8D7A0]
And  [Eax+000020E4], 0
And  [Eax+000020E8], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00E96098]
Call 004F923F
Jmp  0096B17F

00CF1888:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00CF1888:
DD   004AC765

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 0096D44C // 8B 83 ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 009BA6D7
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 0096D44C

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp 009e9756

00CF5894:
dd SpeedUp

00FE4541:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00CF5894: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 009BA6D7 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

00FE4541:
jmp 009e9756

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],009C3E60 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002B0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000488], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 009BAA55
ret

00CF505C:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00CF505C: // [5/10]
DD 009BAA55 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS151.2 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2012-12-16
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0090F4C3	// 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 ?? 57
Jne  008FA02B
Call R2
Jmp  008FA02B
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004B8],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00CF1864:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00CF1864:   // [4/5]
DD 008FA02B // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS151.2/TWMS151.2_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00E8DA4C]+00007928, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002A8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006A4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 009C3A30	// 55 8B EC 51 53 56 57 FF 75 08
Ret

00CF51D8:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00CF51D8:
dd 009C3A30

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00DB2F98] = 008DF7FD, End At 008DFA53
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-20
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 008DB357

008DF9C9: // +4 // 57 FF 75 ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008DF9C9:
db e8 89 b9 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00A1D1F0
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00A1D1F0
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1D534 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1D534
//-----------------------------------------------
00F7D268:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00F7D268:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_吸怪.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
GlobalAlloc(MobVacSwitch, 4)
GlobalAlloc(VacXY, 8)
Alloc(MobVac, 1024)
Label(SetXY)
Label(TestRoutine)
Label(__MobVac)
Label(Return)
Label(StartVac)

MobVac:
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0064DF8D // [1/4] 最後一個CALL // 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 28 00
Jne  GetProcessHeap
Mov  [Esp+34], TestRoutine
Jmp  GetProcessHeap

TestRoutine:
Mov  Eax, [MobVacSwitch]
Dec  Eax
Je   SetXY      // 1
Dec  Eax
Je   __MobVac   // 2
Jmp  Return

SetXY:
Pushad
Push VacXY
Mov  Ecx, [00F6C8DC]
Add  Ecx, 04
Call 004B5238
Popad
Sub  [VacXY+04], 5
Mov  [MobVacSwitch], 2
Jmp  __MobVac

__MobVac:
Cmp  [Esi+000002B8], 01
Je   StartVac
Cmp  [Esi+000002B8], 03
Je   StartVac
Jmp  Return

StartVac:
Cmp  [Esi+04], 0
Jg   Return
Inc  [Esi+04]
Pushad
Mov  Eax, Esi
Mov  Ebx, Eax
Mov  Ecx, Ebx
Add  Eax, 10
Add  Ecx, 10
Mov  Edi, [Eax]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [VacXY+4]
Push [VacXY]
Push 06
Call dword ptr [Edi+00000088] // ff ?? ?? 00 00 00 8b ?? ?? ?? 00 00 83 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 00 74
Popad
Jmp  Return

Return:
Jmp  0064DF8D

00F7D0B4:
DD   MobVac
[DISABLE]
00F7D0B4:
DD   GetProcessHeap

Dealloc(MobVac)
```

```txt
//
// 無形之箭  	0099D048 - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0099D05F - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-20

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],009B9D52 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00F71328] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 009BEA04 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],009BC478 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 009BEA04
ret

00DBCD1C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00DBCD1C: // [1/1]
DD 009BEA04 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
// 152.1掛了
// Cmp  [Esp+1C], %GodIcsRet% // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
// Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A155A6 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A16935 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0064BBC5 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0077B5B8
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+50]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   009BB4AE // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+50], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+40]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+08], #30000
Jmp  009B71BE
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002D0]
Jmp  00A155BB // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00A16949           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00A16940           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00A1693C           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0064BBD8           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0064BBDC           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0064BBC5
//------------------------------
00F4EE24:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00F4EE24:
DD   0077B5B8

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(Pick)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 009B9118 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Je   Pick
Cmp  [Esp], 009B80D3 // 8B 4D ?? 50 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 07 8d 4d ?? 51
Je   Pick
Jmp  004B5238

Pick:
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004B5238
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 0050669E
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
And  [Eax+000020F4], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 0050669E
Jmp  009B9120 // Jmp 009B920B

00DBCCE8:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00DBCCE8:
DD   004B5238

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-20
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 009BEF59 // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00A0FCE2
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 009BEF59

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00DC0E2C:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00DC0E2C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00A0FCE2 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_讓180帳號開凱薩領套裝.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 發送封包 / 讓180帳號開凱薩領套裝
// 
// 說明：用180的帳號開凱薩，打勾此數據，SendPacketSwitch改成不為0就會領取了
// 
// 領凱薩套裝
// [Out]   8A8779 | 61 | 21 02 BA C9 01 00 01 00 00 00 CD 17 25 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 05 BB 46 E6 17 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 9D FF FF FF 9D FF FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 01
// 領角色擴充
// [Out]   8A8779 | 61 | 21 02 BB C9 01 00 01 00 00 00 B1 DB 23 00 01 00 00 00 C0 4E 00 00 00 80 05 BB 46 E6 17 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 9D FF FF FF 9D FF FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 01
[ENABLE]
Alloc(SendPacket, 256)
Alloc(Hook,128)
Alloc(SendPacketSwitch, 4)
Alloc(Packet, 512)
Alloc(Length, 4)
RegisterSymbol(SendPacketSwitch)
RegisterSymbol(Packet)
RegisterSymbol(Length)

Packet:
// 凱薩套裝
// DB 21 02 BA C9 01 00 01 00 00 00 CD 17 25 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 05 BB 46 E6 17 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 9D FF FF FF 9D FF FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 01
// 角色擴充
// DB 21 02 BB C9 01 00 01 00 00 00 B1 DB 23 00 01 00 00 00 C0 4E 00 00 00 80 05 BB 46 E6 17 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 9D FF FF FF 9D FF FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 01

Length:
DD #61

SendPacketSwitch:
DD 0

SendPacket:
Pushad
Push 00
Push [Length]
Push Packet
Push 00
Push Esp
Call 0042810A
Add  Esp, 14
Popad
Ret

Hook:
cmp [esp],004010D1
jne 0077B5B8
cmp [SendPacketSwitch],0
je 0077B5B8
mov [SendPacketSwitch],0
call SendPacket
jmp 0077B5B8

00f4ee24:
dd Hook
[DISABLE]
00f4ee24:
dd 0077B5B8

Dealloc(SendPacket)
Dealloc(Hook
UnregisterSymbol(SendPacketSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(Packet)
UnregisterSymbol(Length)
Dealloc(SendPacketSwitch)
Dealloc(Packet)
Dealloc(Length)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-20

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],00A19624 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002C0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000490], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 00A10083
ret

00DC05D4:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00DC05D4: // [5/10]
DD 00A10083 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-20
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0095B955	// 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 08
Jne  00944C9A
Call R2
Jmp  00944C9A
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004D0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBCCC4:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBCCC4:   // [4/5]
DD 00944C9A // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_降低損血量+怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.1 ICS 降低損血量+怪物不反擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-20
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)
Label(Normal)
Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)

RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 009BB028 // [3/6] + 7 // 8b 03 8b cb ff 50 ?? 6a 64 99 59 f7 f9 83 f8
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 00650453 // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 00650718
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58]
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+58], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  0097E778

00DBCD5C:
DD   RHNFB
[DISABLE]

DD   0097E778 // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.1/TWMS152.1_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00F6C8DC]+00007F88, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006B4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 00A1913C	// 55 8B EC 83 EC 0C 53 56 57 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06
Ret

00DC0758:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00DC0758:
dd 00A1913C

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_CRC_AAFullMap.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 CRC AAFullMap
// by.aaaddress1.
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AAFullMap, 128)

AAFullMap:
db 56 57 8b 7c 24 0c

pushad
mov ecx, [00F6C8DC] // Char Base
add ecx, 04
push edi
call 004B5242 // 寫入XY到 [Edi], [Edi+04]
popad

jmp 00435217 // push [edi]

00651029: // [2/2] // e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8b 86 ?? ?? ?? ?? 3b c3 74 1c
Call AAFullMap

00651120: // Bypass // [2/2] // 75 03 6A 00 C3
db eb
[DISABLE]
00651029:
call 00435211

00651120: // Bypass
db 75

Dealloc(AAFullMap)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00DB2F58] = 008DF80F, End At 008DFA65
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 008DB369

008DF9DB: // +4 // 57 FF 75 ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008DF9DB:
db e8 89 b9 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_CRC_技能無延遲.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(SuperNoDelay, 128)
Label(IsSkill)
Label(Return)

SuperNoDelay:
Push Esi
Push 01
Mov  Esi, Ecx
Call 00412CAF
Mov  Ecx, [Esi+08]
Mov  Eax, [Esi+04]
Mov  Dl, [Esp+08]

Cmp  word ptr [Eax], 0057
Je   IsSkill
Cmp  word ptr [Eax], 0058
Je   IsSkill
Cmp  word ptr [Eax], 0059
Je   IsSkill
Cmp  word ptr [Eax], 005A
Je   IsSkill

Return:
Jmp  00412D01

IsSkill:
Cmp  Ecx, 13
Jl   Return
Cmp  Ecx, 17
Jg   Return

Or   Dl, 04
Jmp  Return

00412CED:
Jmp  SuperNoDelay

0095B81E:
Ret  0010
DB   90 90 90 90
[DISABLE]
00412CED:
DB   56 6A 01 8B F1

0095B81E:
DB   6A 00 B8 79 25 BA 00

Dealloc(SuperNoDelay)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00A1D2D4
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00A1D2D4
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1D618 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1D618
//-----------------------------------------------
00F7D268:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00F7D268:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_吸怪.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
GlobalAlloc(MobVacSwitch, 4)
GlobalAlloc(VacXY, 8)
Alloc(MobVac, 1024)
Label(SetXY)
Label(TestRoutine)
Label(__MobVac)
Label(Return)
Label(StartVac)

MobVac:
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0064DEE8 // [1/4] 最後一個CALL // 8D 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C2 28 00
Jne  GetProcessHeap
Mov  [Esp+34], TestRoutine
Jmp  GetProcessHeap

TestRoutine:
Mov  Eax, [MobVacSwitch]
Dec  Eax
Je   SetXY      // 1
Dec  Eax
Je   __MobVac   // 2
Jmp  Return

SetXY:
Pushad
Push VacXY
Mov  Ecx, [00F6C8DC]
Add  Ecx, 04
Call 004B5242
Popad
Sub  [VacXY+04], 5
Mov  [MobVacSwitch], 2
Jmp  __MobVac

__MobVac:
Cmp  [Esi+000002B8], 01
Je   StartVac
Cmp  [Esi+000002B8], 03
Je   StartVac
Jmp  Return

StartVac:
Cmp  [Esi+04], 0
Jg   Return
Inc  [Esi+04]
Pushad
Mov  Eax, Esi
Mov  Ebx, Eax
Mov  Ecx, Ebx
Add  Eax, 10
Add  Ecx, 10
Mov  Edi, [Eax]
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push 00
Push [VacXY+4]
Push [VacXY]
Push 06
Call dword ptr [Edi+00000088] // ff ?? ?? 00 00 00 8b ?? ?? ?? 00 00 83 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 00 74
Popad
Jmp  Return

Return:
Jmp  0064DEE8

00F7D0B4:
DD   MobVac
[DISABLE]
00F7D0B4:
DD   GetProcessHeap

Dealloc(MobVac)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_攻擊不顯示傷害.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 攻擊不顯示傷害
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30
// 0064F541 - call dword ptr [eax+50]
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Hook, 32)

Hook:
Cmp  [Ebp+04], 00650045 // 8d 45 cc 50 8b cb e8 ?? ?? ff ff ff
Jne  0097E796 // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74
Mov  [Ebp+20], 38FFFFFF
Jmp  0097E796

00DBCD1C:
DD   Hook
[DISABLE]
00DBCD1C: // [1/1]
DD   0097E796

Dealloc(Hook)
```

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0099D066 - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0099D07D - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0099D094 - 89 85 e0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000220],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0099D1CF // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000224], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000220], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  004F09CE

00D33638:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],009B9D70 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00F71328] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 009BEAE8 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],009BC4F2 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 009BEAE8
ret

00DBCCDC:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00DBCCDC: // [1/1]
DD 009BEAE8 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
// 152.1掛了
// Cmp  [Esp+1C], %GodIcsRet% // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
// Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A1568A // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A16A19 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0064BB20 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0077B5BE
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+50]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   009BB528 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+50], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+40]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+08], #30000
Jmp  009B71DC
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002D0]
Jmp  00A1569F // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00A16A2D           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00A16A24           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00A16A20           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0064BB33           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0064BB37           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0064BB20
//------------------------------
00F4EE24:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00F4EE24:
DD   0077B5BE

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 009B9136 // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004B5242
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004B5242
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 00506764
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 00506764
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
And  [Eax+000020F4], 0
Pop  Eax
Jmp  009B913E

00DBCCA8:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00DBCCA8:
DD   004B5242

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 009BF03D // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00A0FDC6
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 009BF03D

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00DC0DEC:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00DC0DEC: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00A0FDC6 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],00A19708 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002C0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000490], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 00A10167
ret

00DC0594:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00DC0594: // [5/10]
DD 00A10167 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0095B973	// 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 08
Jne  00944CB8
Call R2
Jmp  00944CB8
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004D0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBCC84:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBCC84:   // [4/5]
DD 00944CB8 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

```txt
// TWMS152.2 ICS 降低損血量+怪物不反擊

// UpdateTime: 2013-01-30
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)

Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 006503AE // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 00650673
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+50]
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4

Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  0097E796
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.2/TWMS152.2_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00F6C8DC]+00007F88, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006B4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 00A19220	// 55 8B EC 83 EC 0C 53 56 57 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06
Ret

00DC0718:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00DC0718:
dd 00A19220

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00DB2F88] = 008DF866, End At 008DFABC
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-08
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 008DB3C0

008DFA32: // +4 // 57 FF 75 ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008DFA32:
db e8 89 b9 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00A1D38D
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00A1D38D
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1D6D1 // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1D6D1
//-----------------------------------------------
00F7D268:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00F7D268:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0099D0BA - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0099D0D1 - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0099D0E8 - 89 85 e0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000220],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0099D223 // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000224], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000220], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  004F09CE

00D33638:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-08

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],009B9DC4 // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00F71328] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 009BEB4B // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],009BC546 // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 009BEB4B
ret

00DBCD0C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00DBCD0C: // [1/1]
DD 009BEB4B // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
// 152.1掛了
// Cmp  [Esp+1C], %GodIcsRet% // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
// Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A15773 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A16B02 // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0064BB24 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0077B5C2
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+50]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   009BB57C // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+50], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+40]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+08], #30000
Jmp  009B7230
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002D0]
Jmp  00A15788 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00A16B16           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00A16B0D           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00A16B09           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0064BB37           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0064BB3B           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0064BB24
//------------------------------
00F4EE24:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00F4EE24:
DD   0077B5C2

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 009B918A // 50 8b cf e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 8b 06 8d 4d ?? 51
Jne  004B5242
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004B5242
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 00506764
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
And  [Eax+000020F4], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 00506764
Jmp  009B9192

00DBCCD8:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00DBCCD8:
DD   004B5242

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-08
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 009BF0A0 // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00A0FEAF
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 009BF0A0

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00DC0E1C:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00DC0E1C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00A0FEAF // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-08

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],00A197F1 // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002C0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000490], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 00A10250
ret

00DC05C4:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00DC05C4: // [5/10]
DD 00A10250 // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-08
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0095B9C7	// 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 08
Jne  00944D0C
Call R2
Jmp  00944D0C
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004D0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBCCB4:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBCCB4:   // [4/5]
DD 00944D0C // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_降低損血量+怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS152.3 ICS 降低損血量+怪物不反擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-08
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)
Label(Normal)
Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)

RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 009BB0F6 // [3/6] + 7 // 8b 03 8b cb ff 50 ?? 6a 64 99 59 f7 f9 83 f8
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 006503B2 // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 00650677
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58]
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+58], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  0097E7EA

00DBCD4C:
DD   RHNFB
[DISABLE]
00DBCD4C: // [1/1]
DD   0097E7EA // 6a 08 b8 ?? ?? ?? 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? 00 85 c9 74

Dealloc(RHNFB)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS152.3/TWMS152.3_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00F6C8DC]+00007F88, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006B4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 00A19309	// 55 8B EC 83 EC 0C 53 56 57 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06
Ret

00DC0748:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00DC0748:
dd 00A19309

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// ICS: [00DB2FC0] = 008DFC1A, End At 008DFE70
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 28)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+18] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 20
Jmp 008DB774

008DFDE6: // +4 // 57 FF 75 ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
008DFDE6:
db e8 89 b9 ff ff

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

```txt
db EB

//Bypass time between mines
0098FB29: // 75 0E 57 6A
db 90 90
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_人物左右走.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(AutoLRICSEntry, 64)
Label(ICSReturn)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Alloc(AutoLRMain, 128)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
RegisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Alloc(AutoLRRange, 4)
Alloc(AutoLRValue, 4)
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRRange:
DD A
//-----------------------------------------------
AutoLRICSEntry:
Cmp   [Esp], 00A1D7CA
Jne   ICSReturn
Mov   [Esp], AutoLRMain
ICSReturn:
Jmp   GetFocus
//-------------------
AutoLRMain:
Cmp   [AutoLRRange], 0
Je    00A1D7CA
Push  Eax
Inc   [AutoLRValue]
Mov   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoLeft
Add   Eax, [AutoLRRange]
Cmp   Eax, [AutoLRValue]
Jge   GoRight
Mov   [AutoLRValue], 1
Jmp   GoLeft

GoLeft:
Mov   [Ebp-04], FFFFFFFF
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1DB0E // 第一個Jne

GoRight:
Mov   [Ebp-04], 00000001
Pop   Eax
Jmp   00A1DB0E
//-----------------------------------------------
00F7D268:
DD AutoLRICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00F7D268:
DD GetFocus

Dealloc(AutoLRICSEntry)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRMain)
Dealloc(AutoLRMain)
UnregisterSymbol(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRRange)
Dealloc(AutoLRValue)
```

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 標彈箭控制
//
// 無形之箭  	0099D4D3 - 89 85 9c fe ff ff - mov [ebp-00000164],eax
// 無限標箭彈	0099D4EA - 89 85 dc fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000224],eax
// 雙倍標箭彈	0099D501 - 89 85 e0 fd ff ff - mov [ebp-00000220],eax
[ENABLE]
Alloc(UnlimitedWeapon, 128)
Label(Return)

UnlimitedWeapon:
Cmp  [Esp+10], 0099D63C // 85 C0 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 81 7d ?? ?? ?? ?? 00 74 ?? 83
Jne  Return
Mov  [Ebp-00000224], 1 // 無限標箭彈
Mov  [Ebp-00000220], 1 // 雙倍標箭彈
Return:
Jmp  004F09C9

00D33638:
DD  UnlimitedWeapon
[DISABLE]
00D33638: // [1/1]
DD  004F09C9 // b9 ?? ?? ?? 00 e9 ?? ?? ?? ff ff 74 24 04
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23

[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],009BA1EA // 下面ICS點的返回位置 [1/2] e8 ? ? ? ? 85 c0 0f 85 ? ? ? ? 8b 83 ? ? 00 00 83 e0 fe 83 f8 12 0f 84 ?? ?? 00 00 e8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8b ?? 8b ?? 8b ?? ff 50 10 8b c8 e8 ?? ?? ?? ff 85 c0 0f 85
jne Normal

mov eax,[00F71328] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血
push 009BEF71 // ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],009BC96C // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 009BEF71
ret

00DBCD3C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00DBCD3C: // [1/1]
DD 009BEF71 // a1 ? ? ? ? 05 ? ? 00 00 c3 81 c1 70 ff ff ff

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Blast, 4096)
Alloc(MobKBSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Alloc(MobJumpSwitch, 4)
RegisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
Label(BlastBack)
Label(God)
Label(GodMain)
Label(Stupid)
Label(StupidMain)
Label(MobKB)
Label(MobKBMain)
Label(MobJump)
Label(MobJumpMain)
//------------------------------
MobKBSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不KB 2絕對KB
MobJumpSwitch:
DD   1      //0不控制 1不跳 2狂跳
//------------------------------
Blast:
// 152.1掛了
// Cmp  [Esp+1C], %GodIcsRet% // e8 ?? ?? ?? ff f6 80 ?? ?? 00 00 02 74 05
// Je   God
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A15BB0 // 33 d2 b9 60 ea 00 00 f7 f1
Je   Stupid
Cmp  [Esp+1C], 00A16F3F // 6a 05 33 d2 59 f7 f1 85 d2
Je   MobJump
Cmp  [Esp+34], 0064BE07 // 83 7D ?? 01 75 ?? 8B 4D ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 39
Je   MobKB

BlastBack:
Jmp  0077B971
//--------------------
God:
Mov  [Esp+1C], GodMain
Jmp  BlastBack
Stupid:
Mov  [Esp+1C], StupidMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobJump:
Mov  [Esp+1C], MobJumpMain
Jmp  BlastBack
MobKB:
Mov  [Esp+34], MobKBMain
Jmp  BlastBack
//------------------------------
GodMain:
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+50]
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   009BB9A2 // And Ecx, 000009C4
And  Ecx, 7
Inc  Ecx
Inc  Ecx
Mov  [Ebp+50], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [Ebp+40]
Push 05
Lea  Eax, [Ebp+04]
Push Eax
Mov  [Ebp+08], #30000
Jmp  009B7656
//--------------------
StupidMain:
Xor  Edx, Edx
Mov  Ecx, 0000EA60
Lea  Ecx, [Esi+000002D0]
Jmp  00A15BC5 // Push Edx
//--------------------
MobJumpMain:
Push 05
Xor  Edx, Edx
Pop  Ecx
Div  Ecx
Test Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 1 //怪不跳
Je   00A16F53           // Jne To...
Cmp  [MobJumpSwitch], 2 //怪狂跳
Je   00A16F4A           // Mov  Ecx, Esi
Jmp  00A16F46           // Test Edx, Edx
//--------------------
MobKBMain:
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 01  //不KB
Je   0064BE1A           //Xor Edx, Edx
Cmp  [MobKBSwitch], 02  //絕對KB
Je   0064BE1E           //Mov Ddx, [Ebp+XX]
Jmp  0064BE07
//------------------------------
00F4EE24:
DD   Blast
[DISABLE]
00F4EE24:
DD   0077B971

Dealloc(Blast)
Dealloc(MobKBSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobKBSwitch)
Dealloc(MobJumpSwitch)
UnregisterSymbol(MobJumpSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_瞬間集滿.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 젊땀떠벙
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Full, 64)

Full:
Cmp  [Esp], 009C8060 // 8B ?? ?? ?? 00 00 2B 08 83 F9 FA
Jne  004B523D

Jmp  004B523D

DD   Full
[DISABLE]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 009B95B0 // 50 8B ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B ?? 8D ?? ?? 51 8B
Jne  004B523D // 55 8b ec 51 51 8d 45 f8 50 81 c1 ?? ?? 00 00
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004B523D
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 0050675F
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [00F71328]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [00F6C600]
And  [Eax+000020F0], 0
And  [Eax+000020F4], 0
Mov  Ecx, [00F75850]
Call 0050675F
Jmp  009B95B8

00DBCD08:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00DBCD08:
DD   004B523D

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```
