`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 009BF4C6 // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00A102EC
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 009BF4C6

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00DC0E4C:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00DC0E4C: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00A102EC // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_超級笨怪(怪不反擊).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 超級笨怪
// 來源: 冷羽楓痕
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23

[Enable]
alloc(Stupid, 256)
alloc(Stupid_Switch, 04)
label(My_Ret)
registersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

Stupid_Switch:
DD 00

Stupid:
cmp dword ptr [esp+48],00A19C2E // 89 45 08 3b c3 75 07 33 c0 e9
jne My_Ret
cmp [Stupid_Switch],01
jne My_Ret

// 笨怪
mov [esi+000002C0],00 // [2/2] // 89 BE ?? 02 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 57 8D 8E
// 怪不反擊
/*
push esi // Monster Esi 轉成 KiKi Esi
mov esi, [esi+18]
sub esi, 4
mov [esi+00000490], 1 // 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 75 0E 8B CE E8 ?? ?? FF FF
pop esi
*/

My_Ret:
push 00A1068D
ret

00DC05F4:
DD Stupid

[Disable]
00DC05F4: // [5/10]
DD 00A1068D // 83 b9 ? ? 00 00 00 74 ? d9 ee

dealloc(Stupid)
dealloc(Stupid_Switch)
unregistersymbol(Stupid_Switch)

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 0095BDA6	// 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 08
Jne  009450F3
Call R2
Jmp  009450F3
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004D0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00DBCCE4:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00DBCCE4:   // [4/5]
DD 009450F3 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_降低損血量+怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS153.1 ICS 降低損血量+怪物不反擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-02-23
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)
Label(Normal)
Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)

RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 009BB51C // [2/2] // 6A 64 99 59 F7 F9 83 ?? ?? 75 ?? 81
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 00650695 // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 0065095A
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+58] // 39 ?? ?? 74 ?? 8D ?? ?? 8B 01 FF 50
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+58], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  0097EC03 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C9 74

00DBCD7C:
DD   RHNFB
[DISABLE]
00DBCD7C: // [1/1]
DD   0097EC03 // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 85 C9 74

Dealloc(RHNFB)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS153.1/TWMS153.1_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([00F6C8DC]+00007FB0, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002B8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006B4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+000000FC], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 00A19746	// 55 8B EC 83 EC 0C 53 56 57 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06
Ret

00DC0778:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00DC0778:
dd 00A19746

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_CRC_取得血、魔、經驗值.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 CRC 取得血、魔、經驗值
// Auther: Inndy
// HP, MaxHP, MP, MaxMP, (int64)Exp, (int64)MaxExp
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Params, 36)
Alloc(Hook, 128)
RegisterSymbol(Params)

Hook:
Add Esp, 04
Pop [Params+00] // [Esp+04] // HpNow
Pop [Params+04] // [Esp+08] // HpFull
Pop [Params+08] // [Esp+0C] // MpNow
Pop [Params+0C] // [Esp+10] // MpFull
Pop [Params+10] // [Esp+14] // ExpNow
Pop [Params+14] // [Esp+18]
Pop [Params+18] // [Esp+1C] // ExpFull
Pop [Params+1C] // [Esp+20]
Pop [Params+20] // [Esp+24] // Unknow
Sub Esp, 28
Jmp 0097770B

0097D2DB: // +4 // 57 FF 75 ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 EC
Call Hook
[DISABLE]
0097D2DB:
call 0097770B

Dealloc(Params)
Dealloc(Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(Params)
```

```txt
//Bypass time between mines
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_AAFullMap.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 ICS AAFullMap
[Enable]
GlobalAlloc(AAFullMapKey, 4)
Alloc(AAFullMap, 512)
Label(FullMap)
Label(Fix)
Label(ExitFullMap)

AAFullMap:
Add  Esp, 04
Call VariantClear
Cmp  [Esp], 0069FA9D
Je   FullMap
Cmp  [Esp], 0069FC6C
Je   Fix
Ret

FullMap:
DB   59 8D 45 A0 50 8B CF
Push 0069FAA9 // Return Address
DB   56 57 8B 7C 24 0C
Cmp  [AAFullMapKey], 0
Je   ExitFullMap
Pushad
Mov  Ecx, [0115BB3C]
Add  Ecx, 4
Push Edi
Call 004CDCEA
Popad
ExitFullMap:
Jmp  00439B0B // Push [Edi]

Fix:
DB   59 8D 45 A0 50 8D 8E 28 07 00 00
Call 00672C6C
Jmp  0069FC83

00D47288:
DD AAFullMap
[Disable]
00D47288:
DD VariantClear

Dealloc(AAFullMap)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_AA無延遲.txt`:

```txt
//無延遲 ICS TWMS158.3
[ENABLE]
Registersymbol(GND_Key)
Alloc(GND_Key,4)
Alloc(GND_ICS,512)
Label(GND)

GND_Key:
DD 01

GND_ICS:
CMP  [GND_Key],01
JNE  00A56B7C
CMP  [ESP],00A7A10E
JNE  00A56B7C
MOV  [ESP],GND
JMP  00A56B7C

GND:
push eax
call 004867EE
pop ecx
test eax,eax
jne 00A7A119
and dword ptr [ebp-000029EC],00
mov eax,[ebp-000029EC]
mov [ebp-40],eax
cmp dword ptr [ebp+10],00
jne 00A7A14D
mov eax,[ebp-60]
mov [ebp-00000084],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-2C]
call 004763AF
mov [ebp-00000BF8],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-2C]
call 00469D55
mov [ebp-0000022C],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-0000022C]
call 00750383
neg eax
sbb eax,eax
neg eax
mov [ebp-000001F0],eax
mov ecx,[ebp-0000022C]
call 00797A79
test eax,eax
jne 00A7A1A1
and dword ptr [ebp-000029F0],00
mov eax,[ebp-000029F0]
mov [ebp-00000228],eax
cmp dword ptr [ebp-000001DC],00
je 00A7A1F5
mov eax,[ebp-000029E0]
mov ecx,[ebp-000001DC]
cmp ecx,[eax+00007F2C]
je 00A7A1F5
jmp 00A7A1E9

00F69D4C:
DD GND_ICS
[DISABLE]
00F69D4C:
DD 00A56B7C
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_全圖吸物.txt`:

```txt
//TWMSv158.4全圖吸物
//更新 放棄
//原創 Cam1596
//ICS. 冷雨楓痕
[Enable]
alloc(ItemVac,256)
label(SetItemXY)
alloc(PickNoDc,64)

PickNoDc:
cmp [esp], 00B002A4//1//
jne 00570912//2//
add esp, 04
call 00570912//2
xor eax,eax
jmp 00B002A4//1

ItemVac:
cmp [esp],005287B4//3//
je SetItemXY
cmp [esp],00527A46//4//
jne PtInRect
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

SetItemXY:
mov eax,[esp+08]
mov [ebx],eax
mov eax,[esp+0C]
mov [ebx+04],eax
xor eax,eax
inc eax
ret 000c

0116FA2C://6
dd ItemVac

00ED2984://5
DD PickNoDc

[Disable]
0116FA2C://6
dd PtInRect

00ED2984://5
DD 00570912//2

dealloc(ItemVac)
dealloc(PickNoDc)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_定點生怪.txt`:

```txt
//TWMSv158.4定點生怪
//更新 放棄
//原創 歐歐
[ENABLE]
RegisterSymbol(ReLifeVac)
Alloc(ReLifeVac, 256)
RegisterSymbol(RelifeXY)
Alloc(RelifeXY,8)
RegisterSymbol(RelifeSwitch)
Alloc(RelifeSwitch, 4)
Label(ReLifeVacXY)
Label(DoRelife)
Label(Return)

RelifeSwitch:
DD 1

ReLifeVac:
Cmp [RelifeSwitch],1
Je  ReLifeVacXY
Cmp [RelifeSwitch],2
Je  DoRelife
Jmp Return

ReLifeVacXY:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax,[01165218]
Push [Eax+0000127C]
Pop  [RelifeXY]
Push [Eax+000010A4]
Pop  [RelifeXY+4]
Pop  Eax
Mov  [RelifeSwitch],2
Jmp  Return

DoRelife:
Cmp [Esp], 00695C80//1//
Jne Return
Cmp dword ptr [Esp+18],02
Jne Return
Push Ecx
Mov  Eax,[RelifeXY]
Mov  [Esp+0c], eax
Mov  Eax,[RelifeXY+4]
Mov  [Esp+10], eax
Push Eax
Mov  Ecx,[01069EF8]
Call 00439A65//2//
Mov  Ecx, eax
Mov  [Esp+20], ecx
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  Return

Return:
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
push ebx
push esi
Jmp 00B08239//3//

00F6DB00://5
DD ReLifeVac
[DISABLE]

00F6DB00://5
DD 00B08234//4//
UnRegisterSymbol(ReLifeVac)
DeAlloc(ReLifeVac)
UnRegisterSymbol(RelifeXY)
DeAlloc(RelifeXY)
UnRegisterSymbol(RelifeSwitch)
DeAlloc(RelifeSwitch)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_左右走(Wall).txt`:

```txt

//TWMSv158.4牆值左右走
//更新 放棄
//原創 Onion
[Enable]
Alloc(AutoLRICS,512)
Alloc(MyLR,4)
Label(AutoLR)
Label(GetWall)
Label(GetChrX)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoLeft)

MyLR:
DD 1 //開啟後向右走

AutoLRICS:
Cmp [Esp],00B111C2//1//
Jne GetFocus
Mov [Esp],AutoLR
Jmp GetFocus

AutoLR:
Call GetWall
Mov  [ebp-04],Eax
Xor  Ecx,Ecx
Xor  Eax,Eax
Cmp  [ebp-04],Eax
Jmp  00B1150E//2//

GetWall:
Call GetChrX
Mov  Ecx,[01069EF8]
Sub  Eax,[Ecx+1C]
Cmp  Eax,04
Jle  GoRight
Call GetChrX
Mov  Ecx,[Ecx+24]
sub  Ecx,Eax
cmp  Ecx,04
Jle  GoLeft
Mov  Eax,[MyLR]
Ret

GetChrX:
Mov Eax,[0106FA8C]
Mov Eax,[Eax+000010A0]
Ret

GoRight:
Mov [MyLR],1
Mov Eax,1
Ret

GoLeft:
Mov [MyLR],FFFFFFFF
Mov Eax,FFFFFFFF
Ret

0116FA88://3//
DD AutoLRICS

[Disable]
0116FA88://3//
DD GetFocus

DeAlloc(MyLR)
DeAlloc(AutoLRICS)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_技能連跳+不耗魔.txt`:

```txt
// TwMS v158.4_ICS_技能連跳+不耗魔
// Author: 微o戀 2013-1-25
// ICS: Onion
[Enable]
GlobalAlloc(UltimateJmp, 64)
GlobalAlloc(JmpRow, 04)
Label(Exit)

UltimateJmp:
Cmp [JmpRow], 01
Je  Exit
Cmp [Esp+0C], 00AB1DCC
Jne Exit
// Mov [Ebp-60], 00AB1DF0
Mov [Esp+0C], 00AB1DF0
Exit:
Mov Ecx, 0111CDDC
Jmp 0042B719

JmpRow:
DB 01

00ED1270:
DD UltimateJmp
[Disable]
JmpRow:
DD 00
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_控怪+跳怪掉落.txt`:

```txt
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// Name：v1.58.4 MobLR
// Address：0097DE6C
// EIP：MobLR
// Aob：DD 07 DC 20 DD 5D ?? D9 EE DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B
// Aob：DC 55 ?? DF E0 F6 C4 ?? 0F 8B ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 83
// Cortrol：LRKey
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
//------------------------------------------------------------------
// V137 00847A28 - 83 bb f4 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f4],00
// V138 00896978 - 83 bb f8 00 00 00 00       - cmp dword ptr [ebx+000000f8],00
[Enable]
Registersymbol(MobLR)
Alloc(MobLR, 1024)
Registersymbol(MyState)
Alloc(MyState, 4)
Registersymbol(MyXYResh)
Alloc(MyXYResh, 4)
Registersymbol(LRKey)
Alloc(LRKey, 4)
Registersymbol(LRXY)
Alloc(LRXY, 4)
Alloc(FakeCall,64)
Registersymbol(Fall)
Alloc(Fall, 128)
Label(MobLRGo)
Label(Left)
Label(Right)
Label(LRGoMe)
Label(LRGoXY)
Label(GetXY)
Label(GetState)
Label(XYAdd)
Label(XYSub)
Label(MobNormal)
//----------------------------
// 0:Off , 1:Left , 2:Right , 3:GoMe , 4:GoXY , 5:GetXY
LRKey:
Dd 3
//----------------------------
FakeCall:
db 55                 // push ebp
db 8b ec              // mov ebp,esp
db 83 ec 20           // sub esp,20
db 8b 45 08           // mov eax,[ebp+08]
db 53                 // push ebx
db 56                 // push esi
db 8B 35 90 01 16 01  // mov esi,[01160190]
db 8b d9              // mov ebx,ecx
db 57                 // push edi
db 8d bb C8 00 00 00  // lea edi,[ebx+000000c8]
db dd 07              // fld qword ptr [edi]
db dc 20              // fsub qword ptr [eax]
db dd 5d e8           // fstp qword ptr [ebp-18]
db d9 ee              // fldz
JMP MobLR
//----------------------------
MobLR:
Cmp [Ebx+2F8], 1 //Wolk
Je MobLRGo
Cmp [Ebx+2F8], 3 //Jump
Je MobLRGo

MobNormal:
Jmp 00B0B196
//Fcom ss:[Ebp-18]  
//Fstsw ax
//Jmp 00B0B19B  //走怪掉落
//----------------------------
MobLRGo:
Push Eax
Cmp [LRKey],1
Je Left
Cmp [LRKey],2
Je Right
Pop Eax

Cmp [LRKey], 3
Je LRGoMe
Cmp [LRKey], 4
Je LRGoXY
Cmp [LRKey], 5
Je GetXY
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Left:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+0000013C], FFFFFFFF
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
Right:
Pop Eax
Cmp Eax, 01
Mov [Ebx+0000013C], 00000001
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoMe:
Call GetState
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[0115bb3c] //人物座標 8b 0d ?? ?? ?? ?? 3b cb 74 ?? 53 6a 01 e8
Mov Eax,[Eax+9410] 
Sub Eax, 8
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+6F4], Eax
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Add Eax, [MyXYResh]
Cmp [Ebx+6F4], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+0000013C], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
LRGoXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[LRXY]
Sub Eax, 8
Cmp [Ebx+6F4], Eax //89 86 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8D 8E ?? ?? ?? ??
Jl Right
Add Eax, 10
Cmp [Ebx+6F4], Eax
Jg Left
Pop Eax
Mov [Ebx+0000013C], 0
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetXY:
Push Eax
Mov Eax,[0115bb3c]  //a1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 3b c2 74 ?? 88 90
Mov Eax,[Eax+9410]  //8d 87 ?? ?? ?? ?? 50 8b cb e8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8b 0d
Mov [LRXY],0
Mov [LRXY],Eax
Mov [LRKey],4
Pop Eax
Jmp MobNormal
//----------------------------
GetState:
Push Eax
Mov Eax, [0115bb3c] //人物動作
Mov Eax, [Eax+04DC]
Mov [MyState], Eax
Pop Eax
Cmp [MyState], 3
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 5
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 7
Je XYSub
Cmp [MyState], 9
Je XYSub

Cmp [MyState], 2
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 4
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 6
Je XYAdd
Cmp [MyState], 8
Je XYAdd
Ret
//----------------------------
XYAdd:
Mov [MyXYResh], 00000020
Ret
//----------------------------
XYSub:
Mov [MyXYResh], FFFFFFE0
Ret
//----------------------------
LRXY:
Dd 0
//----------------------------
00F6DBF8:
DD FakeCall
//----------------------------
Fall:   //跳怪掉落
push ebp
mov ebp,esp
sub esp,0c
push ebx
push esi
mov esi,ecx
cmp dword ptr [esi+000002f8],03
push edi
mov edi,[01160190]
JMP 00b0a256

00F6DBFC:
DD Fall
//----------------------------
[Disable]
00F6DBF8: //Call From 0089510A   138 
DD 00B0B173 //55 8b ec 83 ec ?? 8b 45 ?? 53 56
00F6DBFC:
DD 00B0A155 //55 8b ec 83 ec ?? 53 56 8b f1 83 be
Dealloc(LRXY)
Dealloc(LRKey)
Dealloc(MyState)
Dealloc(MyXYResh)
Dealloc(MobLR)
Dealloc(FakeCall)
Unregistersymbol(LRXY)
Unregistersymbol(LRKey)
Unregistersymbol(MyState)
Unregistersymbol(MyXYResh)
Unregistersymbol(MobLR)
```

```txt
//TWMS V1.58.4 滾筒速爆 [ICS]

JMP  00A126D6

CMP  [ESI+C8],EDI
JE   005B2BDD
LEA  EBX,[ESI+D4]
CALL 00AD2BAC
MOV  [EBX],EAX
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 ICS 無敵30秒
// Auther: 冷羽楓痕
//
// 89 ?? ?? 8D ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 C3 55 83
// 下面就是損血CALL的開頭
[enable]
alloc(GodMode,128)
alloc(GodTime,4)
label(Normal)
label(God)

GodMode:
cmp [esp],00A9C558 // Call dword ptr [Eax+10] 下一行
jne Normal

mov eax,[011605F0] // 時間
mov eax,[eax+1C]
cmp eax,[GodTime]
jl God

add eax,00007530 // 無敵時間30秒
mov [GodTime],eax
Normal: // 正常損血

// ICS: call dword ptr [eax+10]
push 00AA271D
ret

God: // 無敵
mov [esp],00A9F3DE // ICS下面的JMP jne 00896AB4
push 00AA271D
ret

00F69D0C:
DD GodMode

[disable]
00F69D0C: // [1/1]
DD 00AA271D // A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 05 ?? ?? 00 00 C3 81

dealloc(GodMode)
dealloc(GodTime)
```

```txt
Jmp [WTF_RET] // VariantClear

Staic:

// cmp dword ptr [ebp-1C],02
// je 008D0035
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_物品過濾.txt`:

```txt
//TwMS v158.4_ICS_物品過濾

Registersymbol(ItemFilter)
Registersymbol(ItemList)
Alloc(ItemFilter,512)
Alloc(ItemList,204800)
Label(HookFun)
Label(HookOr1)
Label(HookOr2)
Label(Filter)
Label(Skip)
Label(End)

ItemList:
DD 3D85F8//發條蟲
DD 1EDE54//緩速藍寶殼
DD 1EDE53//暈眩小碎石
DD 3CF4AB//新奇驚奇券
DD 1F72C8//弩箭矢
DD 1F6EE0//箭矢
DD 414EC1//銀寶箱
DD 3FA133//魔法的羽毛筆
DD 253B41//吃蟲寶石君
DD 253B40//吃蟲桔小姐
DD 3D82FC//火焰的鎦
DD 3FA138//妖精的眼淚
DD 253B4B//楓樹樹苗

ItemFilter:
Cmp [Esp+6C], 0052BD55
Jne 007E6073
Mov [Esp+6C], HookFun
Jmp 007E6073

HookFun:
mov eax,[ebp+38]
mov esi,[ebp+24]
mov [esi+1C],al
cmp eax,01
Je HookOr1
cmp eax,02
Je HookOr1
xor al,al
Jmp HookOr2

HookOr1:
mov al,01

HookOr2:
mov [esi+1D],al
mov eax,[ebp+6C]
mov ecx,edi
mov [esi+20],eax
call 00409587
movzx eax,al
mov ecx,edi
//Xor Eax, Eax   //過濾楓幣
mov [esi+30],eax
call 004095E2
Push Esi
Mov Esi,ItemList
Filter:
CMP EAX,C350
JLE End
Cmp [Esi],0
Je End
Cmp [Esi],Eax
Je Skip
Add Esi,4
Jmp Filter
Skip:
Xor Eax,Eax
End:
Pop Esi
Mov Ecx,Edi
Mov [Esi+34],Eax
Jmp 0052BD90

0113A744:
DD ItemFilter

[Disable]
0113A744:
DD 007E6073 

UnRegistersymbol(ItemFilter)
DeAlloc(ItemFilter)
UnRegistersymbol(ItemList)
DeAlloc(ItemList)
```

```txt
//TwMS v158.4_ICS_物落腳下

Push [ebx+1280]
Lea Ecx,[Esi+00000724]
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_疾風N合一.txt`:

```txt
//TwMS v158.4_ICS_疾風N合一
//更新+合併:冰Smith

[Enable]
RegisterSymbol(Main)
Alloc(Main,20480)
RegisterSymbol(ItemList)
Alloc(ItemList,204800)
RegisterSymbol(MissTime)
RegisterSymbol(Miss_HOOK)
RegisterSymbol(Miss)
RegisterSymbol(Miss_KEY)
RegisterSymbol(AABack)
RegisterSymbol(AABackOnOff)
RegisterSymbol(AAttackDir)
RegisterSymbol(inst_Hook)
RegisterSymbol(inst_OnOff)
Alloc(MissTime,4)
Alloc(Miss_HOOK, 1028)
Alloc(Miss, 1028)
Alloc(Miss_KEY, 1028)
Alloc(AABack, 128)
Alloc(AABackOnOff, 4)
Alloc(AAttackDir, 4)
Alloc(inst_Hook,128)
Alloc(inst_OnOff,4)
Alloc(inst,512)
Label(HookESP)
Label(HookFun)
Label(HookOr1)
Label(HookOr2)
Label(Filter)
Label(Skip)
Label(End)
Label(Ultimate)
Label(Ultimate2)
Label(AABack2)
Label(doAABackNormal)
Label(inst2)


ItemList:
//請在以下加入欲過濾名單
dd 1F6EE0 //箭矢
dd 1F72C8 //弩箭矢

dd 2654E3 //提昇的 1階段敏捷藥水的製作書。

dd 1F6EE0 //箭矢
dd 1F72C8 //弩箭矢
dd 3FA138 //妖精的眼淚
dd 253B40 //吃蟲桔小姐
dd 253B41 //吃蟲寶石君
dd 253B4B //楓樹樹苗
dd 264D3B //強化驚電弓製作法
dd 264DB0 //龍尾巴法師斗篷製作法
dd 264DB1 //帕爾困監視兵斗篷製作法
dd 264E8F //莎莉絲手杖製作法
dd 26548E //9階段敏捷藥水的製作書。
dd 265495 //8階段智能藥水的製作書。
dd 26549E //9階段幸運藥水的製作書。
dd 2654E3 //提昇的 1階段敏捷藥水的製作書。
dd 26555A //提昇的 10階段 幸運藥丸製作說明書
dd 3D0ABB //有裂痕的沙漏
dd 3D0ABC //綠色衣角
dd 3D0ABE //微笑面具
dd 3D0ACD //騎士的面具
dd 3D0AD3 //金色假髮
dd 3D0AD4 //某人的輪胎
dd 3D0B59 //竊水賊的水瓶
dd 3D0B5D //安全第一的標誌板
dd 3D0E7A //龍的精髓
dd 3D0EE9 //斑點紋卷碎片
dd 3D0EEB //豹紋卷碎片
dd 3D0EF1 //老虎紋卷碎片
dd 3D0F9C //高級怪物公園入場卷
dd 238D93 //高等子彈
dd 1F95FA //冰柱
dd 1F6EE0 //箭矢
dd 1F72C8 //弩箭矢
dd 3d0ac0 //綠色心臟
dd 3d0abb//有裂痕的沙漏
dd 3d0abc//綠色衣角
dd 3d0abd//綠色尖帽
dd 3d0abe//微笑面具
dd 3d0abf//綠色頭盔
dd 3d0ac0//綠色心臟
dd 3d0ac1//藍色衣角
dd 3d0ac2//藍色尖帽
dd 3d0ac3//面無表情面具
dd 3d0ac4//藍色頭盔
dd 3d0ac5//藍色心臟
dd 3d0ac6//紅色衣角
dd 3d0ac7//紅色尖帽
dd 3d0ac8//哀傷面具
dd 3d0ac9//紅色頭盔
dd 3d0aca//紅色心臟
//請在以上加入欲過濾名單
DD 00
Miss_KEY: //0:無敵 1:MISS+無敵時間
DD 0

AABackOnOff:
dd 1  // {0: 關閉 | 1: 開啟 }

AAttackDir:
dd 0 //遠攻者可改2
    // 0: 怪不動
    // 1: 怪退後一點點 (正常值)
    // 2: 怪退後很多點
    // 3: 怪反方向退到底
    // A(以上): 怪退到底
    // C: 怪物跳躍
    
inst_OnOff: // 怪物舜移
DD 1     // {0: 關閉 | 1: 開啟 }      



Main:

cmp [0115bb3c],00000000    //原地攻擊         
je 007E6073              
mov eax,[0115bb3c]         
mov [eax+7FC8], 0          // 

cmp [0115bb3c],00000000    //攻擊次數         
je 007E6073              
mov eax,[0115bb3c]         
mov [eax+81d0], 0          // 

cmp [esp+24],00A9C91A //無敵:Miss
je Miss_HOOK //
Cmp [Esp+6C],0052BD55 //物品過濾
Je  HookESP
Cmp [Esp+3C],0069A0B9 //退怪3  EB  8B
Je AABack2
Cmp [Esp+24],00A5161F //終極100% 
Je Ultimate2
cmp [esp+4C],006B37B2 //怪物瞬移
Je inst_Hook //
Jmp 007E6073

HookESP:
Mov [Esp+6C], HookFun
Jmp 007E6073

Miss_HOOK:
mov [esp+24],Miss
jmp 007E6073

AABack2:
Mov [Esp+3C],AABack
Jmp  007E6073

Ultimate2:
Mov [Esp+24],Ultimate
Jmp 007E6073

inst_Hook:
Mov [Esp+4C],inst
Jmp 007E6073

//====================↓物品過濾↓====================\\


HookFun:
mov eax,[ebp+38]
mov esi,[ebp+24]
mov [esi+1C],al
cmp eax,01
Je HookOr1
cmp eax,02
Je HookOr1
xor al,al
Jmp HookOr2

HookOr1:
mov al,01

HookOr2:
mov [esi+1D],al
mov eax,[ebp+6C]
mov ecx,edi
mov [esi+20],eax
call 00409587
movzx eax,al
mov ecx,edi
//Xor Eax, Eax   //過濾楓幣
mov [esi+30],eax
call 004095E2
PUSH ESI
MOV ESI,ItemList
Filter:
CMP EAX,C350
JLE End
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],0
Je End  //JNE  白名單
CMP DWORD PTR DS:[ESI],EAX
Je Skip  //JNE  白名單
ADD ESI,4
JMP Filter
Skip:
XOR EAX,EAX
End:
POP ESI
MOV ECX,EDI
MOV [ESI+34],EAX
Jmp 0052BD90 
//====================↑物品過濾↑====================\\

//====================↓MISS無敵↓====================\\

Miss:
mov [ebp+esi*4-000000ac],eax
inc esi
cmp esi,08
jnge 00A9C913
mov edi,[ebp+3c]
lea ecx,[edi+000021f8]
mov [ebp-34],ebx
mov [ebp-3c],ebx
mov [ebp-64],ebx
mov [ebp-38],ebx
mov [ebp-70],ebx
mov [ebp+0c],ebx
mov [ebp+04],ebx
call 005ABA69
mov esi,[ebp-40]
push eax
mov eax,[esi]
mov ecx,esi
call dword ptr [eax+54]
push eax
mov eax,[esi]
mov ecx,esi
call dword ptr [eax+50]
push eax
call 0074EAFB
push [esi+0000041C]
mov [ebp-48],eax
mov [ebp-2C],edi // ebx ?
mov [ebp-44],edi
mov [ebp-4C],edi
mov [ebp+14],edi
mov [ebp-7C],edi
mov [ebp-68],edi
mov [ebp-30],edi
mov [ebp-00000084],ebx
mov [ebp-80],edi
mov [ebp-78],edi
call 004756D7
push [esi+00000420]
mov [ebp-00000088],eax
call 004756D7
add esp,14
mov [ebp-28],eax

// 00A9C9A9 - cmp [ebp+60],ebx
cmp [ebp+60],edi // ebx ?
Cmp [Miss_KEY],0
je 00A9F3DE // Exit function

cmp [ebp+50],ebx
jne 00A9E1B4

// 00A9CB43 - cmp [ebp+54],ebx
cmp [ebp+54],ebx

// 00A9E1CD - cmp [ebp+4C],ebx
// 00A9E1D0 - jng 00A9E5D4
// 00A9E1D6 - cmp [ebp-78],ebx
// 00A9E1D9 - je 00A9E1EC
jne 00A9E1CD
cmp [ebp+4c],ebx
mov ecx,[ebp+3c]
add ecx,000021F8
call 00798799
xor ecx,ecx
test eax,eax
setle cl
dec ecx
and ecx,000009c4 // 2500
add ecx,00000000
jmp 00A9E5F6
//====================↑MISS無敵↑====================\\

//====================↓退怪模式↓====================\\
AABack:
cmp [AABackOnOff],0
jz doAABackNormal
// [ebp+44] = [AAttackDir]
push [AAttackDir]
pop [ebp+44]

doAABackNormal:
mov edx,[ebp+48]
jmp 0069A0BC

//00601AA3:
//JMP AABack
//====================↑退怪模式↑====================\\

//====================↓100%終極↓====================\\
Ultimate:
push 64
pop ecx
xor edx,edx
div ecx
push [ebp-0c]
mov ecx,[ebp-14]
mov [ebp-24],edx
call 0077C21A
mov ecx,eax
call 0075098E
add eax,[ebp-04]
cmp [ebp-24],eax
jmp 00a51651

//====================↑100%終極↑====================\\

//====================↓怪物舜移↓====================\\
inst:
mov ecx,[ebp+18]
cwde
mov [ebp+14],eax
fild dword ptr [ebp+14]
fstp qword ptr [ebx]
mov ax,[edi+0c]
mov [ecx],eax
movzx eax,byte ptr [edi+02]
mov ecx,[ebp+1c]
mov [ecx],eax
movsx eax,word ptr [edi+12]
mov [ebp+14],eax
mov eax,[ebp+24]
fild dword ptr [ebp+14]
fstp qword ptr [eax]
movsx eax,word ptr [edi+14]
mov [ebp+14],eax
mov eax,[ebp+28]
fild dword ptr [ebp+14]
fstp qword ptr [eax]
lea ecx,[esi+24]
push [ecx+0c]
cmp [inst_OnOff],0
jz inst2

push eax
mov eax,00000001
mov [esi+2C],eax
pop eax


inst2:
call 006b304e
jmp 006B37F7

//====================↑怪物舜移↑====================\\




0113A744:
DD Main

[Disable]
0113A744:
DD 007E6073

UnregisterSymbol(Main)
Dealloc(Main)
UnregisterSymbol(ItemList)
Dealloc(ItemList)
UnregisterSymbol(MissTime)
UnregisterSymbol(Miss_HOOK)
UnregisterSymbol(Miss)
UnregisterSymbol(Miss_KEY)
UnregisterSymbol(AABack)
UnregisterSymbol(AABackOnOff)
UnregisterSymbol(AAttackDir)
UnregisterSymbol(inst_Hook)
UnregisterSymbol(inst_OnOff)
Dealloc(MissTime)
Dealloc(Miss_HOOK)
Dealloc(Miss)
Dealloc(Miss_KEY)
Dealloc(AABack)
Dealloc(AABackOnOff)
Dealloc(AAttackDir)
Dealloc(inst_Hook)
Dealloc(inst_OnOff)
Dealloc(inst)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_神速撿物.txt`:

```txt
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 00A9B782 // 50 8B ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B ?? 8D ?? ?? 51 8B
Jne  004CDCEA
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004CDCEA
Mov  Ecx, A
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [011605F0]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [01160F50]
Call 0052867B
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [011605F0]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [0115B800]
And  [Eax+00002108], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [0115B800]
And  [Eax+00002108], 0
And  [Eax+0000210C], 0
Mov  Ecx, [01160F50]
Call 0052867B
Jmp  00A9B78A

00F69CD8:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00F69CD8:
DD   004CDCEA

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-07-22
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 00AA2D1F // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00B00266
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 00AA2D1F

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00F6E4FC:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00F6E4FC: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00B00266 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_移除背景.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 ICS 移除背景（007Style）
// 來源：EMS
[ENABLE]
Alloc(Hook, 128)
Label(BlackBack)

Hook:
Cmp [Esp+38], 006621B7
Jne VariantInit
Mov [Esp+38], BlackBack
Jmp VariantInit

BlackBack:
// 8B F8 8D 45 ?? 50 C6 45 FC ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 C4 0C 83 FF 01 75
db 8B F8 8D 45 AC 50 C6 45 FC 13
call 004012D1
add esp,0c
// cmp edi,01
jmp 006621D3 // jne

00D47294:
DD Hook
[DISABLE]
00D47294:
DD VariantInit

Dealloc(Hook)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_終極攻擊無延遲.txt`:

```txt
//TwMS TwMS v158.4_ICS_終極攻擊無延遲
//更新時間:2013-07-20
//更新: 乂Boyue乂
//原創: 未知 有知道的麻煩私信 將改正

[ENABLE]
alloc(NDFA,128)
alloc(NDFA2,128)
alloc(ICS,128)
registersymbol(SkillID)
alloc(SkillID,16)
RegisterSymbol(NDFAOnOff)
Alloc(NDFAOnOff, 04)

NDFAOnOff:
DD 00

ICS:
Cmp [NDFAOnOff], 01
Jne InterlockedDecrement
cmp [esp+1c], 00AAD5E3
jne InterlockedDecrement
MOV [esp+1c],NDFA
jmp InterlockedDecrement

NDFA:
cmp [SkillID],0
je NDFA2
Xor Edi,Edi
PUSH EAX
MOV EAX,[SkillID]
MOV [ESI+00007F58],EAX
POP EAX
jmp 00AAD5F1

NDFA2:
push eax
mov eax,[esi+00007F58]
pop eax
cmp eax,0
je 00AAD5E3
push eax
mov eax,[esi+00007F58]
mov [SkillID],eax
pop eax
jmp 00AAD5E3

00D4709C:
DD ICS

[DISABLE]
00D4709C:
DD InterlockedDecrement

dealloc(NDFA)
UnRegisterSymbol(NDFAOnOff)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-07-22
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 00A2D81C	// 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 08
Jne  00A15F77
Call R2
Jmp  00A15F77
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004E0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00F69CA8:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00F69CA8:   // [4/5]
DD 00A15F77 // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_降低損血量+怪不反擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS158.4 ICS 降低損血量+怪物不反擊
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(RHNFB, 128)
Label(Normal)
Label(ReduceHurts)
Label(NoFightBack)
// 00A9F3DE -> Exit Function
RHNFB:
Cmp  [Esp], 00A9DD25 // [2/2] // 6A 64 99 59 F7 F9 83 ?? ?? 75 ?? 81
Je   ReduceHurts
Cmp  [Esp+58], 0069EDF1 // [1/2] // 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 83 F8 FF 0F 8F ?? ?? 00 00 8B CE
Je   NoFightBack
Jmp  Normal

NoFightBack:
Mov  [Esp+58], 0069F0D7 // [1/1] // 8D ?? ?? 89 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 83 F8
Jmp  Normal

ReduceHurts:
Mov  Eax, [Ebp+54] // 39 ?? ?? 74 ?? 8D ?? ?? 8B 01 FF 50
Shr  Eax, 2 // 損血量 / 4
Sub  [Ebp+54], Eax
Jmp  Normal

Normal:
Jmp  00A56B7C // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C9 74

00F69D4C:
DD   RHNFB
[DISABLE]
00F69D4C: // [1/1]
DD   00A56B7C // 6A 08 B8 ?? ?? ?? 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? 00 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? 00 85 C9 74

Dealloc(RHNFB)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS158.4/TWMS158.4_ICS_高效率控怪.txt`:

```txt
[Enable]
Alloc(MobFollowX, 4)
Alloc(MobFollow, 128)
Label(Control)
Label(Return)
Label(GoLeft)
Label(GoRight)
Label(GoStop)

MobFollowX:
ReadMem([0115BB3C]+00009410, 4)

MobFollow:
Cmp  [Ecx+000002F8], 01
Je   Control
Cmp  [Ecx+000002F8], 03
Je   Control
Jmp  Return

Control:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [MobFollowX]
Cmp  [Ecx+000006F4], Eax
Pop  Eax
Jl   GoRight
Jg   GoLeft
Jmp  GoStop

GoLeft:
Mov  [Ecx+0000013C], FFFFFFFF
Jmp  Return

GoRight:
Mov  [Ecx+0000013C], 00000001
Jmp  Return

GoStop:
Mov  [Ecx+0000013C], 00000000
Jmp  Return

Return:
Push 00B0C218	// 55 8B EC 83 EC 0C 53 56 57 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06
Ret

00F6DC18:
dd MobFollow
[Disable]
00F6DC18:
dd 00B0C218

Dealloc(MobFollowX)
Dealloc(MobFollow)
```

```txt
// 159.1 快速挖礦
[Enable]
//Bypass Timestamp
00A8FF8E: // 7C ?? 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 7F 03
db 90 90

//Bypass Slash-limit
00A8FF96:
db EB

//Bypass time between mines
00A9BDA5: // 75 0E 57 6A
db 90 90

db 7C 31

db 7F
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS159.1/TWMS159.1_ICS_人物損血不退.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS159.1 ICS 人物損血不退
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-08-08
// [c2 14 00]應該等於[c2 14 00]
[ENABLE]
00FCB060:
DD 00B334B1
[DISABLE]
00FCB060: // [9/10]
DD 00B33478 // [2/3] 55 8B EC 56 FF 75 08 8B F1 8B 06 FF 90
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS159.1/TWMS159.1_ICS_技能動畫消除.txt`:

```txt
Alloc(Hook, 32)

Hook:
Cmp [Esp], 00A605EC // [1/6] // 88 45 ?? 8B 06 8B CE FF 50
Jne 00A87EFB // [ (1/7) / N] // 55 8B EC 51 51 8B 0D ?? ?? ?? ?? 56 8D 45 ?? 50 E8
Mov [Esp], 00A66BBF // 往上數第二個Je To...
Jmp 00A87EFB

00FC67B0:
DD Hook
```

```txt
db 83 A0 68 9A 00 00 00                  // 006A2206 - and dword ptr [eax+00009A68],00
call 0068A173                            // 006A220D - call 0068A173 : [RPCRT4.I_RpcOpenClientThread+E3B]
db 8B 45 08                              // 006A2212 - mov eax,[ebp+08]
db 83 4D FC FF                           // 006A2215 - or dword ptr [ebp-04],-01
db 85 C0                                 // 006A2219 - test eax,eax
je MyLabel006A2227                       // 006A221B - je 006A2227
db 83 C0 F4                              // 006A221D - add eax,-0C
db 50                                    // 006A2220 - push eax
call 00402D1C                            // 006A2221 - call 00402D1C
db 59                                    // 006A2226 - pop ecx
MyLabel006A2227:
call 00C14801                            // 006A2227 - call 00C14801
db C2 44 00                              // 006A222C - ret 0044

```

`CheatScripts/TWMS159.1/TWMS159.1_ICS_神速撿物(限速版).txt`:

```txt
// TWMS159.1 ICS 神速撿物(限速版)
// Auther: Inndy
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FakeTime, 4)
Alloc(SuperPick, 512)
Label(LoopPick)
Label(NormalPick)

SuperPick:
Cmp  [Esp], 00ACF3BA // 50 8B ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B ?? 8D ?? ?? 51 8B
Jne  004CE2A1
Add  Esp, 4
Call 004CE2A1
Mov  Ecx, 5
LoopPick:
Dec  Ecx
Test Ecx, Ecx
Je   NormalPick
Push Ecx
Push Eax

Push Eax
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [011CBD80]
Add  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Mov  Ecx, [011CC6E8]
Call 0052A859
Mov  Ecx, [FakeTime]
Mov  Eax, [011CBD80]
Sub  [Eax+1C], Ecx
Add  [FakeTime], 1E
Mov  Eax, [011C6F20]
And  [Eax+00002108], 0
Pop  Eax
Pop  Ecx
Jmp  LoopPick
NormalPick:
Push Eax
Mov  Eax, [011C6F20]
And  [Eax+00002108], 0
And  [Eax+0000210C], 0
Mov  Ecx, [011CC6E8]
Call 0052A859
Jmp  00ACF3C2

00FC6780:
DD   SuperPick
[DISABLE]
00FC6780:
DD   004CE2A1

Dealloc(SuperPick)
Dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS159.1/TWMS159.1_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS159.1 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-08-08
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 00AD695A // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00B34185
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 00AD695A

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00FCB004:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00FCB004: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00B34185 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS159.1/TWMS159.1_ICS_連續擊.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS159.1 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-08-08
[ENABLE]
Alloc(R2_ICSEntry, 64)
Alloc(R2, 128)
Alloc(R2KEY, 4)
Alloc(NextTime, 4)
Label(R200)
Label(R2_Return)
Label(NormalR2)
//-----------------------------------------------
R2KEY:
DD 0
//-----------------------------------------------
R2_ICSEntry:
Cmp  [Esp], 00A604D6	// 39 ?? ?? ?? 00 00 74 ?? 51 8B C4 89 65 08
Jne  00A4917F
Call R2
Jmp  00A4917F
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]
Cmp  [R2KEY],2
Jl   R2_Return
Cmp  [R2KEY],3
Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------
R200:
Mov  [R2KEY],0
R2_Return:
Mov  [Esi+000004E0],Edi
Ret
//-----------------------------------------------
00FC6750:
DD R2_ICSEntry
[DISABLE]
00FC6750:   // [4/5]
DD 00A4917F // 55 8B EC 83 EC ?? 53 56 33 F6

DeAlloc(R2_ICSEntry)
DeAlloc(R2)
DeAlloc(R2KEY)
DeAlloc(NextTime)
```

```txt
DB 90 90
[DISABLE]

DB 7C 07
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS159.2/TWMS159.2_CRC_快速挖礦.txt`:

```txt
// 159.2 快速挖礦
[Enable]
//Bypass Timestamp
00A90667: // 7C ?? 39 9E ?? ?? 00 00 7F 03
db 90 90

//Bypass Slash-limit
00A9066F:
db EB

//Bypass time between mines
00A9C47E: // 75 0E 57 6A
db 90 90
[Disable]
00A90667:
db 7C 31

00A9066F:
db 7F

00A9C47E:
db 75 0e
```

```txt
//TwMS v159.2_ICS_全圖打箱子 by Toby
[Enable]
Alloc(FullMapBox, 64)
Label(ICSBack)

FullMapBox:
Cmp [Esp], 00A94129
Jne ICSBack
Mov [Esp], 00A9412D
Jmp ICSBack

ICSBack:
Jmp IntersectRect

011DBBF8:
DD FullMapBox
[Disable]
011DBBF8:
DD IntersectRect
DeAlloc(FullMapBox)
```

```txt
// TWMS159.2 ICS 人物快速移動
// Update: Inndy
// UpdateTime: 2013-08-12
[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(HookTime)

dd 0A

SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 00AD7033 // 8B ?? ?? 00 00 00 8B 4D ?? 83 C0
jne 00B34878
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal

dec esi
push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 00AD7033

HookTime:
add eax, [FakeTime]
add [FakeTime], 000001FE
jmp %hooktimeback%

00FCB014:
dd SpeedUp

%hooktime%:
jmp HookTime

[disable]
00FCB014: // [9/10] // 008E0059
dd 00B34878 // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06

%hooktime%: // [4/4] 倒數第4個jmp // dd 1c 24 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? db 45 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 58 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ? dd 40 ? 68 ? ? ? ? e9 ? ? ? ?
jmp %hooktimeback%

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

```txt
// TWMS159.2 ICS 連續擊
// Auther: Inndy

[ENABLE]

Jne  00A49858
Call R2
Jmp  00A49858
//-----------------------------------------------
R2:
Push Eax
Call GetTickCount
Cmp  [NextTime], Eax
Jl   NormalR2
Mov  [R2KEY], 0
Mov  [NextTime], Eax
Add  [NextTime], 1388	//5秒自動清除
NormalR2:
Pop  Eax
Inc  [R2KEY]

Jl   R2_Return

Jg   R200
Mov  Edi,ffffffff //2a or ffffffff
Jmp  R2_Return
//-----------------------------------------------

Ret
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS166.2/TWMS166.2_ICS_FullMap.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(FullMapHack, 128)
GlobalAlloc(FullMapHack_Switch, 4)
GlobalAlloc(FullMapHackXY, 8)
Label(FullMap)
Label(ExitFullMap)
Label(SetXY)
Label(Fix)

FullMapHack:
	Add  Esp, 04
	Call VariantClear
	Cmp  [Esp], 00729680 // 59 8D 45 ?? 50 8B CF E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 8B 86
	Je   FullMap
	Cmp  [Esp], 0072984F // 59 8D 45 ?? 50 8D 8E ?? ?? 00 00 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 85 C0
	Je   Fix
	Ret

FullMap:
	Add  Esp, 04
	DB   59,8D,45,A0,50,8B,CF
	Push 0072968C // Return Address
	DB   56,57,8B,7C,24,0C
	
	Cmp  [FullMapHack_Switch], 0
	Je   ExitFullMap
	Cmp  [FullMapHack_Switch], 2
	Je   SetXY

	Push [FullMapHackXY]
	Pop  [Edi]
	Push [FullMapHackXY+04]
	Pop  [Edi+04]

ExitFullMap:
	Jmp  0043F273 // Push [Edi]

SetXY:
	Mov  Ecx, [01532780]
	Add  Ecx, 04
	Push FullMapHackXY
	Mov  Eax, [Ecx]
	Call [Eax+10]
	Jmp  ExitFullMap

Fix:
	Add  Esp, 04
	DB   59,8D,45,A0,50,8D,8E,DC,07,00,00
	Call 006F57EA
	Jmp  00729866

00F982B0:
DD FullMapHack
[DISABLE]
00F982B0:
DD VariantClear

Dealloc(FullMapHack)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS166.2/TWMS166.2_ICS_NoDelay.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
GlobalAlloc(GND_ICS,256)
Label(GndHook)

GND_ICS:
Cmp [Esp], 00C2B885 //89 ? ? ? ? ? 83 ? ? ? ? ? ? 74 ? 8b ? ? ? ? ? 8b ? ? ? ? ? 3b
Jne 00BF8826 //8b ? ? ? ? ? 85 ? 74 ? 83 ? ? eb ? 33 ? 85 ? 74 ? 83 ? ? c3 33 ? c3 8b ? ? ? ? ? 85 ? 74 ? 83[14/11]
Mov [Esp], GndHook
jmp 00BF8826

GndHook:
mov [ebp-00000278],eax
cmp dword ptr [ebp-0000023C],00
je 00C2B8B4
mov eax,[ebp-00002D9C]
mov ecx,[ebp-0000023C]
jmp 00C2B8A8

012C88F0:
DD GND_ICS
[DISABLE]
012C88F0:
DD 00BF8826
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS166.2/TWMS166.2_ICS_無敵30秒.txt`:

```txt
[ENABLE]
Alloc(GodMode, 128)
Label(God)
Label(Normal)
GlobalAlloc(GodTick, 4)

GodMode:
	Cmp  [Esp], 00C552E0 // 8B C8 E8 ?? ?? ?? FF 85 C0 0F 85 ?? ?? 00 00 57 8B
	Jne  Normal

	Call 00C9CE0B
	Cmp  Eax, [GodTick]
	Jl   God

	Add  Eax, #30000
	Mov  [GodTick], Eax
    Jmp  Normal

God:
	Mov  [Esp], 00C57BA5 // Exit Function, Jne To...

Normal:
	Jmp  00C60141 // A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 05 ?? ?? 00 00 C3 81 C1

012C8914:
DD GodMode
[DISABLE]
012C8914:
DD 00C60141

Dealloc(GodMode)
```

`CheatScripts/TWMS166.2/TWMS166.2_ICS_移動加速.txt`:

```txt
// TWMS166.2 ICS 移動加速
// Update: Inndy

[enable]
alloc(SpeedUp,128)
alloc(Client,128)
alloc(Speed,4)
alloc(FakeTime,4)
label(SpeedChk)
label(Normal)
label(SpeedUpMain)

Speed: // 移動速度
dd 0A


SpeedUp:
cmp [esp], 00C5AFCF //8b ?? ?? 00 00 00 8b 4d ?? 83 c0 ??  //00C1971A
jne 00CD2C7C
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,[Speed]
jmp SpeedChk

SpeedUpMain:
add esp, 4
push esi
mov esi,6
jmp SpeedChk

SpeedChk:
test esi,esi
je Normal
dec esi

Pushad
Mov Ecx,[Client]
mov eax,[01537670]  //point~ A1 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 50 //mov eax,[014b4830]
Lea Eax,[Eax+1C]    
Add [Eax],Ecx
Popad

push esi
push ecx
push eax
call dword ptr [eax]
pop eax
pop ecx
pop esi

Pushad
Mov Ecx,[Client]
mov eax,[01537670]  //mov eax,[014b4830]
Lea Eax,[Eax+1C]
Sub [Eax],Ecx
Add [Client],000001Fe
Popad
jmp SpeedChk

Normal:
pop esi
jmp 00C5AFCF   //00C1971A

012CE4C4:   //0125BD54
dd SpeedUp

[disable]
012CE4C4: // [-3/N]  //0125BD54
dd 00CD2C7C // [2/2] // 53 56 57 8b f9 8d 77 ?? 8b 06  //00C8EEE4

dealloc(SpeedUp)
dealloc(Speed)
dealloc(FakeTime)
```

```md
# TWMS-Hacking-Data

## 我已經不玩楓之谷了，去找別人討論吧

Happy Hacking :)

More things can be found at [https://github.com/MapleStoryGameHack](https://github.com/MapleStoryGameHack)
```
